column2: Yesu Kristo yɛ kigyɔgyɔɛ ɛ mɛ kusrɔsrɔɔ kwitrɛ te e: Yesu onu Dawid yɛ lipo me obi lɛ Dawid fɛ ɛ, onu Abraham yɛ lipo me obi i.
Niteme si dɔnɔ ní Abraham aʋa kɔna ni Dawid aʋa ɛ, kigyɔgyɔɛ mɛ kinu sì: Abraham apɔ Isak, Isak apɔ Yakob, lɛ Yakob apɔ Yuda ni yɛ beneminyime ba ɛ.
Yuda apɔ Peres ani Sera. Ba onee eze Tamar. Nite si Peres apɔ Xezron, lɛ Xezron apɔ Aram i.
Aram apɔ Aminadab, Aminadab apɔ Nahson, lɛ Nahson apɔ Salmon i.
Salmon ni Raxab bɛpɔ Boaz, Boaz ni Rut bɛpɔ Obed, lɛ Obed apɔ Isai i. Lɛ Isai apɔ Okusi ye Dawid i.

Dɔnɔ ní Dawid yɛ lipoe le aʋa kɔna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Babilonia banɛ ma bevu Israel bebi ba ní kigũ i tsinɔ ní Babilonia kesea aʋa ɛ, Yesu yɛ kigyɔgyɔɛ mɛ kusrɔsrɔɔ kwitrɛ kɛ aʋa nite: Okusi ye Dawid apɔ Salomo. Salomo yene ezeni Uriya.
Salomo apɔ Rexabeam. Rexabeam apɔ Abiya, lɛ Abiya apɔ Asa ɛ.
Asa apɔ Yehosafat, Yehosafat apɔ Yoram, lɛ Yoram apɔ Uziya ɛ.
Uziya apɔ Yotam, Yotam apɔ Axaz, lɛ Axaz apɔ Xizkiya ɛ.
Xizkiya apɔ Manase, Manase apɔ Amon, lɛ Amon apɔ Yosia ɛ.
Lɛ Yosia apɔ Yexonya ni yɛ beneminyime ba ní ba Babilonia aboyo la me kuzezeo lipoe le me e.
Dɔnɔ ní Babilonia aboyo la mɛ kuzeze o kede kɔkpɛni Yesu yɛ kupɔpɔɔ mɛ ɛ, kigyɔgyɔɛ mɛ kitrɛ kɛ aʋa nite: Yexonya apɔ Sealtiel, lɛ Sealtiel apɔ Zerubabel i.
Zerubabel apɔ Abihud, Abihud apɔ Elyakim, nite si Elyakim apɔ Azur.
Azur apɔ Zadok, Zadok apɔ Yaxin, lɛ Yaxin apɔ Elihud i.
Elihud apɔ Eleazar, Eleazar apɔ Matan, lɛ Matan apɔ Yakob i.
Nite si Yakob apɔ Yosef. Yosef yedze eze Maria a. Lɛ Maria ɛ, yɛ apɔ Yesu gi yɛ onu Kristo e.

Niteme si Abraham yɛ lipo le me bebi ba kɔna ni Dawid aʋa ɛ, beze liɔfɔ ni tiene. Lɛ sɛ̀ ní Dawid aʋa kɔna ni Babilonia aboyo la mɛ kutrɛtrɛɔ aʋa ɛ, ba fɛ beze liɔfɔ ni tiene. Lɛ dzɛ ɛ, dɔnɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa kɔna ni Yesu lipɔpoe le aʋa ɛ, lipo le me bebi ba beze liɔfɔ ni tiene.
Yesu Kristo yɛ kupɔpɔɔ mɛ eboe la ɛtrɛ nite: Beʋi yene Maria litukpo ɛki Yosef. Pɔ xe ableke biakpɛ likpɔ ɛ, amɔ si yɛ akɔ limɛ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ mɛ kooko.
Yenye Yosef eze ɔnɔ gi abitɛ ní Aya yɛ isã nɛ aʋa a, niteme si ɔ́pɛ si yikpɛ ɔdzɛɛ kuye e ní banima aŋu mɛ. Lɛ loso e, atrɔ si yɛ ayurɔ yɛ ní kikpokpo me.

Agi azeegyo eboa la su edi i, Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ebu isu ya abasɛ Yosef ní kulila mɛ. Lɛ akpɛ ɔna ní yɛ lipo si, “Yosef, Dawid yebie, wukíse lifu ní Maria kugbanɔɔ su u, lɛ ese linu si yɛ limɛ nɛ ɛ, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ mɛ lidɔ ɔ.
Atrápɔ obinyime gi biaxwa yɛ si Yesu lɛ ese linu si yɛ atrábu yɛ benete ba ní ba eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ.”
Kɔ eboa la ya pɔ́ ɛba la mɛ, tɔ biakɔ bloni liboe lɛ gi Aya apani aplɛ gani yɛ oboedoplɛɛ aʋa sì,
“Di ke, ɔdisami gi óte onyime e, aakɔ̀ limɛ ɛ, gi aapɔ obinyime e, lɛ biaxwa yɛ si Imanuel,” gi lɛ ese linu si “Aya ɔlɛ ni blɔ.”
Agi Yosef enyime ní sra sɛ mɛ ɛ, abitɛ ní Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ yɛ liboe le aʋa. Niteme si agbani Maria.
Pɔ ɛ, yɛ ni yɛ béze edi zɛkɔ nani lipoe lɛ gi apɔ yebinyime tɔpu yɛ pɔ́ ɛ. Lɛ Yosef axwa obi ye linyi si Yesu i.
Agi bɛpɔ Yesu ní Betlehem ní Yudea, ní Okusi ye Herodes lipoe le me e, beboete ba bɛdɔ ní kewetu ya ɛba Yerusalem, lɛ beʋi sì
“Nifɔ kwiamɔ Yudanɛ ma Okusi ye gi bɛpɔ ɔ? Kwimɔ yɛ liŋui nɛ, lɛ kwiba si kwitrakpɛ litukpo kesea ɛki yɛ ɛ.”
Agi Okusi ye Herodes enu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, yɛ ɔna nɔ ɛhwa. Lɛ Yerusalem banɛ ma pɔ́ fɛ ɛ, liboe le lihwa ni ba a.
Lɛ axwa kusɔliɔ baka ba petee ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba pɔ́ akpɛ likpɔ, lɛ apamí liboe le me nì ba si, “Nifɔ biapɔ Kristo ye?”
Lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Ní Betlehem, ní Yudea, lɛ ese linu si, Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ aŋwlimi a plɛ si:
‘Lɛ wɔ Betlehem ní Yuda kesea aʋa ɛ,
wɔ wonu ɔma sisami nɔ ní Yuda ikusima nɛ kusi;
pɔ lɛ wɔ mɛ ɔnɔgbanɔɛ
gi yɛ atrá gbani mɛ Israel ɔma nɔ aadɔ.’ ”
Lɛ Herodes axwa beboete ba tsinɔ ní kutsatsa mɛ ní kikpokpo me, lɛ apami lipoe lɛ klɔ gi liŋui nɛ lido e nì ba mɔmɔmɔ.
Le kede e, akpɛ ba atsisi Betlehem, lɛ asi ba sì, “Mlazɛpɛ́ obi ye mɔmɔmɔ; tɔ xegi mlɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, mledzi ba atɔ mlagasi mɛ, tɔ mɛ fɛ maatrɛ tɔ miikpɛ litukpo kesea ɛki yɛ.”

Agi benu Okusi ye eboe la pɔ́ ɛ, beku kudeo me. Gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ liŋui nɛ klɔ gi bɛmɔ ní kewetu ya ɛ, ní ba ɔtɔ nɔ. Isami nɛ iku ba nyani nyani lɛ liŋui nɛ lizeeli ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi obi ye eze e, ka ada la mɛ ɛ.

Gi beti iku ní kepea mɛ pɔ́ ɛ, bɛmɔ obi ye nì yene Maria; lɛ bedu ba aklamasi na kesea lɛ bɛkpɛ etukpo kesea ɛki obi ye. Lɛ bebu ba bidɔkɔkɔɛ ʋɛ gi bize sika, kotoklobo ani lifi yɛ ní ba igudo le me ɛki obi ye e.
Agi Aya ebu abasɛ ba ní kulila mɛ si bakídzi atrɛ ní Herodes klɔ tɔ ɛ, bɛga kude dzedze lɛ bɛtrɛ ní ba kepea ɛ.

Agi bɛsɛ pɔ́ ɛ, Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ebu isu ya abasi Yosef ní kulila mɛ si, “Herodes atrápɛ obi ye si yiye ye, lɛ loso e, yɔ tɔ gbani obi ye ni yene tɔ sé trɛ ní Egipte. Mleze niklɔ kɔzɛna nani lipoe lɛ klɔ gi maasi mlɔ si mlasɛ edzi i.”
Niteme si Yosef ayɔ, lɛ agbani obi ye ni yene elesi la lɛ eseni ba atsinɔ ní Egipte e.
Beze ní Egipte kɔzɛna nani Herodes litsepoe le. Lɛ loso e, liboe lɛ gi Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ apani si “Maxwa Mobi ye adɔ ní Egipte e,” liba lɛ mɛ.

Agi Herodes amɔ si beboete ba gi bɛdɔ kewetu ya bekyi ye exla ɛ, amɔ kusuyeʋi nyani nyani. Lɛ loso e, akpɛ ɔsã si beye obinyime kakaa gi azɛ agɔ taʋa pleno ní Betlehem ani imaɛ nɛ klɔ gi iklani lɔ ɛ. Ebu ɔkliɔ lɔ klɔ kɔkpɛ liboe lɛ klɔ gi enu adɔ ní bababa ʋa onu ní ɔnuvɔɛ lipɔpoe le su i.
Niteme liboe lɛ gi Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ Yeremya apani aplɛ ɛ,
liba lɛ mɛ si, “Ole ɔtɔ eyi ní Rama,
gi onu kubemi gagla ole.
Raxel eebemi yɛ bebi ba;
ɔ́dimɛ si bayɔ yɛ ɔna a,
lɛ ese linu si yɛ bebi ba pɔ́ betse.”
Ní Herodes kutseo kede e, Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ebu isu ya abasi Yosef ní kulila mɛ ní Egipte,
lɛ apani si, “Yɔ, gbani obi ye ni yene, atɔ dzitrɛ ní Israel kesea aʋa, lɛ ese linu si banama gi bɛpɛ si beye obi ye e, betse.”
Loso e Yosef ayɔ, lɛ agbani obi ye ni yene, atsinɔ ní Israel kesea ʋa ɛ.
Pɔ̀ gi Yosef enu si Arxelao yɛ ɛɛŋa kukusi yo ní yɛka Herodes kutse o kede ní Yudea ɛ, ese lifu ne ki niklɔ kutrɛtrɛ. Agi bɛkpɛ yɛ ɔsã ní kulilaa mɛ loso e, ekyi atrɛ ní Galilea kesea mɛ.
Lɛ atsa kepe ní ɔma ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si Nazaret mɛ ɛ. Nite si liboe lɛ gi bedo eplɛ gani beboedoplɛ ba ʋa si “Banima biaxwa Yɛ si Nazaret Ɔnɛ ɛ” liba lɛ mɛ.
Ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ aba Yudea ɔyaya klɔ lɛ azɛɛpani Aya yɛ liboe le e.
Apani si, “Mlekyi ní mlɔ ìna nɛ mɛ, lɛ ese linu si lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa ketii pɔnɔ!”
Yohanes yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ su gi bɛpani i gani Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ Yesaya aʋa si:
“Ɔniɛ ɛɛkla Aya yɛ Liboe le ní ɔyaya klɔ si,
‘Mlalulɔ kudeo aplɛ akí Ɔkaɛ;
mlagyɔ kudeo akí yɛ atɔ aaga!’ ”
Lɛ kposɔ sipi liwu Yohanes akpɛ, lɛ akɔ kagaplekpa ɔgɛmi akɔ anya yɛ kasɛa mɛ ɛ. Yɛ kiŋaŋaɛ kize akikli ni liŋwafu mɛ kìbu.
Banima bɛdɔ ní Yerusalem ni Yudea ani Yɔdan onipe lo su gi bɛba yɛ klɔ.
Lɛ bɛdra ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ, xe akpɛ kuni aki ba ní Yɔdan onipe lo me e.

Agi Yohanes amɔ Farisianɛ ma ni Zadukianɛ ma ní kisrɛsrɛ mɛ gi bɛzɛba yɛ klɔ si ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba ɛ, “eʋi ba si, mlɔ banama gi mlɔ etukpo la mɛ alɛ gaglaa ŋwisi bagblaga ʋa kinɛ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ asi mlɔ si mlese ní Aya yɛ kutuheheo gi kwitraba onu na a?
Mlabitɛ eboa la gi aabasɛ si mlekyi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ.
Nite si mlakíbù si mlatani kuse ní kutuheheo onu xe mlɛkɔ lɛ si Abraham yɛ onu mlɔ ɔkatsitsi ye. Mɛɛsi mlɔ si Aya aatani akla ana na ya kukɔ bitɛ besoebi ki Abraham!
Bɛkɔ kawɛa ɛtrɔ ní ise le igu ne aʋa kooko; nite si ose kakaa gi óyo esebi gbã ɛ, biate lo kɔŋwia kpɛ́ ní kifu yɛ mɛ.

Makpɛ kuni aki mlɔ gi libasɛ si mlekyi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi aaba ní mɛ kedea ɛ, yɛ kɔɔ aakpɛ kuni ki mlɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ani kifu. Yɛ emu asani mɛ kura, lɛ mégyeno gi maagbɔni yɛ afɔkpa ʋa kyɛ ɛ.
Evu yɛ kitɛɛ gi atrákɔ ɛ pí amu na petee e. Atrákpɛ yɛ amu na likpɔ ní owle lo me, kɔ akpɛ itsɔ lɛ ni kifu monimoni ye me.”
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu ádɔ Galilea lɛ aba Yohanes klɔ ní Yordan onipe lo kutu si tɔ Yohanes ɔkpɛ kuni yo ɔki yɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yohanes apɛ si yitsi kude kí Yesu. Lɛ loso asi yɛ si, “Wɔ́ linu si wɔakpɛ kuni ki mɛ. Lɛ wɔ boŋu wɔba mɔ klɔ a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu lɛ onu aki yɛ si, “Ki tɔ lize nite abla. Niteme si, kwiabitɛ Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa.” Liki si Yohanes adimɛ ɛ.
Kyɔŋ gi Yohanes akpɛ kuni yo aki Yesu pɔ ɛ, Yesu azeedo ní kuni yo me ko e, lɛ lifunu ne lidra ɛ, lɛ amɔ Aya Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ gi eeple edɔ ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ ní yɛ aʋa ɛ.
Lɛ ole ɔtɔ ɛpani dɔni lifunu ne si, “Mobi ye liɛ ya yɛ madimɛ nɔ yɛ liboe liku me aŋu u!”
Lɛ Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛgbani Yesu i tsinɔ ní ɔyaya klɔ tɔ Ozimizi ye ofeke ye odi i.
Agi Yesu aza kuʋɛ ewe avitene elesi ni kemize pɔ́ ɛ, kuʋɛ kwiku ye.
Lɛ Ozimizi ye aba yɛ klɔ ɔ; lɛ asi yɛ si, “Xe Aya Yebi wonu i, kɔlɔ ki tɔ akla la ya edzì bidɔŋaŋa aki wɔ.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Aya Liboe le lipani si, aní lìklãtata tete aʋa ɔnɔ aaze ligbã́. Pɔ̀ ɔnɔ aaze ligbã ní liboe kakaaɛ lɛ gi Aya aapani onu u.”
Lɛ Ozimizi ye atsini Yesu ní Yerusalem, ɔma dradra lɔ mɛ ɛ; lɛ atrɔ yɛ ní lisɔligba lɛ lɛ ɔpiɔpiɔ klɔ kee e.
Niklɔ asi Yesu si, “Xe Aya Yebi wonu i, pí atɔ dɔ kesea; lɛ ese linu si Aya Liboe le lipani i plɛ si,
‘Aya aaki yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ɔsã ní wɔ su
gi biasɔli wɔ ní ba kuwlaa mɛ ɛ,
nite si wɔ́trakɔ ɔkli isa likla a.’ ”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Pɔ̀ Aya Liboe le lipani dzɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ gi onu wɔ Aya ɛ, wukífeke ye edi i.’ ”
Lɛ dzɛ ɛ, Ozimizi ye atsini Yesu ní lito gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ aʋa a. Lɛ ebu kelea mɛ bèkusi ʋa pɔ́ ani ba kuʋidi yo abasi yɛ.
Lɛ Ozimizi ye asi yɛ si, “Xegi wodu aklamasi kese xe wɔkpɔ̀ mɛ ɛ, maakɔ bekusi ʋa ya petee ɔki wɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Sɛ ní mɛ su, Wɔ Satana, Liboe le lipani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ gi onu wɔ Aya ɛ, yɛ ko wɔasumu; lɛ yɛ lixwɛ ko wɔawa a!’ ”
Nite si Ozimizi ye asɛ ní Yesu su; lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bɛba ɛki yɛ kupɔnɔ ɛ.
Agi Yesu enu si bɛkpɛ Yohanes ni ligba lɛ ɛ, atrɛ ní Galilea.
Asɛ ní Nazaret lɛ adzɛ eze ní Kapernaum, gi onu ɔma ɔtɔ ní Galilea limu ne kutu ní Zebulon ni Naftali kuseo me e.
Nite yɛ kigaglaɛ kize, atɔ Yesaya Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ yɛ liboe le liba lɛ mɛ si,
“Zebulon kesea ni Naftali kesea,
kuse gi kuli axu la kudeo aʋa ɛ ní Yordan kewetu ya,
Galilea, banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ma ba kese!
Banama gi balɛ ní litumu ne me e,
biamɔ kuklekle ʋidi.
Lɛ banama gi bali ní kutseo litumu ne kesea aʋa a,
kuklekle kwiaba ba aʋa a.”
Dɔnɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, Yesu ekpese kusɔli si, “Mlekyi kede akpɛ mlɔ eboe zimizi na, lɛ ese linu si lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa ketii pɔnɔ!”
Agi Yesu azɛɛga aza ní Galilea limu ne kutu yɔ ɛ, amɔ beneminyime tiaʋa gi benu bakpábu i. Simon gi bɛzɛxwa fɛ si Petro e, ni yenemi ye Andrea. Bezee bu akpa la nì dzikle.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlekuni mɛ kude tɔ mabasɛ mlɔ banima kubúbú yo.”
Kyɔŋ lɛ bɛyurɔ ba dzikle lɛ bekuni yɛ kude e.

Yesu atrɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ lɛ azɛɛmɔ beneminyime tiaʋa dzedze e. Ba beze Yakobo ni Yohanes, gi benu Zebedeo yɛ bebi ba. Beze ní ba katapokpa me ni ba ɔkaɛ gi bɛzɛlulɔ ba dzikle ye e. Niteme si Yesu axwa ba kyɛ.
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, bɛsɛ ní katapokpa ni ba ɔkaɛ su lɛ bekuni ni Yesu kude e.
Yesu aklanɔ ní Galilea petee. Abasi bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsa klɔ. Apani Kaʋaŋaa su Liboe Gbã nɛ, lɛ ayɔni banama su gi bànya ede ede na eze e.

Benu Yesu unu ní Siria kesea petee me nite si banima bɛmani banyanya ba petee ní yɛ klɔ dɔni ikɔ ikɔ lɛ. Bɛzɛnyà bànya ede ede: kusutà, ifuɛfuɛ zimizi, kukpakpanya ani ɔnɔse kapɛ tiele kutsetse. Lɛ Yesu ayɔni ba petee e.
Anɔkpi la ɛdɔ Galilea, Dekapolis, Yerusalem, Yudea ani kuseo liɔ klɔ gi kuli ní Yɔdan kewetu ya ɛ, ekuni yɛ kude.
Agi Yesu amɔ anɔkpi la ɛ, emu ketokpaa lɛ eze ní kesea ɛ. Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛkpɛ likpɔ ní yɛ su i.
Lɛ ekpese ba bidɔ kubasɛ si,
“Isami iku banama gi bɛmɔ e gyesi si Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ kigagla kíma ní ba awla,
lɛ ese linu si lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, ba kanɛ kenu.”
Isami iku banama gi bɛwa awowoe la ɛ,
lɛ ese linu si Aya aayɔ ba ina a.
“Isami iku banama gi bɛbubɔ isu ya ɛ, ba kaŋasea kiaze kesea petee.
Isami iku banama gi bɛpɛ si beze ní Aya yɛ kude gyɔgyɔ aʋa ɛ.
lɛ ese linu si Aya aaki si biakè.
Isami iku banama gi bizedi banɔ dzedze ba asigaga la ɛ,
lɛ ese linu si Aya aadi ba asigaga a.
Isami iku banama gi ba ina nɛ mɛ idra ɛ,
lɛ ese linu si ba biaze ní Aya aŋu na mɛ ɛ!
Isami iku banama gi bizɛpɛ kusuyɔ ɛ,
lɛ ese linu si Aya aaxwa ba si yɛ bebi i.
Isami iku banama su gi bɛyɔ kedu ní Aya yɛ liboe le aʋa kubitɛɔ loso o,
lɛ ese linu si ba kanɛ kenu Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa a.
“Isami iku mlo xegi banima beekpini mlo, loo bɛyɔ kedu ní mlɔ su, aloo bɛsɛ asia zimizi ɛkpɛ mlɔ awla gi mlalɛ ní mɛ kude loso o.
Mlamɔ isami lɛ ese linu si bɛbla liʋɛ ʋidi itɔ ɛplɛ ki mlɔ ní lifunu ne. Kiliɛ gi bɛyɔ kedu ya ní mlɔ su i, nite ke lize ɛki Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ní kanaa mɛ ɛ.

“Yesu apani si, “Mlalɛ ŋwisi kumwɛ ki kelea pɔ́. Pɔ̀ xegi ɔgyi nɔ eblo ní kɔ mɛ ɛ, batrátani ɔgyi nɔ kudzini ikpɛ ní kɔ mɛ tɔ ɔ. Kúpɛ ɛki kididɔ tɔ ɔ. Nite si biakyi ko bali kɔ banima bɛga ní kɔ aʋa ɛ.
“Mlalɛ ŋwisi kani aki kelea mɛ. Ɔma gi bɛtsa ní lito aʋa ɛ, óʋikpo o.
Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋisu kani xe izɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ kasɔʋi ese e. Boŋu i, bizɛkɔ yɛ ɛsu lifune kɔ ekle aki ɔnɔ kakaa ní kepea mɛ ɛ.
Nite ke mlaki tɔ mlɔ kaniɛ okle ɔki banima, atɔ biamɔ mlɔ eboe gbã na, kɔ bɛkpɔ̀ mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne e.
“Mlakígyo le edi si maba si míbu Mose yɛ Isã nɛ ni beboedoplɛ ʋa bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ etu eʋe e. Mába si míbu ʋe zanɔ ɔ, boŋu i maba si tɔ ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ biba bɛ mɛ.
Sugba sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, agi lifunu ne ni kesea kalɛ ɛ, ɔplipami kyɛ ɔ́trado ní Ɔsã nɔ mɛ kɔzɛna ni eboe la mɛ libapoe le e.

Lɛ loso e, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aata ɔsã sisami nɔ ní isã nɛ kusi ese e, xe aabasɛ banɔ dzedze ba si ba kyɛ babitɛ nite e, ɔniliɛ klɔ aaze ɔsisami yɛ ní lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa mɛ. Pɔ̀ ní kapɛ ʋlaa mɛ ɛ, ɔniliɛ gi aabitɛ ní isã nɛ aʋa a, xe abasi banɔ dzedze ba si ba kyɛ babitɛ nite e, yɛ aaze ɔnɔ ʋidi ní lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.

Mɛɛsi mlɔ si xegi mlɔ kubitɛɔ ní Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a, gi kɔ kiaki si mlɔ liboe liagyɔ ní Aya kɔ ɔ, xe kúsani Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma kiniɛ ɛ, mlatrátani kuti iku ní lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.
“Mleenu gi bɛsi kana mɛ banɛ ma si, ‘Wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ. Ɔniliɛ gi aaye ɔnɔ ɛ, biaxwa litsi ni yɛ.’

Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aamɔ kusuyeʋi ní yenemi su i, biaxwa litsi ni yɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi aasi yenemi ye si, ‘Wɔ́pɛ ɔki kididɔ ɛ!’ biahe ye ɔtsinɔ ní otsixwaklɔ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aakpinì yenemi ye si ɔga ɛ, aaze kuxixa mɛ kí kifu monimoni ye me kutrɛtrɛ.
Lɛ loso e, xegi wɔɛtrɛ ní bidɔ ɔpɔʋi kɔ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ aʋa ɛki Aya a, xe wɔplɛ aŋu si liboe lilɛ ní wɔ onemi ye me ni wɔ ɛ,
yurɔ wɔ bidɔ mɛ plɛ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ɔtɔ nɔ atɔ zɛbitɛ kusuyɔ ni yɛ kyɔŋ. Lɛ kede e, dzi ba atɔ gapɔʋi wɔ bidɔ mɛ ki Aya.

“Xe ɔnutɔ akɔ liboe ní wɔ su ní otsixwakɔ ɔ, xe lipoe le lilɛ ɛ, ye liboe le nì yɛ xe litsixwawe le liana a. Xegi aní nite e, xe mleku otsixwaklɔ ɛ, aakɔ̀ wɔ kukpɛ awla ki otsixwa yɛ, kɔ yɛ kyɛ akɔ wɔ akpɛ awla aki bewukpɛ ʋa ɛ. Niteme si biakpɛ wɔ ligba.
Sugba sugba ɛ, níklɔ wɔaze kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ gi wɔatsa liʋɛ kakaa gi bɛnya ɛki wɔ ɛ.
“Mleenu gi bɛpani si, ‘Mlakílɔ̀ ádzɛboe nì enyimeboe.’
Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi aadi ɔdzɛ ɛ, xe aaku yɛ kule si yifɛ ni yɛ ɛ, afɛ ni yɛ ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ kooko.
Lɛ loso e, xe wɔ kaŋaa mɛ kimbi ye kiaki si wɔata kese e, bu ke tuʋe e! Liapɛ ki wɔ si lila wɔ kapɛatɔ sani si tɔ bakɔ wɔ ɔnɔse lo petee aŋwia kpɛ kifu monimoni ye me e.
Lɛ ɛ, xegi wɔ ɔŋawla lɔ aaki si wɔata kese e, tsa lɔ tuʋe. Liapɛ ɛki wɔ si lila wɔ kapɛatɔ sani si tɔ bakɔ wɔ ɔnɔse lo petee aŋwia kpɛ kifu monimoni ye me e.
“Bɛpani fɛ si, ‘Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aayurɔ yedze e, ɔŋwlimi kadzɛgbeplekpa aki yɛ.’

Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xegi onyime ayurɔ yedze e, gi aní enyimeboe alɔ ɛ, kɔ onyimee yɛ aki si ɔdzɛɛ alɔ enyimeboe xegi ɔdzɛɛ atrɛ onyime dzedze kɔ ɛ. Lɛ onyime liɛ klɔ kɔ gi ɔdzɛɛ atrɛ ɛ, yɛ kyɛ alɔ ádzɛboe.
“Mlenu gi bepani dzɛ si, ‘Mlakíta mlɔ kedoplɛ ese, pɔ̀ mlabitɛ ní mlɔ bitamu bɛ aʋa kí Ɔkaɛ.’
Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si xegi mlɛbitɛ kedoplɛ ɛ, mlakíta ka ese. Mlakítani lifunu ne e, lɛ ese linu si lɛ linu Aya yɛ likusigbo le e.
Mlakítani kesea, lɛ ese linu si ka kenu Aya yɛ ikli lɛ odu klɔ ɔ. Mlakítani Yerusalem kyɛ ɛ lɛ ese linu si onu Okusi ʋidi ye yɛ ɔma.
Lɛ ɛ, mlakítani mlɔ etukpo la kyɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlatrátani kuya pititi tule loo kukpikpi tule kubitɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ kiboedoe ko kize si, ‘Ee’ aloo ‘Oo’. Liboe kakaa gi mlapani lɛ ya kede e, lidɔ ní Ozimizi ye klɔ ɔ.
“Mleenu gi bɛpani si, ‘Xegi wɔyaʋi ɔnutɔ kimbi i, linu si bayaʋi wɔ kiniɛ kyɛ.’ Lɛ ɛ, xegi wɔvini ɔnutɔ line e, biavini wɔ lini nɛ kyɛ.
Pɔ̀ mɛɛsi mlɔ abla si mlakíʋi kuwle aki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ. Xe ɔnutɔ ábɔ wɔ bidɔ ní ɔŋawla lɔ kutu yɔ mɛ ɛ, ki tɔ ɔbɔ wɔ ní kaʋaa kuni yɔ mɛ kyɛ.
Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ liboe nì wɔ ní otsixwakɔ si tɔ yizɛ wɔ liwu le ese lini nɛ ɛ, yurɔ lɛ aʋa lini nɛ kyɛ ki yɛ.
Lɛ xegi ɔgũta ɔtɔ emi wɔ aʋa si tu yɛ lidɔtu le ki yɛ ɔtiplɛkɔ tole e, tu le itiplɛkɔ tiʋa.
Xe ɔnutɔ eʋi wo kiditɔ ɛ, ki yɛ kɛ. Xe ɔnutɔ apɛ si yidɔ kiditɔ ní wɔ awla ɛ, dɔ kɛ̀ ki yɛ.
“Mleenu gi bɛpani si, ‘Mlalɔ mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba atɔ mlekyri mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma.’
Pɔ̀ mɛɛsi mlɔ abla a si: mlalɔ mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma lɛ mlapɛ Aya ligbã aki banama gi bɛyɔ kedu ní mlɔ su i.
Atɔ mlaadzi mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne yɛ bebi. Lɛ ese linu si yɛ izɛki yɛ kuweo kuzekle ɛki banɔ zimizi ba ni banɔ gbã ba pɔ́. Lɛ ɛ, izɛki dzeni ye izɛdɔ ɛki banɔ gbã ba ni banɔ zimizi ba.
Xegi banama gi bɛdimɛ ni mlɔ ko mlɔ kyɛ mlɛdimɛ nɔ ɛ, mlakígyo le edi si Aya aatsa liʋɛ tɔtɔ ɔki mlɔ ɔ. Lɛ ese linu si ligbãzeze lɛ klɔ elu lilɛ babɔgyɔ ba fɛ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ xegi mlɔ baʋia nɛ ba ko mlezeegu kunugu yo nɔ e, kiboebitɛ gbã woli lu mlɛsa kubitɛ ɛ? Banama gi béte Aya ɛ, ani nite ko ba kyɛ bizɛbitɛ ɛ?
Mlaki si mlɔ kizezee me kiflɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne aflɔ kinɛ ɛ.
“Mledi lɛ aʋa si, mlakíbitɛ mlɔ eboe gbã na ní banima aŋu mɛ tɔ bamɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ xe mlɛbitɛ nite, Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne ɔ́tratsa liʋɛ tɔtɔ ɛki mlɔ ɔ.

“Lɛ loso xe wɔki opiplinete kiditɔ ɛ, wukísa lɛ kamasa ŋwisi kiliɛ gi banɔ aŋumɛboebitɛ ba bizɛbitɛ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ni ablɔ ʋa aʋa kinɛ atɔ banima bakpɔ̀ ba. Sugba sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, bɛzi ba liʋɛtsatsa lɛ kooko.
Pɔ̀ xe wɔpɔni opiplinete e, wukíki tɔ wɔ ɔʋia nɛ kyɛ ote e.
Nite si wɔ kiboebitɛ ɛ kiaze liboe kpòkpo. Kɔ wɔ Ɔka gi izɛmɔ eboe kpòkpò la ɛ, aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ɔki wɔ ɔ.

“Xe mlɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlakíbitɛ lɛ ŋwisi banɔ aŋumɛboebitɛ ba kinɛ ɛ, gi bizɛpɛ si bɛyɔ ɛlɛɛ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ni ablɔ ʋa aʋa tɔ bɛxwa Aya atɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ ba a. Sugba sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si bɛzi ba liʋɛtsatsa lɛ kooko.
Pɔ̀ xe wɔɛxwa Aya ɛ, tiku wɔ ligba lɛ mɛ, da opupo lo tɔ xwa Aya gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋímɔ ɛ. Kɔ wɔ Ɔka gi izɛmɔ kikpòkpo me kiboebitɛ kakaa ɛ, aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ki wɔ.
“Xe wɔɛxwa Aya ɛ, wukízeege eboe la epio ŋwisi kiliɛ gi babubitɛ ba bizɛbitɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si bebu si xegi ba eboe la ɛsrɛ ɛ, kɔ ba Aya enu aki ba ɛ.
Wukíyi ba, lɛ ese linu si wɔ Ɔka ete wɔ baziazia ʋa kooko xe ableke wɔeʋi ye e.
Lɛ loso e, xe mlɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlapani si:
‘Blɔ Ɔka ní lifunu ne:
biakpɛ kubùbù yo ní wɔ linyí dradra lɛ su;
Kí wɔ Kaʋaŋaa keple ku ní blɔ kusi,
kí tɔ babitɛ ní wɔ kupɛ́pɛɔ aʋa ní kesea aʋa ŋwisi kiliɛ gi lilɛ ní lifunu ne e.
Kí blɔ omono liwe le kiŋaŋaɛ.
Atɔ kɔ blɔ eboe zimizi na kyɛ blɔ; ŋwisi si kiliɛ
gi blɔ fɛ kwikɔ banima eboe zimizi na ní blɔ su i kyɛ ba kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ ɛ, wukíkɔ tɔ kukú ní kufekedi me e,
pɔ bú blo dɔni ní ozimizi ye iwla mɛ.
Lɛ “Xe mlɛkɔ banima eboe zimizi na ní mlɔ su i, kyɛ ba ɛ, mlɔ Ɔka ní lifunu ne fɛ aakɔ̀ mlɔ ani na kyɛ mlɔ.
Pɔ xe mlákɔ banima eboe zimizi na akyɛ ba ɛ, mlɔ Ɔka fɛ ɔ́trakɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ mlɔ.
“Xegi mlɛɛnya onugu lo e, mlakinyasi aŋu mɛ ŋwisi baŋumeboebitɛ ba kiniɛ. Bizɛɛnyasi aŋu mɛ atɔ banima ba mɔ si bɛɛnya onugu. Sugba sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, bɛzi ba liʋɛtsatsa lɛ kooko.
Xe mlɛnya onugu lo e, mleplo mlɔ aŋu na mɛ, mlasra kumu mlɔ etukpo la, atɔ mlebu mlɔ síya sɛ
atɔ banima bakímɔ egyesi si mlɛɛnya onugu, pɔ̀ mlɔ Ɔka gi baʋímɔ ɛ yɛ tete ko. Atɔ mlɔ Ɔka gi izɛɛmɔ bidɔ gi bɛbitɛ ní kikpokpo me e, aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ki mlɔ.
“Mlakibla kupimi yo ɛki mlɔ isu ya ní kesea aʋa niklɔ gi asu na ni kugyewlegyewleo kwiazizi ʋe xe beze ʋa biayaʋi uku xe biazuru.
Pɔ mlabla kupimi yo ki isu ya ní lifunu ne, niklɔ gi asu na ni kugyewlegyewle kutrázizi ʋe lɛ beze ʋa kyɛ batrátani kuyaʋi ku xe biazuru u.
Lɛ ese linu si, niklɔ gi wɔ kepimia kalɛ ɛ, niklɔ wɔ begyodi ʋa bizeeze.
“Bimbi bilɛ ŋwisi kani kí ɔnɔse lo. Xe wɔ bimbi ʋe bipɛ ɛ, wɔ ɔnɔse lo petee aakle.
Pɔ xe wɔ bimbi ʋe bìpɛ ɛ, wɔ ɔnɔ zizi yɛ wɔayi ní litumu. Lɛ loso xe kaniɛ ní wɔ mɛ onu litumu i, kɔlɔ litumu zizi lilɛ ní wɔ mɛ ɛ.
“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́traze baka tiaʋa ba ɔxwɛdzɛ ní lipoe tile me, aakyi kede kpɛ tole kɔ adimɛ ni ɔʋla ɛ; loo aadra isu mɛ ki tole kɔ ayɔ kedu ní ɔʋlaɛ su i. Wɔtratani Aya ni kibɔ axwɛ kuwa akpɛ likpɔ ɔ.

“Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si mlakíta ɔna ní mlɔ ligbã, loo kiŋaŋaɛ loo biŋwɛŋwɛ, aloo mlɔ isu ya su ani kidiliɛ gi mlakpɛ su. Xe wodi i, ligbã líziã ɛ sani kiŋaŋa na a? Lɛ ɔnɔse lo ɔ́ŋa kedzi i sani awu na a?
Mledi liwɔ lɛ mɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ; kuʋíkpɛ bidɔ loo vini bidɔ kɔbla ní owle me, pɔ fɛ ɛ mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne e izeedi kɔ aʋa. Mláŋa kedzi asani kɔ na a?
Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ma gi gani begyodi me e aatani ɔnyɔsasa tole ku kɔ pɔni yɛ agɔ la.
“Lɛ ege lɛ loso mlɛɛkpɛ isu kunugu i ki bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ? Mledi kiliɛ gi otukpomeyaʋi lɔ izefu u, xe izeeyo e. Ɔʋíwa axwɛ loo yo bidɔ ki isu.
Pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si Okusi ye Salomo kura ni yɛ kepimia ni yɛ kukemeo petee me fɛ ɛ ɔ̀ŋwi ŋwisi lɔ kiniɛ ɛ.
Xegi nite Aya izɛlulɔ siwa sɛ ɛ, gi silɛ omono o, xe kivo biaŋwia sɛ ɔkpɛ kifu mɛ ɛ, ɔ́tratani mlɔ kululɔ ni bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ sanɔ na a? Mlɔ kuziŋaa kuli sisami koŋ!
“Lɛ loso e, mlakítà ɔna ni mlɔ begyodi ʋa si, ege kwíatà, ege kwiaŋa, ege kwiaŋwɛ loo ege kwiakpɛ ɛ?
Niteme bidɔ mɛ banama gi béte Aya ɛ bizɛɛpɛ. Lɛ mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne e, ete si niteme bidɔ mɛ petee biziã mlɔ.
Pɔ̀ mlaki tɔ mlɔ bimbi ʋe bizã ní Aya kaʋaŋaa a ni yɛ kupɛ́pɛɔ aʋa kubitɛɔ su kpɛ ɔtɔ atɔ biakɔ bidɔ bɛ ya petee kukɔpɔnɔ ki mlɔ.
Lɛ loso e, mlakíta ɔna ní kivo su u, lɛ ese linu si kivo ɔtutɔ lɔ aakyi awla ní isu ya su. Liwe kakaa liawa axwɛ ní lɛ baxixa ʋa su.
“Mlakixwa litsi nì ɔnɔ, tɔ Aya kyɛ aʋáxwa litsi nì mlɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si, Aya aaxwa litsi ni mlɔ kiliɛ gi mlɛxwa litsi nì banima ɛ. Lɛ isãɛ nɛ gi mlɛkɔ ɛxwa litsi nì banima ɛ, lɛ ké aakɔ̀ xwa litsi ni mlɔ fɛ.
Ege lɛ loso woevu aŋu ní kumlu uliɔ gi kulí ní wonemi ye kimbi ye aʋa xe wɔyurɔ kanyikpea trɔ ní wɔ tutɔ wɔ kimbi ye aʋa na a?
Lɛ kítɛmɛ wɔɛsi wonemi ye si, ‘Di, kítɔ mibu simlu se ní wɔ kimbi ye aʋa,’ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi kanyikpea katini ní wɔ tutɔ wɔ kimbi ye aʋa na a?
Wɔ ɔnɔ ɔŋumɛboebitɛ, ti kanyikpea ní wɔ kimbi ye aʋa kɔ wɔɛmɔ mumɔ kɔ wɔtani simlu se kuti ní wonemi ye yɛ kimbie aʋa ɛ.
“Mlakíyurɔ bidɔ gi bɛsu bidra ɛplɛ akí kudroʋio; tɔ kwíakyi iku mlɔ aʋa a, Mlakíŋwia mlɔ ihwia kpakpa lɛ aplɛ ki iha lɛ, xegi aní te e, iafanya lɛ nì lɛ ikli lɛ.
“Mleʋi bidɔ tɔ biaki mlɔ, mlapɛ bidɔ tɔ mlaamɔ; mlasa opupo lo, tɔ biadra lɔ ɔki mlɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi eeʋi bidɔ ɛ, bizɛki yɛ, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɛɛpɛ bidɔ ɛ, aamɔ ʋɛ ɛ, ɔnɔ kakaa gi aasa opupo lo e, biadra lɔ ɔki yɛ.
Obika woli Yebi aaʋi ye lìklã xe aakɔ̀ likla ɔki yɛ na a?
Aloo xe eʋi ye lìkpa ɛ, aakɔ̀ ɔgblaga ɔki yɛ na a?
Lɛ xegi mlɔ gi mlenu banɔ zimizi ba, mlete kiliɛ gi mlaki mlɔ bebi ba bidɔ gbã ɛ; kitɛ xe mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne ɔ́traki banama gi beʋi ye bidɔ gbã ʋɛ na a.
“Lɛ loso kiliɛ gi mlɛpɛ si babitɛ akí mlɔ ɛ, mlɔ fɛ mlábitɛ nite aki ba a! Lɛ linu Ɔsã nɔ ese kununu yo ni Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ɛ.
“Mleti eku gani kevunu pɔpɔa mɛ; lɛ ese linu si kifu monimoni ye me kevunu ya kɔ ɛ, keenè, lɛ ka kudeo aʋa kugaga ɛ, kúma ɛ gagla a; lɛ banama gi batini ní kɔ aʋa ɛ, bɛsrɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ ligbã́ nɛ kevunu ya kɔ ɛ, kɛpɔ; lɛ ka kudeo aʋa kugagaa ɛ, kuli i gagla a, niteme si banɔ sisami atɔ ko bizɛmɔ kɔ.
“Mleze ní aŋuplɛplɛ mɛ ní asia na beboedoplɛ ba su, lɛ ese linu si biaba mlɔ klɔ ŋwisi iʋesi kinɛ ní aŋu mɛ. Pɔ̀ ní kimɛ mɛ ɛ, banyraga ɔtutɔ benu u.
Mlatè ba gani ba kiboebitɛɛ mɛ. Ɔdɔ̃ nɔ liho le liʋíyo wain yɛ ɛ, nite ke fife e oʋí yo esebi ŋaŋa a.
Lɛ loso e ose gbã izeyo esebi gbã, pɔ̀ ose nyani nyani izeyo esebi nyani nyani.
Lɛ ose gbã ɔ́tratani esebi nyani nyani kuyo, nite ke ose nyani nyani ɔ́tratani esebi gbã kuyo o.
Lɛ ose kakaa gi óʋiyo esebi gbã ɛ, biatsa lɔ kukɔ ŋwia kpɛ́ ní kifu mɛ.
Nite si mlaate ba gani ba kiboebitɛɛ mɛ ɛ.
“Aní ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɛɛxwa mɛ si, ‘Ɔka, Ɔka’ ɛ, yɛ aati uku ní lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ banama gi bɛɛbitɛ ní mɛ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa ɛ, ba ko biati uku.

Ní litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, banɔ glegle biaŋwlɛ isu ya litukpo si, ‘Ɔka, Ɔka! Wɔ línyi ne me kwipani wɔ Liboe le e, lɛ wɔ linyi ne me kwikpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi glegle e dono o, lɛ wɔ linyi ne me kwibitɛ enugutseboe glegle la!’
Nite si maasi ba wee si, “Méte mlo liwewe e, Mlasɛ ní mɛ su, mlɔ banɔ dovo ba!”
“Lɛ loso e, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeenu mɛ eboe la xe izɛɛbitɛ ní la aʋa ɛ, ɔlɛ ko ŋwisi oboete, gi awa yɛ ligba lɛ ní liklakpɔ aʋa kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ gi dzeni ye adɔ, xe inipe le iyi igbigba a, xe liwɔ gagla lɛ lifu ihali ligba lɛ ɛ, líkpa a, lɛ ese linu si bɛwa lɛ ɛtrɔ ní liklakpɔ aʋa a.
“Pɔ̀ ɛ, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeenu mɛ eboe la xe ɔ́ʋibitɛ ní la aʋa ɛ, asrɔ ni ɔga gi awa yɛ ligba lɛ atrɔ ní siklami se aʋa ɛ.
Lɛ gi dzeni ye adɔ xe inipe le iyi i igbigba a, xe liwɔ gagla lɛ lifu i ihali ligba lɛ ɛ, liki si ligba ɛlɛ klɔ ʋa likpa gbloo.”
Agi Yesu agu yɛ eboe la ɛ, anɔkpi la inugu itse ní yɛ kudɔbasɛ yɔ su u.
Lɛ ese linu si abasi ba bidɔ ŋwisi ɔniliɛ gi kigagla kilí yɛ awla kinɛ ɛ, aní ŋwisi ba Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba kiniɛ ɛ.
Agi Yesu eple a dɔni ketokpaa aʋa ɛ, anɔkpi ʋidi eze ni yɛ kude.
Lɛ onyime ɔtɔ gi azɛɛnya kunya kyikyĩ yɔ ɛ, aba yɛ klɔ. Edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea, lɛ aki yɛ litukpo si, “Ɔka, xe linu wɔ kupɛpɛ ɛ, ki mɛ isu ya idra a.”
Lɛ Yesu anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ xe agbɔni onyimee e, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Èe, linu mɛ kupɛpɛ. Wɔ isu ya ìdra a!”

Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, yɛ kunyaa kwilila. Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ta kutu! Wukífeke onugu ní liboe lɛ ya aʋa a. Pɔ̀ trɛ ní kusɔliɔ ɔkaɛ klɔ laa tɔ ɔtapo wo odi. Tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ si wɔlɛ mumɔ ɛ, trɛ tɔ zɛɛtsa kidiliɛ gi Mose Ɔsã nɔ eʋi i.”
Agi Yesu eti eku ní Kapernaum i, Roma banɛ ma baguta ba ɔka ɔtɔ atsani yɛ lɛ eʋi ye kupɔnɔ si,
“Ɔka, mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ eetse gi ɔfini kesea ní kepea mɛ ɛ. Ɔ́ʋitani kuhwa a lɛ eepe nyani nyani.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Maatrɛ tɔ miiyɔni yɛ.”
Lɛ baguta ba ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Owo Ɔka, mégyeno gi maaki si wɔaba mɛ kepea mɛ ɛ. Wɔ kɔ ɛ, pani liboe tile ko, mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ aayɔ.
Mɛ fɛ malɛ ní ɔsã ese, lɛ baguta ba bali mɛ ese. Xegi masi ba mɛ ɔtɔ si, ‘Trɛ!’ ɛ, izɛɛtrɛ. Lɛ xegi masi ɔʋla si, ‘Ba!’ ɛ, izɛba; lɛ xe masi mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ si, “Bitɛ te!” e, izɛbitɛ.
Agi Yesu enu baguta ba ɔkaɛ yɛ liboe lɛ ya ɛ, litu ye kugyɔ, lɛ asi banama gi bali ni yɛ kude si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ ní anukwarɛ mɛ si, mámɔ ɔnɔnɔ ní Israel nì kuʋaziŋa ʋidi uliɔ ya elu oʋídi i.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banima biadɔ kewetu ya ni keweku ya gi biaze ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su nì Abraham, Isak ani Yakob ní lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.
Pɔ̀ banama gi ba kaŋase kenu Kaʋaŋaa xe e, Aya aaŋwia ba ɛkpɛ ní litumu ne me. Niklɔ biabemi xe biatà ba ene na.”
Lɛ Yesu asi baguta ba ɔkaɛ si, “Ga trɛ! Kidiliɛ gi kɛ aʋa wɔziŋa ɛ, kiaba kɛ mɛ ɔki wɔ.” Nite si baguta ba ɔkaɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ayɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ ke me.
Agi Yesu aba eku Petro kepea mɛ ɛ, amɔ si kuwe kwivu Petro yɛnadzee plɛ ní ɔtɔsi aʋa.
Nite si Yesu agbɔni yɛ ɔwla lɔ; lɛ kuweo kwiyurɔ yɛ, lɛ ayɔ xe ekpese yɛ aʋa kudi i.
Agi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, banima bɛmani banɔ glegle gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne izɛkpɛ ba kunugu yo ní Yesu klɔ ɔ. Lɛ Yesu akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne nì liboe tile, lɛ ayɔni banyanya ba petee e.
Abitɛ lɛ nite tɔ yiki liboe lɛ gi Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ Yesaya apani i liba lɛ mɛ si,
“Akɔ blɔ kubotsobotsoo atrɔ isu ya aʋa
lɛ etu blɔ bànya ʋa.”
Agi Yesu evu aŋu ni linɔkpii lɛ gi liklani yɛ su í, asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si batrɛ ní limu ne kapɛ ʋla.
Lɛ ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ɔtɔ aba Yesu klɔ lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, maze ni wɔ kude trɛ ní ɔkɔ kakaa gi wɔatrɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “kuŋwafudroʋi yo e, ezokpo la alɛ ní kɔ awla gi kúzeeze e, lɛ evu na alɛ ní kudzɔʋi yɔ awla, pɔ̀ ozekɔ ɔma ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye awla.”
Yesu yɛ ɔdɔkpasi dzedze apani si, “Ɔka, kpɛ ɔtɔ ɛ, kí tɔ midzitrɛ tɔ mizeevive mɔka.”
Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Kuni mɛ kude tɔ ki tɔ bekpo ʋa bevive ba tutɔ ba bekpo ʋa.”
Yesu emu eku ní katapokpaa mɛ lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekuni yɛ kude e.
Kyɔŋ ko e, liwɔ gagla ɛtɔ likpese kufu ní limu ne aʋa gi lihali kuni yo e kpɛ ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ, gi libasɛ si katapokpaa kɛtrányrɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu azɛɛdɔ sra.
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ xe beze nyime ye xe bɛsi yɛ si, “Bu blo Ɔka, kwitranyrɔ!”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ege lɛ loso mleese lifu ne, Mlɔ Kuʋaziŋaa kuli sisami koŋ!” Lɛ ayɔ xe akpɛ ozi ní liwɔ lɛ ni kuni yo aʋa si bidzini mɔni, lɛ niklɔ ɛdɔ zii i.
Ɔnɔ kakaa yɛ onugu ètse, lɛ beʋi si, “Onyime woli lu liɛ ya a, gi liwɔ lɛ ni kuni yo akpɔ la bizee nu yɛ igbè le e!”

Agi Yesu aba Gadara banɛ ma kesea me ní limu ne kapɛ ʋla ɛ, benyime tiaʋa gi bedo edɔni bekpo ʋa idrɔ lɛ kusi i, bɛtsani yɛ. Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ize ní benyime ba mɛ, lɛ bizɛwa anyra na nite me si ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋíkeni idi si yiga kudeo liɔ klɔ ʋa.
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, bɛkpɛ ozi taataataa si, “liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní blɔ su, wɔ́ Aya Yebie? Kiba wɔba si wuwa blɔ nyɔnyɔɛ xe ableke lipoe trɔtrɔ lɛ liana na a?”
Iha kisrɛsrɛ ɛtɔ iizɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ní niklɔ ɔza lɔ.
Nite si ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne iiki Yesu litukpo si, “Xe wɔtra kpikpini blɔ edono e, kɔ lɔɔ ki tɔ kutiku ní iha lɛ likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mledo,” nite si, ido lɛ izeetiku ní iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ iha lɛ pɔ́ iise eple ní otoganɔ kapɛa eku ní limu ne me lɛ inyrɔ ɛ.
Niteme si banɔ ba klɔ gi bɛzeedi iha lɛ aʋa ɛ, bese etrɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ. Niklɔ bedo liboe kakaa gi liba iha lɛ aʋa a, ni kiliɛ gi lize kí benyime ba klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e.
Nite si banima pɔ́ gi bɛdɔ ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ, bedo gi bɛzɛtsani Yesu. Agi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bɛ bɛki yɛ litukpo si ɔsɛ ní ba kesea mɛ.
Yesu emu eku ní katapokpaa mɛ, lɛ edzi atrɛ ní limu ne kedea ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ.

Lɛ banɔatɔ bɛmani yɛ onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e,” ɔnyanya gi ɔfini ní ɔtɔsi aʋa ɛ. Agi Yesu amɔ ba kuʋaziŋaa kisrɛsrɛ mɛ ɛ, asi onyime liɛ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e si, “Mɛ obi ye, mɔ ɔna. Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ.”
Lɛ niklɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ bɛsi ba ɔtutɔ ba isu ya si, “Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, ɛɛpani ebusioboe!”
Agi ba begyodi ʋa bezee kutete me ɛki Yesu loso e, eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mleegyo eboe zimizi na edi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ?
Lɛ eʋi ba dzɛ si, liwoli lilɛ plɔplɔ si bapani, ‘Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ,’ aloo si tɔ pani si, ‘Yɔ́ tɔ ga na a’?
Pɔ̀ tɔ mlete si kigagla kilɛ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye awla ní kesea ʋa si aakɔ̀ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ ɛ.” Lɛ asi onyime liɛ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e, si “Yɔ́ kɔ wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ trɛ ní kepea mɛ!”
Lɛ onyimee ayɔ lɛ atrɛ ní kepea mɛ.
Agi linɔkpi le limɔ niteme kibitɛ ɛ, litu ba kugyɔ, lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya si aki banima kigaglaɛ liɛ ya elu.
Yesu asɛ ní niklɔ, lɛ gi azɛɛga aza ɛ, amɔ ɔbɔgyɔ gi yɛ linyi linu Mateo gi odi ní yɛ lixwɛwagba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kuni mɛ kude e.” Mateo ayɔ lɛ ekuni yɛ kude e.
Lɛ kede e, gi Yesu azɛɛŋa bidɔ ní Mateo kepea mɛ ɛ, babɔgyɔ glegle atɔ ni “eboe zimizi na babitɛbitɛ atɔ” bɛba eku ní Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba kusi lɛ ba pɔ́ bɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
Agi Farisianɛ ma bɛmɔ ba ɛ, beʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɔ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ izɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ nì babɔgyɔ ba ni banama gi bizɛbitɛ eboe zimizi na na a?”
Agi Yesu enu ba liboe le, lɛ ebu le onu si, “Banama gi balɛ mumɔ ɛ, bázia ɔwabitɛ, pɔ̀ banama gi bɛɛnya ɛ.
Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlazɛ pami liboe lɛ gi bɛpani plɛ mɛ si, ‘Asigagadidi mapɛ, aní baga kuyeye ki Aya.’ Mába si matraxwa banɔ gbã ba boŋu i, banɔ zimizi ba.”
Lɛ Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ beʋi yɛ si, “Ege lɛ loso blɔ ni Farisianɛ ba kuzɛɛnya onugu lipoe me lipoe me, pɔ̀ wɔ badɔkpasi ba kɔɔ baʋínya onugu liwewe na a?”

Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kigyo mlegyo edi si banama gi bɛba kudzɛgbanɔ liwe le me, biazɛɛwa awowoe la ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi ɔdzɛnyee ɔlɛ ní ba su na a? Sugba ɛ, litráze nite e! Pɔ̀ liwe le litrába gi biagbani ɔdzɛnyee sɛnɔ ní ba su u, lɛ niklɔ bianya onugu lo o.
“Ɔnɔnɔ oʋíkɔ lisiapɛ vuvu u, kɔ lulɔ kusa koko gi kwikyi i, lɛ ese linu si lisiapɛ vuvu nɛ liapɔ ɔ kɔ lipa kusa kokoo, gi liwu le lia keme sanɔ tsã a.

Lɛ nite ke ɔnɔnɔ óʋinye kuda vuvu ukpɛ ní kagaplekpa kuʋe koko me e. Lɛ ese linu si kagaplekpaa kuʋeo kwiayaʋi, gi biaki si kudaa kwiabali, kɔ kagaplekpaa kuʋeo kwizizi i. Boŋu i, bizenye kuda vuvu i, kpɛ ní kagaplekpa kuʋe vuvu mɛ, niteme si bɛtuʋa biaze ní kizeze me gbã mɛ.”
Agi Yesu ɛɛpani eboe ala ɛ, ɔka ɔtɔ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ aba yɛ klɔ, edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea lɛ asi Yesu si, “Mɛ obidzɛɛ etse ablahate; pɔ̀ gatrɔ awla ni yɛ aʋa tɔ odzi ligbã.”
Lɛ loso Yesu ayɔ lɛ ekuni yɛ kude ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ.
Lipoe lɛ klɔ ʋa mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi ika lɛ izɛɛba yɛ su agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa zizi i, aga Yesu yɛ kedea lɛ agbɔni yɛ liwu le ɔgyurɔ lɔ ɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si asi yɛ isu ya si, “Xe màtani yɛ liwu le ɔgyurɔ lɔ tètè kugbɔnɔ ko e, maayɔ.”
Yesu ekyi lɛ gi amɔ yɛ ɛ, asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obidzɛɛ, mɔ ɔna! Wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔ ni wɔ ɔ.” Dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ko e, ika lɛ imɔni kudo ní yɛ su u.
Agi Yesu eti eku ní Yudanɛ ma ɔkaɛ yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ. Amɔ bebemidzikpɛ ba ní banama gi bebemi okpo ye e,
lɛ asi ba si “Mledo mlɔ petee! Ɔdzɛʋi yɛ ótse, sra ko ɛɛdɔ!” Pɔ̀ ba petee bɛmwɛ yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ gi bebu linɔkpi le edono e, Yesu eti eku ní ɔdzɛʋi yɛ ligba lɛ mɛ lɛ evu yɛ ɔwla lɔ ɔ ko lɛ ayɔ ɛ.
Liboe lɛ ya líhle eku ní kesea kapɛ kakaa.
Le kede gi Yesu asɛ ní klɔ ɛ, benyime kuŋupo tuʋa bezeni yɛ kude e, gi bɛzɛɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Di blɔ asigaga, Dawid Yebi ye!”
Agi Yesu eti eku ní kepea mɛ ɛ, benyime tiaʋa ba klɔ gi ba bimbi ʋe bini i bɛba yɛ klɔ, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Mlɛzi lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa si maatani mlɔ bimbi ʋe kudra na?”
Bebu le onu si, “Ee, Ɔkaɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu agbɔni ba bimbi ʋe lɛ apani si. “Liba lɛ mɛ kimlɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɛzi i ŋa ɛ!”
lɛ ba bimbi ʋe bidra ɛ. Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla aki ba si, “Mlakí pani ní lɛ su i, si ɔnɔnɔ!”
Pɔ̀ bɛsɛ lɛ beze fuflu Yesu su liboe le e, klanɔ ní kesea kapɛ a klɔ petee aʋa ɛ.
Lipoe lɛ gi benyime ba klɔ bɛzɛ sɛ ɛ, banɔatɔ bɛmani onyime ɔtɔ gi oʋí gu kunugu u, lɛ ese linu si Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi, ɛzɛkpɛ yɛ kunugu ni Yesu klɔ.
Pɔ̀ gi akpikpini Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edono ko e, omúmu no ekpese kunugu yo kugu gi linɔkpi le lɛ inugu itse. Lɛ bɛpani si, “Kuʋí mɔ bidɔ bɛ ya elue ʋídi ní Israel kesea mɛ!”
Pɔ̀ Farisianɛ ma bɛpani si, “Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ɔkaɛ yɛ izɛɛki yɛ kigaglɛ xe izɛkɔ ɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudo no o.”
Yesu aklanɔ gi azaadzɛ ima nɛ ni ima sisami nɛ petee me. Abasi bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ, lɛ apani Aya yɛ liboe Gbã nɛ ní Kaʋaŋaa su u, lɛ ayɔ ni banɔ gi kunya kakaa elu kwize ní ba su i.
Agi amɔ anɔkpi la ɛ, ba liboe liga yɛ asigaga, lɛ ese linu si bɛpisa lɛ beze banɔ gi kupɔnɔ kúma ɛkɔ ɛ, ŋwisi iʋesi gi ɔgbanɔgbanɔ ɔ́ma ɔki lɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ bidɔ mɛ bisrɛ, pɔ̀ baxwɛwa gi biakpɛ ʋɛ likpɔ básrɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e, mlaki ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee litukpo tɔ ɔtsisi baxwɛwa ba ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ.
Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba akpɛ likpɔ lɛ aki ba kigagla si tɔ biakɔ kpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudo no ani tɔ biakɔ yɔni ɔnyanya kakaa elu.
Banɔkpɛkpɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba gi axwa ɛ, ba enyi na enu: Simon gi yɛ ke bizɛɛxwa si Petro e, ni yeneminyime Andrea; Yakobo ni yeneminyime Yohanes gi benu Zebedeo yɛ bebi ba ɛ;
Filipo ni Bartolomeo; Toma ni Mateo gi onu ɔbɔgyɔ ɛ; Yakobo gi onu Alfeo Yebi ni Tadeo;
Lɛ bagɔgɔ ba benu Simon, gi ádɔ ní Kanaa ɛ, ani Yuda Iskariot gi yɛ akpɛ Yesu awla ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba a, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlakítrɛ ní banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ma klɔ ɔ, lo Samaria ɔma ɔtɔtɔ mɛ ɛ.
Boŋu i, mlatrɛ ní Israel bebi ba gi balɛ ŋwisi iʋesi gi ilila kinɛ ɛ klɔ.
Lɛ xegi mlɛtrɛ ɛ, mlapani liboe lɛ ya si, ‘Aya Kaʋaŋaa keti i pɔnɔ!’
Mlayɔ ni banyanya ba, tɔ mlenyime bekpo ʋa, mleplo kunya kyikyĩ yɔ banyanya ba su atɔ mlakpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudo no. Aya aki mlɔ fãa, mlɔ kyɛ mlakɔ fãa
Mlakíkpɛ kibɔɛ tɔ́tɔ isu ya a;
mlekívu igudo, iiki kude gaga loo liwu ʋla, afɔkpa ʋla loo aloo ose vuga vuga a. Lɛ ese linu si, ɔxwɛwa kakaa ɛ, aaŋa bidɔ ɔ dɔnɔ ní yɛ ohihe tata lɔ me e.
“Xe mleku ɔma ɔtɔ lo ɔma sisami ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, mlapɛ́ ɔnɔ gbã gi adimɛ si yizɛ mlɔ ɛ, atɔ mlatí yɛ klɔ kɔkpɛni mlɔ lisɛpoe le e.
Xegi mleti iku kepe atɔ mɛ ɛ, mlapani kepea mɛ benete ba si, ‘Kusuyɔ kí mlɔ!’
Lɛ xegi banima ní kepea mɛ bɛzi mlɔ ɛ, mlaki tɔ mlɔ kusuyɔɔ kuze ní kepea aʋa; pɔ̀ xe bázɛ mlɔ ɛ, tɔ mledzini mlɔ kunɔpanɔɔ kuzɛ.
Lɛ xe kepe atɔ aloo ɔma ɔtɔ ɔ́zɛ mlɔ aloo ɔ́ta mlɔ kutu i, mlesugu ovugbo lo mlɔ kuklikpɔɔ aplɛ ní iklɔ atɔ mlasɛ.
Sugba, sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, ní litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Aya aadi banama gi beze ní Sodom ni Gomora asigaga a sani ɔma lɔ klɔ mɛ benete ʋa a.
“Mlata kutu! Mɛɛkpɛ mlɔ ŋwisi iʋesi kinɛ ní kuŋwafudroʋi yo kusi. Lɛ loso e, mlete liboe ŋwisi bagblaga kinɛ pɔ̀ tɔ mlayɔ ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ ɛ.
Mledi isu ya aʋa mɔmɔmɔ, lɛ ese linu si banɔatɔ biavu mlo tsinɔ ní otsixwaklɔ ɔ, lɛ biafiaʋi mlɔ bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ.
Kɔ kpɛ mɛ loso e, biaxwa litsi ni mlo ní baʋaŋa ba ani bekusi ʋidi ba aŋu mɛ; lɛ gani lɛ mɛ ɛ, mlaapani liboe Gbã nɛ kí bekusi ba ni banama gi bénu Yadanɛ ma kyɛ ɛ.
Xegi bɛmani mlɔ ní litsi le me e, mlɔ begyodi ʋa bakípisa ní liboe lɛ gi mlapani su u, aloo ní kiliɛ gi mlaapani lɛ su u. Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, biaki mlɔ eboa la gi mlapani i.
Lɛ ese linu si mlátrapani ní mlɔ isuwla mɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ eboe la aadɔ ní mlɔ Ɔka yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ klɔ gi ɛɛpani gani mlɔ aʋa ɛ.
Beneminyime biakpɛ ba beneminyime ní awla tɔ beye; lɛ bebika batɔ kyɛ biabitɛ nite ke tsini ba bebi ba su u, bebi biayɔ kedu ní ba bapɔnɛ ba su gi biaki biaye ba a.
Ɔnɔ kakaa aavu mlo kpɛ ní ofu me kɔ kpɛ mɛ loso. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi ɔwla ótse ye kɔna ni ɔgũklɔ ɛ, biazɛ yɛ ligbã a.
Xegi bɛyɔ kedu ní mlɔ su ní ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ mlese atrɛ ní odzedze me. Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si mlatragù mlɔ axwɛ na ní Israel ima nɛ pɔ́ mɛ xe Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye aaba a.
Ɔdɔkpasibi ɔtɔtɔ óʋikeme ɔsani yɛ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ; lɛ ɛ ɔnɔdzidzi ɔtɔtɔ óʋimu ɔsani yɛ ɔkaɛ ɛ.

Niteme si isami iku ɔdɔkpasibi ye xe bɛbitɛ tsini yɛ su ŋwisi yɛ kiliɛ gi bɛbitɛ tsini yɛ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ su kinɛ ɛ; tɔ isami iku ɔnɔdzidzi ye xe edzì ŋwisi yɛ kaɛ kinɛ ɛ. Xegi bɛki kepea ɔkaɛ linyi si Beezebul i, kitɛ bátraxwa kepea me benete ba enyi dovo e sanɔ ɛ?
“Lɛ loso, mlakíse banima a. Kidɔ kakaa gi bekpo abla ɛ, biabu ke kudono; lɛ kidɔ kpokpo kakaa a, kiado oŋwe.
Eboa la gi masi mlɔ ní litumu ne me e, mlebu la edono kemizea; lɛ ɛ, idali ilɛ gi medo a si mlɔ ɛ, mlasa lɛ kamasa ni ɔma kusi.
Mlakíse banama gi biaye kisugyaɛ pɔ̀ báma esobo la kuye me e; pɔ̀ mlese Aya gi aatani kisugyaɛ ni esobo la kuzizi ní kifu mobloe me.
Tiasɛ kura abia taʋa izɛɛzɛ ɛ? Pɔ̀ libia ɛtɔtɔ litrawɔli dɔ kesea xegi mlɔ ɔka Aya ɔ́ki kudeonu u.
Mlɔ kɔ ɛ, mlɔ litukpo le siya sɛ kyɛ ɛ, Aya ete sɛ kiklaklaɛ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e, mlakíse lifu u. Lɛ ese linu si, mlɛŋa kedzi isani abia likpi.
“Xe ɔnutɔ aanada si yete me ní banɔ aŋu mɛ, mɛ fɛ maanada si mete ye ní mɛ Ɔka aŋu mɛ ní lifunu ne.
Pɔ̀ xe ɔnutɔ aagbe me ní banɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, mɛ fɛ maagbe ye ní mɛ Ɔka aŋu mɛ ní lifunu ne.
“Mlakígyo le edi si kusuyɔ mamanɔ ní kelea mɛ ɛ. Owo, mámani kusuyɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ kusi lɛlɛ kwitraze e.
Maba si tɔ bebinyime bayɔ kedu ní ba baka su u; tɔ bebidzɛ bayɔ kedu ní ba bene ba su; atɔ beblidze ba bayɔ kedu ní ba banadze ba su;
nite si ɔnɔ yɛ ahwafianɛ ba biadɔ yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ kepea mɛ.
“Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi adimɛ ni yɛka lo yene a sani mɛ ɛ; ɔ́ma gi aaze mɛ ɔdɔkpasi i; lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi adimɛ ni yebinyime lo yebidzɛ a sani mɛ ɛ, ɔ́ma gi aaze mɛ ɔdɔkpasi i.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́pɛ si yimɔ ɔzia mɛ kiniɛ ɛ, ɔ́ma gi aaze mɛ ɔdɔkpasi i.
Ɔniliɛ gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aalila yɛ ligbã nɛ kɔkpɛ mɛ loso e, aabu le.
“Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aazi mlɔ ɛ, mɛ azɛ, lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ mɛ ɛ, azɛ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ.

Ɔnɔ kakaa gi azɛ Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ, ní kiliɛ gi onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ onu i, aamɔ liʋɛtsatsa ŋwisi oboedoplɛ kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aazi ɔnɔ gi ɔlɛ ní kude gyɔgyɔ aʋa kɔ kpɛ gi ɔlɛ ní kude gyɔgyɔ aʋa loso e, aamɔ liʋɛtsatsa ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi yɛ linɛ ligyɔ kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ sugba sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, ɔniliɛ gi aki mɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ ɔgɔgɔɛ kuni ŋrini kepliʋi tiele e, ní kiliɛ gi onu mɛ ɔdɔkpasi onu i, aazi yɛ liʋɛtsatsa lɛ kikaa elu.”
Agi Yesu abasi yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba ikli odukɔ pɔ́ ɛ, asɛ niklɔ lɛ azɛ basɛ bidɔ, lɛ apani liboe gbã nɛ a klanɔ ní Galilea ima nɛ mɛ ɛ.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ eze ligba lɛ. Enu Kristo yɛ axwɛwawa la. Nite si akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba ní Kristo klɔ ɔ.
tɔ beʋi ye si, “Wɔ wonu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ su Yohanes apani aplɛ si atrába, loo kudi kudeonu ɔki ɔnɔ dzedze na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mledzi a trɛ tɔ mlasi Yohanes eboa la gi mlenu, ani eboa la aŋu mɛ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ.
Kuŋupoo kwimɔ, lɛ bafa ba bɛɛga a; kunya kyikyĩ yɔ banyanya ba ɛ, ba isu iidra a, lɛ itoku le kyɛ iinu i. Bekpo ʋa beedzi ligbã, lɛ bɛpani liboe gbã nɛ ɛsi bepiplinete ba a.
Aya aakrira ɔnɔ kakaa gi ógbe me ní eboa la gi mɛɛbitɛ loso e!”

Agi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛsɛ̀ ɛ, Yesu ekpese kupani ní Yohanes su u, kí linɔkpi le si, “Gi mlɛdzi Yohanes klɔ ní ɔyaya klɔ ɛ, ege mlegyo edi si mlɛtrɛ ɛmɔ ɔ? Kize eze ŋwisi oxugbe ní liwɔ onu loo o?
Ege mledo etrɛ si mlɛtrɛ ɛmɔ ɔ? Onyime gi ɔkpasi liwu gbã mɛ loo o? Banama gi bizɛkpɛ ewu gbã na ɛ, kekusipe me bizeeze e.
Mlasi mɛ, ege mledo etrɛ si mlɛzeedi i? Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ loo o? Nite ɖii; pɔ ɔniliɛ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, ekeme a sani oboedoplɛ ɛ.
Yohanes yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ su Aya liboe le lipani i plɛ si, “‘Maatsisi mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ tɔ aadra kudeo ki wɔ ɔ.’
Sugba ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ ekeme a sani ɔnɔ kakaa gi aga ɔdzɛ kupɔpɔ mɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi onu ɔsisami yɛ ní Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, ekeme a sani yɛ ɛ.
Dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Yohanes apani yɛ eboe la, gakɔ nani ablahate e, Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛtrɛ ɔtɔ ni kigagla, lɛ banɔ aŋu mɛ gagla benete bɛpɛ si bɛzi ka ní kigagla a.
Gakɔ nani Yohanes lipoe le e, Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ni Mose yɛ isã nɛ bɛpani ní Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa su.
Lɛ xe mlɛpɛ si mlaazi ba eboe la aʋa ŋa ɛ, kɔlɔ, Yohanes yɛ onu Eliya gi yɛ kubabaa su u bɛpani i plɛ ɛ.
Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kuli yɛ ɛ, atɔ onu le.
“Lɛ abla ɛ, ege maakɔ omono kelea mɛ banima kusrɔnɔ ɛ? Balɛ ŋwisi ɔnuvɔ ha gi odi ní kedzi me kinɛ ɛ. Ɔha tole ɛkpɛ ozi ɛtsisi ba ɔhanuglɔ ba si,
“ ‘kwikpɛ kudzɛgbanɔ idzi iki mlɔ,
pɔ̀ mleyo o.
Kwikpɛ ibemidzi i ki mlɔ,
pɔ̀ mlébemi i.’
Agi Yohanes aba ɛ azaanya onugu lo lɛ ɔ́ŋwɛ wain kyɛ ɛ; lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa apani si, ‘Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ!’

Agi Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba ɛ, azaaŋa bidɔ, lɛ azaaŋwɛ wain yɛ kyɛ, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa apani si, ‘Mledi onyime liɛ ya a! onu ɔŋazi nɛ ni ɔdaŋwɛmu, babɔgyɔ ba ni “banɔ zimizi ba” ɔʋia nɛ.’ Kuboeteo kɔ kiboebitɛ kɛ kizebu isu ya ɛbasɛ si kwina a.”
Agi banama gi bali ní imaɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ gi Yesu abitɛ yɛ enugutseboe la begbe xe békyi ní ba eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ, Yesu atɛni ba a.

Yesu apani si, “Lianyani iki wɔ Korazin! Lianyani ki wɔ Betsaida fɛ! Xe enugutseboe ala gi bɛbitɛ ní wɔ mɛ ɛ, atɛsi Tiro ni Sidon, bɛbitɛ la ɛ, nya banima beenyime akpanya basa e fuflu kusuʋɔtɔ ní isu ya kokooko tɔ bɛbasɛ si bekyi ní ba eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ sugba sugba si ní Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ Aya aadi banama gi bali ní Tiro ni Sidon asigaga a sani mlɔ.

Lɛ wɔ Kapernaum kɔ ɛ! Kipɛ́ wɔpɛ si wumuni wɔ isu ya kɔna ni lifunu ne na a? Aya aawɔli wɔ kɔŋwia kpɛ ní kifu monimoni ye me! Atɛsi enugutseboe ala gi bɛbitɛ ní wɔ mɛ ɛ, xe bɛbitɛ la ní Sodom i, nya Sodom aaze kɔ bana ni omono o!
Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛ, kimlɔ si, ní litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Aya aadi Sodom asigaga a sani wɔ ɔ!”
Ní lipoe klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu apani si, “Medo wo ɖase Ɔka, Lifunu ne ni kesea Ɔkaɛ! Lɛ ese linu si wobu ɔbasɛ banama gi béte keplekpa ɛ, kidiliɛ gi wɔkɔ okpo beboete ba ni beplekpate ba ɛ.
Ee, Ɔka, nite wɔpɛ si liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
“Mɛ ɔka akɔ kidɔ kakaa aki mɛ. Ɔnɔnɔ óte Obi ye sani Ɔka yɛ ko, lɛ ɔnɔnɔ fɛ óte Ɔkaɛ, sani Obi ye ko, ani banama gi Obi ye apɛ si yibu ye e basɛ ɛ.
“Mlaba a! Mlɔ banama petee gi mletu adɔtu la xe mlɔ adɔtu la eepè mlo e, mlaba mɔklɔ atɔ maaki mlaayɔ isu mɛ ɛ.
Mlabubɔ isu ya akpɛ mɛ ese tɔ mlakpasi mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si mayɔ ɔ, lɛ mepleni isu ya ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ, atɔ mlamɔ isu mɛ kuyɔyɔ ɔ.
Mɛ ese kuzezeo kuli i plɔplɔ ɔ, lɛ mɛ lidɔtu le gi maatrɔ wɔ ɛ, líma ɛnyipu.”
Lipoetɔ kede, gi Yesu azɛɛga aza ní idoli ɔnyrɔ ɔtɔ mɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa ɛ, kuʋɛ kwizeeku yɛ badɔkpasi ba, lɛ loso e bekpese idoli le kuyasi uta.
Agi Farisianɛ ma bɛmɔ kibitɛɛ liɛ klɔ ɛ, bɛsi Yesu si, “Di ke, blɔ ɔsã nɔ ɔ́ki kude si wɔ badɔkpasi ba babitɛ kiboebitɛ liɛ ya ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa a.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Mlákla edi liwewe kidiliɛ gi Dawid abitɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi kuʋɛ kwizeeku ye ni yɛ banima na a?
Eti eku ní Aya yɛ kepea mɛ lɛ yɛ ni yɛ banima bɛzɛɛtà Aya yɛ akla na ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi liyɔ kedu ní Ɔsã nɔ su xe e; lɛ ese linu si kusumu yo baka ba ko linu si biata akla la klɔ ʋa.
Aloo, mlákla ní Mose Ɔsã nɔ mɛ si ní Lizemɔniwe kakaa aʋa ɛ, kusumu yo baka ba bizɛɛta Mose ɔsã nɔ ese ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ baa pɔ̀ baʋíŋa lipɔ na a?
Sugba ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, kiditɔ gi kiŋa kedzi i sani Lisɔligba lɛ ni Yerusalem i, kilí ní mlɔ kusi i.
Aya liboe le lipani si, ‘Lipomepɛpɛ mɛɛpɛ ɛ; aní baga bisumudɔ kukɔkɔ ɔ.’ Atɛsi mlenu eboa la ya ese e nya mlatrábu banima
lipɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi báŋa lipɔ xe e; lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, yɛ onu Lizemɔniwe le lɛ Ɔkaɛ.”
Agi Yesu asɛ niklɔ ɛ, atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ.
Lɛ amɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ ɔwla tole ètse e niklɔ ɛ. Banɔatɔ gi bɛpɛ si beebu Yesu lipɔ ɛ, beʋi ye si, “Ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si bayɔni ɔnɔ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Xe oʋesi ɔlɛ ní ɔnutɔ awla xe ɛdɔ eku ní lizokpo dzudzuitɔ mɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa ɛ, ɔ́trabu lo edono na a?
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si ɔnɔ gbagbe e, aŋa kedzi a sani oʋesi! Lɛ loso e, blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛki blɔ kude si kupɔni ɔnɔ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa a.”
Niklɔ Yesu asi onyimee gi yɛ ɔwla tole ètse si “Nina wɔ ɔwla lɔ “Onyimee anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ lɛ edzì iku lɔ mɛ ŋwisi ɔʋla lɔ kiniɛ.
Lɛ Farisianɛ ma bɛsɛ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ batrɔtrɔ ʋa si biaye Yesu i.
Agi Yesu enu ba keduyɔyɔ a batrɔtrɔ ʋa ní yɛ su i, asɛ niklɔ; lɛ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ likuni yɛ kude e. Ayɔ ni banyanya ba petee ni ba kusi.
Lɛ etsi kude akí ba si, bakípani ní yɛ su asi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ.
Abitɛ lɛ nite atɔ yikɔ ebu í basɛ si, liboe lɛ gi Aya apani agani yɛ oboedoplɛ Yesaya aʋa ɛ liba lɛ mɛ si:
“Mɛ ɔwxɛdzɛɛ gi makya ɛ, yɛ iliɛ ya,
yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi madimɛ nɔ xe mamɔ isami ní yɛ su u.
Maakpɛ mɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ní yɛ mɛ;
aasa kamasa ní mɛ litsi me kutsatsa dradra su u ki banima petee ní kelea mɛ.
Ɔ́traŋwlɛ liboeboe ni ɔnɔnɔ ɔ;
lɛ ɔ́trakpɛ ozi ni ablɔ ba aʋa a.
Aaplɛ litɔ kese akí banama gi ɔna eedo ní ba lipo e.
Lɛ banama gi bɛziã kupɔnɔ ɛ, aadi ba asigaga a.
Aatrɛ ní lɛ aʋa zɛkɔ nani lipoɛ lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ litsi me kutsatsa dradra kupɛpɛɔ kwiaŋa aʋa ɛ.
Nite si kelea petee kiakɔ ka aŋu kutrɔ ni yɛ aʋa a!”
Liba lɛ mɛ si banɔatɔ bɛgbani onyime ɔtɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ize e manɔ ní Yesu klɔ. Niteme onyimee, eze kaŋupo ni omúmu. Yesu ayɔni yɛ, niteme si ekpese kunugu yo kugu lɛ azɛɛtani kumɔ kyɛ ɛ.
Yesu yɛ kiboebitɛ kiki si banima pɔ́ ba inugu itse e. Lɛ beʋi si, “Mlɔ ma! Aní Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye iliɛ ya lò o?”
Agi Farisianɛ ma benu liboe le e, lɛ bebu le onu si, “Belzebul, ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne okusi ye, yɛ ko ɛɛki Yesu kigagla ɛ xe ɛɛbitɛ eboa la nite e.”
Yesu ete ba begyodi ʋa, lɛ asi ba si,” Kaʋaŋaa kakaa gi kalɛ ɛ, xe kɛyɔ kedu ya ní ka isu ya su i, kiayaʋi. Lɛ ɔma loo kepe kakaa mɛ gi kulɛlɛ nì eboese monumonu bi lɛ ɛ, kiakyrɔ̃.
Lɛ loso xegi Satana ɛɛkpikpini Satana ɛ kɔ libasɛ si ayɔ kedu ya ni yɛ isu ya su i, lɛ kitɛ yɛ kaʋaŋaa kia lɛ ɛ?

Mlɛɛpani si, Beelzebul yɛ aki mɛ kigaglaɛ xe mɛɛkɔ ɛ kpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono o. Xe lilɛ te e, kɔ nyaŋwɛ kigagla ʋa mlɔ kude bezenozeno ba bizɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne dono e? Kibitɛɛ liɛ gi mlɔ kude bezenozeno ba bizɛbitɛ ɛ, kibasɛ si mlɛta kese lɛ loso e, ba biaxwa litsi ni mlo.
Pɔ̀ Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ lɔ ɛki mɛ kigaglaɛ xe mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne dono o; Niteme si lɛ liibasɛ si Aya Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ni mlɔ kusi kooko.
“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kuti ku ní ɔnɔ gagla yɛ kepe me xe aahali yɛ exo la a, xegi aní kivu evu ɔnɔ gagla liɛ klɔ anya kpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ; lɛ ko aatani yɛ exo la kuhali i.
“Ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́ma ní mɛ aʋa ɛ, lɛ mɛ lidra si ayɔ kedu ní mɛ su u. Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́trapɔnɔ xe biakpɛ bidɔ likpɔ ɛ, yɛ ɖii ehle ʋe e.

Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si, liboe zimizi kakaa elu gi banima biabitɛ ɛ, ani liboe zimizi kakaa gi biapani i, Aya aakɔ̀ lɛ kukyɛ ba a. Pɔ̀, ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ gi aapani liboe zimizi kuyurɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ dradra lɔ ɛ, bátrakɔ kɔ lɛ kyɛ yɛ ɛ.

Ɔniliɛ gi aapani liboe gi liyɔ kedu ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye su i, biakɔ lɛ kukyɛ yɛ, pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aapani liboe gi liayɔ kedu ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ su i, bátrakɔ lɛ kyɛ yɛ ní kelea lia loo kakɔlɔ gi kɛtraba mɛ ɛ.
“Xe wɔamɔ lisebi gbã ɛ, linu si ose lo ɔpɛ; xe ose nyani nyani ɔlɛ ní wɔ awla ɛ, wɔamɔ esebi nyani nyani. Esebi la izɛɛbasɛ ose lo kilɛlɛɛ mɛ ni ose lɔ klɔ elu gi onu i.
Mlɔ bagblaga ʋa kipɔ̀pɔ̀ mɛ gi mlɛnyani i, kitɛ mlaapani eboe gbã a? Lɛ ese linu si onugu lo izɛpani eboa la gi alɛ ní ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔ gbã ɛ izebu bidɔ gbã ʋɛ dɔni yɛ bidɔ gbã ʋɛ ɔbla klɔ. Nite ke ɔnɔ zimizi kyɛ izebu bidɔ zimizi i dɔni yɛ bidɔ zimizi ʋɛ ɔbla klɔ.
“Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ní litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, ɔnɔ kakaa aabu isu ya onu ní liboe futsufutsu kakaa gi apani edi su u.
Lɛ ese linu si wɔ tutɔ wɔ eboe la biakɔ tsã litsi le ɔki wɔ, lɛ wɔ tutɔ wɔ eboe la biakɔ bu wɔ lipɔ.”
Lɛ Mose Ɔsã nɔ Badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ batɔ bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛɛ, kwipɛ si bitɛ linugutseboe gi liabasɛ si Aya yɛ akpɛ wɔ ɔ.”

Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kitɛ mɛ abla bebi ba bɛnyani xe béte Aya kyɛ na a! Mleʋi si mibitɛ linugutseboe! Owo lítra ba lɛ mɛ ɛ! Linugutseboe tile gi biaki mlɔ ɛ, lɛ ko linu Yona oboedoplɛɛ su linugutseboe le e.
Kiliɛ gi Yona eze ní bosoe yɛ lipo le me ewe tata ni elesi tata la ɛ, nite ke Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye fɛ aaze ní sise se me, ewe tata ni elesi tata a.

Lɛ Yesu apani dzɛ si, ní litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, banima pɔ́ ní Ninive biayɔ lɛɛ gi biabu biwlaʋi kpɛ mlɔ aŋu mɛ, lɛ ese linu si bekyi ní ba ina nɛ mɛ gi benu Yona liboe le e; lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ abla si ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ ni ya gi ekeme asani Yona ɛ!

Ní litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Sheba Okusidzɛɛ, aayɔ lɛɛ gi aabu kiwlaʋi kpɛ́ mlɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si aga kude gblamadza dɔnɔ ní yɛ kesea ʋa gi aba enu Okusi ye Salomo yɛ kuboeteo me bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ. Lɛ mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛ ki mlɔ si ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ ní ya gi ekeme asani Salomo e!
Xegi Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔtɔ edo ní ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, izɛklanɔ ní kuse pluplu yo aʋa gi ɛɛpɛ ozemɔnikɔ ɛ. Pɔ̀ xe ɔ́mɔ ɔkɔkɔ ɛ
kɔ ɛsi isu ya si, “Madzi itrɛ ní mɛ kepe kokoa mɛ.” Xegi edzì trɛ ɛ, xe ɛmɔ si bɛgba kepea mɛ lulɔ ɛ,

kɔ ɛtrɛ, kɔ ɛzɛɛgbani ifuɛfuɛ tigloele dzedze gi inyani sani lɔ ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛ manɔ ɛ, kɔ ikɔ niklɔ ɛbitɛ lɛ ozekɔ ɛ. Gɔgɔ ɛ, ɔnɔɛ yɛ kude gbaa ligbãzeze ne lianyani i sani kutɔpu yɔ ɔ. Nite ke liaba lɛ mɛ ɔki abla banɔ zimizi ba.”
Yesu azɛɛpani kí banima xe yene ni yɛ beneminyime ba bɛba eku u. Bɛlɛɛ ní oŋwe no gi bɛpɛ si beegu kunugu ni yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ banama gi beze ní yɛ su i, ba mɛ tole asi Yesu si, “Dike, wone ni wɔ beneminyime ba balɛ ní oŋwe no, gi bɛɛpɛ si beegu kunugu ni wo o.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu mone e? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ ba benu mɛ beneminyime ba a?”
Lɛ ebu kiwlaʋi yɛ akpɛ badɔkpasi ba klɔ, lɛ apani si, “Dike! banama benu mone ni mɛ beneminyime ba a.
Lɛ loso e, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛbitɛ ní Mɔka ní lifunu ne yɛ kupɛpɛ ɔ aʋa ɛ yɛ onu moneminyime, monemidzɛ ani mone e.”
Liwe lɛ klɔ ke aʋa ɛ Yesu asɛ ní kepea mɛ lɛ atrɛ ní Galilea limu ne kutu i, eze kesea lɛ ekpese banima bidɔ mɛ kubasɛ ɛ.
Linɔkpi i lɛ gi lixogo ní yɛ su i, likeme nite si Yesu emu eku katapokpa katɔ mɛ lɛ eple e ze e. Linɔkpi le kɔ ɔ lize ní limu ne oge no.
Lɛ abasi ba bidɔ glegle ní abee ʋa mɛ si, “Ɔnyrɔmɛdzɛ ɔtɔ atrɛ si yizeglu amu na ni yɛ kayaa mɛ liwe etɔ lɛ.
Gi azeehle amu na ɛ. atɔ ɛwɔli i dɔ odeʋa nɔ; lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwita la ɛmlɔ ɛ.
Atɔ ɛdɔ ní akla kesea aʋa gi sise se sísrɛ ɛki la. Amubi la ɛyɛ pɔ̀ gi sise se sísrɛ ɛ, kí la onu i
Agi kuweo kwikle dɔ la aʋa ɛ, ebi yɛyɛ la pɔ́ ɛyrɔ ɔ; Lɛ ese linu si igù ne íku kesea mɛ lɛ awlakpa vuvu na etse e.
Atɔ ɛdɔ ni bibu ʋe me lɛ bibu ʋe biyɛ xe biwe amu vuvu na aʋa lɛ etse e.
Pɔ̀ amubiatɔ ɛdɔ ní kese gbã aʋa; etsi gi eyo asà la; atɔ ɛkpɛ amubi alafa, atɔ aviteglo lɛ atɔ fɛ ɛkpɛ avitata ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kuli yɛ ɛ, atɔ onu u.”
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yesu klɔ ni kuʋiʋi si, “Ege loso wuzeegu kunugu yo ɛki banima ní abee ʋa mɛ ɛ?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya Kaʋaŋaa eboe kpòkpò la su kuboeteo e, bɛkɔ kɔ ɛ kimlɔ; aní kí banɔ dzedze ba a.
Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ awla gi bidɔ bilɛ ɛ, biaki yɛ ɔpɔnɔ, atɔ aamɔ ɔsã nɔ; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ awla gi kididɔ kima ɛ, Aya aazi kisisami liɛ klɔ fɛ gi kiliɛ yɛ awla ɛ.
Mizeegu kunugu yo ɛki ba ní abee me, lɛ ese linu si, bizedi bidɔ pɔ báʋimɔ ɔ; lɛ bizɛta kutu pɔ̀ baʋínu xe bianu eboe se e.”.
Lɛ loso Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ Yesaya eboe la ɛba la mɛ ki ba si,
‘Bianyata kutu baa pɔ̀ bátranu kididɔ ese e.
lɛ bianyatapo odi baa, pɔ̀ bátramɔ egyesi i.
Lɛ ese linu si ba ina nɛ mɛ ilí gagla; bɛda ba begyodi ʋa ni ba atukpa la
lɛ bɛda ba bimbi ʋe kyɛ ɛ.
Xegi aní nite e, nya ba bimbi ʋe biamɔ
ba batu ʋa bianu eboe
kɔ ba ina nɛ inu eboe ese e,
kɔ bekyi vu me e
kɔ màyɔ ni ba ɛ.’
“Mlɔ kɔ ɛ, mlamɔ isami! Lɛ ese linu si mlɔ xunyɔ ɛ, mlɔ bimbi ʋe biimɔ lɛ mlɔ batu ʋa kyɛ beenu u.
Matrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa aki mlɔ si, Aya yɛ banɔ ni beboedoplɛ glegle bɛpɛ si bɛmɔ kidiliɛ gi mlɛɛmɔ ɛ, pɔ̀ bámɔ kudeonu nite e; lɛ bɛpɛ dzɛ si benu eboa la gi mleenu u, pɔ̀ bámɔ kudeonu nite e.”
“Ablɔ ɛ mlata kutu, tɔ mlakpasi bidɔ ní abee ní amu na ogluglu ye su u.

Banama gi xegi benu liboe Gbã nɛ ní Aya Kaʋaŋaa su pɔ̀ báʋinu lɛ ese e, balɛ ko ŋwisi amubi ala klɔ gi ɛdɔ ní kudeo me kinɛ ɛ. Kɔ Ozimizi ye aaba kɔ ebu eboa la gi bɛkpɛ ní ba ina nɛ mɛ kɔ ɛsɛnɔ ɛ.
Amubi ala klɔ gi ɛdɔ ní akla kpakpla na aʋa ɛ, ba benu banama gi bɛzi liboe le ni isami kutɔpu yɔ gi benu le e.
Pɔ̀ liboe le líʋili ní ba mɛ ɛ, lɛ baʋíze tsini ɔtɔ. Lɛ xe kunugukpɛkpɛ loo baxixa ʋa bɛba ní Aya liboe le su i, kɔ bedzi kide kyɔŋ ɛ.

Amubi ala klɔ gi ɛdɔ ní bibu ʋe me e, ba benu banama gi xe benu liboe le e, pɔ̀ gi bekuni kelea mɛ bidɔ mɛ ni ba kulɔlɔ ki exo la kude e, kɔ liboe le litse ní ba mɛ ɛ. Nite si bátratani libi tɔtɔ kubu u.
Amubi ala klɔ gi ɛdɔ ní kese gbã aʋa ɛ, alɛ ŋwisi banama gi xe benu liboe le e, bizenu le ese kinɛ ɛ. Ba bizɛkpɛ ebi la, batɔ alafa, batɔ aviteglo lɛ batɔ fɛ avitata.”
Yesu ebu abee dzedze aki ba si, “Lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi Onyime ɔtɔ gi eeglu amu gbã ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Elesiatɔ, agi ɔnɔ kakaa ɔfini ní kesea ɛ, lɛ yɛ ahwafiɔnɛɛ aba efuflu siwa sɛ ebi la akpɛ ní amu na mɛ xe asɛ ɛ.
Agi amu na etsi xe ekpese kupɔ ɛ, lɛ siwa sɛ fɛ siyɛ edono e.
Lɛ onyimee yɛ besumubi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, ‘Ɔka, aní amubi gbã woglu ní wɔ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ lò o? Lɛ nifɔ siwa sɛ sidɔ ɛ?’
Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee ebu le onu si, ‘ahwafiɔnɛɛ yɛ abitɛ lɛ. Lɛ beʋi yɛ si, ‘Wɔpɛ si kuzɛɛkpaʋi siwa sɛ ebu na a?’
Ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, ‘Owo, lɛ ese linu si xe mlɛɛkpaʋi siwa sɛ ɛ, mlaakpaʋi amu na a pɔni sɛ.

Mlaki tɔ amu na ni siwa sɛ pɔ́ bitsì i kpɛ likpɔ kɔzɛna nani amu na lipapoe le e. Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ maaki baxwɛwa ba biakpaʋi siwa sɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ, atɔ banya sɛ etù na atɔ biakpɛ la kifu, lɛ kedee, biakpɛ amu na likpɔ atɔ biahali la a kpɛ ní mɛ owle lo me e.”
Yesu ebu abee dzedze aki ba si, “Aya Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite e: Onyime ɔtɔ akɔ lisebi sisami nɛ a kpɛ ní yɛ kesea mɛ
Lisebi lɛ ya linu lisisami gɔgɔ lɛ ní esebi la kusi. Pɔ̀ xe ose lo etsi i, izeke me e sani ose kakaa. Aadzi ose ʋidi gi kudzɔʋi yɔ kuzɛɛwa kɔ evu na ɛkpɛ ní lɔ ayaa la mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ebu abee dzedze asi ba si, “Aya Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi akɔ kunyasi sisami kutɔ apisa kunɔ glegle gi kunyasi yɔ kwiku kunɔɔ petee me kinɛ ɛ gi liki si kunɔɔ pɔ́ kwifeke e.”
Yesu apani eboe la aki anɔkpi la gani abee me. Lɛ ɔ́pɛ si yipani liboeboe si ba xe líga abee ʋa mɛ ɛ.
Apani nite tɔ liboe le gi Aya yɛ Oboedoplɛɛ apani i, liba lɛ mɛ si,
“Maagu kunugu yo ki ba ní abee ʋa mɛ;
Maasi ba eboe kpokpo la ɛdɔni kelea mɛ okpese klɔ.”
Agi Yesu asɛ ní linɔkpi le su i, atrɛ ní kepea mɛ, lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Bu abee ní siwa sɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ su ese ki blɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi akpɛ esebi gbã na ɛ, yɛ onu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye;
Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onu kelea mɛ ɛ; esebi gbã na ɛ la enu banama gi ba kanɛ kenu Kaʋaŋaa a, siwa sɛ sinu banama gi benu Ozimizi ye yɛ banɛ ma;
lɛ ahwafiɔnɛɛ gi akpɛ siwa sɛ ɛ, yɛ onu Ozimizi ye. Amu na kupapaa kɔ kunu kelea ɔgù klɔ lɛ banama gi bɛpa amu na ɛ, ba benu Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba.
Kiliɛ mɛ gi bɛkpɛ siwa sɛ likpɔ ɔ, xe bɛkani sɛ ní kifu yɛ mɛ ɛ, nite ke liaze ní kelea mɛ ɔgù klɔ.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrákpɛ yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba tɔ biakpɛ banama gi bɛki banima bɛta kese e ni banama gi bɛbitɛ eboe zimizi na a likpɔ dɔni yɛ kaʋaŋaa mɛ,
lɛ biaŋwia ba kpɛ ní lifuha lɛ mɛ, ní klɔ biabemi xe biata ba ene na a.
Lɛ Aya yɛ banima biakle ŋwisi liwo le ní ba Ɔka yɛ kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ. Mlatá kutu, xe batu bali mlɔ ɛ!

Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite: Onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛmɔ exo gi bekpo ní kayaa atɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ agba sise se ada ní la aʋa dzɛ, amɔ isami nɛ gbɛgbɛ nite si azɛɛda kidɔ kakaa gi kilí ní yɛ awla ɛ, lɛ edzi atrɛ xe azeedzi kesea lia klɔ ʋa ɛ.
“Dzɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite: odziga ɔtɔ azɛɛpɛ ihwia kpakpa,
lɛ gi azɛɛmɔ ɔtɔ gi ɛɛŋa kedzi mɔmɔmɔ ɛ, azɛɛda yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee, lɛ azɛɛkɔ e dzi ɔhwia kpákpaa lɔ klɔ ɛ.
“Dzɛ lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite: Bakpábuatɔ bɛŋwia ba dzikle ye kpɛ ní limu ne me lɛ bebu akpa ede ede na ɛ.
Agi dzikle ye eyi i, behe ye edono ní oge no e, lɛ beze ní kesea si tɔ biakya akpa la mɛ ɛ. Bɛkpɛ agbã̀ na ní kusɔʋi yɔ mɛ, lɛ bɛkɔ anyaninyani na etu eʋe e.
Nite litraze ní ewe gɔgɔ la mɛ ɛ. Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba biado kɔ bebu banɔ zimizi ba ní banama gi ba bede ba bɛgyɔ su i.
Nite si biaŋwia banɔ zimizi ba kpɛ ní lifuha lɛ mɛ, niklɔ biabemi xe biata ene na a.
Yesu eʋi ba si, “Dani mlenu eboa la ya ese e?”
Bebu le onu si, “Ee!”

Lɛ Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Libasɛ si Ɔsã nɔ Ɔdɔbasɛ kakaa gi edzì lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kede ozeno zeno e, ɔlɛ ko ŋwisi kepe ɔka ɔtɔ gi ebu yɛ bidɔ vuvu ni bikóko adɔ ní yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɔblakɔ amani oŋwe no e.”
Agi Yesu eblo ni yɛ abee ʋa ɛ, asɛ ní niklɔ
lɛ edzi atrɛ ní yɛ kepea ɛ. Abasi bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ lɛ banama gi benu yɛ eboe la ɛ ba inugu itse e. Lɛ beʋi si, “Nifɔ adɔ ni kuboeteo liɔ ya elu ni yɛ enugutseboe la na?”
Aní yɛ onu osetsí yɛ Yebi ye lò o? Lɛ ani yene onu Maria na a? Lɛ aní yɛ beneminyime ba benu Yakobo, Yosef, Simon ani Yuda na a?
Lɛ dani yɛ benemidzɛ ba petee fɛ bali ní blɔ kusi na a? Kɔ nifɔ adɔ ni eboa la ya petee e?”
Lɛ loso e, bázɛ yɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ, bizɛkpɛ kubùbù ní yɛ su ní ɔkɔ kakaa; pɔ ɔ́ʋita libi ní yɛ kepea ni yɛ ɔtutɔ kepea mɛ.
Agi kuziŋa kuze ní ba awla onu i, ɔ́bitɛ enugutseboe glegle ní niklɔ ɔ.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Herodes gi eze ɔʋaŋa ní Galilea ɛ, enu Yesu unu.
Lɛ Herodes asi yɛ baka ba si, “Yɛ onu Yohanes kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛɛ gi edzì ligbã nɛ, lɛ loso kigaglaɛ kiliɛ ní yɛ awla xe ɛɛbitɛ enugutseboe a la te e.”
Kpɛ ɔtɔ ɛ, Herodes aki si bevu Yohanes, lɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ xe bɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ ní ligba lɛ ɛ. Abitɛ lɛ nite kɔkpɛ Herodia gi eze yeneminyime Filipo yedze loso o.
Lɛ ese linu si Yohanes kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛɛ asi Herodes si, “Linu ogú ni Aya ɔsã nɔ onu si gbani Herodia!”
Lɛ Herodes apɛ si yiye Yohanes, pɔ azeese Yudanɛ ma gi bɛzi yɛ si onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ.
Agi Herodes azɛɛŋa yɛ lipɔwe le e, Herodia yɛ obidzɛ eyo livu ne ní banima pɔ́ aŋu na mɛ, gi liku Herodes aŋu.
Lɛ aka aplɛ akí ɔdisami nɔ si, “Maka kitamu si maakiwɔ kidɔ kakaaɛ liɛ gi wɔaʋi i!”
Ní yene kupɛpɛ onu i, eʋi si “Mani mɛ niya abla Yohanes kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ litukpo le ní kitɛɛ mɛ!”
Liboe le liwa axwɛ ní Okusi ye aʋa, pɔ̀ kɔkpɛ yɛ kitamu yɛ gi aka aplɛ ní bababa ba petee aŋu na mɛ loso e, aki ɔsã si babitɛ ní ɔdzɛʋi yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa.
Lɛ aki si bɛzɛtsa Yohanes yɛ litukpo le ní ligba lɛ ɛ.
Bɛmani litukpo le ní kitɛ mɛ xe bɛkɔ lɛ ɛki ɔdisami nɔ ɛ, lɛ akɔ lɛ atsini yene e.
Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba efeke okpo ye, lɛ bezeevive ye e; lɛ kede e, bɛzɛɛsi Yesu liboe le.
Agi Yesu enu Yohanes liboe le e, asɛ ni klɔ ní katapokpa mɛ, lɛ atrɛ ní ɔkutɔ gi ebu lidze dzaa yɛ tete e. Banima benu si asɛ lɛ bɛsɛ ní ba ima nɛ mɛ ɛ, bɛga ikli lɛ lɛ bɛzɛtsani yɛ.
Yesu edo ní katapokpaa mɛ, lɛ gi amɔ linɔkpi le e, asigaga ɛga yɛ ni ba lɛ ayɔni banama gi ba isu mɛ igɔ ɛ.
Gi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Kelea keeblo, lɛ niya fɛ ebu lidze. Ki banima basɛ tɔ bazeedzi kiŋaŋa ní kumami yɔ mɛ kí ba isu ya.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Líma si basɛ, mlɔ tutɔ mlaki ba kiditɔ tɔ baŋa!”
Lɛ bɛsi Yesu si, “Aklã tetsu ni akpa taʋa ko alɛ blɔ awla.”
Yesu asi ba si, “Kɔlɔ ɛ, mlakɔ la amani mɛ ní ya.”

Lɛ Yesu asi banima si beze ní siwa sɛ aʋa; lɛ kede e, akɔ aklã tetsu la ni akpa taʋa la, lɛ efeke yɛ aŋu na xe edi lifunu ne, lɛ edo Aya ɖase e. Lɛ kede e, ayaʋi aklã na mɛ lɛ akɔ la aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ, lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛkɔ la ɛki banima ɛ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa atà gi eke e. Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛhali bigɔgɔ ʋɛ gi biyi kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa a.
Banama gi bɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ bɛna benyime akpe tietsu, badzɛ ba ni bebi ba bákla ba akpɛ lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Yesu aki si yɛ badɔkpasi ba beku katapokpaa kpɛ ɔtɔ tɔ bazaatrɛ ní kuni yo kapɛ ʋla, atɔ yɛ pɔ ɛ yikpɛ banima kude.
Agi aya banima pɔ ɛ, emu atrɛ ní ketokpa katɔ aʋa yɛ tètè lɛ azɛɛxwa Aya ɛ. Gi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, Yesu tètè ko eze niklɔ;
lɛ ní lipoe lɔ klɔ mɛ ɛ, katapokpaa kalɛ ní limu ne aʋa ke, lɛ kuni yo kwizɛwa abla la ni katapokpaa gi liwɔ lɛ lizeefu i tsani ka ɛ.
Olezatɔ nɔ ní inyɔ tita ni inyɔ tiglo kusi i, Yesu azɛɛga ní kuni yo aʋa gi atrába ní yɛ badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ.
Agi bɛmɔ yɛ gi ɛɛga ní kuni yo aʋa ɛ, lifu ne liku ba, lɛ bedo si okpo bɛmɔ, lɛ bɛkpɛ ozí lo ni lifu me.
Lɛ Yesu edo asi ba kyɔŋ si, “Mlevu ɔna! Mɛ liɛ ya! Mlakí se lifu.”
Lɛ Petro apani si, “Ɔkaɛ, xe gi wɔɖi i, kɔlɔ ki tɔ miga kuni yo aʋa tɔ miba wɔ klɔ.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ba!” Lɛ Petro edo ní katapokpaa mɛ lɛ ekpese kuni yo aʋa kuga trɛ ní Yesu klɔ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ gi amɔ liwɔ gagla lɛ ɛ, ese lifu ne ko lɛ ekpese kuwɔli uku ní kuni yo me. Lɛ Petro akpɛ ozi lo si, “Zɛ kímɛ Ɔkaɛ!”
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e Yesu anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ lɛ evu Petro e xe apani si, “Wɔ kuziŋa kuli sisami koŋ! Ege lɛ loso wɔ kpɛ eɖikeke la?”
Ba tiaʋa bemu iku katapokpaa mɛ ko lɛ liwɔ lɛ limɔni kufu i.
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba ní katapokpaa mɛ bekutu ye lɛ bedo si, “Sugba wɔ wonu Aya yebínyimee!”
Agi bɛtsa limu ne e, bɛba eku Genesaret.
Lɛ gi niklɔ banɛ ma bɛmɔ Yesu i gyesi i, bɛ kpɛ ole tsisi kusio klɔ petee. Lɛ banima bemani banama gi bɛzɛ nya ɛ dɔni imaɛ nɛ klɔ gi iklani ba mɛ mani Yesu i.
Lɛ bedu litukpo kesea ɛki yɛ si ɔki kude tɔ banama gi bɛnya ɛ, bagbɔni yɛ liwu le ɔgyurɔ lɔ ko; lɛ banama petee gi bɛgbɔni liwu le e, bɛyɔ ɔ.
Lɛ kede e, Farisianɛatɔ ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ bɛdɔ ní Yerusalem i ba Yesu klɔ, lɛ beʋi ye si,
“Ege lɛ loso wɔ badɔkpasi ba bɛyurɔ blɔ bakatsi ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ na a? Baʋíplo awla ní ɔkɔ lɔ onu xe bizɛŋa bidɔ ɔ!”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛta Aya isã nɛ ese xe mlevu mlɔ ɔtutɔ mlɔ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ awla na a?
Lɛ ese linu si Aya apani si ‘Kpɛ kubùbù ní wɔka ni wone su,’ lɛ ‘Ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeexo ifi ikpɛ yɛka loo yene e, lilɛ si beye ye.
Pɔ̀ mlɛbasɛ bidɔ si, xe kidɔ kiliɛ obi ɔtɔ awla gi aatani kɛ kukɔpɔni yɛka loo yene e pɔ̀ xe apani si, ‘Aya bidɔ binu i,’
líziã si odi yɛka loo yene aʋa tɔ ɔ. Gani kude uliɔ ya aʋa ɛ, mlegbe Aya yɛ ɔsã nɔ, lɛ mlekuni mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ ɔkɔ lɔ kude e.
Aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ mlenu! Anukwarɛ Yesaya edo aplɛ ní mlɔ su si! Aya apani si;
‘Banɔaya, bɛkpɔ̀ mɛ nì ba enugumeboe la,
pɔ̀ ba ina nɛ idzi kede ni mɛ su u.
Libi i tɔtɔ líma lɛ mɛ si besumu me e,
lɛ ese linu si bɛ basɛ banɔ batrɔtrɔ ŋwisi bɛ binu mɛ ba isã nɛ na a.’ ”
Lɛ Yesu axwa linɔkpi le mani isu ya lɛ asi ba si, “Mláta kutu tɔ mlenu!
Aní kidiliɛ gi kize eku ɔnɔ onugu lo me e, kɛ kize lulu ye ní ɔkɔ lɔ onu u, boŋu i eboa la gi izedo edɔní yɛ onu i, la izelulu ye.”
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Wote si eboa la gi wɔpani i eeyeʋi Farisianɛ ma na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ose kakaa elu gi aní Mɔka ní lifunu ne yɛ akpɛ lɔ ɛ, biakpaʋi lɔ.
“Mlakífuɛ ni ba; Kuŋupo benu xe bɛgbani kuŋupo o, lɛ xe kaŋupo kɛgbani kaŋupo e, ba tiaʋa pɔ́ biìdɔ eku ní lizokpo me.”
Petro azɛ liboe le yɛ onu si, “Dra abee liɛ ya su ki blɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kɔ mlenu mɛ badɔkpasi pɔ̀ mlenu liboe lɛ ya ese ŋwi banɔ gɔgɔ ba lo o?”
Kɔ mléte si kidɔ kakaa gi kiza eku ɔnɔ yɛ onugu lo me, yɛ lipo le me kizɛtrɛ kɔ ɔniɛ azɛɛdzi bɛ na a?
Pɔ̀ eboa la gi izeedo ega onugu lo me e, edɔ yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ, lɛ la enu kidiliɛ gi kizelulu ɔnɔ ɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si, dɔni yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, niklɔ begyodi nyani nyani ʋa, kí kunɔye, kihasiwawa, ɔnɔ su kuzizizizi; adzɛ ni enyimeboe, kuzé, ni asia kusɛsɛ, kalɔa ani ligbãzeze zimizi kakaa elu bizɛdɔ.
Kiboebitɛ liɛ ya elu i, kɛ kizelulu ɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ tɔ ŋa bidɔ awla moplo e, biʋílulu ɔnɔ.”
Agi Yesu asɛ ní niklɔ ɛ, atrɛ ní kesea klɔ mɛ gi Tiro ni Sidɔn balɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Kanandze ɔtɔ gi ádɔ ní kusio klɔ ɛ, aba Yesu klɔ lɛ akpɛ ozi si, “Ɔkaɛ Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye! Di me asigaga! Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔtɔ ɔkpasi mobidzɛ mɛ, lɛ ɛkpɛ yɛ kunugu yo o.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́yaka yɛ ɛ. Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba beti apɔni yɛ lɛ bɛki yɛ litukpo si, “Kítɔ ɔsɛ! Ɔlɛ ni blɔ kude gi ɛkpɛ blɔ kutoku u!”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Israel ɔlɛ ŋwisi iʋesi lɛ klɔ gi ilila ɛ, lɛ bakɔ ko bɛkpɛ mɛ ɛ.”
Niklɔ ɔdzɛɛ aba dɔ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa ní Yesu ketu ya lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ, pɔni mɛ!”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “lima si bakɔ banuvɔ ba bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ aŋwia aplɛ akí kudroʋio.”
Lɛ ɔdzɛɛ ebu le onu si, “Nite ɖii lilɛ, Ɔkaɛ, pɔ̀ kudroʋio fɛ kuzɛɛŋa bɛ klɔ gi biwɔli dɔnɔ kɔ ɔkaɛ yɛ ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ aʋa ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔdzɛ wɔ kuziŋaa kwikeme koŋ! Kidiliɛ gi wɔɛpɛ ɛ kiaba kɛ mɛ ɔki wɔ.” Lɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖi i yebidzɛ ayɔ.
Agi Yesu asɛ niklɔ ɛ, edzi aba Galilea limu ne kutu. Emu ketokpaa lɛ eze ní kesea ɛ.
Anɔkpi ʋidi atɔ ɛba yɛ klɔ, gi ɛmani bafa ba, kuŋupoo, banɔ klɔʋiklɔʋi ba, imumu ne ani bànya ede ede banyanya ba ní Yesu klɔ, nite si ayɔ ni ba pɔ́.
Banima inugu itse gi bɛmɔ imumu ne gi iigu kunugu yo, banɔ klɔʋiklɔʋi ba gi bɛɛga, bafa ba bɛyɔ ɛga, lɛ kuŋupoo fɛ kwimɔ ɛ. Nite si bɛkpɔ̀ Israel Aya.

Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba amanɔ ní yɛ isu ya, lɛ asi ba si, “Banɔaya ba liboe liiga mɛ asigaga, lɛ ese linu si balɛ ní mɛ su ewe tata lɛ abla ɛ, kididɔ fɛ kíma gi biaŋa a. Mápɛ si basɛ nì lipo me pluplu u, xegi ani nite e, biatɔ ɔpiti ní kudeo me e.”
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ kwitramɔ kiŋaŋa ɛki linɔkpii lɛ ní ɔyaya klɔ ya na a?”
Yesu eʋi si, “Aklã tasɛ alɛ ní mlɔ awla a?”
Lɛ bebu le onu si, “Aklã tegloele ni akpa sisami atɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu aki si linɔkpi le lize ní kesea ɛ.
Lɛ akɔ aklã tegloele la ni akpa la, lɛ gi edo Aya ɖase e, ayaʋi la mɛ, lɛ akɔ la aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ; lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛkɔ la ɛki banima ɛ.
Ba pɔ́ bɛŋa gi beke e. Lɛ kede e, biŋaŋa gɔgɔɛ klɔ gi badɔkpasi ba bɛhali i, biyi kusɔʋi tugloele.
Banama gi bɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, ba kiklaklaɛ mɛ kize benyime akpe tiene gi bákla badzɛ ni bebi akpɛ lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Agi Yesu akpɛ ba kude pɔ ɛ, eku katapokpaa trɛ ní Magadan kesea mɛ ɛ.
Farisianɛatɔ ni Zadukianɛ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ, lɛ bɛpɛ si, bɛɛpunu yɛ. Lɛ beʋi i dɔni yɛ klɔ si ɔbitɛ linugutseboe ki ba tɔ ɔkɔ ɔbasɛ si Aya akpɛ yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Xegi liwo le liiku u, xe kana mɛ kɛ zã ɛ, kɔ mlɔ si, ‘Kana mɛ kɛtrapɛ keletitia mɛ.’
Lɛ livlɛ lɛ ɛ, mlɔ si ‘Dzeni ye atrádɔ lɛ ese linu si ayɛɛ mɛ azã lɛ aplɛ la ɛzi kana mɛ. ‘Xegi mlɛzɛtani kana mɛ kumɔ gyesi i, kitɛ xe mlátratani eboa la gi ɛɛtrɛ la aʋa abla ɛ, kumɔ ogyesi i?”
Mlɔ abla bebi ba mlɛnyani, lɛ kumɔziŋa kyɛ kuli mlɔ mɛ ɛ! Linugutseboe mleeʋi na a? Mlatrámɔ litɔtɔ ɛ sani Yona yɛ linugutseboe le ko o.”
Lɛ ayurɔ ba xe asɛ ɛ.
Agi badɔkpasi ba ni Yesu bɛtsà Galilea limu ne e trɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ ɛ, bedze bákɔ aklãa tɔtɔ evu u.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mledi mumɔ; mleze ni aŋu ní Farisianɛ ma ni Zadukianɛ ma kunyasi yɔ su u.”
Lɛ bekpese yɛ eboe la kuta odi ní ba tsali kusi i, “Apani eboa la klɔ lɛ ese linu si kúmani aklã a tɔtɔ ɔ.”
Yesu ete eboa la gi bɛzɛpani i, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlegyo edi ní mlɔ kusi si mlámani liklã ɛtɔtɔ na a? Mlɔ kuziŋaa kúsrɛ koŋ!
Kɔ mlaʋínu eboe la ese kɔna ni abla na a? Kidze mledze si mayaʋi aklã tetsu akí benyime akpe tietsu na a? Kusɔʋi tusɛ mɛ mlɛkpɛ agɔgɔ la na?
Lɛ kitɛ mlenu aklã tegloele la gi maki benyime akpe tiene ba ese e? Kusɔʋi tusɛ mlɛhali i?
Lɛ ege lɛ loso mlénu le ese si aní aklã su mazeegu kunugu yo aki mlɔ ɛ? Mlakpɛ isu lixaŋu ní Farisianɛ ma ni Zadukianɛ ma ba binyasi dɔ mɛ su!”
Able ko yɛ badɔkpasi ba benu le ese si ɔzɛsi ba si bezeni aŋu ní aklã mɛ binyasi dɔ mɛ su, boŋu i azɛɛpani ní Farisianɛ ma ni Zadukianɛ ma bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su.
Agi Yesu atrɛ ní Kaisarea Filipi kesea mɛ ɛ, eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ banima bizedo si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye onu na a?”
Lɛ bebu le onu si, “Banɔatɔ si Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ; lɛ batɔ fɛ si Eliya, banɔatɔ fɛ si Yeremya, loo Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba mɛ ɔtɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ mlɔ pɔ̀ mlɛɛsɛ si menu na a?”
Lɛ Simon Petro ebu le onu si, “Wɔ wonu Kristo ye, Aya gi ɔlɛ ligbã nɛ Yebinyime e!”
Lɛ Yesu apani si “Isami iku wo, Simon Yona yɛ obinyimee! Anukwarɛɛ liɛ klɔ ɔ́dɔ ɔnɔ gbagbe ɔtɔtɔ kɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ mɔka ní lifunu ne e, yɛ ebu le abasi wɔ.
Lɛ loso e mɛɛsi wɔ Petro si wɔ linyine ese linu si liklakpɔ, lɛ liklakpɔɛ lɛ ya aʋa maadu mɛ ɔsɔli ha lɔ ɔ, lɛ kutseo fɛ kútratani lɔ aʋa kuŋa a.
Maakɔ lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa safi ʋa aki wɔ. Liboe kakaa gi wɔanya ní kesea aʋa ɛ, bianya nɛ ní lifunu ne, lɛ kidɔ kakaa gi wɔable ni kesea aʋa ɛ, biable ke ní lifunu ne.”
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, bakísi ɔnɔnɔ si yɛ yenu Kristo ye.

Dɔnɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, Yesu ekpese lɛ mɛ kudra aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Linu si mitrɛ ní Yerusalem tɔ mizɛɛmɔ kini gagla ní kusumu yo baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba iwla mɛ. Biaye me, pɔ̀ ní liwe tanɛ nɛ aʋa ɛ, Aya aayɔ ni mɛ gi maadzi ligbã a.
Lɛ Petro ebu Yesu kuka xe atɛni yɛ si, “Liwewe Ɔkaɛ, Aya otini le ɔzanɔ ni wɔ su”
Lɛ Yesu ekyi kyɔŋ lɛ aka aŋu mɛ akí Petro si, “Wɔ Satana! Sɛ ní mɛ su! Woetsi kude ɛki mɛ; lɛ ese linu si wɔ begyodi ba ya ɛ, bádɔ Aya kɔ ɔ; keleme banɔ begyodi benu.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Xe ɔnutɔ apɛ si yizeni mɛ kude e, lilɛ si odze yɛ isu ya, tɔ otu yɛ osetsase lo, atɔ okuni mɛ kude.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi apɛ si yibu yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aalila yɛ ligbã nɛ kɔ kpɛ mɛ loso e, aamɔ nɛ.
Libi woli liaze lɛ mɛ ki ɔnɔ xe kelea mɛ kedzì yɛ kanɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ aalila yɛ esobo la na a? Owo! Ɔ́tramɔ kididɔ kura! Lɛ ege kɛ akɔ atsrɛ yɛ ligbã nɛ na a?
Lɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, adziba ní yɛka kusudraa mɛ nì Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba, lɛ atrátsa liʋɛ ɛki ɔnɔ kakaa ní yɛ axwɛwawa la onu.
Matrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa aki mlɔ si banɔatɔ bali blɔ kusi niya gi bátratse e, kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi biamɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye yɛ kibabaɛ mɛ ŋwisi Okusi kinɛ ɛ.”
Ewe teglo kede e, Yesu agbani Petro ni beneminyime tiaʋa ba Yakobo ani Yohanes evu, lɛ bemu lito gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ ɛ; nite si ba tete bebu lidze ní niklɔ.
Agi bezeedi ye e, bɛmɔ si yɛ kiŋwiŋwiɛ mɛ kikyí, yɛ aŋu na mɛ ɛzekle ŋwisi liwo le kinɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ kyɛ ɛ, bixwa pititi gi bizeŋle e.
Kyɔŋ ko e, lɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba bɛmɔ Mose ni Eliya gi bɛzɛpani ní Yesu i.
Lɛ Petro ebu le edo asi Yesu si, “Ɔkaɛ, lipɛ koŋ si kwiba ní ya! Xe wɔpɛ ɛ, kwiawa akatsa tata ní niya; tile ki wɔ, tile kí Mose ani tile kí Eliya.”
Óbu onugu ní lɛ mɛ xe aplɛ klekle atɔ ewe ba a. Ko lɛ ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔni aplɛ la mɛ si, “Ɔniliɛ ya onu mɛ ɔtutɔ mobinyime gi malɔ ɛ, gi eku mɛ liŋu u; mlata yɛ kutu!”
Agi badɔkpasi ba benu ole lo e, lifu ne liku ba ɛsanɔ nite si bɛkɔ ba aŋu na mɛ ewe kesea.
Lɛ Yesu aba ba klɔ; lɛ agbɔni ba a; xe asi ba si i, “Mlayɔ! Mlakíse lifu u!”
Lɛ gi bɛyɔ ɔ xe bedi klanɔ ɛ, bámɔ ɔnɔnɔ sani Yesu ko.
Agi bɛzeeple lito le e, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si, “Kububasɛ kuliɔ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, mlɔ mɛ tɔtɔ ɔkifeke onugu ní kɔ aʋa a kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi Yesu si, “Ege lɛ loso Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛpani si linu si Eliya yɛ aatu kuba na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Eliya yɛ aatu kuba, kɔ akpɛ kidɔ kakaa likpɔ aplɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ mɛɛsi mlɔ si; Eliya aba kooko pɔ̀ lɛ banima bámɔ yɛ egyesi, lɛ bebu i tu ye ní ba kupɛpɛɔ onu i. Nite ke biawa Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye fɛ nyɔnyɔɛ.
Niklɔ badɔkpasi ba benu lɛ ese si Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ su azɛɛpani.
Agi Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bedziba ɛtsani linɔkpi le e, onyime ɔtɔ aba Yesu klɔ, lɛ adɔ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa ni yɛ ketu ya a,
lɛ apani si, “Ɔkaɛ, di mobinyimee asigaga! Kukpakpanya kuli ní yɛ su u, gi izeegleʋe eku kifu nì kuni me e, nite si izɛɛmɔ ɔzia glegle.
Lɛ loso magbani yɛ amani wɔ badɔkpasi ba, pɔ̀ bátani yɛ kuyɔnɔ nɔ ɔ.”

Lɛ Yesu azɛ liboe le si, “mlɔ omono kizeze me kyrikyri bebi ba ya, kitɛ xe kuʋaziŋa kúma ni mlɔ awla na a? Lɛ kɔzɛna ni lipoe woli i onu maaze ni mlɔ su du u? Lɛ kɔna ni lipoe woli onu mazɛɛzi mlɔ eboe la na? Mlagbani onyimemi ye amani mɛ ní ya!”
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no lɛ edo ní onyimemi ye me kyɔŋ ko lɛ onyimemi ye ayɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ.
Lɛ kede gi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bebu lidze e, beʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso blɔ kɔ ɔ kútani Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no kukpikpini dono na a?”

Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ mɛ aki ba si, “Liba lɛ mɛ nite lɛ ese linu si mlɔ kuziŋaa, kúsrɛ ɛ. Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, atɛsi mlɔ kuziŋaa kwikeme ŋwisi odum ye libi le kinɛ ɛ, mlaatani litoe lɛ ya kusɛ si, ‘Kpaʋi tɔ zɛdɔ ni kɔlɔ! ‘gi liaba lɛ mɛ ɛ; nite si kididɔ kítrasani mlɔ kubitɛ ɛ.
Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi lɔ ya elu i, gani Aya kuxwaxwa ni onugu nyanya mɛ ko mlatani lɔ kukpikpini dono o. Kidɔ dzedze kakaa elu kítratanɔ ɔ.”
Agi badɔkpasi ba pɔ́ bɛkpɛ likpɔ ní Galilea ɛ, Yesu asi ba si, “Bíha Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukpɛ awla ki banima
niteme si biaye ye; pɔ̀ ní liwe tanɛ we le aʋa ɛ, Aya aayɔ ni yɛ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
Liki si badɔkpasi ba pɔ́ beze ní asigaga mɛ ɛ.
Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba Kapernaum i, Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ babɔgyɔ ba beʋi Petro si, “Dani mlɔ ɔdɔbasɛɛ izɛtsa Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ kagyɔa na a?
Lɛ Petro ebu le onu si, “Ee, izɛtsa a.”
Lɛ gi Petro atrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu etu ye kuʋi si, “Petro, kitɛ wogyo liboe le odi i? Nyaŋwɛ izɛtsa kagyɔ ɔki kelea ya mɛ bekusi ba na a? Kesea mɛ bebi ba loo bababa ba na a?
Lɛ Petro ebu le onu si, “Bababa bá bizɛtsa bibɔɛ ʋɛ klɔ ɔ.” Lɛ Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Lipɛ! Kɔ libasɛ si líma si kesea mɛ bebi ba batsa kibɔ ɔ.

Pɔ̀ tɔ kukíta ɔnɔnɔ ese e, trɛ ní limu ne kutu yɔ, tɔ kpɛ wɔ dadiwa ɛ. Likpaa tɔpu inɛ gi wɔabu i, yaka lɛ onugu lo me. Wɔamɔ kibɔ gi kiana ki mɛ ni wɔ lisumugba lɛ kagyɔa ɛ. Kɔ kɛ zɛɛtsa mɛ ní wɔ onu.”
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yesu klɔ, lɛ beʋi ye si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu oʋidi ye ní lifunu ne Kaʋaŋaa mɛ na a?”
Lɛ Yesu axwa ɔnuvɔ ɔtɔ amanɔ lɛ aki yɛ ɔlɛɛ ní ba kusi yo e,
lɛ apani si “Sugba sugba, xegi mlékyi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ edzì ŋwisi banuvɔ kinɛ ɛ, mlátrati iku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ liweewe e.
Ɔnɔ ʋidi ye ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi eple ni isu ya xe edzì ŋwisi ɔnuvɔ liɛ ya kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi azɛ banuvɔ ba ya elu ba mɛ tole ní mɛ linyi ne me e, mɛ azɛ.
“Xegi ɔnutɔ aaki si banuvɔ ba ya gi bɛzi mɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa biakyi kede kpɛ mɛ ɛ, liapɛ ɔki ɔniliɛ klɔ sanɔ xe bɛka kuhɔ ʋidi ní yɛ ole lo xe bɛkɔ yɛ ɛŋwia kpɛ ní axu la odzudzu klɔ ɛ.
Babaa ki kelea, lɛ ese linu si bidɔ bɛ klɔ gi biaki si banima biabitɛ eboe zimizi na ɛ bilɛ. Lɛ linu si eboa la klɔ elu aaba la mɛ lipoe kakaa. Pɔ̀ babaa ki ɔniliɛ klɔ aʋa gi biaga ɛ!

Xe wɔ kawlakpɔa loo wɔ ɔkli aaki si wɔata kese e, tsa lɔ tuʋe. Liapɛ ɔki wɔ si tiku ní ligbã moblo le me ni kawlakpɔ tiele, loo ɔkli tole sani si tɔ iwla loo ikli tiʋa ize wo, pɔ tɔ bakɔ wɔ aŋwia akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e.
Lɛ xe wɔ kimbi ye kiaki si wɔata kese e, kpaʋi kɛ tuʋe. Liapɛ ɔki wɔ si tiku ní ligbã moblo le me ni kimbi tile sanɔ si tɔ bimbi tuʋa bize wo pɔ̀ tɔ bakɔ wɔ aŋwia akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e!
“Mlakímɔ banuvɔ sisami ba ya si bénu kididɔ ɔ. Lɛ ese linu si ba baxwɛdzɛ ba ɛ, balɛ Mɔka ni lifunu ne yɛ aŋu mɛ lipoe kakaa.
Lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, kiba aba si yibu banama gi bɛlila ɛ.
Mlegyo le edi si, iʋesi alafa tole ilɛ ní onyime ɔtɔ awla a, lɛ lɛ mɛ tole ɛlila ɛ. Kɔ ɔ́trayurɔ iʋesi avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole le ní siwa sɛ ɔtaklɔ xe iipɛ lɔ klɔ gi ɛlila na a?
Kikaka elu i, xegi amɔ lɔ ɛ, onyimee aamɔ isami glegle ní lɔ su sani iʋesi avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole le gi ílila su i.
Nite ke línu mlɔ Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne kupɛpɛ si banuvɔ sisami ba ya mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔlila a.
“Xe wonemi abitɛ liboe zimizi amani wɔ su i, wɔ tètè tipɔni yɛ tɔ bu le kubasɛ yɛ ní mlɔ tiaʋa kusi. Xe enu kutu i, tɔ mleku likpɔ.
Pɔ̀ xegi ónu kutu i, gbani ɔnɔ tole, tiaʋa pɔni isu ya ‘tɔ ɔʋatrɔ oze ní wɔ awla ní liboe kakaa gi mlaapani su u ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya liboe le libasɛ kinɛ ɛ.’
Lɛ xegi ɔ́zɛ ba liboe le e, zɛ kɔ wɔ liboe le plɛ ní ɔsɔli ha lɔ aŋu mɛ. Niteme si, xegi ónu kutu ki ɔhalɔ kyɛ ɛ, kɔ yɛ kudeo kí yɛ tɔ oze ɔki wɔ ŋwisi ɔbubitɛ loo ɔtumonu kinɛ ɛ.
“Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ pɔ́ si: xe mletsi kude ɛki kiditɔ ní kesea aʋa ɛ, biatsi kɛ onu ní lifunu ne, lɛ xe mlɛki kude ní kiditɔ su ní kesea aʋa ɛ, biaki kɛ kude ní lifunu ne.
“Lɛ mɛ ɛɛpani ipɔnɔ si, xegi mlɔ mɛ banɔ tiaʋa mlaakpɛ mlɔ begyodi ʋa likpɔ ní kidɔ kakaa su ní kesea aʋa xe mleʋi ke e, mɔka ní lifunu ne aabitɛ kɛ ɔki mlɔ.
Lɛ niklɔ gi banɔ tiaʋa loo tiata biakpɛ likpɔ ní mɛ linyi ne me e, malɛ ní ba kusi.”
Lɛ Petro aba Yesu klɔ xe eʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ, tasɛ mɛ ɔhanɛ ɔʋaziŋa aabitɛ liboe zimizi mani mɛ su xe maakɔ kyɛ yɛ na a? Tegloele na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Owo, mápani si tegloele pɔ̀ avitegloele ede tegloele,
lɛ ese linu si lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite e: ɔʋaŋa ɔtɔ eze e; lɛ liwe etɔ lɛ ɛ, atrɔ si yɛ aga kibɔɛ eboe la mɛ ni yɛ banɔsumu ba.
Kiliɛ gi ekpese ko e, lɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba bɛgbani ba mɛ tole gi adɔ liʋɛ kibɔ ʋidi itɔ ní yɛ ɔʋaŋaɛ su amanɔ ní yɛ aŋu na mɛ ɛ.

Pɔ̀ gi kibɔ kíze ní ɔnɔsumu ye awla xe akɔ tsa liʋɛ nɛ gi adɔ onu i, lɛ ɔʋaŋaɛ asi si badà yɛ ŋwisi ɔnɔ dzidzi kinɛ ɛ, yɛ nì yedze, yɛ bebi ba kɔpɔni kidɔ kakaa elu gi kiliɛ yɛ awla ɛ, tɔ bakɔ atsa liʋɛɛ nɛ gi adɔ ɛ.
Lɛ ɔnɔsumu ye adɔ́ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa aki ɔʋaŋaɛ si “Maki wɔ litukpo, plɛ litɔ kese ki mɛ; tɔ maatsa liʋɛ kakaa gi madɔ ní wɔ su i!’
Yɛ liboe le liga ɔʋaŋaɛ asigaga, nite si akɔ liʋɛɛ nɛ gi adɔ ní yɛ su i, akɔ lɛ akyɛ yɛ, lɛ ayurɔ yɛ ɛ.

“Pɔ̀ gi onyimee asɛ ní ɔʋaŋaɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ, atsani yɛ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu dzedze ɔtɔ gi adɔ kibɔ liʋɛ sisami itɔ ko ní yɛ su i. Asɔli yɛ ka, lɛ evu yɛ ole lo apɔ ɛ. Lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Tsa liʋɛ nɛ gi wɔdɔ mɛ su ɔki mɛ ɛ!’
Lɛ yɛ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu ye adɔ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa, xe aki yɛ litukpo si i, ‘Plɛ litɔ kese ki mɛ ɛ; maatsa liʋɛɛ nɛ gi madɔ ɛ!’
“Pɔ̀ ɔ́zɛ lɛ ɔki yɛ ɛ. Boŋu i, aki bɛkpɛ yɛ ligba kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ɔki yɛ pɔ́ ɛ.
Agi banɔsumu dzedze ba bɛmɔ eboa la gi ɛtrɛ la ʋa nite e, limi ba aʋa koŋ. Nite si bɛtrɛ ní ɔʋaŋaɛ klɔ, lɛ bɛsi yɛ liboe kakaa gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Liki si ɔʋaŋaɛ axwa ɔnɔsumu ye amani yɛ klɔ. Lɛ atɛni yɛ si, ‘Wɔ ɔnɔsumu litukpo me gagla onete wonu. Makɔ wɔ aʋɛ na petee akyɛ wɔ lɛ ese linu si wɔki mɛ litukpo si mikɔ la kyɛ wɔ,
wo gyeni wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ asigaga kudi ŋwisi kiliɛ gi medi wɔ kyɛ asigaga la kinɛ ɛ?’
Nite si ɔʋaŋaɛ amɔ kusuyeʋi nyani nyani, lɛ aki bɛkpɛ yɛ ligba tɔ bawa yɛ nyɔnyɔɛ kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi aatsa liʋɛ kakaa gi adɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Nite ɖii mɔka ní lifunu ne aabitɛ mlɔ mɛ kakaa liɛ gi ɔ́kɔ kyɛ yɛ ɔhanuglɔ ɔʋaziŋa dɔnɔ ní yɛ ɔna mɛ ɛ.”
Agi Yesu agù yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, asɛ ní Galilea lɛ atrɛ ní Yudea kesea ní Yordan onipe lo kede e.
Anɔkpi ʋidi eku ni yɛ kude, lɛ ayɔ ni ba ní niklɔ ɛ,
Farisianɛatɔ bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ bɛpɛ si bɛɛpunu yɛ ni kuʋíʋi si, “Dani blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si wɔagbe wodze ní kude kakaa onu gi wɔpɛ na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kikla mlákla ní Aya liboe le me si ní okpese klɔ ɛ, Aya ebu ba onyime ni ɔdzɛ na a?
Lɛ Aya apani si, ‘lɛ loso onyime aayurɔ yɛka ni yene tɔ yɛ nì yedze biakpɛ likpɔ ɔ, lɛ ba tiaʋa biadzi kisugya tile na a.’
Lɛ loso bénu banɔ tiaʋa tɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ kisugya tile. “nite si kidiliɛ gi Aya akpɛ likpɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ki lɛ kɛ mɛ ɛ.”
