Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “ege lɛ loso, Mose aki kude si onyime ɔki yedze kegbegbeplekpa tɔ ɔkpɛ yɛ kude na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mose aki mlɔ kude si mlegbe mlɔ bedze ba lɛ ese linu si mlɔ batu ba mɛ bali i gagla. Pɔ̀ lize nite ní kelea okpese klɔ ɔ.
Abla ɖii, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xe onyime ɔtɔ egbe yedze ni kude dzedze onu gi aní enyimeboe alɔ ɛ, xe agbani ɔdzɛ dzedze e, kɔ onyimee liɛ klɔ alɔ ádzɛboe e.”
Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsi yɛ si, “Xegi nite kudzɛgbanɔɔ kulɛ ni ɔdzɛ ni onyime kusi i, kɔlɔ ɔ liapɛ ɔsã nɔ xegi wɔ́gbani ɔdzɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu azɛ liboe le si, “Ani ɔnɔ kakaa yɛ aanu liboe lɛ ya ese e, pɔ̀ banama gi Aya aki kesenunu i, ba linɛ.

Mlenu lɛ ese si, eboe glegle alɛ gi la loso onyime ɔ́tratani ɔdzɛ kugbanɔ ɔ: benyimeatɔ ɛ, bɛpɔ ba si bawɔ ɔdzɛ mɔgbanɔ ɔ; batɔ ɛ banɔ bɛbitɛ ba nite; lɛ benyimeatɔ fɛ bágbani badzɛ kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa loso o. Ɔniliɛ gi aatani lɛ ese kunu i tɔ ɔzɛ lɛ.”
Banɔatɔ bɛgbani banuvɔ ba ɛ mani Yesu klɔ tɔ ɔtrɔ awla ní ba aʋa ni tɔ ɔxwa Aya ní ba litukpo, pɔ̀ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtɛni banɔaklɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu egbe liboe aki ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banuvɔ ba baba mɔ klɔ; mlakítsi kude aki ba, lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, ba elu kanɛ kenu u.”
Lɛ atrɔ awla ní ba aʋa a, lɛ asɛ.
Lipoetɔ kede e, onyime ɔtɔ ɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛɛ, kidɔ gbã woli lu lilɛ si mibitɛ xe maamɔ ligbã moblo le e?”
Lɛ ebú le onu si, Ege lɛ loso wɔeʋi me liboe ní kidɔ gbã su u? Koŋu i, ɔnɔ tole ko ɔlɛ gi yɛ apɛ ɛ. Ga ní isã nɛ aʋa xe wɔpɛ si wutiku ní ligbã́ moblo le me e.”
Lɛ onyimee eʋi si, “Isã woli lɛ klɔ ɔ?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ; wukílɔ enyimeboe ni ádzɛboe; wukízuru; wukísɛ asia akpɛ ɔnɔ awla a;
Bù wɔka ni wone; tɔ dimɛni wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ tutɔ lɔ wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ onyimee ebu isu ya onu si, “Maga ní isãɛ nɛ klɔ pɔ́ aʋa. Ege kigɔ dzɛ gi linu si mibitɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Xe wɔpɛ si wuflɔ ɛki ligbã moblo le e, trɛ tɔ zɛɛda wɔ bidɔ mɛ petee atɔ kɔ kibɔɛ kí bepiplinete ba. Liaki si exo aaze ní wɔ awla ní lifunu ne; Atɔ wɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, ga kuni mɛ kude.”
Agi onyimemi ye enu liboe le e, asɛ ní asigaga mɛ, lɛ ese linu si oxonete ʋidi onu u.
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, liaze gagla ki bexonete ba si beti eku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.
Meedzini le epani si: liaze gagla ki oxonete si oti oku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ sani si kposɔɛ ɔga trɔ̀ni yɛ liwu le me odo.”
Agi badɔkpasi ba benu liboe le e, ba inugu itse mɔmɔmɔ, lɛ beʋi si, “Kɔ abla ɛ, nyaŋwɛ koŋ aamɔ kububu i?”
Lɛ Yesu edu aŋu na ní ba aʋa a, lɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔnɔ gbagbe ɔ́tratani ɔnɔnɔ kubu u, pɔ̀ Aya kɔ ɛ, kidɔ kakaa kiatani kɛ mɛ kuba ki yɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Petro ebu le edo si, “Dike, ɔka! kwiyurɔ kidɔ kakaa, lɛ kwikuni wɔ kude e. Ege kwiamɔ obu ní lɛ mɛ ɛ?”

Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Sugba mɛsi mlɔ si, xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaze ní yɛ likusigbo le aʋa ní isami mɛ ní kele vuvu ya mɛ gi Aya aabitɛ ɛ, kɔ́ mlɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba gi mlalɛ ni mɛ kude e, mlɔ fɛ mlaze ní ekusigbo aʋa, gi mlaaŋa kukusi ní Israel akpɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa la aʋa a.
Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi ayurɔ kupe loo, beneminyime, loo benemidzɛ, loo ɔka, loo one, loo bebi, loo inyɔɔ kɔkpɛ mɛ loso e, aamɔ bɛ elu ede alafa kɔ sanɔ, lɛ Aya aaki ɔniɛ ligbã mobloe le e.
Pɔ̀ banɔ glegle gi benu batɔpu i, biaze bagɔgɔ, lɛ banɔ glegle gi benu bagɔgɔ abla ɛ, biadzi batɔpu u.
Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ nite e. Livlɛ ɛtɔ lɛ onyime ɔtɔ edo atrɛ gi azɛɛkɔ apaa benete tɔ bawa axwɛ aki yɛ ni yɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ
Adimɛ si yɛ atsa liwe le apaa yɛ kibɔɛ aki ba; lɛ atsisi ba ní yɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ.
Edzi atrɛ ní ablɔ yɛ mɛ ní ɔnyrɔ ɔgɔtole me, lɛ azɛɛmɔ benyimeatɔ gi balɛɛ kididɔ mɔbitɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e, asi ba si, ‘Mlɔ fɛ mlazɛwa axwɛ na ní mɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, atɔ maatsa liʋɛɛ nɛ gi ligyeno e ɛki mlɔ ɔ.’
Lɛ bɛtrɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Nite ke atsisi banɔatɔ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, ní inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa ani inyɔ tita mɛ dzɛ.
Agi inyɔ titsu iha kusa ɛ, edzì atrɛ ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa dzɛ lɛ azɛɛtsani benyime dzedzeatɔ gi balɛɛ ni niklɔ ɔ, lɛ eʋi ba si, ‘Ege lɛ loso mleezizi liwe zizi nɛ kidiidɔ mɔbitɛ na a?’
Lɛ bebu isu ya onu si, ‘Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ki blɔ lixwɛxwɛ ɛ.’ Lɛ asi ba si, ‘Lipɛ, nite kɔ mlɔ fɛ mlazɛwa axwɛ na ni mɛ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ ɛ.’
“Agi ɔlagɔ lɔ inyɔ tiglo isã ɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ, onetee asi yɛ axwɛ na aʋa odidi ye si, ‘Xwa baxwɛwa ba tɔ tsa ba aʋɛ na kí ba. Kpese ní baxwɛwa gɔgɔ ba aʋa zɛkɔna ni baxwɛwa tɔpu ba aʋa a.
Benyime ba klɔ gi bɛtrɛ ní axwɛ na mɛ, ní inyɔ titsu le me e, bɛtsa liwe le liʋɛ nɛ ɛki ba mɛ ɔkakaa.
Lɛ gi lina banɔ tɔpu ba aʋa ɛ, begyo edi si ba liʋɛ nɛ liakeme ɔsanɔ; pɔ̀ ba fɛ ɛ, liwe tile liʋɛ ko bɛtsa ɛki ba mɛ ɔkakaa.
Agi bɛzi ba kibɔɛ ɛ, beku kutɛ mɛ.
Ba liboe le linu si, ‘Benyime ba ya gi bɛba kudegba ɛ, ɔnyɔsasa tole ko bɛwa axwɛ na a; lɛ blɔ kɔ ɔ kwize kuweo me e, wa axwɛ na liwe zizi nɛ petee. Pɔ̀ liʋɛ lide tile ko wɔtsa aki blɔ petee!”
Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onete ebu le onu ki ba mɛ tole si, ‘Ta kutu, ɔʋiaa. Mába wɔ kura. Wɔtutɔ, wɔdimɛ si, wɔawa liwe tile axwɛ ɛ ki liwe le liʋɛ nɛ.
Lɛ loso e, zi wɔ liʋɛ nɛ tɔ sɛ. Mɛ mapɛ si miki ɔxwɛwa gɔgɔɛ nite gi maki wɔ ɔ.
Aloo mámɔ kude gi maabitɛ kidiliɛ gi mapɛ ni mɛ ɔtutɔ mɛ kibɔɛ na a? Kɔ ege lɛ loso wɔzã kimbi ní mɛ lipomepɛpɛ lɛ su i?’ ”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Lɛ loso e, banɔ gɔgɔ ba biadzi batɔpu ba, lɛ banɔ tɔpu ba biadzi banɔ gɔgɔ ɔ.”
Agi Yesu azeemu atrɛ ní Yerusalem i, ebu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kuka ní kudeo aʋa, lɛ apani aki ba ɛ.
Asi ba si, “Mlata kutu! Kwimu itrɛ ní Yerusalem. Niklɔ biakɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukpɛ awla ɔki kusɔliɔ baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba. Biatsa kutsépia ɔki yɛ.
Kɔ bɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ́ awla ɛki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ. Ba kyɛ ɛ, biakpɛ yɛ kakpaa kɔ bekusi ye e; gɔgɔ ɛ, kɔ beku ye ní ose lo su i. Pɔ̀ liwe tanɛ we le aʋa ɛ, Aya aayɔ ni yɛ ɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ.”
Lɛ Zebedeo yedze aba Yesu klɔ ni yɛ bebinyime tiaʋa ba ɛ. Edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea akí yɛ, lɛ eʋi si ɔpɛ lipo me ɔki yɛ ɛ.
Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege wɔɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki wɔ ɔ?”
Lɛ ebu le onu si, “Kaplɛ ki mɛ si, mɛ bebínyime tiaʋa ba ya ɛ, biaze ni wɔ kaŋaa ni wɔ kabaa mɛ xegi woku wɔ kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu aki bebinyime ba si, “Mléte kidiliɛ gi mleeʋi i, mlaatani ɔzia nɔ lidɔtu ilɛ gi matratu i, kutu na?”
Bebu le onu si, “Ee, kwiatanɔ.”

Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaatani mɛ lidɔtu le kutu baa; Pɔ̀ kigagla kíma ní mɛ awla si mikyá ɔniliɛ gi yɛ aaze ní mɛ kaŋaa loo kabaa mɛ ɛ. Banɔaklɔ gi Mɔka abla izekɔɛ lɛ klɔ akɔ ɛ, ba ko biatani niklɔ kuze e.”
Agi badɔkpasi liɔfɔ gɔgɔ ba benu liboe le e, bɛmɔ kusuyeʋi ní beneminyime tiaʋa ba su.
Lɛ loso Yesu axwa badɔkpasi ba akpɛ likpɔ, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlete si banama gi bizɛ ŋa banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ma aʋa ɛ, bizɛɛŋa kuka ní ba aʋa, lɛ ba onu bezeze ba ɛ, bɛmɔ kigagla ní ba aʋa a.
Pɔ̀ líma si lize ní mlɔ kusi nite e. Lɛ loso xe mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ apɛ si yize ɔnɔ ʋidi i, lilɛ si oze ɔnɔsumu ɔki mlɔ bagɔgɔ ba;
Lɛ xe mlɔmɛ tole apɛ si yize ɔtɔpu i, lilɛ si oze ŋwisi ɔnɔ dzidzi kí mlɔ bagɔgɔ ba a.
Lilɛ si mlabitɛ nite lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ɔ́ba si besumu ye e, boŋu i, aba si tɔ yisumu atɔ yikɔ yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛkɔ ɛki banɔ glegle ba ligbã kuzɛɛzɛ.”
Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛɛ sɛ ní Yerixo e linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lize ni Yesu kude.
Lɛ benyime tiaʋa gi beze kuŋupo e, beze ní kudeo su, lɛ gi benu si Yesu azɛɛza ɛ, bekpese ozí kukpɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye, di blɔ asigaga.”
Linɔkpi le litɛni ba lɛ lisi ba si bagɔ tsriɖi. Pɔ̀, bɛkpɛ ozi gaglaa ɛsanɔ dzɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye e! Dí blɔ asigaga!”
Yesu alɛɛ, lɛ axwa ba xe eʋi ba si, “Ege mlɛɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki mlɔ ɔ?”
Bebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, kwipɛ si kí tɔ kumɔ!”
Yesu edi ba asigaga lɛ agbɔni ba bimbi ʋe e; kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, ba bimbi ʋe bidra, lɛ bekuni Yesu kude e.
Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beetipɔni Yerusalem i, bɛba ɛna Betfage ní olif ye ise le ketokpaa su. Niklɔ Yesu akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa ní ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ.
Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ ní ɔmaa nɔ klɔ gi ɔlɛ mlɔ ɔtɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Xegi mleku ko e, mlaamɔ tedzi ɔtɔ gi bɛkpɛ ní ogbe no me nì Yebi ye. Mleble ʋa tɔ mlagbani ʋa amani mɛ.
Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ eʋi mlo liboetɔ ɛ, mlasi yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã ʋa a,’ nite si aayurɔ ba ɔki mlɔ kyɔŋ.”
Liba lɛ mɛ nite atɔ Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ yɛ eboe la aba la mɛ si:
“Mlasi Yerusalem ɔma ʋidi no me bezeze ba si,
Mledi, mlɔ okusi ye atrába ní mlɔ klɔ!
Epleni isu ya, lɛ ɔtini ní tedzi
ni yebi ye aʋa.”
Nite si badɔkpasi tiaʋa ba bɛzɛ bitɛ kiliɛ gi Yesu asi ba ɛ:
Begbani tedzi ye ni yebi ye manɔ, bɛkɔ ba bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛtrɔ ní ba aʋa lɛ Yesu emu atrɔ ɛ.
Banɔ glegle ni linɔkpi le me bebu ba bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛplɛ ní kudeo me, lɛ banɔatɔ fɛ bɛtsà kuwlakpasa ɛplɛ ní kudeo me ɛki yɛ tɔ ɔga ɛ.

Anɔkpi ala gi eze ní Yesu ɔtɔ nɔ ni yɛ kedea bekpese ɔsaye kukpɛ si, “Hosana ki Dawid yɛ lipo me obi ye! Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ linyine me! Biakpɔ Aya ní Lifunu ne ɔgyɔgyɔ klɔ ke!”
Agi Yesu eti eku Yerusalem i, ɔma nɔ pɔ́ ɛkpa ge. Lɛ banima beʋi si, “Nyaŋwɛ iliɛ ya lee e?”
Lɛ linɔkpi le libu le onu si, “Yɛ onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ Yesu gi ádɔ ní Nazaret ní Galilea a.”

Yesu etiku ní Yerusalem Kasɔlipea mɛ lɛ akpikpini banama petee gi bɛɛda bidɔ mɛ ní banama gi beedzi bidɔ mɛ ni níklɔ ɛ. Ekyi banama gi bɛɛyaʋi bibɔ ʋɛ ba ikplɔ nɛ ewe e, lɛ etutru banama gi bɛɛda akpakpo la ba egbo la eʋe e.
Lɛ asi ba si, “Bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ni Aya yɛ liboe le me sì Aya apani sì, ‘Mɛ Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ, biaxwa lɛ si, ligba gi biazesumu me ní lɛ mɛ ɛ. ‘Pɔ̀ mlɛ kɔ lɛ ɛbitɛ okpokɔ ki beze ba!”
Kuŋupoo ni banama gi báʋitani kuga ɛ, bɛba yɛ klɔ ní Kasɔlipea mɛ, lɛ ayɔ ni ba ɛ.
Kusɔliɔ baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛmɔ kusuyeʋi gi bɛmɔ enugutseboe ala gi azɛɛbitɛ ɛ, ni banuvɔ ba gi bɛzɛkpɛ ozi ní Kasɔlipea mɛ si, “Hosana kí Dawid yɛ lipo me Obi ye e!”
Lɛ loso beʋi Yesu si, “Dani woenu eboa la gi banuvɔ ba ya bɛɛpani i?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ee menu.” “Mlaʋíkla Aya liboe le oʋídi si, ‘Mlɛ basɛ banuvɔ ba nì bebi ba sì biaki kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ liɔ gi kwiflɔ na a?’ ”
Lɛ Yesu asɛ ní banima su ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ xe edo ní Yerusalem atrɛ ní Betania ɔma nɔ mɛ, niklɔ azɛɛfɛ.
Agi Yesu edziitrɛ Yerusalem keletitia livlɛ lɛ ɛ, kuʋe kwizeeku ye.
Amɔ ogbose ní kedèpɛa lɛ atrɛ ní lɔ su i, pɔ ɔ́mɔ lisebi tɔ́tɔ ni lɔ mɛ sani awlakpa tsali. Lɛ asi ose lo si, “Wɔtrayo esebi liwewe tɔ ɔ!” Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e ogbose lo etse.
Agi badɔkpasi ba bɛmɔ te e, ba inugu etse. Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Kitɛ lize xe ogbose lo etse kpla te na a?”

Yesu ebu le onu si, “Matrɔ likla lɛ aʋa aki mlɔ si, xe mlɛziŋa a xe mlɛ́keɖi i, mlaatani kidiliɛ gi mabitɛ aki ogbose lo e, kubitɛ. Aní lɛ tete, pɔ̀ mlaatani ketokpa lia ya kyɛ kusɛ si, ‘Kpaʋi tɔ zɛɛŋwia isu ya akpɛ ní axu la mɛ,’ lɛ lia ba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Xegi mlɛziŋa ɛ, kidɔ kakaaɛ liɛ gi mlaʋi i xe mlɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlamɔ kɛ.”
Yesu edzi aba Yerusalem Kasɔlipea mɛ; lɛ gi azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ, kusɔliɔ baka ba ni banɔ tsitsi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Kigagla woli wɔmɔ xe wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu u? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aki wɔ kudeo?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Maʋi mlo liboe tile ko, lɛ xe mlebu le onu i kí mɛ ɛ, maasi mlɔ kigaglaɛ liɛ klɔ gi kilɛ mɛ awla xe mɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya a.
Nifɔ Yohanes yɛ kigaglɛ ki dɔ gi kɛ azɛɛkɔ akpɛ kuni yo aki banima: Aya klɔ loo banima klɔ na?”
Lɛ bekpese eboe la kuŋwlɛ ní ba atsali kusi si, “Liboe woli lɛ kwiapani i? Xe kwibu le onu si, ‘Dɔni Aya kɔ ɛ,’ aaʋi blo si, ‘Kɔ ege lɛ loso mlázi Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ?’
Pɔ̀ xe kwipani si, ‘Dɔni banɔ kɔ ɛ,’ kwise lifune kidiliɛ gi banima biabitɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ba petee bɛzi lɛ si Yohanes onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ.”
Lɛ loso e, bebu le onu ki Yesu si, “Kúte.”
Lɛ asi ba si, “Lɛ kɔ mɛ fɛ, mátrasi mlɔ, kigaglaɛ liɛ gi mɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya a.

Yesu ebu abee si, “Abla ɛ kitɛ mlegyo edi ni liboe lɛ ya su u? Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi bebinyime tiaʋa beze ni yɛ awla a. Adzɛ otsitsi ye klɔ lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Mobi ye, trɛ tɔ zɛɛwa axwɛ na ní wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ omono.’
Ebu le onu si, ‘Mápɛ si miwa axwɛ,’ pɔ̀ lɛ kede e, ekyi yɛ kugyodi yo lɛ atrɛ ɛ.
Lɛ yɛka atrɛ ní obinyime ʋlaɛ klɔ, lɛ asi yɛ nite me liboe le ké. Ebu le onu si, ‘yoo, mɔka maadzɛ,’ pɔ̀ ɔ́dzɛ ɛ.
Ba tiaʋa ɛ, bamɛ owoli abitɛ ní yɛka kupɛpɛɔ aʋa na a?”
Bebú le onu si, “Obinyime tsitsi ye.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Sugba, mɛsi mlɔ si: babɔgyɔ ba ni bawawadze ba betu ɔtɔ ɛki mlɔ lɛ beti eku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.

Lɛ ese linu si gi Yohanes kuni yo okpɛkpɛɛ aba mlɔ klɔ xe azaabasɛ mlɔ kude gbã gi mlaga ɛ, mlázi yɛ aʋa ŋa; pɔ babɔgyɔ ba ni bawawadze ba bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa. Lɛ gi mlɛmɔ nite fɛ ɛ, mlékyi mlɔ begyodi ʋa xe mlazi yɛ aʋa ŋa a.

Yesu apani si, “Mlata kutu tɔ mlenu abee dzedze. Kese onete ɔtɔ eze, lɛ awà wain ɔnyrɔ ɔ, akpɛ kuka aklà ni lɔ̀, lɛ etu lizokpo akí wain yɛ kukakà ɛ, lɛ awa ɔnyrɔ nɔ bepepe ba ligba gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ ɛ. Lɛ ahayi wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akí ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba, lɛ atrɛ ní kude me e.
Agi lipoe le lina kí wain yɛ kugugu yɔ ɛ, akpɛ yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba atsisi yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba klɔ atɔ bazɛ yɛ ɔgyɔ lɔ amani yɛ.
Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bevu yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba a, bekusi tole, beye ɔtɔ, lɛ bɛsa ɔtɔ fɛ akla na ɛ.
Onyimee edzi akpɛ yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dzedze batɔ gi bɛsrɛ sani batɔpu ba, lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛ bitɛ ba nite me ke.
Gɔgɔɛ, atsisi yebinyime ní baklɔ. Maka lɛ aʋa si, ‘biakpɛ kubùbù yo ní mobi ye su.’
Pɔ̀ gi ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛmɔ obinyime e, bɛpani ni bahanuglɔ ba kusi sì, ‘Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee Yebi ye iliɛ ya, yɛ atráŋa ɔnyrɔ nɔ. Mlaki tɔ kuye ye, atɔ kuzi yɛ ɔŋa klɔ!’
Nite si bɛ ʋã yɛ gbli, bu ye dono ní wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ beye ye e.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Abla xe wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aba ɛ, ege aabitɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ bepepe ba na a?”
Lɛ bebu le onu si, Lɛ mɛ lidra si aaye benyime zimizi ba klɔ ʋa, kɔ akɔ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aki ɔnyrɔ aʋa bedidi dzedze, gi bakɔ biakɔ yɛ ɔgyɔ lɔ mani yɛ xe wain yɛ ligúpoe le lina ɛ.”
Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaʋíkla e ʋidi ní Aya yɛ liboe le me si,
‘Likla ɛnɛ klɔ gi beglitrɔ ba
begbe si líma ní liboeboe me e,
lɛ lidzi likla veve le koŋ
ní la petee kusi.
Ɔkaɛ yɛ abitɛ lɛ nite;
linu liboe gi litu blo kugyɔ ɔ!’
“Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ biazɛ ka ní mlɔ awla kɔ kí banama gi biayo esebi gbã na ɛ.”
“Ɔniliɛ gi aagleʋe dɔ ní likla ɛlɛ ya aʋa ɛ, avini kukpe kukpe. Pɔ̀ xe likla ɛ lɛ ya lia wɔli dɔ ɔnutɔ aʋa ɛ, liahɔ yɛ pliplipli.”
Agi Kusɔliɔ baka ʋidi ba ni Farisianɛ ma benu Yesu yɛ abee liɛ ɛ, betè si ba su azeegu kunugu yo,
lɛ loso bɛ pɛ si beevu ye. Pɔ̀ bezese linɔkpi le, gi lizi lɛ si Yesu onu Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ.
Yesu egu kunugu yo aki ba dzɛ ní abee ʋa mɛ si,
Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi nite gi okusi ɔtɔ eze e xe azɛɛgbani ɔdzɛ aki yebinyime e. Lɛ edu ɔdɔŋakplɔ aki banima a.
Akpɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba sì bazɛ si banɔxwaxwa ba tɔ baba kudzɛgbanɔɔ ɔdɔŋa klɔ, pɔ̀ bádimɛ ní lɛ aʋa a.

Lɛ loso akpɛ banɔsumu dzedze nì ole kí banɔxwaxwa ba si: ‘Mɛ ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ ni kidɔ kakaa kiflɔ; meyé mɛ egumenyime na nì ádzɛ la gi eku kumu yɔ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ kakaa kina a, mlaga ba ní kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwe le me.’
Pɔ̀ banɔxwaxwa ba báfuɛ ɛ, ba axwɛ na ɔza ko bezee di: batɔ bɛtrɛ ní ba inyrɔ nɛ mɛ, batɔ kyɛ bɛtrɛ ní ba axwɛ na mɛ,
lɛ banɔ gɔgɔ ba bevu yɛ banɔsumu ba, bebu kinie ɛki ba lɛ beye ba ɛ.
Isu iyeʋi okusi ye nyani nyani; niteme si akpɛ yɛ baguta ba lɛ beze ye banɔye ba klɔ ɔ xe bɛkani ba ɔma nɔ ɛ.
Lɛ axwa yɛ banɔsumu ba lɛ asi ba si, ‘Mɛ obi ye kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwe le lina, pɔ̀ banama gi maxwa ɛ bégyeno aki lɛ ɛ.
Le loso e, mlatsanì ɔma nɔ bede ʋa tɔ mlaxwa banima kisrɛsrɛ liɛ ko gi mlamɔ ɛ amani kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwe le me.
Niteme si banɔsumu ba bɛtrɛ ɔma nɔ enè na mɛ ni bede ʋa aʋa, lɛ bɛkpɛ banama gi bɛmɔ ɛ likpɔ, bagbã̀ ni banyaninyani pɔ́, niteme si, kudzɛgbanɔɔ kepea keyi ni banɔxwaxwa ba.
Pɔ̀ gi Okusi ye etiku tɔ yidi bababa ba ɛ, amɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi ɔ́kpɛ kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwu le e.
Okusi ye eʋi ye si, ‘ɔʋia, kitɛ lize xe woti oku ní ya gi wɔ́kpɛ kudzɛgbanɔɔ liwu na a?’ Pɔ̀ onyimee óbu le onu u.
Lɛ okusi ye asi yɛ banɔsumu ba si, ‘Mlanya yɛ ikli ni iwla, tɔ mlakɔ yɛ aŋwia kpɛ oŋwe no ní litumu ne me. Niklɔ kubemi ni ene kutàtà kwiaze.’ ”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Bɛxwa banɔ glegle pɔ̀ basisamiatɔ ko bebú ba mɛ ɛ.”
Lipoe tɔ kede, Farisianɛ ma bɛsɛ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ kunyanya tɔ bɛkɔ ɛ punu Yesu i vu gani beʋiʋi me.

Lɛ bɛkpɛ ba badɔkpasi ba ni banɔatɔ gi bɛdɔ Herodes yɛ likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ mɛ ní Yesu klɔ ɔ, lɛ bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwite sì wónu ɔsia nɛ ɛ. Lɛ wɔ kudɔbasɛ yɔ kuli ní Aya yɛ kudeo aʋa ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ, wɔʋíkpɛ isu kunugu ní ɔnɔ gbagbe yɛ begyodi ba su u, lɛ ese linu si wɔkɔ litɔtɔ lɛ mɛ ɛki ba ozekɔ
Si blɔ, kitɛ wogyodi? Liyɔ kedu ní blɔ ɔsã nɔ su si kutsa ɔgyɔ ɔki Roma banɛ ma ɔʋaŋaɛ loo kukí tsa na a?”
Pɔ̀ gi Yesu kɔɔ, ete ba batrɔtrɔ nyani nyani ʋa loso e, apani si, “Mlɔ banɔ aŋumɛboebitɛ ba! Ege lɛ loso mlɛpɛ si mlefeke me edi i?
Mlabasɛ mɛ kibɔ ɛ liɛ klɔ gi bizɛ kɔ ɛtsa ɔgyɔ lɔ ɛ!” Agi bɛkɔ kibɔɛ mani yɛ ɛ,
eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ aŋu mɛ ni linyi bɛ ya a?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kaisaro binɛ.” Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Nite kɔ ɛ, mlakɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Kaisaro kiniɛ akí Kaisaro, tɔ mlakɔ Aya kiniɛ akí Aya.”
Agi benu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, litu ba kugyɔ, lɛ bɛyurɔ yɛ xe bɛsɛ ɛ.
Ní liwe lɛ klɔ ke aʋa ɛ, Zadukianɛ batɔ gi bizedo si bekpo ʋa batrádzi ligbã́ tɔ ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ nì kuʋíʋi sì
“Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Mose asi blɔ sì xe onyime ɔtɔ agbani ɔdzɛ pɔ̀ bápɔ bebi xe etse e, lilɛ si yɛ oneminyime ɔgbani ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze tɔ bapɔ bebi aki yɛ ɔtrɛtrɛɛ.
Abla ɛ, beneminyime tiegloele beze ní blɔ kusi. Otsitsi ye agbani ɔdzɛ pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ bebi xe etse e, lɛ ayurɔ yedze aki yeneminyime e.
Nite ke liba lɛ mɛ ɛki yeneminyime ʋla ɛ ní ɔtanɛ aʋa a, riɖiɖi kɔzɛna ogloele aʋa, ba tiegloele ba petee bɛgbani ɔdzɛɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́pɔ obi xe etse e.
Gɔgɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛɛ kyɛ etse.
Abla ní liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi bekpo ʋa biayɔ ɛ, ní banɔ tiegloele ba kusi bamɛ owoli yedze ɔdzɛɛ aaze? Gi ba pɔ́ bɛgbani yɛ edi na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Mlɛ ta kese koŋ! Lɛ ese linu si mléte Aya yɛ liboe le loo Aya yɛ kigagla ɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si xe bekpo ʋa bɛyɔ xe bedzi ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, biaze ŋwisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba kinɛ ní lifunu ne lɛ batrá gbani badzɛ loo zeni benyime.
Ableke ní bekpo ʋa kuyɔyɔɔ su i, mlaʋíkla ʋídi liboe lɛ gi Aya asi mlɔ na a? Apani si,
‘Mɛ menu Aya akí Abraham, Aya akí Isak, ni Aya akí Yakob.’ Yɛ onu Aya akí banɔ gbagbe ba, aní kí bekpo ʋa.”
Agi linɔkpi le linu liboe le e, ba inugu itse ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su.
Agi Farisianɛ ma benu si Yesu amwa ene na akpɛ Zadukianɛ ma onu i, bɛ kpɛ likpɔ,
lɛ ba mɛ tole, ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ekeni edi si yipunu yɛ ni kuʋiʋi.
Eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Ɔsã woli ɛsa kedzi kuzɛ na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, ‘Lɔ wɔka Aya nì wɔ ɔna nɔ pɔ́, ni wɔ esobo la petee, ani wɔ begyodi ʋa pɔ́.’
Lɔ ya onu ɔtɔpu nɔ gi ɛsa kedzi kuzɛ ní isã nɛ kusi i.
Ɔʋla lɔ gi eyi lo o lɔ onu si: ‘Lɔ wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ ɔtutɔ wɔ isu ya.’
Mose yɛ Isã nɛ pɔ́ nì Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ bɛ like ne lɛ ya.”
Agi Farisianɛatɔ bɛkpɛ likpɔ ɛ, Yesu eʋi ba si,
“Kitɛ mlebu ní Kristo su u? Nyaŋwɛ Yebi onu u?”
Bebu le onu si, “Dawid yɛ lipo me obi onu.”
Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kɔlɔ ege lɛ loso Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛki si Dawid ɔxwa yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ’? Lɛ ese linu si Dawid apani si,
“Ɔka Aya asi mɛ Ɔkaɛ si:
‘Ze niya ní mɛ kaŋa mɛ
kɔkpɛ ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi makɔ wɔ ahwafianɛ ma kukpɛ ní wɔ kukliseo.’
Xe nite Dawid axwa yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ’, kɔ kitɛ mɛ Kristo aaze Dawid yɛ lipo me obi i?”
Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani le onu kubu kí Yesu u, lɛ dɔnɔ liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa kɔtsinɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani yɛ liboeboe kuʋi tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu apani aki anɔkpi la ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba si,
“Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma ba bɛki kigaglɛ tɔ bebu Mose isã nɛ ese.

Lɛ loso e, lilɛ si mlabitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi biasi mlɔ si mlabitɛ ɛ aʋa, tɔ mlezeni liboe kakaa gi biasi mlɔ si mlabitɛ kude e; pɔ̀ mlakikpasi ba kiboebitɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si baʋíga ní ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ aʋa a.
Ba isã nɛ ese kubùbù yo kuzɛɛkɔ si banima baʋítani lɛ aʋa kuga a, gi bilɛ ko ŋwisi adɔtu nyipu u gi bɛtrɔ ba kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ bápɛ si bɛkpɛ ɔwla tɔ béfeke loo tɔ bɛpɔni ba tɔ betu la a.

“Bizɛbitɛ liboe kakaa tɔ banima bamɔ ba. Mledi igɛmi nɛ gi bɛŋwlimi Aya liboe le ni lɛ aʋa a gi bizɛkɔ ɛ nya ba kutu yo, ni ba iwla lɛ, tɔ mlevu aŋu ní kiliɛ gi bikeme su i! Able mlevu aŋu dzɛ tɔ mledi kiliɛ gi ba igɛmi nɛ idze ní ba ewu la su i!
Bɛdimɛ ni izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ní bidɔ mɛ iŋaklɔ nì egbo gbã na ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ;
Bízɛpɛ si ba pani ba nì kubùbù ní ene na mɛ nì tɔ baxwa ba si, ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ.’ Líma si baxwa mlɔ si.
“ ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ’ lɛ ese linu si mlɔ pɔ́ ɛ, benemi ko mlenu lɛ ɔdɔbasɛ tole ko ɔlɛ ní mlɔ awla.
Lɛ mlakíxwa ɔnɔnɔ ní kesea aʋa ya si, ‘Ɔka a’, lɛ ese linu si Ɔka tole ko ɔlɛ ní mlɔ awla ní lifunu ne.
Lɛ loso mlakíki si baxwa mlɔ si, ‘Ɔnɔgbanɔ’, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ ɔnɔgbanɔ tolee ko onu Kristo ye.
Lilɛ si, ɔnɔ ʋidi ye ní mlɔ kusi i, yɛ oze mlɔ ɔnɔsumu ye.
Ɔniliɛ gi aabitɛ isu ya ɔnɔ ʋidi i, Aya aaple ni ye lɛ ɔniliɛ gi aaple ni isu ya ɛ, Aya aamu ni ye.

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mlɛda lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa opupo lo ekpɛ banima lɛ mlɔ ɔtutɔ pɔ̀ mlaʋíti iku u, lɛ mlaʋíki si banama gi beekeni idi i kyɛ, si beti eku u!

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba. Mlɛtrɛ ní batrɛtrɛ ba bedze ba klɔ si mlɛɛpɔni ba, pɔ̀ kɔ ɛ, mlemeni ba kɔ mlɛzi ba kudɔkpa ɛ. Kɔ lɛ kede kɔ mlalɛ ni banima aŋu na mɛ, kɔ mlɛɛxwa Aya lipoe gblamadza tɔ mlɛkɔ emeni ba. Mlɔ kutuhehe o kɔ kwianyani sanɔ.

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mlɛdzi kaale ni kaʋa tɔ mleekyi ɔnɔ, pɔ̀ xe mlemɔ ɔnɔ ɛki Aya ɛ, kɔ mlɛbitɛ yɛ ɔnɔ zimizi gi aasɔ̀ ni kifumoni ye me sani mlɔ tutɔ lɔ ɛ!

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ kuŋupoo, gi mlɛɛgbani banima ɛ! Mlɛɛbasɛ si, ‘Xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu ni Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ, kitamu yɛ kínya yɛ; pɔ̀ xe aka kitamu ni Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ sika ɛ, kɔlɔ kitamu yɛ kinya yɛ.’
Kuŋupo ni baga! Liwoli lisa ɛveve e, sika yɛ loo Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ gi lɛ liki si sika yɛ su adra na a?
Mlɛɛbasɛ dzɛ si, ‘Xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu ni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ɛ, ɔsã nɔ óvu ye e; pɔ̀ xe aka kitamu ni bidɔ kɔkɔ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ aʋa ɛ, kitamu yɛ kivu ye.’
Kitɛ mlɔ bimbi ʋe bini te! Biwoli bísaɛ veve e, bidɔkɔkɔ ʋɛ loo ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ gi lɔ ɛki bidɔkɔkɔ ʋɛ su bidra na a?
Niteme si, xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu nì ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ɛ, aka kitamu ni ɔsuʋɔ lɔ ni kidɔ kakaa gi bɛki ní lɔ aʋa ɛ;
lɛ xe aka kitamu ni Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ, aka kitamu yɛ ni lɛ ni Aya, gi yɛ yɛ̀ ozekɔ ɛ;
lɛ xe ɔnutɔ aka kitamu ni lifunu ne e, aka kitamu ni Aya yɛ likusigbo le ni Aya gi yɛ odi ní lɛ aʋa ɛ.

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ! Mlɛzɛɛki Aya oni me bikpɛdɔ flafla dɔni mlɔ inyɔ nɛ mɛ bɛ kapɛ liɔfɔa, pɔ̀ mlɛyurɔ Ɔsã nɔ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ bɛ likenè ŋwisi, eboe me kutsatsa gbã, asigagadidi ni kuʋaziŋa. Mlabitɛ ní la ya aʋa pɔ̀ mlakiyurɔ agɔgɔ la a.
Kuŋupo banɔgbanɔ ba! Mlɛyurɔ eboe nyipu nyipu na lɛ mleeti eboe fiteete la xunyɔ ɛ!
“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mleplo mlɔ kupliʋi yo ni kuzi yo kedea, pɔ̀ kɔmɛ kwiyi ni bidɔ bɛ klɔ gi mlɛzɛ ni kigagla ni kuŋazi i.
Wɔ Farisiɔnɛ! kaŋupo! Plo kepliʋia ni kezia mɛ gbã, kɔ ka kedea kyɛ kɛdra ɛ!

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba! Mlalɛ ŋwisi idrɔ lɛ gi bedzà akalo ekɔ kinɛ, gi iipedi ní oge no o pɔ̀ ni kimɛ mɛ kɔ ɛ, iyí ni bekpo ba axwa ni bidɔ fumufumu.
Niteme ké, ní oge no e, mlɛŋwi kí ɔnɔ kakaa sì mlɛpɛ̀, pɔ̀ ní kimɛ mɛ ɛ, mleyi ni aŋu mɛ kiboebitɛ ni etukpo me gagla.
“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba, Mlɛwa Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba idrɔ lɛ, lɛ mlɛlulɔ banɔ gbã ba idrɔ lɛ kyɛ ɛ;
Lɛ mlɛsi isu ya si, atɛsi kwize blɔ baka ba lipoe le e, nya kúkpɛ inugu ni Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba kuyeye me.
Nite si mlɛzi lɛ si mlɔ mlenu besoebi ba aki banama gi bá beye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba a!
Kɔlɔ mlatrɛ ní lɛ aʋa, tɔ mlagù eboa la gi mlɔ bakatsitsi ba bekpese e!
Mlɔ bagblaga ʋa ni bagblaga bebi ʋa! Kitɛ mlegyo edi si mlaase ní lipɔ bubu le gi liakpɛ mlɔ ní kifumoni ye me na a?

Lɛ loso e, mɛɛsi mlɔ si mɛɛtsisi mlɔ Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ni beboete ba ani badɔbasɛ ba; mlɛtraye bátɔ, ku batɔ ni ise su, mlafiaʋi batɔ biseʋi ni Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ, lɛ mlakpikpini batɔ dɔni ɔma mɛ kɔtsinɔ ɔma mɛ ɛ.
Gani lɛ mɛ ɛ, kutuhehe kí banɔgbã̀ ba gi mleye e, kwiaba mlɔ aʋa, dɔni Abel dradra yɛ aʋa kɔzɛna ni Zakaria Baraxya yebinyime gi mleye ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ ni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ kusi i aʋa.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ ní lɛ mɛ si: sugba ɛ, kutuhehe kí kunɔye uliɔ pɔ́ kwiba mlɔ abla bebi ba pɔ́ aʋa a!

“Yerusalem, Yerusalem! Wɔ gi wòye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba, xe wɔ̀sa Aya yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba gi atsisi wɔ ɛ, akla na! Tasɛ mapɛ si mikpɛ wɔ bebi ba likpɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔkukɔne lɔ izeewe lɔ bebi ʋa ni siwlasasa sɛ, pɔ̀ wɔ́ki mɛ kude e!
Dike, Aya edo ní mlɔ lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, lɛ loso e lilɛɛ ki mlɔ pluplu.
Dɔnɔ abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, mɛsi mlɔ si, mlatrámɔ mɛ tɔɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi mlaapani si, ‘Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ linyi ne me e.’ ”
Gi Yesu edo ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ xe azaasɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beti i pɔni yɛ si tɔ odi ligba lɛ
Lɛ asi ba si, “Ee, pɔ̀ mlɛɛmɔ agba la ya petee e, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, sugba ɛ, akla ana petee biatsra la, lɛ litɔtɔ lítrawɔ ní litɔtɔ aʋa a.”

Lɛ kede agi Yesu odi ni olif ye ise le lito le aʋa ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beti apɔni yɛ, lɛ beʋi ye si “Si blɔ lipoe lɛ gi eboa la petee aaba la mɛ ɛ. Lɛ kidiliɛ gi kiabu wɔ kubabaa ni kelea lidu le kubasɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ, tɔ mlakíki ɔnɔnɔ omeni mlo.
Banɔ glegle biaba ní mɛ linyi ne me si, ba benu Kristo ye gi biameni banɔ glegle e.
Mlaanu bigu ʋɛ ni agutaboe la onu ní idzage ne, pɔ̀ mledi lɛ aʋa si lifu likíku mlo, eboa la elu aaba la mɛ, pɔ̀ kelea lidupoe le liʋína a.
Kese kiayɔ kedu ní kese su, lɛ kukusi kwiata kigũ ni kukusi, kuʋɛ kwiadɔ lɛ kese kiahwa ni ikɔ glegle e.
Bɛya elue biaze ŋwisi kuyeʋiyeʋi ní kubipɔ mɛ.
Lɛ biabu mlo kɔ si tɔ behe kutu aki mlɔ nì tɔ beye mlo, lɛ kelea pɔ kiatrɔ mlɔ ahwafi kɔkpɛ mɛ loso o.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banɔ glegle biayurɔ ba kuziŋaa. Lɛ biatrɔ ba ahanuglɔ ba ahwafi, biabu ba ahanuglɔ ba kukɔ.
Niteme si asia na beboedoplɛ ba biaŋwi gi biameni banɔ glegle e.
Ɔkpɛ gi kuzimizi yo kwiasrɛ onu i, banɔ glegle ba kunɔdimɛnɔɔ onu kwiayɔ.
Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aalɛ kɔzɛna ni lɛ ɔgù klɔ ɛ, Aya aabu ye.
Lɛ Liboe Gbã nɛ ní Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa gi kɛtraba su i, biapani lɛ klanɔ ní kelea mɛ petee gi liaki kudeonu si ɔnɔ kakaa aanu le e, xe ableke kelea kia gu u.
Lɛ loso e, “Mletramɔ, ‘Litugu ne ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ’ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi oboedoplɛɛ Daniel apani i. Litralɛɛ ní ɔdradra klɔ.” ɔdɔkla yɛ ovu aŋu tɔ onu liboe lɛ ya ese.
“Kɔlɔ ɛ, banama gi bali ní Yudea kesea mɛ ɛ, bese atrɛ ní eto la mɛ.
Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔtini yɛ ligba lɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔkizizi lipoe si yiple eku kepea mɛ tɔ yizɛɛkɔ yɛ bidɔ mɛ.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔkidzi itrɛ kepea si yatrɛɛkɔ yɛ ewu la a.
Liaze gagla ɛki bamɛdzɛ ba nì bebi ne ba ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ!
Mleʋi Aya tɔ mlɔ kuseseo kukídɔ ní kublɔ lipoe le loo ní isu mɛ liyɔwe le aʋa!
Lɛ ese linu si kupepeo ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, kwianyani sani kuliɔ gi kwiba edi i dɔni kelea mɛ okpese klɔ kɔna ni omono e. Lɛ kɔ elu kutrába liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ Aya atí ní ewe la aʋa kooko; xe ɔ́bitɛ nite e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́traze ligbã. Kɔkpɛ yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba, loso e Aya atráti ní ewe la aʋa.
“Niteme si, xe ɔnutɔ asi wɔ si, ‘Di, imɔ Kristo ye ní ya!’ loo imɔ yɛ ní kɔlɔ ɛ!’ wukízɛ yɛ aʋa ŋa a.

Nite si basia nɛ ba gi biaba ní mɛ linyi ne me si ba benu Kristo ye ni banama gi biayɔ ɔlɛɛ si benu beboedoplɛ; xe biabitɛ enugutseboe ni eboe gi banɔ bámɔedii tɔ bɛkɔ emeni Aya yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba, xe liasɔnɔ ɛ.
Mlata kutu! Masi mlɔ xe ableke lipoe le liana a.
“Lɛ loso e, xe banima biasi mlɔ si, ‘Dike, aŋwi ní ɔyaya klɔ ɛ’ mlakídzɛ niklɔ; loo xe bɛpani si, ‘Dike, ɔkpasi ligba ɛ lɛ ya mɛ ɛ!’ mlakízi lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa.
Lɛ ese linu si, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, aaba ŋwisi dzeni kifububu dɔni kewetu ya gi kizɛŋwi ni keweku ya kinɛ ɛ.
“Niklɔ gi bidɔ tsetse ʋe bifini i, niklɔ opéte ʋa bizɛkpɛ likpɔ.
“Kyɔŋ ní baxixa ba klɔ ʋa kede e, liwo le liamɔni kuyi lɛ kanɔa mɛ kialɔsi, ɔdzidzi yɛ kyɛ ɔ́trakle tɔɔ, aŋwi na aawɔli, lɛ Aya aasugu kidɔ kakaa ni lifunu ne.
Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kubaba gyesi ye aaŋwi ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ; lɛ banima pɔ́ ní kesea aʋa biabemi gi bɛmɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi atrába ní lifunu ne aplɛ la mɛ ni kigagla ani kusudra glegle.
Nite si aatsisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ni kakuklui ole gagla ni kelea mɛ akɔtɔ tene la pɔ́ aʋa, lɛ biaxogo yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba dɔni kelea mɛ kapɛ tiele tsini ka kapɛ ʋla.
Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Mlaki tɔ ogbose lo ɔbasɛ mlɔ bidɔ, xe lɔ aya la alɛ wɔwɔ, xe ose lo ɛɛtuma ɛ, kɔlɔ mlete si kedzenilea keti pɔnɔ.
Niteme ke xe mlɛɛmɔ eboa la gi ɛɛba la mɛ ɛ, mlete si lipoe le lina, lɛ lina kevunu ya a.
Mlaplɛ aŋu si eboa la ya pɔ́ aaba la mɛ, xe ableke banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla ɛ biatse.
Lifunu ne nì kesea biaza, pɔ̀ me eboe la atráza liwewe e.
“Ɔnɔnɔ ote, liwe le loo ɔnyɔsasa nɔ, Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne loo Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kyɛ béte e, Ɔka Aya tete ko ete.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kubaba ɛ, kwiaze ko ŋwisi nite gi lize ní Noa lipoe le me e.
Kpɛ ɔtɔ kí kuni yiyio e, banima bɛzɛŋa, lɛ bɛzɛŋwɛ kyɛ, benyime nì badzɛ bɛzɛgbani baglɔ ʋa, kɔzɛna nani liwe gɔgɔ lɛ aʋa gi Noa emu eku ní onitsahu lo me e.
Pɔ̀ bamɔ liboe lɛ gi lizɛba egyesi kɔzɛna nani lipoe lɛ gi kuni yiyio kwiba ɛgba ba ɛsɛ nɔ ɛ. Nite ké litraze xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba a.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, benyime tiaʋa biazɛwa axwɛ ní ɔnyrɔ mɛ, biasɛ ni tole, lɛ ɔʋla ɛ, biayurɔ yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ badzɛ tiaʋa biaze ní lihɔkla nɛ aʋa a; biasɛ ni tole, pɔ̀ ɔʋla ɛ, biayurɔ yɛ.
“Lɛ loso e, mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ, lɛ ese linu si mléte liwe lɛ klɔ gi mlɔ Ɔkaɛ aaba a.
Xe kepea ɔkaɛ ete elesi la lipoe lɛ klɔ gi oze ye aaba ɛ, wɔaka ní lɛ aʋa si aaze ni aŋu, lɛ ɔ́traki kude xe oze ye aatiku ní yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e, mlɔ fɛ mlabla aplɛ, lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ aʋa gi mlaʋídi yɛ kudeo onu i.
“Nite kɔ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ onu ɔnɔsumu gbã nì oboete e? Yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ɔkaɛ akɔ edu ní banɔsumu dzedze ba onu u, tɔ aaki ba bá kiŋaŋaɛ ni lipoe le aʋa.
Liaku ɔnɔsumu liɛ klɔ isami xe yɛ ɔkaɛ adziba tsani yɛ gi eedi kepea aʋa mumɔ ɛ!
Sugba mɛsi mlɔ si, yɛ ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ ɔnɔsumu liɛ klɔ du ní yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee onu.
Pɔ̀ xe onu ɔnɔsumu nyani nyani i, aasi isu ya sì, yɛ ɔkaɛ ɔ́tratsɔ odzi i,
kɔ ekpese yɛ bahanuglɔ banɔsumu ba kukusi, lɛ aaŋa kɔ aŋwɛ ni badaŋwɛmu ba ɛ.
Xe ɔnɔsumu liɛ klɔ yɛ ɔkaɛ aadzi i liwe lɛ gi odi yɛ kudeo onu i, ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ gi óte aʋa ɛ.
Yɛ ɔkaɛ aatsà yɛ kukpe kukpe lɛ aaki si yɛ nì banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ ba biaze ní kakpá tiele me. Niklɔ aabemi xe aata yɛ ene na a.
“Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kiaze ŋwisi kiliɛ gi idisami liɔfɔ ikɔ lɛ kani ʋa a, xe itrɛ si lɛzɛtsani onyime ɔtɔ gi ɛgbani ɔdzɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Bamɛ tietsu beze kunukpadze, lɛ tietsu gɔgɔ ba beze beboete e.
Idisami kunukpadzeo kwikɔ lɛ kani ʋa pɔ̀ kúvu kumu ipɔnɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ idisami beboete ba ɛ, bevu kumu ní kuʋeo me epɔni ba kani ʋa.
Ɔdzɛnyee ɔ́tsɔ kuba a, liki si sra si mu idisami nɛ, lɛ iku sra mɛ ɛ.
“Elesi la tetsu i, ozi lo eyi si, ‘ɔdzɛnyee aba loo. Mledo aba tsani yɛ!’
Lɛ idisami liɔfɔ lɛ inyime e, lɛ imuni lɛ kani ʋa kuklekleo e.
Lɛ idisami kunukpadzeo kwisi beboete ba si, ‘Mlapɔli mlɔ kumu kutɔ aki blɔ ɔ; blɔ kani ʋa bíha kuni.’
Idisami beboete ba bebu le onu si ‘Owo!’ ‘kumu liɔ gi kuli ní blɔ awla ɛ, kútrana blɔ nì mlɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso e, mlaze ebu aki isu ya ní kɔ badàdà ba klɔ ɔ.’
Pɔ̀ gi idisami kunukpadzeo kwitrɛ ní kumu yɔ obu klɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛnyee aba eku, lɛ idisami titsu i lɛ gi ize kublabla mɛ itiku ní ɔdzɛɛ ɔgbanɔ klɔ nì ɔdzɛnyee, lɛ bɛda opupo lo e.
Lɛ kede e, idisami gɔgɔ lɛ iba lɛ ikla ɛtsisi si ‘Ɔka, ɔka! Dra opupo lo ki blɔ ɔ!’
Pɔ̀ ɔdzɛnyee ebu le onu si mɛɛsi mlɔ si, méte mlo.”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ abee si lɛ loso e, mleze ni aŋu lɛ ese linu si mléte liwe le e loo ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɔ, gi maadziba ɛ.
“Yesu atrɛ ni yɛ abee ba aʋa si dzɛ, lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa kiaze ŋwisi kiliɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛsɛ atrɛ ni kude me e xe axwa yɛ besumu bi ʋa a, lɛ akɔ yɛ bidɔ mɛ akpɛ ni ba awla kinɛ ɛ.
Aki ɔkakaa ní yɛ kutanɛɔ onu. Aki ɔnɔ tole kibɔ ikotoku titsu, aki ɔnɔ ʋla yɛ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa, lɛ aki odzedze kibɔ okotoku tole e. Lɛ asɛ atrɛ ní yɛ kudeo me e.
Niteme si, osumubi liɛ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku titsu le e, akɔ yɛ kibɔe akpɛ ní axwɛwawa mɛ, lɛ amɔ kibɔ ikotoku titsu atrɔ ɛ.
Nite ke osumubi liɛ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa lɛ ɛ abitɛ, lɛ yɛ kyɛ amɔ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa atrɔ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ osumubi liɛ gi azɛ kibɔ okotoku tole lo e, asɛ lɛ azeetu lizokpo le, lɛ ekpo yɛ ɔkaɛ yɛ kibɔɛ ɛ.
“Lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ kede e, besumubi ba ɔkaɛ edzì niteme si eʋi ba kiliɛ gi bɛwa kibɔɛ su axwɛ ɛ.
Osumubi liɛ klɔ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku titsu le e, akɔ kibɔ ikotoku titsu dzedze apɔnɔ lɛ ebu lɛ mɛ si, ‘Mɛ ɔkaɛ, wɔki mɛ kibɔ ikotoku titsu, Di titsu ilɛ ya gi lɛ mamɔ atrɔ ɛ.’
Lɛ yɛ ɔkaɛ apani si, ‘Wɔbitɛ mumɔ, wɔpɛ, wonu osumubi gbã, wodo anukwarɛ nì kibɔ sisami liɛ ya, madu wo ní eboe ʋidi onu. Ba tɔ gamɔ isami ni mɛ!’
Lɛ osumubi liɛ klɔ gi azɛ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa lɛ kyɛ ɛ, aba lɛ apani si ‘Mɛ ɔkaɛ, wɔkɔ kibɔ ikotoku tiʋa kpɛ mɛ awla, pɔ̀ mamɔ ikotoku tiʋa apɔni lɛ ɛ.’
“Yɛ ɔkaɛ edo si ‘Wɔbitɛ mumɔ, wonu osumubi gbã, wodo anukwarɛ nì kibɔ sisami liɛ ya. Madu wo ní eboe glegle onu. Ba tɔ gamɔ isami nì mɛ!’

“Lɛ kede e osumubi liɛ klɔ gi azɛ kibɔ okotoku tole kyɛ aba a, lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔka mete si ɔnɔ gagla wonu gi wɔlɛ ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi izɛ kɔ bidɔ ɛdɔni níklɔ gi ɔ́kpɛ kididɔ ɛ, le wuzɛɛŋwlɛ̃ bidɔ gi bínu wɔ binɛ ɛ.
Nite si mese lifu lɛ mazeekpo wɔ kibɔ ɛ ni sise se me. Ɔka di imɔ wɔ kibɔɛ, zikɛ ɛ.’
“Lɛ ɔkaɛ apani si, ‘Wɔ ɛ, ɔ́flɔ ni litukpo me gagla osumubi wonu, kɔ wote si mizeebu bidɔ niklɔ gi mákpɛ kididɔ ɛ, lɛ mizɛɛŋwlɛ bidɔ eŋa ní níklɔ gi mehle kididɔ ɛ
Agi wote si nite malɛ ɛ, ege lɛ loso wɔ́kɔ mɛ kibɔɛ ɔzɛɛkɔ ɔkpɛ ní kibɔɛ ɔbla klɔ ɔ, xe kiapɔ trɔ kímɛ, xe ableke madzi na a.’
“ ‘Abla ɛ, mlazi kibɔ okotoku tole lo ní yɛ awla tɔ mlakɔ kɛ aki kibɔ ikotoku liɔfɔ lɛ onete e.
Ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ awla gi kidɔ kilɛ ɛ, biapɔnɔ ɔki yɛ, tɔ aamɔ sanɔ; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ awla gi kididɔ kíma ɛ, kisisami liɛ gi kiliɛ yɛ awla ɛ, biazɛ kɛ.
Osumubi ɔ́flɔ liɛ ya xunyɔ ɛ mlebu yɛ aŋwia kpɛ oŋwe no ní litumu ne me. Niklɔ aabemi xe aazeɔta yɛ ene na.’
“Xegi Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba ni sikusi me ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba petee, aaze ní yɛ likusigbo le aʋa,
nite si kelea mɛ banima petee biaxogo ba ni yɛ aŋu na mɛ. Kɔ alɛ bamɛ ní kupɛ tuʋa ɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ ko gi oʋesi gbanɔ yɛ izeebu iʋesi le lidze ni bamu ʋa su kinɛ ɛ.
Aadu banama gi bɛbitɛ ní yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa ɛ, ni yɛ kaŋaa mɛ, kɔ atsini bagɔgɔ ba ni yɛ kaba mɛ.
Kɔ Okusi ye asi yɛ kaŋaa mɛ bezeze ba si, ‘Mlaba, mlɔ Mɔka akrira, mlagazɛ mlɔ ɔŋa klɔ ni kaʋaŋaa gi abla aplɛ kimlɔ dɔni kelea likpese le e.
Gi kuʋɛɔ kwize kume e, mlɛki mɛ kiŋaŋa, olile ezeku me lɛ mlɛki mɛ kuni; Meze ɔbaba lɛ mlɛzi mɛ kpɛ mlɔ kupeo me.
Meze ni liya lɛ mlɛkpɛ kusa ní mɛ su i; Mazɛɛnya lɛ mledi mɛ aʋa ɛ, gi meze ligba fɛ ɛ, mlɛba edi me.’
Nite si banama gi bɛbitɛ Aya kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a biabu le onu ki yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, lipoe woli kwimɔ wɔ gi kuʋɛ kwizeeku wo o xe kwiki wɔ kiŋaŋa a, loo olile ezeku wo o xe kwiki wɔ kuni na a?
Lɛ lipoe woli kwimɔ wɔ gi woze ɔbaba xe kwizi wɔ ɛkpɛ blɔ kupeo me e loo woze ni liya xe kwikpɛ kusa ni wɔ su u?
Lɛ lipoe woli kwimɔ si wɔ isu mɛ igɔ ɔ, loo woze ligba, xe kwiba edi wo o?’
Nite si Okusi ye aabu le onu si, ‘Mɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, lipoe kakaa gi mlɛbitɛ nite me eboa la elu ɛki mɛ benemi ba ya mɛ tole e gi ɔnɔnɔ oʋíbù i, mɛ mlɛbitɛ lɛ ɛkɔ.’
“Kɔ asi banama gi bali ní yɛ kabãa mɛ si, ‘Mlaseza ní mɛ su, mlɔ Aya exo ifi le akpɛ. Mlazatrɛ ní kifumoni ye gi bɛkpɛ plɛ kí Ozimizi ye ni yɛ bapɔnɔpɔnɔ ba mɛ ɛ!
Kuʋɛ kwiku me pɔ̀ mlɛda aŋu na mláki mɛ kiŋaŋa a, olile eku me mláki mɛ kuni i;
Meze ɔbaba pɔ̀ mlazi mɛ akpɛ mlɔ kupeo me e. Meze ni liya mlegbe mlákpɛ kusa mɛ su u. Gi mazɛɛnya ɛ xe meze ligba kyɛ ɛ, mlákɔ litɔtɔ ní le mɛ aki mɛ ɛ.’
Kɔ banima bebu le onu ki yɛ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, lipoe woli koŋ kwimɔ wɔ gi kuʋɛ kwiku wo, loo olile ezeku wo, loo woze ɔbaba, woze ni liya, wɔ isu ya mɛ igɔ ɔ, loo woze ní ligba xe kwikyí kede kpɛ wɔ na a?’
Niteme si Okusi ye aasi ba si, ‘Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, lipoe kakaa ɛ lɛ gi mlegbe xe mlapɔni mɛ benemi ba ya gi ɔnɔnɔ óʋibu i, mɛ mlapɔnɔ.’
“Lɛ loso biatsisi ba ní kutuhehe moblomoblo me e. Kɔ bɛtsisi banama gi bɛbitɛ ni Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a, ní ligbã moblo le me e.”
Agi Yesu agù yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ bɛ ya petee e, asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si;
“Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlete plɛ kinɛ ɛ, betráŋa kutseo lidɔzawe le ní ewe taʋa kede. Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ biakɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kpɛ awla tɔ beku ye ní ose lo su.”
Nite me si kusumu yo baka ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛtsa ní Kayafa gi yɛ onu kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ,
lɛ bɛbitɛ batrɔtrɔ níklɔ si biavu Yesu ní kikpokpo me tɔ biaye ye.
Pɔ̀ bɛpani si “lima si kwiabitɛ lɛ ní liweŋaŋa lɛ mɛ” “xe aníte e banima biayɔ kedu.”
Yesu eze ní Betania ní onyime ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si, Simon gi anya kunya kyikyi yɔ kepea mɛ.
Gi azɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ aba yɛ klɔ gi evu alabasta keʋe gi kamɛ kumu flafla a gi kwizi kedzi i, kwize; lɛ ɔdzɛɛ ekyi kumu yɔ abali yɛ litukpo le.
Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beyeʋi isu gi bɛmɔ nite e, lɛ beʋi si “Ege lɛ loso ezizi kumu yɔ nite e?”
“Nya biatani kumu liɔ kudà kedzi ʋidi gi biakɔ kibɔɛ ɔki bepiplinete ba xe e!”
Yesu ete liboe lɛ gi bɛzɛ pani, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege kunugu mlɛkpɛ ɔdzɛ liɛ ya,? Kidɔ gbã gi ki gyeno e, kɛ abitɛ aki mɛ.
Bepiplinete ba bali mlɔ kusi liwe kakaa, pɔ̀ mátraze mlɔ su lipoe kakaa.
Kumu yɔ gi abali mɛ aʋa te e kɔ akɔ abla mɛ kisugyaɛ aki mɛ kuviveo.
Sugba mɛsi mlɔ si ɔkɔ kakaa gi biapani Aya liboe le ni kelea mɛ ɛ, biapani ní kidiliɛ gi ɔdzɛ liɛ abitɛ su tɔ biakɔ lɛ plɛ aŋu ni yɛ aʋa a.”
Lɛ kede e, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba bamɛ tole gi yɛ bizɛxwa si Yuda Iskariot i, atrɛ ní kusumu yo baka ba klɔ
lɛ eʋi ba si, “Xe gi mebu Yesu akɔ kimlɔ ɛ, ege mlaki mɛ ɛ?” Lɛ bɛkla kibɔ pititi yɛ avitata kɔ ɛki yɛ.
Dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, Yuda azaapɛ kudeonu gi akɔ Yesu kukpɛ awla ki ba ɛ.
Ni Akla mɔnyasi na liwe tɔpu nɛ aʋa ɛ, badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ wɔ̀pɛ si kululɔ plɛ ki kutse lidɔzawe le bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ kí wɔ na a?”

Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ ní onyime ɔtɔ klɔ ní ɔma ʋidi no me, tɔ mlasi yɛ si; ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ apani si, Mɛ ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɛna; mɛ ni mɛ badɔkpasi ba kwiaŋa Kutse lidɔzawe le bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ ní wɔ́ kepea mɛ ɛ.’ ”
Lɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛbitɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛbla Kutseo lidɔzawe le bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ plɛ ɛ.
Gi kulagɔ kwina ɛ Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba beple eze ní kezia ese e.
Gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu apani si “mɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, mlɔ mɛ tole atrákpɛ mɛ awla.”
Liki si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛpisa, lɛ bekpese ye kuʋí tole tole si, “Ɔkaɛ, maka si aní mɛ wɔɛsɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlɔ mɛ liɛ gi ɛkpɛ awla kezia mɛ ni mɛ ɛ, yɛ atrábu me kɔ.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrátse ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya liboe le lipani i kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ líaze gagla ki ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aabu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukɔ ɛ. Xegi baxà ɔniliɛ klɔ apɔ kura ɛ, liapɛ ki yɛ sanɔ ɔ!”
Lɛ Yuda gi yɛ atrákpɛ yɛ awla ɛ, eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, dani aní mɛ ɛ?” Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Wɔ́ wɔɛpani nite.”
Agi bɛzɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu akɔ lìklã nɛ, lɛ edo Aya ɖase e, xe ayaʋi lɛ ɛ. Lɛ akɔ lɛ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlazɛ atà; lɛ lìnu mɛ kisugyaɛ.”
Lɛ kede e, akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia lɛ edo ɖase e ní ka aʋa xe, akɔ ka aki ba si, “Mlɔ pɔ́ mlaŋwɛ ní ka onu.”
“Bɛ ya binu mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛkɔ e du kunyanya vuvu yɔ ní Aya ni yɛ banima kusi, mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛbali ní banɔ glegle ba eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ litukpo o.
Mɛsi mlɔ si, Mátraŋwɛ wain liɛ tɔɔ kɔzɛna nì liwe lɛ gi maaŋwɛ wain yɛ dzɛ nì mlɔ ní Mɔka Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ gi bɛza ɔdzi tole e, bedo etrɛ ní Olif ye ise le ketokpa aʋa a.
Lɛ Yesu apani asi ba si, “Omono elesi ala ya ɛ, mlɔ pɔ́ mlaase yurɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si Aya liboe le lipani si:
“ ‘Aya aaye oʋesi gbanɔɛ,
kɔ iʋesi le isehle e.’
“Pɔ̀ xegi mayɔ ádɔ ní bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, maaku mlɔ ɔtɔ trɛ ní Galilea.”
Lɛ Petro ebu le onu aki Yesu si, “Xe banima pɔ́ bese yurɔ wɔ kura kyɛ ɛ, mátradzi kede ní wɔ su liwewe e!”
Yesu asi Petro si, “Sugba ɛ, katsaa gi ɔkukɔ lɔ si loeme elesi la ɛ, wɔanada tatá si wote me.”
Lɛ Petro ebu le onu si, “Xe liaze si beye me apɔni wɔ kyɛ ɛ, mátranada si mete wo!” Lɛ badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba kyɛ bɛpani nite ke e.
Lɛ Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní ɔkutɔ gi bizɛxwa si Getsemane e, lɛ asi ba si, “Mleze ní ya tɔ mitrɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ kɔlɔ tɔ mizɛɛxwa Aya.”
Agba ni Petro ni Zebedeo yɛ bebinyime tiaʋa ba evu. Enu kuyeʋiyeʋi lɛ isu ikpese yɛ asigaga la kuga ɛ,
lɛ asi ba si, “mɛ esobo la ɛxixa gbɛgbɛ nite si míhatse. Mleze nì aŋu nì mɛ ní ya.”
Agi atrɛ ni ɔtɔ nɔ taʋɛ ɛ, adɔ nì yɛ aŋu na mɛ ní kesea. Lɛ aki Aya litukpo si, “Mɔka, xe liapɛ ɛ, tɔ ti ɔzia nɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia lia ní mɛ aʋa! Pɔ̀ aní kiliɛ gi mapɛ pɔ̀ bitɛ ní wɔ kupɛ́pɛɔ onu u.”
Lɛ gi edzi aba ní badɔkpasi tiata ba klɔ ɛ, amɔ si bɛdɔ sra, lɛ eʋi Petro si “kɔ mlɔ tiata mlatrátani aŋu kuze ni mɛ ɔnyɔsasa tole kpoo na a?
Mlezè ni aŋu tɔ mlaxwa Aya tɔ mlakíku ní kufekedi me. Nya Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛdimɛ xe e pɔ̀ kisugyaɛ kibotso o.”
Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya kuʋla si, “Mɔka, xe lítrasɔnɔ si wɔati ɔzia nɔ kepliʋia ní mɛ aʋa a, sani si maŋwɛ ka ɛ, lɛ kɔ ɛ bitɛ ní wɔ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a.”
Gi Yesu edzi aba ɛ, amɔ si badɔkpasi ba bɛdɔ sra dzɛ; bátani ba bimbi ʋe kudra.
Dzɛ ɛ, Yesu ayurɔ ba, lɛ asɛ atrɛ xe azɛɛxwa Aya kutanɛ nì eboa la klɔ ke e.
Lɛ edzì atrɛ ní badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ, xe eʋi ba si “Sra sɛ ko mlafini idɔ xe mlɛyɔ isu ya mɛ na a? Mledi ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɛna! Bɛtra bu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kpɛ awla ɛki banɔ zimizi ba.
Mlayɔ! Mlaki tɔ kusɛ! Imɔ ɔniliɛ gi eebu me kɔ ɛ.”

Agi Yesu aze gu kunugu yo e, Yuda, badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole e, aba eku ni ba kusi i. Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ gi kusumu yo baka ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛkpɛ ɛ, xe livu ihɛ piɔpiɔ ʋa ni kusekpeo, lize ni yɛ kude e.
Yuda gi yɛ ɛkpɛ Yesu awla ɛ, abitɛ kutrɔtrɔ ni linɔkpi le si; “Ɔniliɛ gi yɛ lidzɔ lɛ maamu i, yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi mlɛpɛ ɛ, mlevu ye!”
Lɛ Yuda eti apɔni Yesu kyɔŋ, lɛ apani yɛ si, “Kusuyɔ ki wɔ, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ.” Lɛ amu yɛ lidzɔ lɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kɔsi ni lɛ su, ɔʋia!” Lɛ linɔkpi le liga xe liba evu Yesu gagla ɛ.
Banama gi beze nì Yesu kude e, bamɛ tole etso yɛ ihɛ piɔpiɔ yɛ lɛ ati kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ ɔnɔdzidzi ye yɛ kutukpa ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu asi ɔdɔkpasi liɛ klɔ si, “Dzini wɔ ihɛ piɔpiɔ yɛ kpɛ ní yɛ ozeklɔ,” “Banama petee gi bizeetso ihɛ ɛ, biatse ní ihɛ onu.
Kite wóte si maatani kupɔnɔ kuʋi dɔni mɔka awla gi aatsisi yɛ baxwɛdzɛ baguta sani ahakpɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa na a?
Pɔ̀ xe mabitɛ nite e, kɔ kitɛ liboe lɛ gi bɛŋwlimi plɛ ni Aya liboe le me e liaba lɛ mɛ?”

Lɛ Yesu apani aki linɔkpi le si, “Liziã si mlaba nì ihɛ piɔpiɔ ʋa nì kusekpeo si mlévu me ŋwisi ɔnɔ zimizi gi ayɔ kedu u, xe ɔʋíbitɛ ni isã nɛ aʋa kinɛ na a? Mazɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, liwe kakaa pɔ̀ mlevu me e.
Pɔ̀ eboa la pɔ́ eba la mɛ tɔ eboa la gi Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba bɛŋwlimi plɛ ní Aya liboe le me e, aba la mɛ.” Lɛ badɔkpasi ba petee bese e, xe bɛsɛ yɛ su i.
Banama gi bevu Yesu i, bɛtsini yɛ ní Kayafa gi onu Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye kepea mɛ, níklɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛtsa.
Petro fɛ eze ní ba kedea ke. Agà riɖiɖi eti eku ní kusumu yo ɔkaɛ kepea mɛ. Eze kesea ní kepea mɛ kɔpɔni kepea bepepe ba tɔ yimɔ kiliɛ gi eboe la aatrɛ ɛ.
Kusumu yo baka ba ni Yudanɛ ma betsixwa ba petee bɛpɛ asia tɔ bɛkɔ ɛbu Yesu lipɔ atɔ biaye ye;
pɔ̀ bátani litɔtɔ kumɔ ɔ, linyaze lɛ mɛ si, banɔ glegle bedo bɛba ɔtɔ nɔ lɛ bɛsɛ asia na ɛkpɛ yɛ awla a, gɔgɔɛ benyime tiaʋa bedo bɛba ɔtɔ nɔ,
lɛ bɛpani si, “Onyime liɛ ya apani si, ‘Maatani Aya yɛ lisɔligba lɛ kuyaʋi lɛ ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ, maadzini lɛ kuwa.’ ”
Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye ayɔ alɛɛ, lɛ eʋi Yesu si, “Kunububu kutɔtɔ kúma ní wɔ awla gi wɔakɔ ki liboe lɛ gi bɛkɔ ni wɔ su na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔfuɛ, nì yɛ ɛ. Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye asi Yesu dzɛ si “Maka kitamu akí wɔ ní Aya linyi ne me, si blɔ xe wɔ wonu Kristo ye gi onu Aya Yebi ye e?”

Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu akí yɛ si, “lilɛ ní lɛ mɛ kiliɛ gi wɔpani i.” Pɔ̀ mɛsi mlɔ si: Lipoe le litrába gi mlɛtramɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi odi i ní Aya kigagla ɛ petee onetee yɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, xe atrába dɔni lifunu ne ní aplɛ la mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye akyì yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ liwu le tɔ yikɔ ɛbasɛ yɛ kusuyeʋio, lɛ apani si, “Libusioboe! kúdzi uzia ɔnɔ gi eze liboe le katsalia tɔɔ. Mlenu yɛ libusioboe le gi apani i.
Lɛ eʋi ba si, ege kinu mlɔ begyodi ʋa ɛ?” Bebu le onu si “Aŋa lipɔ lɛ loso e egyeni ni kutse.”
Banɔatɔ bɛɛtsí sita sɛ kpɛ Yesu aŋu na mɛ, batɔ bekusi ye xe batɔ kyɛ bɛbɔ yɛ isumu ne e
lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Do liboe plɛ ki blɔ Kristo! Nyaŋwɛ asa wɔ bidɔ mɛ na a?”
Lɛ gi Petro eze ní kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea kuka mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ osumubi ɔtɔ eti apɔni Petro lɛ asi yɛ si, “Wɔfɛ woze ni Yesu Galilea ɔnɛ kude.”
Pɔ̀ Petro anada ní ba petee aŋu na mɛ si, “Méte liboe lɛ su gi wɔɛpani i.”
Lɛ edo atrɛ ní kepea kevunu ya, níklɔ ɔnɔsumu ɔdisami dzedze ɛmɔ yɛ lɛ ɛsi banɔaklɔ gi beze níklɔ si i, “onyime liɛ eze ni Yesu gi ádɔ Nazaret kude e.”
Petro anada dzɛ si, “Maka kitamu si méte onyime liɛ klɔ!”
Lidze xe banama a gi bɛlɛɛ niklɔ ʋa ɛ, bɛsi Petro si, “Lilɛ lɛ mɛ si bamɛ tole wɔfɛ wonu, wɔ kipaniɛ kibu wɔ ɛkɔ!”
Petro apani dzɛ si, Maka kitamu si sugba mɛɛsɛ! Aya ohe kutu kí mɛ faã xe lima lɛ mɛ ɛ! “Méte onyime liɛ klɔ ɔ!” Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖi i, ɔkukɔ lɔ eme e.
Lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ klɔ gi Yesu asi yɛ aʋa a si: “Xe ableke ɔkukɔ lɔ aame e, wɔanada tatá si wote me.” Edo lɛ aze bemi tiitiiti i.
Keletitia livlɛ lɛ fìfìfì ì, kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛnya si biaye Yesu.
Bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ lɛ bɛgbani yɛ tsini Pilato gi yɛ onu Roma ɔnɛ kesea aʋa odidi ye klɔ ɔ.
Agi Yuda a, gi yɛ ebu Yesu akɔ, enu si bɛtsa kutse pia ɛki Yesu i, ekyi ɔna mɛ lɛ edzini klosalo, kibɔ pititi avitata la atsini kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba ɛ.
Lɛ apani si i, “Mabitɛ liboe zimizi gi makɔ onyime e gi ɔ́ŋa lipɔ ɛ akpɛ awla kí kutse.” Lɛ bebu le onu kí yɛ si i, “Kitɛ líyi blo e? Wɔ liboe linu!”
Lɛ Yuda aŋwia kibɔɛ aplɛ ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ lɛ asɛ xe azɛɛkpɛ isu ya lihuʋi i.
Lɛ kusumu yo baka ʋidi ba bɛtá kibɔɛ lɛ bɛpani si i, “Ika kibɔ kɛ ya, liyɔ kedu ní blɔ isã nɛ su si kukɔ kɛ kpɛ ní bidɔgyɔgyɔ ʋɛ kepimia mɛ.”
Bɛbitɛ kugyodi lɛ bɛkɔ kɛ zeedzi ɔ́dɔʋɔ yɛ kesea tɔ biazevìve bababa ba.
Lɛ loso bizɛxwa kesea lia klɔ si ìka kese kɔkpɛ nì omono o.
Niteme si liboe lɛ klɔ gi Aya apani i agani oboedoplɛ Yeremya aʋa liba lɛ mɛ si, “Bɛkɔ kibɔ pititi avitata la gi Israelbanɛ ma bɛdimɛ si biatsa ní yɛ litukpo e,
bekɔ kɛ edzi ɔdɔʋɔɛ kesea ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔkaɛ aki mɛ ɔsã nɔ kinɛ ɛ.”
Yesu alɛɛ ní Roma ɔnɛɛ kesea ɔʋadi ye aŋu mɛ, lɛ eʋi Yesu si, “Wɔ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye na a?” Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Nite wɔ̀pani.”
Pɔ̀ gi kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛkɔ eboe la ní yɛ su i, óbu litɔtɔ onu u.
Lɛ gi Pilato eʋi Yesu si i, “Woʋínu eboe ala gi bɛkɔ ní wɔsu na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu obu liboeboe onu tɔɔ gi lítu kesea ɔʋadi ye kugyɔ ɔ.
Ni Kutseo lidɔzawe kakaa aʋa ɛ, Roma ɔnɛɛ kesea ɔʋadi ye izɛyurɔ ɔnɔ tole gi bɛkpɛ ligba ɛ, ɛki linɔkpi le xegi liʋi ye e.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔka ɔtɔ gi bete mɔmɔɔmɔ si eze ɔnɔ zimizi i, gi bɛzɛxwa si Baraba ɛ, eze ligba.
Lɛ loso gi linɔkpi le likpɛ likpɔ ɛ, Pilato eʋi ba si, “Bamɛ owoli mlɛpɛ si miyurɔ kí mlɔ na a? Baraba loo Yesu gi onu Kristo ye na a?”
Pilato etè mɔmɔɔmɔ si Yudanɛ ma baka ba ɛ, bɛkɔ Yesu i mani yɛ lɛ ese linu si bɛkɔ kaŋuza nì yɛ.

Agi Pilato eze ní litsixwagbo le aʋa ɛ, yedze atsisi yɛ ole si, “Wukíbitɛ kididɔ nì onyime liɛ klɔ ɔ, gi ɔ́ta kese e. Lɛ ese linu si mamɔ ɔzia glegle omono kelea petee kɔkpɛ kulila gi maza elesi la ní yɛ su i.”
Kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛliɔʋi linɔkpi le tɔ liʋi Pilato tɔ ɔyurɔ Baraba ɔki ba tɔ beye Yesu boŋu.
Lɛ Roma ɔnɛɛ kesea ɔʋadi ye eʋi linɔkpi le si, “Ní banɔ tiaʋa ba ya kusi i, ba mɛ owoli mlɛpɛ si miyurɔ kí mlɔ na a?” bebu le onu si, “Baraba!”
Lɛ Pilato eʋi ba si, “Kɔlɔ ɛ, ege, mlɛpɛ si míbitɛ nì Yesu gi onu Kristo ye na a?” Lɛ ba pɔ́ bebu le onu si, “Kú ye ní ose lo su!”
Lɛ Pilato eʋi dzɛ si, “Ege loso o, liboe zimizi woli abitɛ na a?” Lɛ linɔkpi le likpɛ ozi lo gaglaa si, “Kú ye ní ose lo su!”

Agi Pilato amɔ si litrabu libiitɔtɔ xe yɛ atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa a, pɔ̀ anyra ko aaga lɛ mɛ kudo e, akɔ kuni yo lɛ eplo yɛ awla la ní linɔkpi le aŋu mɛ, lɛ apani si, “Mɛ ɔwla ɔma ní onyime liɛ ya kutseo me! Mlɔ kiboebitɛ kɛ ya.”
Lɛ linɔkpi le pɔ́ libu le onu si, “Ki yɛ kutseo kɔ kutuheheo kuba blɔ ni blɔ bebi ba aʋa a!”
Lɛ Pilato ayurɔ Baraba aki ba ɛ; xe aki sì bɛfiaʋi Yesu atam la ɛ. Lɛ kede e, ayurɔ yɛ aki ba tɔ bazeekú ye ní ose lo su.
Lɛ Pilato yɛ baguta ba bɛkɔ Yesu itsini kesea ɔʋadi ye yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ, lɛ baguta ba pɔ́ ní ba lihakpɔ lɛ mɛ bɛklani yɛ ɛ.
Agi bebu ewu la ní yɛ su i, bɛkɔ liwu kyíkyĩ kpɛ ki yɛ.

Lɛ beyo bibu ʋɛ likuto le xe bɛkɔ lɛ ekume ki yɛ lɛ bɛkpɛ kiseʋi ní yɛ kaŋawla mɛ; xe bɛdɔ ní ba aklamasi na aʋa ni yɛ ketu ya, lɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa ɛ nì eboa la si, “Oheye lo! Yudanɛ ma okusi ye ozè ligbã gblamadzaa!”
Betsĩ sita sɛ bali yɛ aʋa lɛ bɛzi kiseʋi ye yɛ awla xe bɛkɔ kɛ sa yɛ litukpo le tasɛ tasɛ.
Agi bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa pɔ́ ɛ, bebu liwu kyíkyĩ nɛ ní yɛ su lɛ bedzini yɛ ɔtutɔ ewu la ɛkpɛ ki yɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛgbani yɛ edono si bɛzekú ye ní ose lo su i.
Lipoe lɛ gi bedo ɔma nɔ mɛ xe bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛtsani onyime ɔtɔ gi ádɔ Kirene gi bizɛxwa si Simon i, baguta ba bemi yɛ aʋa si ɔzɛ Yesu osetsase lo otu.
Bɛzɛna ɔkutɔ gi bizɛxwa si Golgota, gi lɛ ese linu si “Litukpoxwa ozekɔ.”
Ni klɔ bɛki Yesu kuda gi bɛtsa ni bidɔ tiitii bitɔ; pɔ̀ gi akpɛ kɔ onu edi i ɔŋwɛ kɔ.
Lɛ gi bekú ye ní osetsase lo su i, bɛlɛ yɛ ewu la gani exoeʋi ʋi kutata mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kede e, beze kesea xe bezeepe ye e.
Ní yɛ etukpo la onu i, bekú bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi gi bipani si, “Yesu, Yudanɛ ma Okusi ye liɛ ya.”
Lɛ beku beze tiaʋa ní ise su i pɔni yɛ, tole ni yɛ kaŋa mɛ, ɔʋlaɛ ni yɛ kaba mɛ.
Banama gi bɛzɛga ɛza ɛ besugu ba etukpo la, lɛ bekpini Yesu si:
“Wɔpani si wɔayaʋi Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ, lɛ wɔadzini lɛ kuwa ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ! Bú isu ya xe Aya Yebi wonu i, tɔ ple ní osetsase lo su!”
Niteme ké, kusumu yo baka ba nì ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ani banɔtsitsi ba bɛzɛɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa si;
“Ebu banima, pɔ̀ ɔ́tani yɛ isu ya kubu! Xe yɛ onu Israelbanɛ ma okusi ye e, lɛ kɔ ople dɔni osetsase lo su abla tɔ kwiazi yɛ aʋa ŋa!
Aká Aya aʋa lɛ apani si, Aya Yebie yenu u. Xe nite e, mlaki tɔ kudi sì Aya aapɛ si yibu ye abla na!”
Nite ke e beze ba klɔ gi bekú i pɔni yɛ ɛ fɛ bekpini ye.
Gi kemizea inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa isã ɛ, litumu ne lìdɔ ní kesea pɔ́ aʋa inyɔ sasa tita.
Gi inyɔ tita isã ɛ, Yesu akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa si, “Eli, eli, lama sabaxtani?” gi lɛ ese linu si, “Mɛ Aya, mɛ Aya, ege lɛ loso wokyi kede ɔkpɛ mɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ banɔatɔ gi bɛlɛɛ ní klɔ ʋa ɛ, benu yɛ onu lɛ bɛpani si, “Ɛɛxwa Eliya!”
Bamɛ tole ese kyɔŋ, lɛ azɛɛkɔ ɔsapo ɔtɔ, akɔ lɔ akpɛ ní kuda nyagba nyagba mɛ, lɛ ete lo ní ose ɔtɔ onu i, xe akɔ lɔ atɔ si aki yɛ si ɔŋwɛ.
Pɔ̀ banɔ gɔgɔ ba bɛpani si, “Lɛɛ mlaki tɔ kudi sì Eliya atra bu ye na a!”
Yesu akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa dzɛ ko lɛ akɔ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ akɔ ɛ.
Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ kusa gi bɛkɔ ɛtsa lɛ mɛ ɛ, kwikyi idɔnɔ lifune banani kesea. Lɛ kesea kesugu u, xe aklakpɔ la ɛyaʋi i.
Idrɔ lɛ idra lɛ banɔ dradra glegle gi betse e, bɛyɔni ba gi bedzi ligbã.
Bedo ní ba idrɔ lɛ mɛ, le gi Yesu ayɔ adɔ ni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, bɛtrɛ ni ɔma ʋidi dradra lɔ mɛ, lɛ banɔ glegle bɛmɔ ba a.
Agi baguta ba ɔkaɛ ni baguta ba gi beze ni yɛ su u, xe bɛzeepe Yesu u bɛmɔ kesea kusugu yo ni eboa la gi ɛba lɛ mɛ ɛ, lifu liku ba lɛ bɛpani si, “Sugba ɛ, Aya Yebi iliɛ ya!”
Badzɛ glegle gi beze nì yɛ kude e dɔni Galilea xe bezee di yɛ baziazia ba aʋa ɛ, bezee di bidɔ ɛdɔni ɔdzage no.
Maria Magdaladzee, Maria gi onu Yakobo nì Yosef ba onee ani Zebedeo yedze, beze ní ba kusi i.
Agi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, oxonete ɔtɔ gi ádɔ Arimatia ɛ, aba eku; yɛ linyi lize Yosef, lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Yesu yɛ ɔdɔkpasi i.
Atrɛ ní Pilato aŋu mɛ lɛ eʋi si ɔkɔ Yesu yɛ okpo ye ɔki yɛ ɛ. Lɛ Pilato aki ɔsã si bakɔ okpo ye akí Yosef.
Lɛ Yosef akɔ okpo ye, xe axla kusa pititi vuvu ní yɛ su i,
lɛ azɛɛkɔ Yesu okpo ye akpɛ ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ ɔdrɔ vuvu gi ebu akpɛ ní liklakpɔ ɛtɔ mɛ. Lɛ emli likla ʋidi itɔ etsi ɔdrɔ lɔ kevunu ya xe asɛ ɛ.
Maria Magdaladzee ni Maria ʋlaɛ, bezè niklɔ gi bebu aŋu na mɛ kpɛ ɔdrɔ lɔ ɛ.
Keletitia gi keze Lizemɔniwe le e, kusumu yo baka ba ni Farisianɛ ma bɛzɛtsani Pilato,
lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔka, kwiplɛ aŋu si lipoɛ lɛ gi ɔsia nɛ liɛ klɔ ezè ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, apani aplɛ si, ‘Mayɔ ní ewe tata kede’
Ki ɔsã nɔ tɔ bazeepe yɛ ɔdrɔ lɔ kɔzɛna nì liwetanɛ we le tɔ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bakítani yɛ okpo ye kuzuru tɔ biasi banima si, bɛyɔ ni yɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ. Asia gɔgɔa la ya anyani sani atɔpu na.”
Lɛ Pilato asi ba si, “Mlatsini ɔnɔpe; tɔ mlazeetsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu niteme gi mlaatanɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ bɛsɛ xe bɛzɛtsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu i, lɛ bedu ɔnɔpe ye si ozeope ɔdrɔ lɔ ɛ.
Agi Lizemɔniwe le liza ɛ, xe Lipadzruwe le olezatɔ nɔ ɛna ɛ, Maria Magdaladzee ni Maria ʋlaɛ bɛtrɛ si bɛtredi ɔdrɔ lɔ.
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, kesea kɛhwa gagla; lɛ Ɔka Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ eple adɔ ni lifunu ne, lɛ emli likla nɛ gi bɛkɔ etsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu i azanɔ ɛ, lɛ ezè ní lɛ aʋa ɛ.
Yɛ kiŋwiŋwi yɛ mɛ, kize ŋwisi dzeni kifububu kinɛ, lɛ yɛ ewu la ɛxwa pititi ŋwisi aklala kinɛ ɛ.
Lifu liku banɔpe ba nyani nyani sì besugu nite si bɛfɛ ŋwisi banɔ gi betse na a.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ apani aki badzɛ ba sì, “Mlakíse lifu, mete sì Yesu gi beku ní osetsase lo su i, yɛ mlɛpɛ.”
Ɔ́ma ní ya a; bɛyɔni yɛ, ɔlɛ ligbã́, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi apani i kinɛ. Mleti eku tɔ mledi niklɔ gi afɛ ɛ.
Mlatrɛ kyɔŋ, tɔ mlasi yɛ badɔkpasi ba sì, ‘Bɛyɔni yɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ. Eku mlɔ ɔtɔ ɛɛtrɛ ní Galilea, niklɔ mlamɔ yɛ!’ Mlaplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ gi masi mlɔ aʋa ɛ.”
Nite si bɛkɔsi sɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ su nì lifu, pɔ̀ isami kyɛ izeku ba xe bɛzɛtrɛ si bɛzeedo ɛsi yɛ badɔkpasi ba a.
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, Yesu atsani ba lɛ apani ba si “Kusuyɔ ki mlɔ.” Beti ipɔni Yesu, bevu yɛ kuklikpɔɔ lɛ besumu ye e.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakíse lifu, mlazɛ si mɛ benemi ba si batrɛ ní Galilea, lɛ niklɔ biamɔ mɛ ɛ.”
Agi badzɛ ba bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ɛ, baguta ba ba me batɔ bɛtrɛ ní kusumu yo baka ba klɔ ní ɔma ʋidi lo me. Lɛ bɛsi ba liboe kakaa gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Gi kusumu yo baka ba nì banɔtsitsi ba bɛtsá ɛ, bɛbitɛ kutrɔtrɔ lɛ bɛki baguta ba kibɔ gi kidzi aŋu mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bɛsi ba si mlapani si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba ezuru yɛ okpo ye elesi la gi kwidɔ sra sɛ ɛ.
Lɛ xegi kesea ɔʋadi ye aanu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, kwialiɔʋi yɛ tɔ kwiabu mlo ní liboe me.
Banɔpe ba bɛzi kibɔɛ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ ní liboe lɛ klɔ gi bɛsi ba aʋa ɛ. Niteme si lɛ lize liboe lɛ gi lizɛklanɔ ní Yudanɛ ma kiboedoe onu ga kɔna ni omono o.
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba ɛ, bɛtrɛ ní ketokpaa aʋa ní Galilea ní niklɔ gi Yesu asi ba si batrɛ ɛ.
Agi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, besumu ye, pɔ̀ ba mɛ batɔ bazɛ lɛ aʋa ŋa a.
Lɛ Yesu eti apɔni ba lɛ asi ba sì, “Aya akɔ kigaglaɛ pɔ́ ní lifunu ne ni kesea aʋa akpɛ ní mɛ awla a.
Lɛ loso e, mlatrɛ, ní ɔkɔ kakaa ni banima pɔ́ klɔ tɔ mlabitɛ ba mɛ badɔkpasi: mlakpɛ kuni aki ba ní Ɔka yɛ ni Obi ye ani Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ linyi ne me.
Tɔ mlabasɛ ba sì babitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi kɛsu makpɛ ɔsã aki mlɔ ɛ. Lɛ mlaplɛ aŋu si, malɛ nì mlɔ lipoe kakaa kɔzɛna nì kelea ligù nɛ ɛ.”
Yesu Kristo Aya Yebi ye, yɛ su Liboe Gbã nɛ lilɛ ya.
Likpese ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya yɛ oboedoplɛɛ Yesaya aŋwlimi nɛ kinɛ si:
“Aya apani si, ‘Maakpɛ mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ní wɔ ɔtɔ nɔ
tɔ aadra kudeo ki wɔ.’
Ɔniliɛ klɔ ɛɛkpɛ ozi ní ɔyaya klɔ si,
‘Mlalulɔ kudeo plɛ aki Ɔkaɛ;
mlebu kude gyɔgyɔɔ aplɛ ki yɛ tɔ aaga!’ ”

Lɛ loso e, Yohanes aba gi azɛɛkpɛ kuni yo aki banima a, lɛ azɛɛkla Aya yɛ liboe le ní ɔyaya klɔ si, “Mlekyi kedea kpɛ mlɔ eboe zimizi na tɔ mlaki tɔ bakpɛ kuni aki mlɔ, tɔ Aya ɔkɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ mlɔ.”
Banɔ glegle ní Yudea kesea mɛ ni Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ bedo etrɛ si tɔ bianu Yohanes yɛ liboe le. Bɛdra ba ina nɛ mɛ ní ba eboe zimizi na su, lɛ Yohanes akpɛ kuni aki ba ní Yordan Onipe lo me e.
Yohanes yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bize kposɔ sipi liwu; anya yɛ kasɛa mɛ ni kagaplekpa ɔgɛmi, lɛ yɛ bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ bize akikli la nì liŋwafu mɛ kibú.
Apani asi banima sì, “Ɔniliɛ gi aaba mɛ kede e, ekeme kura sani mɛ. Lɛ mágbɛ gi maaze yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ní kapɛa tɔtɔ mɛ ɛ.
Makpɛ kuni aki mlɔ, pɔ̀ yɛ kɔ, aakpɛ Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ki mlɔ.”
Ni ewe ala klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu ádɔ Nazaret ní Galilea kesea mɛ aba a, lɛ Yohanes akpɛ kuni aki yɛ ní Yordan Onipe lo me e.
Kiliɛ gi Yesu eedo eemu dɔni kuni yo me ko e, amɔ si lifunu ne lizɛɛdra, gi Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ eeple dɔ yɛ aʋa ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ na a.
Ko lɛ ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔni lifunu ne si, “Wɔ wonu mɛ obi ye gi malɔ ɔ, lɛ wɔ liboe liiku me aŋu u.”
Kyɔŋ niklɔ ko e, Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛgbani yɛ tsinɔ ní ɔyaya klɔ.
Eze niklɔ ewe avitene lɛ Satana efeke ye edi i. Liŋwafu nɛ mɛ baga ʋa kyɛ beze ní klɔ, lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bɛba esumu ye xe bɛkpɛ yɛ kigagla ɛ.
Lipoe lɛ gi bevu Yohanes ikpɛ ligba pɔ́ ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Galilea gi azaapani Aya yɛ Liboe Gbã nɛ ɛ.
Yesu yɛ liboe le linu si, “Lipoe le lina ablɔ kɔ; lɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ketipɔnɔ ɔ! Mlekyi kede akpɛ mlɔ eboe zimizi na, tɔ mlazi Liboe Gbã nɛ aʋa ŋa!”
Gi Yesu azɛɛga Galilea Limu ne kutu i, amɔ bakpábu tiaʋa. Ba beze Simon nì yeneminyime Andrea gi bɛzɛɛta ba dzikle e.
Niklɔ Yesu axwa ba si, “Mleku nì mɛ kude, tɔ maabasɛ mlɔ kiliɛ gi mlaabù banima ɛ.”
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, bɛyurɔ ba dzikle ʋa ko lɛ bekuni ni yɛ kude e.
Aga atrɛ ɔtɔ nɔ taʋɛ ko lɛ amɔ beneminyime tiaʋa dzedze e, Yakobo nì Yohanes. Beze Zebedeo yɛ bebi. Beze ba katapokpaa mɛ gi bɛzɛɛlulɔ ba dzikle ʋa a.
Kiliɛ gi amɔ ba nite ko e, axwa ba. Bɛyurɔ ba ɔkaɛ Zebedeo ni apaa yɛ bebi ʋa ní katapokpaa me ko lɛ ba kɔɔ bɛsɛ xe bekuni Yesu kude e.
Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní Kapernaum ɔma nɔ mɛ. Gi Lizemɔniwe le lina ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsa klɔ; lɛ ekpese bidɔ mɛ kubasɛ ɛ.
Banama gi bɛta yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ kutu i, ba inugu itse, lɛ ese linu si yɛ kiniɛ kiga lidze ní Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su. Yesu xunyɔ ɛ, abasi bidɔ mɛ ni kigagla.
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, onyime ɔtɔ gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze yɛ mɛ ɛ, akpɛ ozi tatata ní kutsatsaa mɛ si,
“Wɔ Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní blɔ su u? Blɔ ɔkyurɔ kɔ wɔba niya putɔ ɔ? Mete ɔniliɛ gi wonu i. Wɔ wonu Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dradra yɛ.”
Yesu akpɛ ozi ní ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ aʋa si, “Gɔ tsriɖi! Do báza ní ɔnɔɛ mɛ!”
Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ esugu onyimee gaglaa, ɛkpɛ ozi tatata, lɛ edo eza ní ɔnɔɛ mɛ ɛ.

Banima pɔ́ ba inugu itse, lɛ bekpese ba ahanuglɔ ba kuʋi si, “Liboe woli lɛ ya a? Bidɔbasɛbasɛ vuvu woli lu bɛ ya a? Onyime liɛ kɔ kigagla kilɛ yɛ awla gi izɛɛki ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔsã a, lɛ izeenu kutu yɔ fɛ ɛ.”
Niteme si Yesu yɛ linyi ne lihle eku ní ɔkɔ kakaa ní Galilea bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀.
Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, bɛtrɛ ní Simon ni Andrea kepea mɛ laa; Yakobo ni Yohanes fɛ beze ba kusi.
Simon yɛnadzee, kuwe kwivu ye plɛ ɔtɔsi aʋa, lɛ gi Yesu eku kepea mɛ ko e, bɛki yɛ kutète kyɔŋ.
Eti eku ní ɔdzɛɛ aʋa, lɛ evu yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ apɔni yɛ xe ayɔ ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, kuweo kwití yɛ aʋa; lɛ ayɔ xe ekpese ba aʋa kudi i.
Agi liwe le liku xe ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, banima bɛkɔ ba banyanya ba petee ni banama mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e, manɔ ní Yesu klɔ.
Ɔma nɔ pɔ́ ɛkpɛ likpɔ ní kepea kevunu ya.
Yesu ayɔni banyanya ba dɔni ba bànya ede ede na mɛ, lɛ akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi glegle edo no ní banima mɛ ɛ. Pɔ ɔ́ki lɛ kudeo si ipani i, lɛ ese linu si ifuɛfuɛ nɛ ite ɔniliɛ gi Yesu onu i.
Liwe ʋla lɛ ɔlezatɔ tsitsi no e, Yesu ayɔ, lɛ edo kepea mɛ ɛ. Edo ní ɔma nɔ mɛ lɛ atrɛ ní okpokpo kɔ ɔ, niklɔ axwa Aya ɛ.
Pɔ̀ Simon nì yɛ ɔha lɔ bɛzɛɛklanɔ gi bɛzɛɛpɛ́ yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa ɛɛpɛ wɔ.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Lilɛ si kutrɛ ní kumami uliɔ klɔ gi kwiklani blɔ mɛ ɛ. Liziã si mipani liboe le ní niklɔ fɛ, lɛ ese linu si lɛ ya loso maba a.”
Lɛ loso e, aga Galilea kesea petee me, lɛ apani liboe le ní ba itsaklɔ ɛ. Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ebu ní banima mɛ.
Onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛnya kunya kyikyĩ yɔ. Lɛ aba Yesu klɔ ɛ. Edu aklamasi kesea lɛ aki yɛ litukpo si ɔpɔni yɛ ɛ. Asi Yesu si, “Xegi linu wɔ kupɛpɛ ɛ, wɔatani kubitɛ gi mɛ isu ya iadra a.”
Asigaga la ɛga Yesu nì onyimee; anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ, lɛ agbɔni onyimee e. Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Linu mɛ kupɛpɛ; wɔ isu ya idra a!”
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, yɛ isu ya ilulɔ; kunyaa fɛ kwilila ní yɛ su.
Niklɔ Yesu akpɛ onyimee kude ni ɔsã gagla si,

“Ta kutu, di lɛ aʋa si wódo liboeboe si ɔnɔnɔ ní kibitɛɛ liɛ ya su u. Boŋu i, ga laa tɔ trɛ ní Yudanɛ ma kusumu yo ɔkaɛ klɔ; ki tɔ ɔtapo wo odi. Lɛ kede e, tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ si wɔnya ahaya ɛ, zeeyi ligoʋi lɛ klɔ gi Mose ɔsã nɔ eʋi i.”

Pɔ̀ gi onyimee asɛ ɛ, azeekpese liboe le kufuflu ní ɔkɔ kakaa a. Onyimee yɛ onugu haha lɔ ɛki si Yesu ɔ́zɛɛtani kudo ní ɔha kusi ní ɔma tɔtɔ mɛ ɛ. Kɔ ɛ, ebu isu ya lidze dzaa ní banima su, pɔ̀ banima bɛzɛɛba yɛ klɔ dɔni ɔkɔ kakaa a.
Ewe atɔ kede e, gi Yesu edzi atrɛ ní Kapɛrnaum i, liyii klanɔ si eze ní kepea mɛ.
Banɔ glegle bɛba ɛkpɛ likpɔ níklɔ lɛ loso e, ɔkli ɔkpɛkɔ óze ligba lɛ mɛ kɔmanɔ ní ligba lɛ kevunu ya a. Yesu azɛɛpani liboe gbã nɛ asi ba.
Niklɔ benyime tiene bɛba eku i. Befeke onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ kapɛ̀ tiele ketse e manɔ ní Yesu klɔ.
Linɔkpi le lɛ loso e, bátani ɔnɔɛ kukɔtsini yɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso bepu liwui ní ligba lɛ ada la mɛ niklɔ gi Yesu eze e. Gi bepu liwui le pɔ́ ɛ, bepleni ɔnɔɛ nì yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ ɛkpɛ.
Gi Yesu amɔ kuziŋa liɔ gi kwize ní ba awla ɛ, edo asi ɔnyanyaɛ si, “Obi, bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ.”
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi beze niklɔ ɛ begyo le edi ní ba isu ya mɛ si,
“Kitɛ mɛ edo igyi le xe apani te e?” Libusioboe lɛ ya! Aya ko onu ɔniliɛ gi aatani eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ ɛ.
Yesu ete ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ kyɔŋ liboe lɛ gi bezegyo edi i, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso eboa la ya elu akpasi ní mlɔ etukpo la mɛ ɛ?
Liwoli lisa ɛplɔplɔ gi biapani i si kapɛ tiele tsetsea ɔnete liɛ ya: ‘Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ,’ loo, ‘Yɔ, feke wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ ga na a?’
Mapɛ si mlete si kigagla kiliɛ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye awla ní kesea aʋa si aakɔ̀ eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ ɛ.” Lɛ loso edo asi ɔnyanyaɛ sì,
“Mɛsì yɔ! Feke wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ sɛ trɛ kepea mɛ.”
Ba pɔ́ bezee di onyimee xe ayɔ ɔ. Efeke yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ lɛ akɔsi asɛ ní ba aŋu na mɛ ɛ. Ba pɔ́ ba inugu itse e. Niteme si bɛkpɔ̀ Aya lɛ bɛpani sì, “Kuʋímɔ kiliɛ ya elu iʋídi i!”
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní Galilea Limu ne kutu dzɛ ɛ. Linɔkpiʋidi itɔ liba yɛ klɔ lɛ ekpese le bidɔ kubasɛ ɛ.
Gi azɛɛga atrɛ ɛ, amɔ ɔbɔgyɔ ɔtɔ, Lewi gi onu Alfeo Yebi i. Eze yɛ lixwɛwagba lɛ mɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ sì, “Kuni mɛ kude.” Lewi ayɔ, lɛ ekuni yɛ kude e.

Lɛ kede e, gi Yesu azɛɛŋa bidɔ ní Lewi kepea mɛ ɛ. Babɔgyɔ glegle atɔ ni banama gi bɛta Yudanɛ ma isã nɛ ese e, ba mɛ batɔ bekuni Yesu kude e. Niteme si ba mɛ beglegle bɛkpɛ awla ní kezi me e pɔni Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba.

Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi beze Farisianɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si Yesu azɛɛŋa bidɔ ni banama gi bɛta Yudanɛ ma isã nɛ ese e, ni babɔgyɔ ba lɛ loso beʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso Yesu izɛŋa bidɔ nì banɔ ba ya elu na a?”

Agi Yesu enu ba liboe le e, Yesu ebu le onu si, “Banama gi ba isu ya mɛ ilɛ mumɔ ɛ, báziã ɔwabitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛɛnya ɛ, ba bɛziã ɔwabitɛɛ ɛ. Mába si mixwa banama gi ba bede ʋa bɛgyɔ ɛ. Boŋu i, banɔ ba ya gi benu banɔ zimizi ba ba loso maba a.”

Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni Farisianɛ ma bɛzɛɛnya onugu. Banɔ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni Farisianɛ ma ba badɔkpasi ba bizɛɛnya onugu, xe wɔ banɛ ma pɔ̀ baʋínya onugu na a?”
Yesu ebu abee aki ba si, “Mlɛpɛ si banama gi bɛba ɔdzɛɛ ɔgbanɔ klɔ ɛ, baza kuʋɛ na a?” Litrába lɛ mɛ ɛ. Xegi ɔdzɛnyee ɔlɛ basu i, bátranya onugu u.
Pɔ̀ liwe etɔ litraba gi biagbani ɔdzɛnyee sɛnɔ ní basu u. Lipoe lɛ klɔ bianya onugu lo.
“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋíkɔ lisaba vuvu kukɔlulɔ kusa koko o, lɛ ese linu si kusa kokoo kuapá vu lisaba vuvu nɛ kɔ liwu le likeme esani kiliɛ gi lize tsã ɛ.

Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ óʋinye kuda vuvu kukɔkpɛ ní kagaplekpa keʋe koko me e, lɛ ese linu si kuda vuvu yɔ kwiaki sì kagaplekpa keʋe kokoa kiata. Boŋu i, lilɛ si benye kuda vuvu yɔ akpɛ ní kagaplekpa keʋe vuvu mɛ.”
Yesu azɛɛga aza ní idoli inyrɔ ɛtɔ mɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa. Gi yɛ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛza ɛ, beku idoli le kuyasi mɛ ɛ.
Nite si Farisianɛ ma bɛsi yɛ si, “Di! Wɔ badɔkpasi ba bɛta blɔ ɔsã nɔ ese, gi bɛɛbitɛ nite ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa ɛ!”
Yesu ebu le onu si “Mlákla kidiliɛ gi Dawid abitɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi aziã kidiitɔ si yiŋa na a? Kuʋɛ kwizeeku ye nì yɛ banima.

Nite si atrɛ Aya kepea mɛ gi azɛɛta liklã dradra lɛ gi bɛbla plɛ ki Aya ɛ. Liba lɛ mɛ nite lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Abiata eze Kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye e. Ni ɔsã nɔ onu i, kusumu yo baka ba ko biata liklã ɛnɛ klɔ xe e, pɔ̀ Dawid atà nɛ lɛ aki yɛ banima kyɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Lizemɔniwe le ɛ, bɛbitɛ lɛ ɛki banɔ kupɛ̀pɛ, bábitɛ banima aki Lizemɔniwe le e.
Lɛ loso Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye onu Ɔkaɛ, gi aŋa Lizemɔniwe le kyɛ aʋa a.”
Agi Yesu edzì atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ní lipoe dzedze me e, amɔ ɔka ɔtɔ gi yɛ ɔwla lɔ ɛklɔʋi i.
Banɔatɔ beze niklɔ gi bɛpɛ si beebu Yesu lipɔ ɛ. Lɛ loso e bedu aŋu na ní yɛ aʋa gaglaa tɔ beedi si aayɔni ɔnyanyaɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa na a.
Yesu asi onyimee si, “Ga lɛɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ ya ní banima aŋu na mɛ.”
Lɛ eʋi banima si, “Ege blɔ ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si kubitɛ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa na a? Kubitɛ kidɔ gbã loo kidɔ nyani nyani na a? Kubu ɔnutɔ yɛ ligbã́ loo kuzizi le na a?”
Pɔ̀ bápani liboeboe.

Yesu edi ba aklanɔ ní kusuyeʋi me pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ, ba liboe liga yɛ asigaga, lɛ ese linu si ba ina nɛ mɛ izee gagla lɛ ba linɛ lígyɔ ɔ. Lɛ asi onyimee sì: “Nina wɔ ɔwla lɔ!” Anina lɔ ko lɛ edzì iku lɔ kiku ye e.
Lɛ Farisianɛ ma bɛsɛ ní ɔtsaklɔ lɛ bɛzɛbitɛ kutsatsa nì Herodes ye baʋatrɔatɔ kyɔŋ. Lɛ bɛbitɛ kunyanya si biaye Yesu u.
Lɛ kede e, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ trɛ ní Galilea Limu ne kutu lɛ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ likuni yɛ kude e.
Banima bɛdɔ Galilea, Yudea, Yerusalem ani Idumea bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀. Batɔ fɛ bɛdɔ Yordan kedaa ni ima ʋidi ilɛ gi iklani Tiro ni Sidon i. Banɔ ba ya pɔ́ bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ ese linu si benu yɛ kiboebitɛ onu.
Linɔkpi le likeme lɛ loso e, Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bapɛ́ katapokpa atɔ aki yɛ tɔ banima bakípɔ yɛ akpɛ ɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si ayɔni banyanya glegle. niteme si banyanya dzedze ba pɔ́ bɛzɛɛŋwlɛ si bɛɛgbɔni yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ xegi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne gi ize ní banɔatɔ mɛ imɔ Yesu ko e kɔ begleʋe edɔ yɛ ketu ya ni ozi tatata si, “Wɔ wonu Aya Yebi ye!”
Pɔ̀ ɛ, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla akí ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne si ikísi ɔnɔnɔ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ yenu u.
Gi Yesu asɛ ní klɔ ɛ, emu ketokpa katɔ lɛ axwa banama gi apɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ.
Lɛ ebu ba mɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa gi aki linyi ne si, banɔkpɛkpɛ ba ɛ. Lɛ asi ba si: “Makya mlɔ si mleze ní mɛ su.” Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, maatsisi mlɔ tɔ mlaapani liboe gbã nɛ
Lɛ maaki mlɔ kigaglaɛ gi mlakɔ kpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudono e.
Banɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba klɔ gi akya ɛ, ba benu: Simon (Yesu aki yɛ linyi si Petro).
Yakobo ni yenemi ye Yohanes gi benu Zebedeo yɛ bebi ba a (Yesu aki ba linyi si Boanerges gi lɛ ese linu si, “dzeni kugugu benyime”).
Bagɔgɔ ba benu Andrea, Filipo, Bartolomeo, Mateo, Toma, Yakobo gi onu Alfeo Yebi, Tadeo, Simon Kanaa ɔnɛ gi adimɛ nì yɛ kakàsea ɛ
ani Yuda Iskariot gi yɛ aba ebu Yesu akɔ ɛ.
Lɛ kede e, Yesu atrɛ ní kepea mɛ. Dzɛ ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ liba gi liki si Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba a, bámɔ lipoe xe biaŋa bidɔ fɛ ɛ.
Agi yɛ benete ba benu liboe le e, bekú kudeo me tɔ bɛzɛgbani yɛ, lɛ ese linu si banima bezeepani si, “Eewle!”
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi bɛdɔ Yerusalem i, bɛzeepani si, “Beelzebul yɛ ɔkpasi yɛ mɛ! Lɛ yɛ onu ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ɔkaɛ, lɛ yɛ ɛɛki Yesu kigaglaɛ xe ɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono o.”
Lɛ Yesu axwa ba manɔ ɔ, xe egu kunugu yo aki ba ní abee ʋa me si, “Kitɛ Abosam yɛ aatani abosam yɛ kukpikpinɔ dono e?
Xegi keduyɔyɔ kɛba keseatɔ mɛ gani kifúgɔnigɔni mɛ ɛ, kesea lia klɔ kiayaʋi.
Xegi okú ɔtɔ ɛlɛ isu ya kpɛ paso paso ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe bɛɛgɔni i, okú lɔ klɔ aayaʋi.
Lɛ loso e, xegi Abosam yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛlɛ kluʋikluʋi i, katrátani kuze lipoe gblamadza, kiayaʋi kɔ kedu i.
“Ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kutiku ní ɔnɔ gagla yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ xe aahali yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ, sani si anya ɔnɔ gagla yɛ akpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ, xe ableke aatani kiditɔ kuzuru u.
“Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si Aya aakɔ̀ banima eboe zimizi kakaa ni ebusioboe kakaa gi biado e, kukɔkyɛ ba.
Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aapani liboe zimizi kuyurɔ Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛ, batrákɔ ɛkyɛ yɛ liwewe e, lɛ ese linu si abitɛ liboe zimizi gi batrákɔ ɛkyɛ yɛ liwewe.”
Yesu apani nite lɛ ese linu si banɔatɔ bɛpani si, “Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu yene nì yɛ benemi ba bɛba eku u. Bɛlɛɛ ní oŋwe no lɛ bɛkpɛ odu itsisi yɛ si ɔba a.
Ɔnɔha ɔtɔ eze Yesu su lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Dike! Wone ni wɔ beneminyime ba ani wɔ benemidzɛ ba balɛɛ ní oŋwe no gi bɛɛpɛ wɔ ɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu mone e? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ ba benu mɛ benemi ba a?”
Lɛ edi banama gi bedi iklani yɛ ɛ, lɛ apani si, “Mledi! mone liɛ ya, lɛ mɛ benemi ba ba ya a!
Ɔniliɛ gi izɛbitɛ kidiliɛ gi Aya apɛ ɛ, yɛ onu mɛ oneminyime e, nì mɛ onemidzɛɛ ani mone e.”

Yesu ekpese yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ní Galilea Limu ne kutu. Linɔkpii lɛ gi lize yɛ ní su i, likeme niteme si, Yesu emu eku ní katapokpa atɔ mɛ lɛ eze ní ka mɛ ɛ. Katapokpaa kɛtrɔ ní kuni yo aʋa lɛ linɔkpi le lize ní limu ne kutu yɔ ɛ.
Ebú eboe glegle me aki ba epoe glegle gani abee ʋa mɛ si:
“Mlata kutu! Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi atrɛ amu na oglu kɔ ɔ.
Gi azeefuflu amu na ní kayaa mɛ ɛ, átɔ ɛdɔ kudeo me, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwita la ɛmlɔ ɛ.
Atɔ ɛdɔ ní akla na mɛ niklɔ gi sise sè sísrɛ ɛ, Lídze ko lɛ amubi la ɛyɛ ɛ lɛ ese linu si sise sè sísrɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ gi liwo le litu u xe kuweo kwiyi i, amuyɛyɛ la ɛyrɔ lɛ etse e. Lɛ ese linu si igũ̀ ne ísrɛ ní la ese e.
Amubiatɔ fɛ ɛwɔli eku ní bibu ʋe me. Gi bibu ʋe bitsì i, biwà ɛda ní amubi yɛyɛ la aʋa, niteme si amu na ébu libii tɔtɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ amubiatɔ ɛdɔ ní kese gbã aʋa a. Niteme si ɛyɛ, etsi, lɛ eyo mɔmɔmɔ ɛ. Atɔ eyo ebi avitata, atɔ ebi aviteglo, lɛ atɔ fɛ eyo ebi alafa ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, tɔ onu!”
Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu tole agɔ ɛ, banama gi benu yɛ liboe le e, ba mɛ batɔ ni badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba bɛba yɛ klɔ, lɛ beʋi idɔni yɛ awla si abee gi ebu i, obu yɛ ese ɔki ba.
Niklɔ Yesu asi ba si, “Aya akɔ yɛ Kaʋaŋaa eboe kpòkpò la aki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ banama gi balɛ oge no e, ba xunyɔ ɛ, biapani eboe la asi ba ní abee ʋa mɛ,
tɔ ɛ,
‘Biatapo odi dzini kutapo odi,
pɔ̀ batrámɔ egyesi i;
biata kutu dzini kuta,
pɔ̀ batránu kididɔ ese e.
Lɛ ese linu si xegi bɛmɔ bidɔ egyesi i,
loo benu eboe ese e,
biakyi ní ba ina mɛ vu Aya
kɔ akɔ akyɛ ba ɛ.’ ”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Xegi mlénu abee liɛ ese e, kɔ kitɛ liaze xe mlaanu abee dzedze ba ese e?
Ɔdɔkpɛɛ eefuflu Aya liboe le.
Banɔ batɔ balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ kudeo su kinɛ ɛ. Xegi benu liboe le ko e, kɔ Satana aba kɔ lɛ asɛ nɔ ɛ.
Nite ke banɔ batɔ fɛ balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ ní akla na mɛ kinɛ ɛ. Xegi benu liboe le ko e, bizɛɛzi lɛ ni isami.
Pɔ̀ liboe le liʋívu kese e, lɛ baʋíze gagla ní liboe le me e. Lɛ loso xe kuxixa loo keduyɔyɔ kɛba agani liboe le me e, kɔ bɛɛdzi kede kyɔŋ.
Lɛ banɔ batɔ fɛ balɛ ŋwisi amu a na klɔ gi ɛdɔ bibu ʋe me kinɛ ɛ. Ba benu banɔ batɔ gi bizeenu liboe le,
pɔ̀ kelea mɛ baxixa ʋa nì kibɔɛ kude kuzenoo ani kelea mɛ ɔgyi nɔ ɛ, bɛ pɔ́ bikpɛ likpɔ ɔ, gi bikɔ si liboe le límɔ obufuɛkɔ xe liabu libiitɔtɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ banɔ batɔ kɔ ɛ, balɛ ŋwisi amu ana klɔ gi ɛdɔ kese gbã aʋa kinɛ ɛ. Benu liboe le, bɛzi lɛ, lɛ beyò ebi la ɛ; batɔ beyò ebi avi tata, batɔ avi teglo, lɛ batɔ fɛ ɛ, ebi alafa ɛ.”
Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ aʋa si, “Nyaŋwɛ izɛsú kani xe izɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ agba yɛ ese loo abati ese e? Aní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa bizɛtrɔ kani yɛ ɛ?
Kidɔ kakaa gi bekpo e biabu ke kudono ní oŋwe no, lɛ kidiliɛ aʋa gi bɛvini awlakpa la ɛtrɔ ɛ, bíabu ke dono.
Lɛ loso e, ɔniliɛ gi kutu kulɛ yɛ ɛ, tɔ onu!”
Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa sì, “Mlata eboa la gi mlenu kutu mɔmɔmɔ! Kikpɛɛ liɛ gi mlɛkpɛ ɛki banima ɛ, nite ke biakpɛ ɔki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ mlɔ kiniɛ kiasanɔ ɔ.
Ɔniliɛ awla gi kiditɔ kilɛ ɛ, biaki yɛ bidɔ ɔpɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ awla gi kididɔ kíma ɛ, yɛ kini sisami yɛ fɛ ɛ, biazɛ kɛ yɛ awla.”
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ eboe la aʋa si, “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛkpɛ esebi la ní yɛ kayaa mɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Ɛɛwa yɛ axwɛ na elesi ni kemize. Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ petee, yɛ esebi la ɛzɛɛyɛ, gi ezeetsi i. Pɔ̀ yɛ ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛ, óte kiliɛ gi lilɛ ɛ xe liba lɛ mɛ nite e.
Kesea ɔtutɔ lɔ kizɛki sì amu na izeetsi xe izɛɛpɔ ɔ. Ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, amu na izedu. Lɛ kede e, kɔ awlakpa la, kɔ ɔmuya lɔ ɛ.
Xegi amu na ɛzã ɛ, kɔ ɔnyrɔmɛdzɛɛ ekpese la kupa ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si la lipa nɛ le lina a.”
Yesu apani dzɛ si, “Ege kwiakɔ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kusrɔnɔ ɔ? Loo abee woli kwiakɔ obu yɛ kaʋaŋaa ese e?
Yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi lisebi sisami gɔgɔ lɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ azɛɛkɔ akpɛ ní yɛ kesea mɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Lipoetɔ kede e, lisebi le liyɛ gi lidzi ose ʋidi i gi ekeme sani ise gɔgɔ lɛ petee, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwiwa kɔ evu na ní lɔ aya la mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu apani yɛ liboe le asi banima ní abee ʋa mɛ ŋwisi ba yà kinɛ ɛ. Apani aki ba kiliɛ onu gi bianu eboe la ese e.
Yesu ɔ́pɛ si yipani iiki ba a, sani si gani abee ʋa mɛ. Pɔ̀ xegi yɛ tete ɔlɛ pɔni yɛ badɔkpasi ba ɛ, kɔ ebú liboe kakaa ese aki ba ɛ.
Liwe lɛ klɔ ke gi kulagɔ kwina ɛ, Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kutsa limu ne atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ”
Lɛ bɛsɛ ní ɔnɔha lɔ su xe badɔkpasi ba bemu iku ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ Yesu xunyɔ ɛ, eze ní katapokpaa mɛ koko; ko lɛ ba petee bɛsɛ ɛ. Kutapokpa dzedzeo fɛ kwipɔni yɛ.
Lɛ lisɛ nɛ ɛ, liwɔ gagla ɛtɔ likpese kufu niteme si kuni yo akpɔ la ɛgbigba eku katapokpaa mɛ gi keyi pɔ́ ɔ.
Yesu afɛ ní katapokpaa mɛ kedea ɔza lɔ gi adɔ sra ní sumu ye aʋa ɛ. Yɛ badɔkpasi ba benyime ye lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛɛ, wɔ́kɔ lɛ mɛ ɔki blɔ gi kuhatse na a?”
Yesu ayɔ ɔlɛɛ kedu ya. Lɛ akpɛ ozi lo ní liwɔ lɛ aʋa si, “Gɔ tsriɖi!” Lɛ ekyi eku kuni yo akpɔ la aʋa lɛ apani si, “Dɔ zĩi!” Liwɔ lɛ onu liyɔ kyɔŋ lɛ niklɔ petee ɛgɔ kranaa a.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege nì lifu mleese e? Kuziŋaa tɔtɔ kúma ní mlɔ awla kɔʋana nì abla na a?”
Pɔ̀ akaŋu yɛ atsa ba, lɛ ba mɛ ɔnɔ kakaa eʋi yɛ ɔhanuglɔɛ si, “Onyime woli lu iliɛ ya? Gi liwɔ lɛ ni kuni yo akpɔ la fɛ binu kutu iiki yɛ ɛ!”
Lɛ kede e, Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzeku Galilea Limù ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ ní Gerasanɛ ma kesea aʋa.
Kiliɛ gi Yesu eple ní katapokpaa mɛ me ko e, onyime ɔtɔ edo ní bekpo ʋa idrɔ lɛ kusi lɛ aba atsani yɛ ɛ. Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze ní onyimee me.
Lɛ loso e, idrɔ lɛ mɛ ize yɛ ozeklɔ ɔ. Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́zɛtani yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ kukpɛ tɔ ɔ.
Bɛzɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ ní ikli lɛ ni iwla lɛ epoe glegle, pɔ̀ lipoe kakaa ɛ, azɛɛpa egboo na, kɔ avini bala ʋa ní yɛ ikli lɛ ɛ. Eze gagla niteme si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́zɛtani yɛ aʋa kuŋa a.
Azɛɛklanɔ ní idrɔ lɛ kusi ní eto la aʋa elesi ni kemize gi azɛɛkpɛ ozi táataa, lɛ azɛɛkɔ akla na akpɛ isu ya ebi la a.
Eze ɔdzage no xe amɔ Yesu atsisi i. Lɛ loso e, ese lɛ adɔ́ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa ní Yesu ketu ya ɛ.
Lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla sì, “Wɔ Yesu, Aya Ʋidi ye Bi ye! Liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní mɛ su u? Aya loso e, maki wɔ litukpo si wukíhe kutu iiki mɛ ɛ!”
Apani nite e, lɛ ese linu si Yesu azɛɛpani si, “Wɔ ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi, doza ní onyime liɛ ya mɛ!”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ye si, “Kitɛ bizɛxwa wɔ ɔ?”
Onyimee ebu isu ya onu si, “Mɛ linyi linu si, ‘Likpi’, lɛ ese linu si kwisrɛ.”
Niteme si azɛɛki Yesu litukpo si ɔkikpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono ní kusio klɔ ɔ.
Liba lɛ mɛ si ihà likpi itɔ lizɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ní lito etɔ su ní niklɔ ʋa ɔza lɔ.
Lɛ loso e, ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne iiki Yesu litukpo si, “Tsisi blɔ ní ihà lɛ klɔ ʋa mɛ, tɔ ki tɔ kuti iku lɛ mɛ!”
Ebu kudeo aki lɛ, lɛ ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido ní onyimee me xe itiku iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Ihà lɛ likpi le kiklaklaɛ mɛ kiaze ŋwisi akpe tiaʋa kinɛ te e. Lɛ pɔ́ ise eple lito le lɛ izɛdɔ limu ne e.
Banama gi bezeedi ihà lɛ aʋa ɛ, bese lɛ bɛzeeefuflu liboe le kpɛ ɔma nɔ mɛ ni inyrɔ nɛ aʋa a. Banima bedo eba tɔ bedi liboe le kibabaɛ mɛ
niteme si gi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛmɔ onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi likpi le lize bázanɔ ɛ. Bemɔ yɛ gi odi i, akpɛ awu la mɔmɔmɔ gi eze ní sínɔ mɛ, nite si lifu ne liku banima pɔ́.
Banama gi bɛmɔ liboe le aŋu mɛ ɛ, behle kiboebitɛɛ kpɛ banɔ dzedze ba mɛ kiliɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛki onyime liɛ me gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e, ni kiliɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛki ihà lɛ fɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso banima bɛsi Yesu sì ɔsɛ ní ba kesea mɛ.
Gi Yesu azeemu iku katapokpaa mɛ si yisɛ ɛ, onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize bázanɔ ɛ, eʋi adɔ ní Yesu awla si ɔki tɔ yiku ni yɛ kude.
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́dimɛ ɔ́ki yɛ, lɛ asi yɛ boŋ si, “Dzi trɛ ní kepea mɛ ní wɔ benete ba klɔ tɔ zɛɛsi ba kidiliɛ gi Aya abitɛ akí wɔ nì asigaga glegle ala gi edi wo e.”
Gi onyimee asɛ nite e, aklanɔ ní Ima Liɔfɔ lɛ pɔ́ mɛ. Asi banima petee kidiliɛ gi Yesu abitɛ aki yɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso banama petee gi benu yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, ba inugu itse.
Yesu edzì atsà limu ne atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ aʋa. Gi eku níklɔ ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lixogo ní yɛ su.
Lɛ Yairo gi eze Yudanɛ ma ɔnɔtsitsi ní ba ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, yɛ fɛ aba eku i. Gi amɔ Yesu i, adɔ ní Yesu ketu ya
lɛ eble yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ kupɛpɛɔ aki Yesu si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ! Mɛ obidzɛʋi yɛ eetse gaglaa. Maki wɔ litukpo, ba tɔ gatrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa atɔ ɔyɔ.”
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, Yesu ni onyimee bɛsɛ eku kudeo me e. Banima bɛsrɛ gi bekuni ba kude e, gi liki si bɛzɛpɔ́ Yesu ikpɛ ní kupɛɔ petee e.
Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ eze ní banima kusi, gi azɛɛnya ɛ. Ika lɛ izedo ní yɛ su agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa nyɔŋ.
Bawabitɛ glegle bekeni idi pɔ̀ liboeboe lísɛ ɛ. Ezizi yɛ exo la petee tɔ nya yɛ isu ya mɛ idzi iku lɛ kiku ye, pɔ̀ lɛ́ kinyani boŋ lizɛɛnyani itrɔ ɛ.
Enu Yesu onu lɛ loso yɛ fɛ ɛ, eti eku ní linɔkpi le me gani kedea.
Lɛ asi yɛ isu ya sì, “Xegi matani Yesu awu la kugbɔnɔ ko e, maahaya.”
Kiliɛ gi anya gbɔni Yesu awu la ko e, ika lɛ gi ííba yɛ su i, itsa kyɔŋ. Enu le ní yɛ isu ya mɛ ké si yɛ ahaya.
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, Yesu amɔ egyesi sì kigagla kido ní yɛ mɛ. Ekyi ní ɔnɔha lɔ gi eze ní yɛ su kusi yo lɛ eʋi si, “Nyaŋwɛ agbɔni mɛ awu la ɛ?”
Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bebu le onu si, “Wɔ tutɔ wɔɛmɔ kiliɛ gi banima bɛsa likpakpa lɛ ní wɔ su i, lɛ woeʋi dzɛ si nyaŋwɛ agbɔni wɔ liwu le na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu azeedi aklanɔ si yimɔ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ agbɔni yɛ ɛ.

Gi ɔdzɛɛ amɔ kidiliɛ gi kiba kɛ mɛ ɛki yɛ onu i, edo ní banima kusi aba ɔtɔ nɔ. Lifu ne likɔ si azeesugu. Edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea ní Yesu ketu ya lɛ asi yɛ liboe zizi nɛ lɛ kizezee me ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ.
Niklɔ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obidzɛɛ, wɔ kuziŋaa kwiki si wɔ haya. Ga trɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ tɔ wɔ kunyaa kuyurɔ wɔ.”
Kiliɛ gi Yesu azɛɛpani eboa la klɔ ko e, banɔ batɔ bɛdɔ ni Yairo kepea mɛ nì odu iiki Yairo si “Wɔ obidzɛʋi yɛ etse.” Lɛ loso e, “kúkpɛ Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ kunugu tɔ ɔ.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́kpɛ ba liboe le linɔ ɔ. Lɛ asi Yairo si, “Kúse lifu u; wɔ kɔ zi ŋa ko!”
Lɛ ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ kude si okuni ba kude sani Petro, Yakobo ni yenemi ye Yohanes ko o.
Lipoe lɛ gi beku Yairo kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu amɔ kiliɛ gi ozi lo ni kubemio kwize ní niklɔ ɛ.
Gi eti eku ni ba aʋa ɛ, eʋi si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛpisa nite e? Liboe woli lɛ loso mleebemi nite e? Ɔnuvɔ yɛ oʋítse, sra ko ɛɛdɔ!”
Pɔ̀, banɔ baklɔ gi beze niklɔ ɛ, bɛmwɛ yɛ; lɛ loso, akpikpini ba petee edono ní ligba lɛ mɛ. Banɔ baklɔ gi beti iku ɔnuvɔ yɛ aʋa a pɔni yɛ ɛ, ba ko beze obika yɛ, obinee ni yɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba.
Yesu evu ɔnuvɔ yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ asi yɛ sì, “Talita kumi,” gi lɛ ese linu si, “Ɔdisami, mɛ si yɔ!”
Nite si ɔdzɛʋi yɛ ayɔ kyɔŋ gi ekpese kuklanɔ ɛ. Azɛ agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa a. Gi liboe le liba lɛ mɛ nite e, banima pɔ́ ba inugu itse e.
Yesu xunyɔ akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si bakífeke onugu ní liboe le aʋa aki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ. Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlaki ɔnuvɔ ɛ kiditɔ tɔ ɔŋa.”
Gi Yesu asɛ niklɔ ɛ, edzi atrɛ ní Nazaret, yɛ kepea. Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekuni yɛ kude.

Ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa ɛ, Yesu ekpese bidɔ kubasɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ. Banɔ glegle beze níklɔ, lɛ gi benu yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ɛ, bɛwɔ yaa. Lɛ beʋi si, “Nifɔ yɛ kɔ adɔ ni eboa la ya petee? Kuboeteo liɔ gi bɛki yɛ ɛ, nifɔ kwidɔ? Kitɛ xe izɛɛtani enugutseboe la kubitɛ nite e?
Aní osetsi yɛ iliɛ ya lò o? Ani Maria yɛ obinyimee, gi yɛ benemi ba benu Yakobo, Yosef ni Yuda ani Simon lò o? Lɛ aní yɛ benemidzɛ ba bali blɔ kusi lò o?” Lɛ loso e, bázɛ yɛ ɛ.
Nite si Yesu asi ba si, “Bizɛkpɛ kubùbù ní Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba su ní ɔkɔ kakaa. Pɔ̀ ní ba kepea ɛ, ba akɔanɛ ma nì ba benete ba kusi kɔ ɛ, beboedoplɛ ba béyi kididɔ ní ba aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ɔ́tani enugutseboe atɔtɔ kubitɛ níklɔ ɔ, sani si ɔtrɔ yɛ awla ní banɔ klakla batɔ aʋa lɛ bɛhaya ɛ.
Litu ye kugyɔ si kuziŋa kúze ní banima mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu aklani kumami uliɔ klɔ gi kwiklani Nazaret i, kɔ mɛ xe abasɛ bidɔ mɛ ní kɔ petee me e.
Yesu axwa badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kpɛ likpɔ, lɛ alɛ ba tiaʋa tiaʋa a xe akpɛ ba ɛ. Aki ba kigagla ní ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne aʋa.
