Lɛ akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si, “Xe mleku kudeo me e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔkivu kididɔ ɛsani ose vuga vuga. Ɔnɔnɔ ɔkikɔ liklã̀ loo kudɔʋí kepimi loo kibɔ ɛtɔtɔ kpɛ isu kura a.
Mlakpɛ afɔkpa fãa, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔkikɔ liwu ʋla evu u.
Asi ba dzɛ si, Kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi biakpɛ mlɔ wolaa ɛ, mleze ka mɛ kɔkpɛni mlɔ lisɛpoe le e.
Xe mleku ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, xe bázɛ mlɔ ɛ, loo bápɛ si bɛzi mlɔ liboe le e, mlasɛ ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ. Xegi mlɛɛsɛ ɛ, mlekple ovugbo lo mlɔ kukliseo aplɛ. Bɛ biaze kiseʋi gi mledu ní ba su i.”
Lɛ loso e, badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ, lɛ bɛpani liboe le klanɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa okyi ɔna mɛ ɛ.
Bɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne dono ní banima ma mɛ. Bɛsra kumu iiki banyanya glegle, lɛ bɛyɔ ni ba ɛ.

Okusi ye Herodes enu eboa la klɔ gi ɛzɛtrɛ la aʋa a, lɛ ese linu si Yesu yɛ linyi ne liyi hoo. Banɔ batɔ ba kugyodi yo ní Yesu su kwize si Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ edzì ligbã o lɛ loso kigaglaɛ liɛ ya kilɛ ní yɛ awla si ɔbitɛ enugutseboe ala ya nite e.
Kokoko e, banɔ batɔ fɛ begyo edi si, “Eliya boŋ iliɛ klɔ ɔ.” Banɔ dzedze ba si, “Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ onu ŋwisi kiliɛ gi beboedoplɛ ba beze ni kanaa mɛ kinɛ ɛ.”
Pɔ̀ gi Herodes enu liboe le e, yɛ kɔɔ asi sì, “Yɛ onu Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ! Maki bɛti yɛ litukpo le, pɔ̀ edzi ligbã a!”

Okusi ye Herodes ɔtutɔ aki si bevu Yohanes, lɛ yɛ ke aki bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ, xe bɛkpɛ yɛ ligba a. Yedze Herodia loso ebu ɔkli lɔ klɔ ʋa. Herodia eze Filipo yedze, xe Okusi ye Herodes azɛ yɛ agbanɔ ɔ. Lɛ Filipo ni Okusi ye Herodes pɔ̀ ɛ, beze benemi.
Lɛ Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ azɛ si Herodes sì, “Lípɛ si wɔazɛ wonemi ye yedze ɔgbanɔ ɔ.”
Liboe lɛ klɔ loso e, Yohanes yɛ liboe lizeeyeʋi Okusi ye Herodes yedze Herodia isu nyani nyani gi azaapɛ kudeonu si yiye ye e. Pɔ̀ Okusi ye Herodes loso e, ɔ́zɛmɔ kudeonu ní yɛ su u.

Lɛ Okusi ye Herodes pɔ ɛ, azeese Yohanes, lɛ ese linu si etè si Yohanes eze ɔnɔ gbã, lɛ yɛ isu fɛ idra ní Aya Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ. Lɛ loso e, edi le aʋa si kididɔ kísa Yohanes kura ní ligba lɛ ɛ. Yohanes yɛ eboe pani pani la ezetu Okusi ye Herodes lipoe kakaa gi enu la ɛ; pɔ̀ fɛ azɛɛpɛ si yinu la.

Gɔgɔɛ, kudeonu liɔ gi Herodia azaapɛ ɛ kwidra ɛki yɛ. Liba lɛ mɛ si Okusi ye Herodes azaaŋa yɛ lipɔwe le. Niteme si edu ɔkplɔ aki yɛ baʋaŋaa klɔ gi beze banɔ ʋidi ba, baguta ba baka ba ni Galilea kesea mɛ banɔ gbɔgbɔ ʋa petee.

Liwe lɛ klɔ ɔŋa klɔ ɛ, Herodia yebidzɛʋiɛ eyo livu ne gi isami iku Okusi ye Herodes ni yɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ su bezeze ʋa mɔmɔmɔ. Lɛ loso e, Okusi ye asi obidzɛʋi yɛ si, “Ege wɔpɛ ɛ dɔni mɛ iwla mɛ ɛ? Kidɔ kakaa gi kiku wɔ kule e, ʋi; maki wɔ kɛ.”
Niteme si aka bitamu glegle aki ɔnuvɔɛ, lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Matàni kidɔ kakaa si, kidɔ kakaa gi wɔaʋi i, vaa xegi mɛ kaʋaŋaa kapɛ tiele fɛ ɛ, maaki wɔ kɛ.”
Niteme si, ɔdzɛʋi yɛ edo atrɛ ní yene klɔ lɛ azeeʋi ye si, “Mone, ege maaʋi i?”
Niklɔ yene asi yɛ si, “Ʋi Yohanes Kuni yo Ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ litukpo le!”
Ɔdzɛʋi yɛ akɔsi edzi atrɛ ní Okusi ye Herodes klɔ, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Mapɛ si kɔ Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ litukpo le trɔ ní kitɛɛ aʋa ki mɛ tɔ mizɛ ablahate!”
Liboe le likɔ si Okusi ye Herodes awɔ ni asigaga mɛ. Pɔ̀ yɛ bitamu ʋɛ gi aka ní yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba aŋu mɛ loso e, ɔ́pɛ si yigbe ɛki yɛ ɛ.
Niteme si akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔye tole kyɔŋ si odi lɛ aʋa si yatsa Yohanes litukpo le amanɔ. Ɔnɔyee asɛ atrɛ niklɔ gi bɛkpɛ Yohanes ní ligba lɛ ɛ; lɛ atsa yɛ litukpo le e.
Lɛ akɔ lɛ atrɔ ní kitɛɛ aʋa a xe akɔ amanɔ ɛ. Akɔ linɔtukpo le aki ɔdzɛʋi yɛ, lɛ yɛ fɛ akɔ lɛ aki yene e.
Gi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba benu liboe le e, bɛtrɛ, lɛ bɛzɛkɔ Yohanes okpo ye zevive e.
Yesu yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bɛtrɛ, bedzi; lɛ bebatsani yɛ ɛ. Bɛsi yɛ eboa la gi etrɛ lɛ aʋa ani bidɔ bɛklɔ gi bɛbasɛ petee.
Lɛ gi banɔ glegle bɛzɛtrɛ xe batɔ fɛ bɛzɛba ɛ, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bámɔ kudeonu tete xe biaŋa bidɔ fɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso asi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kubu lidze dzaa atɔ mlazeze mɔni taʋɛ.”
Bemu iku katapokpa atɔ mɛ lɛ beku kudeo me etrɛ ní ɔkutɔ gi ɔnɔnɔ óze e.

Pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ, banɔ glegle gi bɛmɔ ba a gi bɛzɛsɛ̀ ɛ, bɛmɔ ba egyesi kyɔŋ. Banima bɛdɔ ima nɛ petee me, besega limu ne kutu yɔ ni ikli lɛ lɛ bezeeku limu ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ kpɛ ɔtɔ ɛki Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba.
Gi Yesu edo ní katapokpaa mɛ xe amɔ linɔkpi le e, ba liboe liga yɛ asigaga lɛ ese linu si beze ŋwisi iʋesi gi ɔʋadi óze ní lɛ awla kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso ekpese ba bidɔ glegle kubasɛ.
Lipoe lɛ gi kelea kekpese kublo e, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Niya ebu lidze” lɛ “Kelea keeblo nì blo.
Lɛ loso e, ki tɔ banima basɛ tɔ batrɛ ní inyrɔɔ nɛ ani imaɛ nɛ klɔ gi iklani niya mɛ ɛ tɔ bazɛpɛ kiditɔ aŋa a.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ tutɔ mlaki ba bidɔ tɔ baŋa.” Lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Kibɔɛ liɛ gi kwiazizi ní ba aklã na litukpo e, kiana ɔnɔ tole yɛ badzidzi ɔgɔtiaʋa liʋɛ ɛ!”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Aklã tasɛ alɛ mlɔ awla a? Mlazedi.” Gi bedzi itrɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Aklã tetsu ani akpa taʋa.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si baki tɔ linɔkpi le lize kesea ní ahakpɔ mɛ ní siwa sɛ aʋa.
Lɛ loso e, banima beple eze ní ahakpɔ mɛ, ikutɔ banɔ alafa, ikutɔ avi tetsu.
Lɛ Yesu akɔ aklã tetsu la ni akpa taʋa la ɛ. Efeke yɛ aŋu na edi lifunu ne, lɛ edo Aya ɖase e. Ayaʋi aklã na lɛ avini akpa la fɛ mɛ xe akɔ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si balɛ aki linɔkpi le petee e.
Ɔnɔ kakaa aŋa, gi eke e.
Pɔ̀ gi bɛŋa pɔ ɛ, badɔkpasi ba bɛkpɛ bidɔ mɛ gi bɛŋa ɛgɔ likpɔ, gi biyi kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa a.
Ní linɔkpi lɛ klɔ gi liŋa bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, benyime ba beze akpe tietsu.
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba ní katapokpa me tɔ bekú yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ atrɛ ní Betsaida ní limu ne kapɛ ʋla. Yesu apɛ si yikpɛ linɔkpi le kude e
Gi akpɛ banima kude pɔ́ ɛ, emu atrɛ ní lito etɔ aʋa si yixwa Aya.
Gi kelea keblo e, katapokpaa keze ní limu ne kusi yo; pɔ̀ Yesu tole eze ní oge no o.

Amɔ si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzetutru ni katapokpaa ní limu ne aʋa lɛ ese linu si bɛtsani liwɔ lɛ gi lifu idɔni niklɔ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso olezatɔ nɔ ŋwisi ɔkukɔ tɔpu nɔ kimemee me kinɛ ɛ, Yesu aga kuni yo aʋa aba tsani ba. Nya apɛ si yiza ba aʋa xe e.
Pɔ̀ gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ gi azɛɛga kuni yo aʋa ɛ, begyodi si okpo bɛmɔ, niteme si bese lifu ne. Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Okpo ye!”
Gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, belulu pɔ̀
Yesu asi ba ni le onu klɔ si, “Mlamɔ ɔna! Mɛ iliɛ ya! Mlakíse lifu u!”
Lɛ emu eku apɔni ba ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, liwɔ lɛ onu líyɔ miɔɔ. Badɔkpasi ba onugu etse
lɛ ese linu si bénu liboe lɛ gi likpasi ní banɔ akpe tietsu ba ba kaʋadi ya mɛ ese e. Ba begyodi ʋa bátani liboe le kuvu kura.
Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtsa limu ne lɛ beple eku ní Genesaret kesea mɛ; lɛ bɛka katapokpaa ní limu ne kutu yɔ ɛ.
Agi beple ní katapokpaa mɛ pɔ́ ko e, banima bɛmɔ Yesu igyesi kyɔŋ.
Lɛ loso e, banima bese eklani kesea mɛ petee niteme si ɔkɔ́ kakaa gi benu si Yesu ɔlɛ ko e, befeke ba banyanya ba ɛmani yɛ ní ba inyanyatɔsi lɛ aʋa.

Lɛ ɔkɔ kakaa gi Yesu atrɛ ɛ, ní kumami yɔ mɛ, ima ʋidi ne me ani inyrɔ nɛ aʋa ko e, banima bɛkɔ ba banyanya ba ɛtsinɔ ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa. Kɔ bɛki Yesu litukpo si ɔki tɔ bagbɔni yɛ awu la kutu yɔ. Lɛ banama petee gi bɛgbɔni yɛ ɛ, ba isu ya mɛ iku igagla a.
Gi Farisianɛ ma ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ bɛdɔ ní Yerusalem xe bɛba ɛ, bexogo ní Yesu su.
Bevu aŋu si Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi batɔ bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ni awla gi béplo ní ba ɔkɔ lɔ onu u. Lɛ ese linu si ba ɖii kɔ béplo awla la kiliɛ gi Farisianɛ ma bɛtrɔ ɛki ɔnɔ kakaa kinɛ ɛ.
Farisianɛ ma ni Yudanɛ ma pɔ́, bekuni ba bakatsi ba bidɔbasɛbasɛ bɛ kude, nite si xegi béplo awla la ní ligoʋi le onu i, bátraŋa bidɔ ɔ.

Lɛ kidɔ kakaa gi bedzi idɔnɔ kedzia mɛ ɛ, linu si beplo ke ni tɔ beplo ba awla la ní ɔtɔpu kɔ xe ableke biaŋa bidɔ ɔ. Isã dzedze itɔ gi ba bakatsi ba bɛkpɛ ɛplɛ, ŋwisi kupliʋi yo, kudɔtɔfukpoo, ni kudɔkpaa liɔ mɛ bizɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, bɛ kiploploe ní ba egoʋi la onu petee, bɛzɛbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa.

Nite si Farisianɛ ma ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba beʋi Yesu si, “Ege lɛ loso xe wɔ badɔkpasi ba kɔ bévu blɔ bakatsi ba ba egoʋi la gi bɛkpɛ ɛplɛ ɔzɔ mɛ na a, xe ba kɔ bizɛɛŋa bidɔ ni awla gi la su ádra na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Yesaya liboe le ligyɔ koŋ gi amɔ liboe edo aplɛ ní mlɔ su i! Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ beboebitɛ mlenu, kiliɛ gi aŋwlimi aplɛ si i:
Aya si, “ ‘Banɔ ba ya ɛ,
enugumeboe ko bɛkɔ ɛlɔ mɛ ɛ;
pɔ̀ ba ina nɛ kɔ ívu me kura.
Líziã si besumu me e.
Lɛ ese linu si banima isã nɛ aʋa ko bizɛbitɛ
ŋwisi lɛ inu Aya yɛ isã nɛ na a!’
“Mlɛyurɔ Aya yɛ isã nɛ, lɛ mlevu banima isã nɛ ɔzɔ mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ yɛ liboe le aʋa si, “Ni mlɔ kuboeteo me e, mlɛyurɔ Aya isã nɛ ɛplɛ lɛ mlevu isu i kɔ ni mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ isã nɛ ɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si, Mose edo aplɛ si, ‘Bù wɔka ni wone.’ Lɛ edo dzɛ si, ‘Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aadu onugu yurɔ yɛka loo yene e, lilɛ si beye ɔniliɛ klɔ.’
Pɔ̀ mlɔ si, xegi kidiitɔ kilɛ ɔnutɔ awla gi aatani kɛ kukɔ odi yɛka loo yene aʋa a, pɔ̀ xe asi ba si kinu Aya kinɛ ɛ,
kɔ libasɛ si mlɛki yɛ kudeo si ɔkipɔni yɛka loo yene e.
Nite mlɛbitɛ, gi mlevu mlɔ bakatsi ba egoʋi la awla a, xe mlɛki si Aya isã nɛ íyi kididɔ tɔɔ ɔ. Lɛ ɛ, eboe glegle dzedze alɛ ŋwisi la ya kinɛ gi mlɛzɛbitɛ ɛ.”
Dzɛ ɛ, Yesu axwa linɔkpi le amani isu ya lɛ asi ba si, “Liboe lɛ gi matrapani i, mlɔ petee mlata kutu tɔ mlenu lɛ ese.
Kidiliɛ gi kidɔ oge no o, xe kiti iku ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, aní kɛ kiaki si ɔnɔ aalulù ní ɔkɔ lɔ onu u. Boŋu i, kidiliɛ gi kidɔ ní ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, kɛ kizelulu ɔnɔ.
Ɔniliɛ gi kutu kuli yɛ ɛ, atɔ onu!”
Gi asɛ ní linɔkpi le su xe atrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si obu abee liɛ ya ese ɔki ba.
Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kɔ mlɔ fɛ mlénu eboa la ya ese na a? Kidiliɛ gi kidɔ oge no e, kitrátani ɔnɔ kululu u.

Lɛ ese linu si kidiliɛ klɔ ɛ, kitiiku ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ kiza eku ní yɛ lipo le me kɔ kido eza ní yɛ ɔnɔse lo me e.” Liboe lɛ gi Yesu apani nite e, libasɛ si kidɔŋaŋa kakaa ɛ, kɛ su kidra gi biaŋa fãa a.
Lɛ atrɛ ní yɛ liboe le aʋa si, “Kidiliɛ gi kido edɔní ɔnɔse lo me e, kɛ kizelulu ɔnɔ ɔ.

Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ yɛ kimɛ ɛ mɛ, lɛ dɔni yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ begyodi nyani nyani ʋa bizɛdɔ edo. Lɛ ba bizɛgbani ɔnɔ ɛkpɛ ní eboe zimizi na kubitɛɔ mɛ ɛ, gi la mɛ atɔ enu kalɔa kulɔ̀lɔ, kuze, kunɔye, kihasiwawa,
kuŋazi, litukpomegagla, kunɔmeno, onugududu, kunɔmobu, kaŋuzã, banɔ enyi kuxwaxwa, kusufeke ani kugadɔdɔ.
Eboe dovo la ya petee ɛdɔ ní ɔnɔɛ kimɛ ɛmɛ lɛ la izelulu ɔnɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ kede e, Yesu asɛ klɔ lɛ atrɛ ní Tiro bidɔ mɛ. Eti eku kepe katɔ mɛ. Ɔ́pɛ si ɔnɔnɔ ote si yɛ ɔlɛ ní klɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ ɛ, ɔ́tani isu ya kukpo o.
Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze ní yɛ obidzɛʋi ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, enu si Yesu aba ni klɔ, lɛ aba Yesu klɔ kyɔŋ lɛ edu aklamasi na kese ní yɛ ketu ya ɛ.
Ɔdzɛɛ eze Heladze gi bɛpɔ ní Foenike bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ní Siria kesea mɛ ɛ. Aki Yesu litukpo si ɔkpikpini ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no dono ní yɛ obidzɛʋi yɛ mɛ ɔki yɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Ki tɔ baki banuvɔ ba bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ. Líma si bakɔ banuvɔ ba bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ tɔ bakɔ aŋwia plɛ aki kudroʋio o!”
Lɛ Heladzee ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Ee Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, lilɛ te xunyɔ; pɔ̀ xegi banuvɔ ba bɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, bitɔ bizɛwɔli kokoko; niteme si kudroʋio fɛ ɛ, kuzɛɛŋa kesea binɛ mɛ ní ɔkplɔ nɔ ese e.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Kɔkpɛ liboe lɛ gi wɔpani loso e, dzitrɛ wɔ kepea mɛ. Xe woku i, wɔamɔ si ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edo eza ní wɔ obidzɛʋi yɛ mɛ.”
Gi ɔdzɛɛ eku yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ, amɔ Yebi ye gi ɔfini yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ aʋa a, gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edo eza ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kede e, Yesu asɛ ní Tiro bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀, lɛ aga Sidon xe aba Galilea Limu ne kutu xe azaatrɛ ní Ima Liɔfɔ lɛ bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ.
Banɔ batɔ bɛgbani onyime ɔtɔ gi ɔ́zenu i, lɛ ɔ́zɛtani kunugu yo kugu fɛ ɛmani Yesu klɔ ɔ; lɛ bɛki Yesu litukpo si ɔtrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa a.
Lɛ Yesu ebu onyimee lidze dzaa ní banima kusi i. Yesu akɔ yɛ biwlaʋi ʋɛ akpɛ ní onyimee batu ʋa mɛ, lɛ ebu sita sɛ; lɛ agbɔni onyimee kinemi ye.
Lɛ Yesu efeke aŋu na edu lifunu ne, egu hũu, lɛ asi onyimee ní si Hebri sɛ mɛ si, “Hefata!” Lɛ ese linu si, “Dra a!”
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, onyimee yɛ batu ʋa bɛdra, lɛ yɛ kinemi ye ika lɛ igyɔ lɛ ekpese kunugu yo kugu gi yɛ kunugu yo me kwidra a.
Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki banima si bakísi ɔnɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ lɛ kiliɛ gi azaakpɛ ɔsã nɔ aki ba si bakífeke onugu ní liboe le aʋa ɛ, nite ke banima fɛ bezehle liboe le.
Lɛ banama petee gi benu liboe le e, bɛwɔ yaa. Liboe gi ɔnɔ kakaa aapani ní lɛ su ko lize si, “Kitɛ yɛ kiboebitɛɛ kidɔ nite e? Kitɛ xe yɛ kɔɔ izɛki si itoku le ize nu u, xe imumu ne fɛ izɛpani i?”
Ní ewe alaklɔ mɛ ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi dzedze itɔ likpɛ likpɔ dzɛ. Lɛ gi kididɔ kize gi biaŋa ɛ, Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba manɔ ní yɛ klɔ, lɛ asi ba si,
“Banɔ ba ya ba liboe liga mɛ asigaga, lɛ ese linu si ewe tatá la ya gi balɛ ní mɛ su u, lɛ ba bidɔŋaŋa bɛ fɛ biblo o.
Xegi médi ba aʋa a, xe makpɛ ba kudeo e, biatɔ ɔpiti ní kudeo aʋa, lɛ ese linu si batɔ ba idɔ klɔ idze e.”
Yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ ɔnutɔ aamɔ kiŋaŋa ɛki linɔkpii lɛ xe biaŋa a, xe biakè ní ɔyaya klɔ ya na a?”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Aklã tasɛ alɛ mlɔ awla a?”
Bebu lɛ onu si, “Aklã tegloele.”

Lɛ asi linɔkpi le si beze keseatsalia. Lɛ akɔ aklã tegloele la a, xe edo Aya ɖase ní la aʋa a. Lɛ ayaʋi la mɛ xe akɔ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakɔ alɛ̀ aki linɔkpi le e. Niteme si badɔkpasi ba bɛlɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛki ba petee e.
Akpa wli wli klakla ʋi atɔ eze ní badɔkpasi ba awla. Yesu edo ɖase ní la aʋa, lɛ akɔ la aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakɔ la fɛ alɛ aki linɔkpi le e.
Ɔnɔ kakaa aŋa bidɔ mɛ gi eke e. Lɛ kede e, badɔkpasi ba bɛhali bidɔ mɛ gi bɛŋa xe bigɔ ɛ, biyí kusɔʋi tugloele.
Banima ba kisrɛsrɛ mɛ kize ŋwisi akpe tiene kinɛ.
Gi Yesu akpɛ banima ma kude pɔ ɛ, emu eku ní katapokpaa mɛ lɛ atrɛ ní Dalmanuta bidɔ mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ.
Lɛ Farisianɛ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ xe bekpese eboe la kuhe ni yɛ ɛ. Bezeekeni ye edi lɛ loso e, beʋi idɔni yɛ awla si ɔbitɛ linugutseboe litɔ ɔki ba tɔ beedi gi liabasɛ si Aya yɛ anya kpɛ yɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu egu hũu lɛ apani si, “Ege lɛ loso omono kelea lia ya kɛɛpɛ linugutseboe e? Owo, Misi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ! Bátraki mlɔ gyesi liɛ ya a.”
Lɛ Yesu asɛ ní ba su u, emu eku ní katapokpaa me lɛ atsa limu ne xe atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ ɛ.
Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba bedze bákɔ aklã atɔtɔ evu sani tile gi lizee ba awla ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ.
Yesu agba ba si, “Mleze ni aŋu tɔ mledi mumɔ ní Farisianɛ ma ni Okusi ye Herodes ba kunyagbãa su.”
Bevu liboe le edi ní batsali kusi. Lɛ bɛsi si, “Agi kúkɔ aklã tɔtɔ evu i, lɛ loso apani liboe lɛ ya te e.”
Agi Yesu kɔ ete liboe lɛ gi bɛzeedo onu i, eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɔ kugyodi yo kwitrɛ ní liklã su u? Kɔ mleʋínu eboe la ese fukɔ na a? Kitɛ xe mlɔ begyodi ʋa bɛdɔ sra sɛ nite e?
Bimbi bilɛ mlɔ awla pɔ̀ mlaʋímɔ na? Lɛ atukpa la alɛ mlɔ, pɔ̀ mlaʋínu na a? Mláplɛ aŋu u
lipoe lɛ gi makɔ aklã tetsu la aki banɔ akpe tietsu ba lò o? Bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ kusɔʋi tusɛ mlɛhali i?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa!”
“Lɛ gi mayaʋi aklã tegloele la aki banɔ akpe tiene ba ɛ, bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ kusɔʋi tusɛ mlɛhali i?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kusɔʋi tugloele.”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kɔ kɔna ni abla ɛ, mleʋínu eboe la ese dzɛ na a?”
Gi bɛzɛklanɔ ɛ, bezeku Betsaida. Niklɔ banɔ batɔ bɛgbani kaŋupo atɔ ɛmanɔ ní Yesu klɔ. Lɛ bɛki yɛ litukpo si ɔgbɔni yɛ ɛ.
Yesu evu kaŋupoa ɔwla lɔ lɛ agbani yɛ edono ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu ebu sita sɛ atrɔ ní kaŋupoa bimbi ʋe aʋa a. Lɛ kede e, Yesu atrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa lɛ eʋi ye si, “Wɔmɔ kiditɔ na a?”
Onyimee efeke yɛ aŋu na lɛ ebú isu ya onu si, “Ee, mɛɛmɔ banima; pɔ̀ balɛ ŋwisi ise ko gi iga ɛza kinɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu atrɔ awla la ní kaŋupoa bimbi ʋe aʋa dzɛ ɛ. Able kɔ onyimee edu yɛ aŋu na ke, lɛ yɛ bimbi ʋe bidra a, nite me si amɔ kidɔ kakaa tsrà a.
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ yɛ kude si ɔtrɛ kepea ni ɔsã si “Kúdzitrɛ ní kamamia mɛ ɛ!”
Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛɛtrɛ ní kumami uliɔ klɔ gi kulɛ ní Kaisarea Filipi ɔma nɔ su mɛ ɛ. Lɛ eʋi ba ní kudeo me si, “Mlasi mɛ; nyaŋwɛ banima bizedo si, mɛ menu u?”
Bebu le onu si, “Banɔ batɔ si wɔ wonu Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ. Banɔ batɔ fɛ si wɔ wonu Eliya, lɛ banɔ dzedze batɔ fɛ si Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ tole ɔtɔ wonu u.”
Lɛ eʋi ba dzɛ si, “Mlɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ mlɛɛsɛ si menu u?”
Petro ebu le onu si, “Wɔ wonu Kristo ye.”
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si, “Mlakípani liboe lɛ ya ní mɛ su isi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ!”

Lɛ Yesu ekpese yɛ badɔkpasi ba bidɔ kubasɛ si, “Lilɛ si, Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye, ɔmɔ ɔziã glegle. Lɛ banɔtsitsi ba, Kusumu yo baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba biadzi kede yɛ su u. Lɛ biaye ye, pɔ̀ ní ewe tata kede e, ayɔ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
Adra liboe le me asi ba. Lɛ loso Petro ebu ye kuka lɛ ekpese ye kutɛnɔ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu ekyi edi yɛ badɔkpasi ba, lɛ aka aŋu mɛ aki Petro si, “Satana, titrɛ ní mɛ su! Wɔ begyodi ʋa bádɔ Aya kɔ ɔ; kisugya mɛ begyodi ba klɔ!”
Lɛ Yesu axwa ɔnɔha lɔ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba amanɔ ní yɛ isu ya su lɛ asi ba si, “Xegi ɔnutɔ apɛ si yiku ni mɛ kude e, lilɛ si odze yɛ isu ya liboe, otu yɛ osetsase lo tɔ ɔga aze ni mɛ kude e.
Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ligbã nɛ lialila ɛ, ní mɛ litukpo loo ní Liboe Gbã nɛ litukpo e, aaze ligbã.
Libi woli liaze lɛ mɛ ɛki ɔnɔ, xegi kelea mɛ bidɔ mɛ petee biadzi yɛ binɛ ɛ, pɔ aalila yɛ Esobo la na a?
loo ege ɔnɔ aakɔ̀ atsrɛ yɛ Esobo la na?
Xegi ɔnutɔ ese kuye ní mɛ su aloo ní mɛ liboe le su ní kele zimizia lia ya mɛ gi béte Aya ɛ, kɔ Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye fɛ, aase kuye ní yɛ su xegi aba ní yɛ Ka kusudra mɛ ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra ba ɛ.”
Lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa lɛ apani si, “Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banɔ batɔ gi balɛ ní ya ɛ, batrátse kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi biamɔ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa gi keplee edɔ ni kigaglaɛ ɛ.”
Ewe teglo kede e, Yesu agbani Petro, Yakobo ni Yohanes evu lɛ bɛtrɛ ní lito gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ aʋa a; ba tete dzaa. Agi bezeedi ye e, bɛmɔ si Yesu kilɛlɛɛ mɛ kikyi.
Yɛ awu la edzi pititi gi eze ŋle; nite si kesea aʋa ɔsaplo ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tratani kididɔ kuplo xe kiaxwa nite e.
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba bɛmɔ Eliya ni Mose gi bɛzɛɛpani ni Yesu i.
Lɛ Petro asi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, lipɛ koŋ si kwikpɛ likpɔ ní niya! Ki tɔ kuwa basa kugbaʋi tuta; tile kí wɔ, tile kí Mose ani tile kí Eliya.”
Lifu liku ba niteme si béte liboe lɛ gi biapani i.
Lɛ liplɛ ɛtɔ lido xe liwe ba aʋa ni lɛ kuyeo e. Ko lɛ benu ole ɔtɔ ní liplɛ lɛ mɛ si, “Mobi ye gi malɔ ɛ, yɛ iliɛ ya. Mlata yɛ kutu.”
Bedi iklanɔ kyɔŋ, pɔ̀ bámɔ ɔnɔnɔ tɔ ɔ sani Yesu ni ba tete ko.
Agi bɛtrɛ eple e, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla aki ba si, “Kidiliɛ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, mlakipani ní kɛ su isi ɔnɔnɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ.”
Badɔkpasi ba bɛbitɛ ní Yesu ɔsã nɔ aʋa. Pɔ̀ ní ba tete kusi i, bezegyo eboe la kudi si, “Kuyɔyɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, lɛ pɔ̀ lɛ ese si kitɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “Ege lɛ loso Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛpani si, Eliya lilɛ si otu kuba na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Li lɛ mɛ si Eliya yɛ aatu kuba tɔ aalulɔ kidɔ kakaa plɛ. Pɔ̀ fɛ ɛ, ege lɛ loso bɛŋwlimi iplɛ si, Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye aamɔ ɔziã glegle lɛ batrázɛ yɛ na a?
Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Eliya aba kooko, pɔ̀ banima bɛbitɛ ba kupɛpɛɔ aʋa ɛyurɔ yɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi iplɛ ní yɛ su ní Aya yɛ liboe le me kinɛ ɛ.”
Agi Yesu ni badɔkpasi tiata ba beple edɔ ɔ xe bɛba ɛtsani badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba ɛ, bɛmɔ si linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ liklani ba. Niteme si Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ bɛzɛŋwlɛ eboe ni badɔkpasi ba.
Kiliɛ gi linɔkpi le pɔ́ limɔ Yesu ko e, libitɛ lɛ onugutsetse; lɛ bese trɛ ní yɛ klɔ xe bɛpani yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege su mlɛŋwlɛ eboe la nì ba ɛ?”
Onyime ɔtɔ ní linɔkpi le kusi ebu le onu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, mɛ mamani mɛ obinyimee ní wɔ klɔ, lɛ ese linu si ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ, gi ɛɛki si ɔ́ʋitani kunugu yo fɛ kugu u.

Lipoe kakaa gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no ɛdɔ ní yɛ aʋa ɛ, izɛŋwia yɛ ɛplɛ ní kesea; kɔ ɔfɔ lɔ eedo ní yɛ onu i; kɔ ɛɛta yɛ ene na ɛ; kɔ yɛ ɔnɔse lo ɛlia ɛ. Niteme si meʋi adɔ ní wɔ badɔkpasi ba awla si bakpikpinì ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no kudono ní yɛ mɛ, pɔ̀ bátanɔ ɔ.”
“Oo! Kitɛ xe kumɔziŋaa kulɛ mlɔ omono kelea lia ya te e?” “Lɛ kɔzɛna ni lipoe woli unu mlɛpɛ si mize ní mlɔ su u? Lɛ kɔzɛna ni lipoe woli te onu maabasɛ mlɔ bidɔ kudu u? Mlagbani ɔnuvɔɛ amani mɛ!”
Lɛ bɛgbani yɛ ɛmani Yesu i.
Gi ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛmɔ Yesu ko e, ɛŋwia ɔnuvɔɛ sa kesea. Niteme si emli aklanɔ ní kesea, lɛ ɔfɔ lɔ fɛ ɛzedo ní yɛ onu i.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ɔnuvɔɛ yɛka si, “Lipoe woli onu kizezee liɛ mɛ kiku ní yɛ su u?”
Ebu le onu si, “Dɔni yɛ kunuvɔɔ mɛ ke.”
“Epoe glegle, ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no izɛɛpɛ si loeye ɔnuvɔɛ, niteme si izɛŋwia yɛ kpɛ kifu ni kuni me. Lɛ loso e, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, di blɔ asigaga tɔ pɔni blɔ xegi wɔatanɔ ɛ!”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ee maatanɔ. Kidɔ kakaa kiaba kɛ mɛ ɔki ɔniliɛ awla gi kuziŋa kulɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ obika yɛ akpɛ ozi kyɔŋ si, “Kuziŋa kulɛ me awla, pɔ̀ kúsrɛ ɛ. Pɔni mɛ tɔ kusrɛ!”

Agi Yesu amɔ egyesi si linɔkpi le lizeetipɔni ba ɛ, akpɛ ɔsã aki ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no si, “Wɔ kutoku ni omúmu ɔfuɛfuɛ, makpɛ ɔsã aki wɔ si, doza ní ɔnuvɔɛ mɛ lɛ wukídzi batiku ní yɛ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.”
Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛkpɛ ozi gagla lɛ edugu ɔnuvɔɛ, xe edo eza yɛ mɛ ɛ. Ɔnuvɔɛ afɛ ŋwisi okpo kinɛ. Niteme si ɔnɔ kakaa azeedo si, “Ɔnuvɔɛ etse!”
Pɔ̀ Yesu evu ɔnuvɔɛ yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ apɔni yɛ xe ayɔ ɔlɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kede agi Yesu edzi atrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye ní kikpokpo me si, “Ege lɛ loso kútani ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ kukpikpini dono na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔfuɛfuɛ lɔ ya elu i, Aya kuxwaxwa ko kwiata ni lɔ kukpikpini dono o. Kidɔ dzedze kakaa elu kítratanɔ ɔ.”
Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ níklɔ ɛ, bɛga Galilea ɛza. Yesu ɔ́pɛ si ɔnɔnɔ ote niklɔ gi yɛ ɔkpasi i;
lɛ ese linu si azɛɛbasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bidɔ si: “Ɔnɔɛ Ye Bi ye e, biabu ye kukɔ kí banama gi biaye ye e. Pɔ̀ ewe tata kede e, aayɔ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
Pɔ̀ badɔkpasi ba bénu bidɔ mɛ gi abasɛ ba ese e, lɛ lifu ne fɛ lize ba mɛ ní kiliɛ gi biaʋi ye le ese e.
Lɛ kede e, bɛba Kapernaum; lɛ gi beti eku kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Liboe woli mlɛzɛŋwlɛ ní kudeo me e?”
Pɔ̀ bébu le onu u, lɛ ese linu si bɛzɛŋwlɛ eboe ní ba tsali kusi ní kudeo me tɔ béte bamɛ iliɛ gi yɛ asa kukeme e.
Agi Yesu eze kesea ɛ, axwa yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba; lɛ asi ba si, “Mlɔ mɛ iliɛ gi apɛ si yize ɔtɔpu yɛ ɛ, ɔkɔ isu ya kpɛ ní ɔgɔgɔ klɔ, tɔ oze mlɔ pɔ́ mlɔ osumusumu ye e.”
Lɛ akɔ ɔnuvɔ ɔtɔ amanɔ ní ba aŋu na mɛ ɛ. Agi akpɛ awla yɛ ole lo e, agba ba si,
“Ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ gi aazɛ banuvɔ ba ya elu ba mɛ tole ní mɛ linyi ne me e, mɛ azɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa liɛ gi azɛ mɛ ɛ, aní mɛ tete azɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ azɛ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ fɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yohanes asi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwimɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi azɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono ní wɔ linyi ne me e, lɛ kwisi yɛ si ɔmɔni, lɛ ese linu si ónu blɔ mɛ tole e.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakitsi kudeo onu akí yɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani enugutseboe kubitɛ ní mɛ linyi ne me xe lɛ kede e, aapani eboe zimizi kuyurɔ mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́yɔ kedu ní blɔ su i, onu blɔ ɔnɔ.
Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi aaki mlɔ kuni kepliʋi tiele si mlaŋwɛ gi mlenu mɛ banɔ loso e, aazi yɛ liʋɛtsatsa lɛ kikaka elu ye.

Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Xegi ɔnutɔ aaki si banuvɔ ba ya ba mɛ ɔtɔ aalila yɛ kuziŋaa ní mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, xe aabitɛ eboe zimizi i, liapɛ kí ɔniliɛ klɔ sanɔ xegi bɛka kuhɔ ʋidi ní yɛ ole e, xe bɛkɔ yɛ ŋwia ɛkpɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ.

Lɛ loso xegi wɔ ɔwla lɔ aaki si wɔabitɛ liboe zimizi i, tsa lɔ tuʋe! Liapɛ ki wɔ si wɔatiku ní ligbãmoblo le me nì ɔwla tole sani si iwla tiʋa ize wɔ awla pɔ̀ tɔ baŋwia wɔ akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e.
Niklɔ asu ana klɔ gi izɛta ba ɛ, eʋitsé liwewe e, lɛ kifui liɛ klɔ gi kizɛkani ba ɛ, kiʋíni liwewe e.
Lɛ xegi wɔ ɔkli lɔ aaki si wɔabitɛ liboe zimizi i, tsa lɔ tuʋe. Liapɛ ɛki wɔ si wɔatiku ligbãmoblo le me ni ɔkli tole sani si ikli tiʋa ize wɔ awla pɔ̀ tɔ baŋwia wɔ akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e.
Níklɔ asu ana klɔ gi izɛta ba ɛ, eʋitsé liwewe e, lɛ kifui liɛ klɔ gi kizɛkani ba ɛ, kiʋini liwewe e.
Lɛ xegi wɔ kimbi ye kiaki si wɔabitɛ eboe zimizi i, kpaʋi kɛ tuʋe! Liapɛ ɛki wɔ si wɔatiku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ni kimbi tile sani si bimbi tuʋa bize wɔ awla pɔ̀ tɔ baŋwia wɔ akpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e.
Niklɔ ʋa ɛ, asu ana klɔ gi izɛta ba eʋitsé liwewe e; lɛ kifui liɛ klɔ gi kizɛkani ba ɛ, kiʋini liwewe e.
“Lɛ kiliɛ gi bizɛkpɛ kiŋaŋaɛ kumɔ ɔ si kikízizi kinɛ ɛ, nite ke bɛtrákɔ kifu yɛ mɛ ɔzia nɔ ɛbla banama gi bɛtrátiku kifumoni ye me e.
“Kumɔɔ ɛ, kidɔ gbã kùnu u. Pɔ̀ xegi kɔ ɔgyi nɔ eblo e, kitɛ mlabitɛ xe ɔgyi nɔ aaku kɔ su dzɛ ɛ?
“Lɛ loso e, mlaki tɔ kulɔlɔ kuze ní mlɔ kusi ŋwisi kumɔɔ ɔgyi nɔ kinɛ ɛ; atɔ mleze ní kusuyɔ mɛ ni mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba a.”
Agi Yesu asɛ ní klɔ ɛ, atrɛ ní Yudea kesea mɛ, lɛ atsa Yordan onipe lo e. Anɔkpi la ɛkpɛ likpɔ ní yɛ su dzɛ, lɛ abasi ba bidɔ mɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi azɛɛbitɛ lipoe kakaa kinɛ ɛ.
Farisianɛ batɔ bɛba yɛ klɔ gi bɛzɛpɛ si bɛ́punu yɛ ɛ. Beʋi Yesu si, “Si blɔ, dani ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si wɔatani wodze kugbe na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu ni kuʋíʋi si, “Ɔsã woli Mose aki mlɔ ɔ?”
Lɛ ba fɛ bebu le onu si, “Mose aki kude si onyime ɔŋwlimi kegbegbeplekpa tɔ ɔkikɔ kutete si yɛyurɔ ye dze, tɔ ɔyurɔ yɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mose aki mlɔ ɔsãa nɔ ya lɛ ese linu si mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ilɛ gagla.
Pɔ̀ ní okpese klɔ ní kelea ɔbitɛ klɔ ɛ, ‘Aya abitɛ ba onyime ni ɔdzɛ.’
‘Lɛ klɔ ʋa loso e, onyime aasɛ ní yɛka ni yene su lɛ aakpɛ likpɔ ni ye dze e,
kɔ ba tiaʋa bedzi kidɔ tile!’ Lɛ loso e, bénu banɔ tiaʋa tɔɔ ɔ, bedzi kisugya tile.
Niteme si kidiliɛ gi Aya akpɛ likpɔ ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔkilɛ kɛ mɛ ɛ.”
Agi bedzitrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye liboe le ese.
Ebu le onu akí ba si, “Onyime liɛ klɔ gi aagbe yedze e, xe aagbani ɔdzɛ dzedze e, awa kihasi ayurɔ yedze.
Lɛ niteme ke ɔdzɛ liɛ klɔ gi aagbe yenye e xe aazeni onyime dzedze e, awa kihasi ayurɔ yenye.”
Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banɔ batɔ bɛmani banuvɔ ba ní Yesu klɔ si ɔtrɔ awla ní ba aʋa; pɔ̀ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛnyra ni ba.

Agi Yesu amɔ ba kibitɛ ɛ, amɔ kusuyeʋi ni ba, lɛ asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banuvɔ ba baba mɔ klɔ; lɛ mlakítsi kudeo nu aki ba a. Lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, banama gi balɛ ŋwisi banuvɔ ba ya elu i, ba kanɛ kenu.
Mɛɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́zɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ŋwisi ɔnuvɔ kinɛ ɛ, ɔ́tratiku ka mɛ liwewe e.”
Lɛ gi efeke banuvɔ ba ɛ, atrɔ awla ní ɔkakaa aʋa lɛ akrira ba petee e.
Agi Yesu eku kudeo me dzɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ ese atsani yɛ lɛ edu yɛ aklamasi na kesea ní yɛ ketu ya, lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ gbã ɛ, ege maabitɛ xe maamɔ ligbãmoblo le na a?”
Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso wɔɛxwa mɛ si ɔgbã a?” “Ɔnɔnɔ ónu ɔgbã asani Aya tete ko.
Wote Aya isã nɛ: ‘Wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ; wukíwa kihasi i; wukízuru u; wukísɛ asia ɛkpɛ ɔnɔnɔ awla a; wukími ɔnɔnɔ ɛkpɛ kese tɔ zi yɛ kidɔ ɔ; kpɛ kubùbù ní wɔka ni wone su.’ ”
Onyimee ebu le onu dzɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, dɔni mɛ kunuvɔ mɛ ké mɛɛbitɛ ní isã nɛ pɔ́ aʋa a.”

Lɛ Yesu edu aŋu na ní yɛ aʋa ni kulɔlɔ, lɛ apani si, “Kidɔ tile ko kiziã si bitɛ ɛ. Trɛ zɛɛda kidɔ kakaa gi kilɛ ní wɔ awla tɔ kɔ kibɔɛ kí bazianete ba, tɔ wɔamɔ exo la ní lifunu ne; lɛ kede e, ba tɔ gaze ni mɛ kude.”
Agi onyimee enu liboe le e, ayrɔ lɛ asɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si oxonete ʋidi onu u.
Agi Yesu edi aklanɔ ɛ, asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Liaze e gagla kí bexonete ba si biati uku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!”
Liboe le litu badɔkpasi ba kugyɔ, pɔ̀ Yesu atrɛ ní liboe le aʋa si, “Mɛ bebi ba! Liaze gagla xe ɔnɔ aatani kutiku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!”
Edo apɔnɔ si, “liaze gagla ki oxonete si oti oku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ sani ki kposɔɛ si ɔga abui ye liwu le me kudo o!”
Liboe le gi apani i, liwa axwɛ ní yɛ badɔkpasi ba aʋa, lɛ beʋi bahanuglɔ ba si, “Kɔ nyaŋwɛ koŋ aatani kubúbú kumɔ ɛ?”
Yesu edu aŋu na ní ba aʋa lɛ ebu le onu si, “Lítratani lɛ mɛ kuba ní banima klɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ liboe kakaa lilɛ plɔplɔ ɛki Aya xunyɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ Petro asi yɛ si “Di kwiyurɔ kidɔ kakaa, lɛ kwikuni wɔ kude e!”

Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Nite lilɛ, lɛ ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi asɛ yɛ kepea, xe ayurɔ yeneminyime, loo yenemidzɛ, loo yene, loo yɛka, loo yɛ bebi ba, aloo yɛ inyrɔ nɛ, kɔkpɛ mɛ ni liboe gbã nɛ loso e,

ɔniliɛ klɔ aazi bidɔ glegle sanɔ ní abla kelea mɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ klɔ aazi beneminyime, benemidzɛ, bene, bebi ni inyrɔ ede alafa kɔpɔni keduyɔyɔ ɔ. Lɛ ní kele vuvu kaklɔ gi kɛtraba mɛ ɛ, aazi ligbãmoblo le.
Pɔ̀ banɔ glegle gi benu batɔpu abla ɛ, biadzi banɔ gɔgɔ ɔ; lɛ banɔ glegle gi benu banɔ gɔgɔ ba abla ɛ, biadzi banɔ tɔpu u.”

Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ní kudeo aʋa a, xe bɛzɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem i, Yesu etu ɔtɔ aki ba. Liboe le litu yɛ badɔkpasi ba kugyɔ, lɛ banama gi beze ní ba kedea fɛ ɛ, lifu ne lizeku ba. Yesu ebu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kuka dzɛ ní kudeo aʋa. Lɛ asi ba eboa la gi ɛtraba yɛ aʋa ɛ.
Asi ba si, “Mlata kutu! Kwitrɛ ní Yerusalem. Niklɔ biabu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kukɔ kí kusɔliɔ baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba. Biatsa kutse pia ɔki yɛ; kɔ bɛkɔ yɛ kpɛ awla ɛki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ma ɛ.
Biakpɛ yɛ kakpaa; biabu sita bali yɛ aʋa; biakusi ye gɔgɔ ɛ, kɔ beye ye. Pɔ̀ ewe tata kede e, aayɔ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
Yakobo ni Yohanes, gi benu Zebedeo yɛ bebi ba ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ ɔ. Lɛ bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kidiitɔ kilɛ gi kwipɛ si bitɛ ki blɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Ege mlɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki mlɔ ɛ?”
Bebú le onu si, “Xegi wodi ní wɔ likusigbo le aʋa ní wɔ kukusi dradra mɛ ɛ, kwipɛ si ki kuze ní wɔ su: blɔ mɛ tole oze ní wɔ kaŋaa mɛ, tɔ ɔnɔ ʋlaɛ oze ní wɔ kabaa mɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mléte kidi liɛ gi kɛ mleeʋi i. Kuyeʋiyeʋi yo kepliʋia lia gi matraŋwɛ ɛ, mlaatani ka kuŋwɛ na a? Lɛ kuni yo gi lilɛ si bakpɛ aki mɛ ɛ, mlaatani kɔ kukpɛ na a?”
Lɛ bebu le onu si, “Kwiatanɔ.”
Yesu asi ba si, “Kepliʋia lia gi matraŋwɛ ɛ, mlaaŋwɛ ka baa, lɛ kiliɛ gi biakpɛ kuni yo ki mɛ fɛ ɛ, mlaakpɛ kɔ.
Pɔ̀ kudeo onu kúma si mɛ mibu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aaze ní mɛ kaŋaa mɛ loo ní mɛ kabaa mɛ ɛ. Aya abla izekɔɛ lɛ klɔ aki banɔ baklɔ gi akya ɛ.”
Agi yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ liɔfɔ gɔgɔ ba benu liboe le e, bɛmɔ kusuyeʋio ní Yakobo ni Yohanes su u.

Lɛ Yesu axwa ba pɔ́ akpɛ likpɔ ní isu ya a, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlete si banɔ baklɔ gi bizeebù si ba benu baʋaŋa ba akí babubitɛ ba ɛ, kigagla kilɛ ba awla ní ba aʋa, nite si baʋaŋa ba bizemi babubitɛ ba ɛkpɛ kesea ni kusufeke e.
Pɔ̀ lima si lize nite ní mlɔ kusi i. Xegi mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ apɛ si yize ɔnɔ ʋidi i, oze ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔki banɔ gɔgɔ ba.
Lɛ xegi mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ apɛ si yize ɔtɔpu yɛ ɛ, lilɛ si oze mlɔ petee mlɔ ɔnɔ sumu ye.
Lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ɔ́ba si tɔ besumu ye e. Boŋu i, kiba aba si yisumu tɔ yikɔ yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛkɔ tɔ yibu banɔ glegle.”
Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛba Yerixo. Agi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ beze do ni ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ, kaŋupo ɔdɔʋi Timeo Yebi ye Batimeo azeeʋi bidɔ ní kudeo su u.
Agi enu si Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ azɛɛza ɛ, ekpese ozi kukpɛ si, “Yesu! Dawid lipo me obi ye, di mɛ asigaga!”
Banɔ glegle bɛka yɛ aŋu mɛ si ɔgɔ tsriɖi. Pɔ̀ akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa sani kutɔpu yɔ si, “Dawid lipo me obi ye, di mɛ asigaga!”
Lɛ Yesu atɔ, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlaxwa yɛ aki mɛ!”
Lɛ loso bɛxwa kaŋupoa, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Mɔ ɔna! Yɔ lɛ ɛ! Yesu yɛ ɛɛxwa wɔ ɔ!”
Nite si Batimeo ebu yɛ liwu le etu eʋe, ayɔ lixu le, lɛ aba Yesu klɔ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege wɔɛpɛ si mibitɛ ki wɔ ɛ?”
Kaŋupoa kebu le onu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, mapɛ si mimɔ dzɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ga trɛ, wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔ nì wɔ ɔ!”
Lɛ onu klɔ koe ekpese bidɔ kumɔ. Nite si ekuni Yesu kude ní kudeo aʋa.
Agi beti ipɔni Yerusalem, xe beku Betania ni Betfage ní Olif ye lito le su i, Yesu akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tiaʋa ní ɔtɔ nɔ
ni kutrɔtrɔ si, “Mlatrɛ ní kamamia lia klɔ gi kalɛ ní mlɔ ɔtɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Xegi mlezekui i, mlaamɔ tedzi obi gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trɔ yɛ aʋa ʋídi gi ɔkpasi ní ohwi lo me e. Mleble ye amani mɛ ní ya.
Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ eʋi mlo si ege lɛ loso mleeble ye na ɛ, mlasi ɔniliɛ klɔ si, ‘Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã yɛ; lɛ aadzi ni ye kumanɔ kpekpemi i.’”
Agi bɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ tedzi obi ye ní ablɔ yɛ su kepe atɔ kevunu ya. Lɛ gi bezeeble ye e,
banɔ batɔ gi bɛlɛɛ níklɔ ɛ, beʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mleeble tedzi ye e?”
Bebu le onu ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ. Niteme si banɔ baklɔ ba bɛki ba kudeo.
Agi bɛmani tedzi obi ye e, ní Yesu klɔ ɛ, bebu ba ewu la ɛtrɔ ní ɔgaɛ aʋa, lɛ Yesu emu atrɔ ɛ.
Banɔ glegle bene ba ewu la ɛplɛ ní kudeo me, lɛ banɔ batɔ fɛ bɛtsa eseya la ɛplɛ ɛ.
Banɔ ba klɔ gi beze ní ɔtɔ nɔ nì kedea pɔ́ bɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Hosana! Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ klɔ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ linyine me e!
Aya ɔkrira blɔ Ɔkatsitsi ye Dawid yɛ kaʋaŋaa gi kɛtraba ɛ. Hosana ní lifunu ne hwii.”
Gi Yesu eku Yerusalem i, atrɛ ní lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, lɛ edi kidɔ kakaa aklanɔ ɛ. Pɔ̀, agi kelea keeblo onu i, asɛ atrɛ ní Betania ni yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba.
Gi kelea kɛti xe bɛsɛ ní Betania ɛ, kuʋɛ kwiku Yesu.

Lɛ gi amɔ ogbose ɔtɔ gi awlakpa la eze ní lɔ aʋa atsisi ní ɔdzage no e, eti apɔni lɔ ni kugyodi si yɛ amɔ lisebi itɔ ní lɔ mɛ na a. Pɔ̀ gi adzɛ ɛ, awlakpa la tètè ko amɔ, lɛ ese linu si ogbose lo liyopoe le liʋí na a.
Lɛ Yesu asi ogbose lo si, “Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́traŋa lisebi dɔni wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ!”
Niteme si yɛ badɔkpasi ba benu liboe lɛ gi apani i.
Agi bezeeku Yerusalem pɔ́ ɛ, Yesu eti eku ní lisumugba lɛ mɛ; lɛ ekpese badɔda ba ni badɔdzi ba pɔ́ kukpikpini dono e. Lɛ etutru babɔtsrɛ ba ba ikplɔ nɛ ni abronuma ʋa badàdà ba egbo la eʋe e.
Lɛ ɔ́ki kude si ɔnɔnɔ ɔkɔ bidɔdada tɔtɔ gani Kesumupea mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ abasɛ banima bidɔ si, “Bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Aya yɛ Liboe le me si, ‘Biaxwa Mɛ kepea mɛ si kelea mɛ banima petee ba Aya ɔxwakɔ.’ Pɔ̀ lɛ mlekyi niklɔ edzì beze ba okpokɔ ɛ!”

Agi kusɔliɔ baka ba ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba benu liboe le e, bekpese kugyodi kiliɛ gi biamɔ kude kutɔ onu u, xe biaye Yesu i. Pɔ̀ bezeese ye e, lɛ ese linu si linɔkpi le pɔ́ lɛ inugu itse ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su u.
Gi ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bedo ní ɔma nɔ mɛ.
Keletitia livlɛ lɛ gi beze ní kudeo aʋa ɛ; bɛmɔ si ogbose lo etse etsinɔ ní lɔ igu ne me ke.
Lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ klɔ gi liba lɛ mɛ aʋa ɛ; lɛ asi Yesu si, “Di! Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, ogbose lo gi woxo ifi le ɔkpɛ ɛ, etse!”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlazi Aya aʋa ŋa.”

“Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi aasi ketokpaa lia ya si, ‘kakpaʋi tɔ kazɛŋwia isu ya akpɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ,’ xe azɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, si liboe lɛ gi yɛ apani liaba lɛ mɛ ɔki yɛ ɛ, lianyaba lɛ mɛ ɔki yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e mɛɛsi mlɔ si: xe mlɛxwa Aya a, xe mleʋi yɛ kiditɔ ɛ, mlazi lɛ aʋa aŋa si mlɛzi kɛ. Nite si kidɔ kakaa gi mleʋi Aya ɛ, akɔ kɛ ɔki mlɔ.
Lɛ xegi mlalɛɛ si mlɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlakɔ liboe kakaa gi mlevu i kpɛ ní ɔna mɛ aki ɔnɔ kakaa ɛ, kukɔkyɛ yɛ, tɔ mlɔ Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne fɛ ɛ, aakɔ̀ mlɔ eboe zimizi na kukɔkyɛ mlɔ.
Pɔ̀ xegi mlákɔ akyɛ ɛ, mlɔ Ɔkaɛ ní lifunu ne fɛ ɛ, ɔ́trakɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ mlɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ kede e, bedzi ba Yerusalem. Gi Yesu azaaklanɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, kusɔliɔ baka ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛba yɛ klɔ.
Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “Kigagla woli wɔmɔ ɔ, xe wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu u? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aki wɔ kudeo o?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Matraʋi mlo liboe tile. Xegi mlebu le onu i, mɛ fɛ maasi mlɔ niklɔ gi mɛ kigaglaɛ kidɔ ɔ, xe mɛɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu i.
Mlasi mɛ, nifɔ Yohanes amɔ kigaglaɛ adɔ nɔ xe azɛakpɛ kuni yo aki banima na a? Aya klɔ loo, banima klɔ na a?”
Niklɔ kyɔŋ ɛ, kuboehe kwiku ní ba kusi. Lɛ bɛpani si, “Xe kwibu le onu si kigaglaɛ kidɔ ní Aya klɔ ɛ, aaʋi blo si kɔ lɔ, ege lɛ loso kúzi Yohanes aʋa ɛɛŋa na a?
Pɔ̀ xe kwibu le onu si Kigaglaɛ liɛ klɔ kidɔ ní banima kɔ ɛ, bezeese banima.” Lɛ ese linu si bɛzeese banima ní kiliɛ mɛ gi ɔnɔ kakaa azɛ lɛ si Yohanes anya eze Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ onu i.
Niteme si bebú le onu ki Yesu si, “Kúte e.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛ fɛ matrasi mlɔ niklɔ gi mɛ kigaglaɛ kidɔ ɔ, xe mɛɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya elu u.”

Lɛ Yesu abasɛ ba bidɔ mɛ gani abee ʋa mɛ si: “Liba lɛ mɛ si onyime ɔtɔ awa wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ, lɛ akpɛ kuka aklani lɔ ɛ. Lɛ etu lizokpo fɛ aki wain yɛ ebi la kukaka ɛ. Lɛ awa ɔnyrɔ nɔ lipegba gyɔ́gyɔɛtɔ fɛ ɛ. Niteme si akɔ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akpɛ awla aki apaa banyrɔmɛdzɛ batɔ, lɛ aga kude e.
Agi wain yɛ ligúpoe le lina ɛ, atsisi yɛ ɔnɔsumu ɔtɔ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba klɔ si ɔzɛ yɛ ɔŋa klɔ ɔmani yɛ.
Pɔ̀ gi ɔnɔsumu ye adzɛ ɛ, ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bevu ye kusi, lɛ bɛkpikpini yɛ ɛtsisi ni iwla pluplu i.
Lɛ kede e, ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔsumu dzedze ní ba klɔ. Bɛsa yɛ bidɔ ní litukpo le lɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ kuyeo e.
Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee atsisi onɔsumu dzedze dzɛ, lɛ beye ye e. Nite ke bɛbitɛ banɔ glegle atɔ gi akpɛ ɛ, bekusi batɔ, lɛ beye batɔ fɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔ tole kpoo gi agɔ ɔ gi biakpɛ dzɛ ɛ, yɛ eze ɔkaɛ ɔtutɔ lɔ yebinyime gi alɔ ɛ. Gɔgɔɛ atsisi yebinyimee ní ba klɔ ni kugyodi si, ‘biabu yebinyimee.’
“Pɔ̀ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛsi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, ‘Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee Yebi ye iliɛ. Mlaki tɔ kuye ye tɔ yɛ kaŋasea kiadzi blɔ kanɛ.’
Nite si bɛsɔ́li obinyimee, lɛ beye ye e, lɛ bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ kedea ɛ.
“Ege mlegyo edi si ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aabitɛ ɛ? Ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aaba ye ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba klɔ aaye ba, kɔ akɔ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akpɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi dzedze awla ɛ.
Lilí lɛ mɛ si mlɛkla ní Aya liboe le me si,
“ ‘Likla ɛlɛ klɔ gi beglitrɔ ba bebu iʋe si lípɛ ɛ,
lɛ liba edzi ogó no aʋa likla veve le.
Ɔkaɛ Aya yɛ abitɛ lɛ ɛ.
Lɛ linu linugutseboe ʋidi ní blɔ aŋu mɛ!’ ”
Lɛ Yudanɛ ma baka ba bɛpɛ si bévu Yesu u, lɛ ese linu si betè si basu ebu abee liɛ klɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ gi bezese linɔkpi le onu i, bɛyurɔ yɛ, lɛ bɛsɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kede e bɛkpɛ Farisianɛ batɔ ni Okusi ye Herodes baʋatrɔ batɔ ní Yesu klɔ tɔ bapunu yɛ gani beʋiʋi me.

Agi bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ, bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwite si wuzɛɛpani anukwarɛɛ, lɛ wɔʋíkɔ banima begyodi ʋa kɔwa lixwɛxwɛ ɛ. Woʋidi ɔnɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, lɛ woʋigyo ba izekɔ odi xe wuzɛɛpani i. Pɔ̀ wuzɛɛbasɛ banima anukwarɛ liɛ gi onu Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ ɛ. Lɛ loso e, kwipɛ si kúte xe liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su si, kutsá kagyɔ ɔki Kaisaro o? Ligyeno si kutsa kagyɔa loo kukítsa na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu amɔ ba ɔdaye lo, lɛ ebu le onu si, “Ege lɛ loso mleekeni idi si mlɛpunu mɛ ɛ? Mlamani mɛ kibɔ kitɔ tɔ midi.”
Agi bɛkɔ kibɔɛ ɛki yɛ ɛ, eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ litukpo ni linyi bitini ní kibɔɛ aʋa a?”
Bebu le onu si, “Kaisaro.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kɔlɔ mlakɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Kaisaro kiniɛ mlakɔ kɛ aki Kaisaro, tɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Aya kiniɛ ɛ, mlakɔ kɛ aki Aya.”
Niteme si litu ba kugyɔ.
Lɛ Zadukianɛ ma gi bázɛ kuyɔyɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ aʋa aŋa ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si,

“Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Mose aŋwlimi ɔsã nɔ ya aki blɔ si, xegi onyime etse ní yedze su u pɔ̀ bápɔ gi obi ɔtɔtɔ ɛ, onyime liɛ klɔ yɛ oneminyime ɔgbani ɔtrɛtrɛɛ yedze tɔ bapɔ bebi ba ní okpo ye yɛ linyi ne me.
Liba lɛ mɛ si, beneminyime tiegloele beze; otsitsi ye agbani ɔdzɛ, pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ obi xe etse e.
Lɛ ɔʋlaɛ agbani ɔdzɛɛ pɔ̀ yɛ fɛ ɔ́pɔ obi ɔtɔtɔ, xe yɛ fɛ etse e. Nite ke liba lɛ mɛ ɛki onemi tanɛɛ fɛ,
ni bagɔgɔ ba pɔ́: niteme si ba beneminyime tiegloele ba pɔ́ bɛgbani ɔdzɛ liɛ klɔ xe betse e, pɔ̀ bamɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́pɔ obi i. Gɔgɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛɛ fɛ aba etse e.
Lɛ xegi bekpo ʋa bɛyɔ ɛdɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní liyɔwe le aʋa ɛ, nyaŋwɛ yedze ɔdzɛɛ aaze e? Gi ba banɔ tiegloele ba pɔ́ bɛgbani ɔdzɛɛ edi.”
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Mlɛta kese kura! Mlete kidiliɛ loso o? Lɛ ese linu si, mlénu Aya yɛ Liboe le ni Aya yɛ kigaglaɛ ese e.
Xegi bekpo ʋa bɛyɔ ɛ, biaze ŋwisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ niklɔ ɛ, kudzɛgbanɔ kúma a.

Abla ní bekpo ʋa kuyɔyɔɔ su i, kɔ mlákla liboeboe ní Mose keplekpaa mɛ ní ose lo gi ɛɛsɔ lɔ su iʋidi na a? Niklɔ Mose aŋwlimi aplɛ si, Aya asi yɛ si, ‘Mɛ menu Abraham yɛ Aya, Isak yɛ Aya ni Yakob yɛ Aya.’
Yɛ onu Aya ki banama gi balɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, lɛ aní ki bekpo ʋa a. Mlɛta kese koŋ!”
Ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ɔtɔ eze ní niklɔ lɛ enu eboa la gi bezevu edi i. Gi amɔ si Yesu ebu eboe la onu mɔmɔmɔ aki Zadukianɛ ma ɛ, eti apɔni yɛ lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔsã woli ɛsaɛ veve ní isã nɛ kusi na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔsãa nɔ gi ɛsaɛ veve petee, lɔ onu si, ‘Israel, ta kutu! Ɔkaɛ gi onu blɔ Aya ɛ, Ɔka tole ko onu.
Lɛ loso e, lɔ Ɔkaɛ Aya nì wɔ ɔna nɔ petee, ni wɔ esobo la petee, ni wɔ kugyodi yo petee ni wɔ isu ya mɛ kigaglaɛ petee.’
Ɔsã ʋla lɔ gi ɛgbani lɔ ɛkpɛ ɛ, lɔ onu si: ‘Lɔ wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ tutɔ wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ.’ Ɔsã ɔtɔtɔ ɔma kunyipu isani isã tiʋa ɛlɛ ya a.”
Lɛ Ɔsã nɔ Ɔdabasɛ yɛ asi Yesu si, “Wɔpani mumɔ, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ! Nite ɖii lilɛ si Ɔkaɛ ko onu Aya, lɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́ma sani yɛ ɛ.

Lɛ tɔ lɔ Aya nì wɔ ɔna nɔ petee e, ni wɔ kugyodi yo petee, ni wɔ isu ya mɛ kigaglaɛ petee, ani tɔ lɔ wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ tutɔ wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ, bilɛ veve sanɔ si tɔ kɔ baga, bidɔkɔkɔ ni bidɔpɔʋipɔʋi ʋɛ kí Aya.”
Agi Yesu amɔ kuboeteo uliɔ gi kulɛ ní yɛ liboe le onu kubúbú yo me e, asi yɛ si, “Woti ɔpɔni Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa.”
Lɛ ya kede e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani Yesu liboeboe kuʋi tɔ ɔ.
Agi Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, eʋi si, “Kitɛ mɛ Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba biapani si, Kristo ye onu Dawid Yebi i?
Gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ́ ɛhwani Dawid xe apani si,
“ ‘Aya asi mɛ Ɔkaɛ si:
Ze ní mɛ kaŋaa mɛ ní ya
kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi maakɔ wɔ ahwafianɛ ma kpɛ ni wɔ kuklise o.’ ”
“Agi Dawid ɔtutɔ lɔ axwa yɛ si ‘Ɔka’ ɛ, lɛ kitɛ Kristo ye aaze Dawid yɛ obi i?”
Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lizɛta Yesu kutu ni isami.
Agi azɛɛbasɛ ba bidɔ mɛ ɛ, apani si, “Mlevu aŋu ní Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba su. Bizɛɛga ɛklanɔ ni ba ewu gblamadzaa na mɛ lɛ bizɛpɛ si banima bapani ba nì kubùbù ní enè na mɛ ɛ.
Bizɛpɛ izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ba itsaklɔ ni izekɔ ʋidi ne ní idɔŋakplɔ̃ nɛ su u.
Bízɛŋa kamla ní badzɛ aba gi ba benye ba betse e aʋa kɔ bɛzi ba bidɔ mɛ petee ní ba awla ɛ. Lɛ bizɛbasɛ isu ya nì Aya kuxwaxwa gblamadza mɛ ɛ. Ba kutuheheo kwianyani usanɔ!”
Agi Yesu eze ní niklɔ gi bizɛɛgyɔ kibɔɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, evu aŋu ní ba bibɔgyɔgyɔ ʋɛ su. Amɔ si bexonete gegle bɛzɛgyɔ kibɔɛ ní ba exomɔmɔ la onu.
Ɔdzɛ opiplinete ɔtɔ gi yenye etse e, aba lɛ agyɔ kɔba tiaʋa ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba akpɛ likpɔ lɛ asi ba si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, si ɔdzɛ opiplinete liɛ ya yɛ kagyɔa kɛsrɛ sani banɔ gɔgɔ ba petee ba kanìa.
Apani si, banɔ gɔgɔ ba kɔ ɛ, bɛgyɔ kibɔɛ ní ba exomɔmɔ la onu. Pɔ opiplinetee kɔ ɛ, akɔ yɛ ligbã nɛ mɛ exo la petee akɔ.”
Agi Yesu azeedò ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tole apani si, “Di ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ! Akla manímaní woli lu la ya te gi bɛkɔ ɛwa agba ʋidi ala ya xe eepedi te e!”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Dani mlɛɛmɔ agba ʋidi gaglaa la ya ɛ? Likla ɛtɔtɔ litráwɔ ní lɛ ɔtrɔ klɔ ɔ. Bɛtrátsra la petee.”
Yesu eze ní Olif ye lito le aʋa, gi libu aŋu mɛ ɛkpɛ Lisɔligba lɛ ɛ. Lɛ Petro nì Yakobo nì Yohanes anì Andrea, ba tete bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ.
Lɛ beʋi Yesu si, “Si blɔ lipoe lɛ klɔ gi eboa la ya aaba la mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ege kiabasɛ si lipoe le lina ki eboa la ya la mɛ kubaba a?”
Lɛ Yesu agba bà si, “Mleze nì aŋu tɔ mlakíki tɔ ɔnɔnɔ omeni mlo o.
Banɔ glegle biayɔ ɔlɛɛ ní mɛ linyi ne me, gi biabu isu ya onu si, ‘Mɛ menu ye e!’ Nite me si biameni banɔ glegle.
Pɔ̀ bikíhwani mlɔ ɔ, xe mlenu bigu ʋɛ izi le gi itipɔni mlɔ ɔ, ni agutaboe la ní idzage ne e; lilɛ si eboa la ya elu aba la mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ líbasɛ si kelea mɛ liblo le lina a.
Kuse kwiata bigu nì kuse, kaʋaŋaa kiayɔ kedu ní kaʋaŋaa su; kese kiasugu ní ɔkɔ kakaa, lɛ kuʋɛ kwiadɔ ɔ. Eboa la ya alɛ ŋwisi limɛ kutàta kinɛ ɛ.
“Mlɔ ɔtutɔ mleze ni aŋu. Biavu mlo kɔtsinɔ ní otsixwaklɔ ɔ. Biakusi mlo ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ; kɔkpɛ mɛ loso e, mlɛtralɛɛ ní baʋaŋa ba ni bekusi ba aŋu mɛ tɔ mlaapani liboe gbã nɛ ɔsi ba.
Pɔ̀ xe able kelea lidu le liana ɛ, lilɛ si basɔli Liboe Gbã nɛ asi kelea petee.

Lɛ xegi bevu mlo ɛtsinɔ ní otsixwaklɔ ɛ, eboa la gi mlaapani ní niklɔ ɛ, mlakíbu litukpo me ní la su ikpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ. Xegi lipoe le lina ɛ, mlɔ kɔ mlapani liboe kakaa gi liaba mlɔ onu i. Lɛ ese linu si eboa la gi mlɛtrapani i, atrádɔ mlɔ klɔ ɔ; ɛɛtradɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ klɔ ɔ.
Oneminyime aakpɛ oneminyime awla tɔ beye ye; lɛ Ɔka fɛ aabitɛ nite tsinɔ Yebi su u. Bebi ba biayɔ kedu ní ba baka ba ni ba bene ba su tɔ beye ba.
Banima petee biayɔ kedu ní mlɔ su kɔkpɛ mɛ loso. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aatani kulɛɛ gaglaa kɔna ni lipoe gɔgɔ lɛ ɛ, aamɔ kubúbú.
“Xegi mlɛmɔ ebusioboe zimizi na gi izeezizi bidɔ ɔ, gi alɛɛ niklɔ ɔ gi líma si eze e, (Ɔdɔklaɛ okeni odi tɔ onu eboa la ya ese!) Lɛ kɔ banama gi balɛ ní Yudea ɛ, bese atrɛ ní eto la mɛ.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔtini ní yɛ ligba lɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔkizizi lipoe si yiple eku yɛ kepea mɛ tɔ yikɔ kididɔ edono o.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, okídzi itrɛ kepea mɛ si yizɛɛkɔ yɛ liwu le e.
Lɛ liaze gagla ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ kí bamɛdzɛ ba ni bebinea ba gi ba bebi ba bɛɛmwa ɛ.
Mlaxwa Aya tɔ eboa la ya ʋa akíba la mɛ ní kublɔ lipoe le e!
Lɛ ese linu si ewe a la klɔ mɛ baxixa ʋa ɛ, bianyani sani báklɔ gi beze edi dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya ebu kelea gakɔna ni omono e. Lɛ baxixa ʋa klɔ elu bátraba tɔɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ Aya aatí ewe ala klɔ aʋa; atɛsi ɔ́bitɛ lɛ nite e, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tragɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ kɔkpɛ yɛ banɔ banɔbúbú ba loso e aati ní ewe a la klɔ aʋa a.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, xegi ɔnutɔ aasi wɔ si, ‘Di imɔ Mesiya yɛ ní ya!’ loo, ‘Di, imɔ yɛ ní kɔlɔ ɛ!’ wukízɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a.
Lɛ ese linu si asia na Mesiya ba ni asia na Beboedoplɛ ba biaba. Biabitɛ enugutseboe la ni eboe mamɔ edi atɔ gi biakɔ meni Aya yɛ banɔ kyakya ba fɛ ɛ, xegi biatanɔ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e, mleze ní aŋuplɛplɛ mɛ! Masi mlɔ liboe kakaa xe ableke lipoe le liana a.
“Niteme si ewe ala gi aaba ní baxixa ʋa kede e, liwo le lialɔsi, lɛ ɔdzidzi yɛ ɔ́trakle tɔɔ ɔ,
Badzidziebi ʋa biawɔli dɔni lifunu ne, lɛ lifunu ne bidɔ mɛ ɛ biaŋwia ní ʋɛ izeklɔ ɔ.
Lɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima biamɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi atrába ní aplɛ la mɛ ni kigagla ʋidi ni yɛ kuklekleo.
Lɛ aakpɛ yɛ lifunu ne baxwɛdzɛ ba kutsisi kesea akɔtɔ tene na mɛ tɔ bakpɛ Aya yɛ banɔbúbú ba likpɔ ɔdɔni kelea mɛ kapɛ tiele kɔtsini kapɛ ʋlaa, ni lifunu ne ɔduklɔ.
“Mlaki ogbose lo ɔbasɛ mlɔ bidɔ. Xegi lɔ aya la ɛtuma ɛ, kɔ mlete si kwiku ní kedzenilea mɛ.
Nite ke xegi mlɛmɔ eboa la ya gi ɛɛba la mɛ ɛ, tɔ mlete si lipoe le lina a.
Ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ ɛ eboa la ya pɔ́ aaba la mɛ xe ableke banama petee gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla ɛ, biatse e.
Lifunu ne ni kesea biaza, pɔ̀ mɛ eboe la onu atráza liwewe e.
“Ɔnɔnɔ óte liwe lɛ klɔ, ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi eboa la aaba la mɛ ɛ. Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba ní lifunu ne fɛ béte e; lɛ Yebi e fɛ óte e; Ɔka Aya ko ete e.
“Mleze ní aŋuplɛplɛ mɛ tɔ mleze ni aŋu, lɛ ese linu si mléte lipoe lɛ klɔ gi lɛ liaze ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɔ.

Liaze ko ŋwisi kiliɛ gi onyime ɔtɔ asɛ yɛ kepea mɛ xe atrɛ ní kude me kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ xe aasɛ ɛ, akɔ yɛ besumubi ba edu ní eboe la onu, lɛ aki ɔkakaa yɛ lixwɛ nɛ ɛ; lɛ asi kevunu ya ɔʋadi ye si oze ni aŋu.
Mleze ni aŋu lɛ ese linu si mléte lipoe lɛ klɔ gi kepea ɔkaɛ aadzi i liatani ɔlagɔ loo olezatɔ loo livlɛ kuze.
Lɛ xegi aado ní mlɔ aʋa kpoyi i, ɔ́kiba atsani mlɔ ní sra mɛ ɛ.
Eboa la gi masi mlɔ ɛ, la ke mɛɛsi ɔnɔ kakaa si: ‘Mleze ni aŋu!’ ”

Agi ɛgɔ ewe taʋa tɔ Yudanɛ ma baŋa ba Kutseolidɔzawe le ni Aklãmɔnyasi na liwe le e. Kusumu yo baka ba ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛzɛpɛ kudeonu si beevu Yesu ní kikpokpo me e gani kunɔmeno me tɔ beye ye e.
Pɔ̀ lɛ bɛsi isu ya si, “Kudi lɛ aʋa si kukíbitɛ lɛ ní liwe le me e. Xe aní nite e, keduyɔyɔ kiaba, kɔ ozi eku i.”

Yesu eze ní Simon, gi anya kunya kyikyĩ yɔ edi i, yɛ kepea mɛ ní Betania. Gi azɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ aba nì kumu flafla gi kwizɛ ní alabasta keʋe me e. Kumu yɔ gi bɛbitɛ ni ose ɔtɔ gi bizɛɛxwa si nad i, kwiŋa kedzi. Adra keʋea lɛ akɔ kumu yɔ abali akpɛ ní Yesu yɛ litukpo le me e.
Banɔ batɔ bezè niklɔ gi bɛmɔ kusuyeʋi i; lɛ bɛsi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Ege lɛ loso ɔdzɛ liɛ ezizi kumu flafla liɔ te e?
Biatani kɔ kudà gi kibɔɛ kiasani kibɔ silva alafa tiata gi biakɔ kɛ ɔki bepiplinete ba ɛ.” Nite si bebu ɔdzɛɛ lipɔ ni kusuyeʋi.
Pɔ̀ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlayurɔ yɛ ɛ! Ege lɛ loso mlɛkpɛ yɛ kunugu yo te e? Kidiliɛ gi abitɛ akí mɛ ɛ, kidɔ gbã gi kiŋa kedzi kinu u.
Bepiplinete ba balɛ ní mlɔ kusi lipoe kakaa; lɛ mlaatani ba kupɔnɔ lipoe kakaa gi mlɛpɛ́ ɛ. Mɛ kɔ ɛ, mátraze ni mlɔ su lipoe kakaa a.
Abitɛ kidiliɛ gi aatani aki mɛ ɛ; abali kumu flaflaa ní mɛ aʋa gi akɔ alulɔ mɛ kisugyaɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ akí mɛ kuviveo.
Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, ɔkɔ kakaa gi biapani Liboe Gbã nɛ ní kelea petee me e, biabu ɔdzɛ liɛ yɛ kiboebitɛɛ kubasɛ gi biakɔ zɛplɛ aŋu ní yɛ aʋa a.”
Lɛ kede e, Yuda Iskariot, gi onu Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole e, atrɛ ní kusumu yo baka ʋidi ba klɔ si yizɛɛkpɛ Yesu awla ɛki ba a.
Isami iku ba gi benu liboe le e, lɛ bɛki yɛ kakaplɛ si biaki yɛ kibɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso Yuda azɛapɛ kudeonu si tɔ yibu Yesu ikɔ ɔ.

Ní Aklãmɔnyasi na liwe tɔpu nɛ aʋa, gi lɛ bizeye kuʋesibi yo ɛki kutseolidɔzawe le ní Yudanɛ ma ligoʋi le onu i, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ wɔ̀pɛ si kuzɛɛbla akí wɔ kí kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ ŋaŋa ʋɛ na a?”
Lɛ loso Yesu akpɛ ba mɛ tiaʋa si: “Mlatrɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no me. Onyime ɔtɔ gi etu kenifukpo e, aatsa ni mlɔ ɔ.
Mleku ni yɛ kude atrɛ ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi aatiku i, tɔ mlasi kepea ɔkaɛ si, ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ si, nifɔ onu ligba ɛlɛ klɔ mɛ gi mɛ ni mɛ badɔkpasi ba kwiaze e, xe kwiaŋa kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ mɛ na a?’
Aabasɛ mlɔ lifune kugbake nene kutɔ, gi bɛbla a, xe bɛlulɔ ɛplɛ ɛ. Mlakpɛ kidɔ kakaa likpɔ aplɛ níklɔ akí blɔ ɔ.”
Badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, lɛ bɛzɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa ŋwisi kiliɛ ɖii gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ bekyi awla ní Kutseolidɔzawe le bidɔ ŋaŋa ʋɛ su i.
Agi kulagɔɔ kwina ɛ, Yesu aba ni yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba.
Gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ si, mlɔ mɛ tole gi ɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ nì mɛ ɛ, atrákpɛ mɛ ní awla a.”
Liboe le lisugu badɔkpasi ba. Niteme si bekpese yɛ kuʋí tole tole, si, “Mɛ loo? Máka lɛ aʋa si mɛ ɛ!”
Lɛ Yesu ebu lɛ onu si, “Litraze mlɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole gi ɛɛkpɛ awla ní kezia mɛ ni mɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrátse ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya yɛ liboe le lipani kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ lianyani kí ɔniliɛ gi aakpɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye awla ɛ! Liapɛ ɔki ɔniliɛ klɔ sanɔ xegi báxa yɛ apɔ kura ɛ!”
Gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu akɔ liklã̀ nɛ, lɛ edo Aya ɖase ní lɛ aʋa xe ayaʋi lɛ ɛ. Lɛ akɔ lɛ aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba a, lɛ asi ba si, “Mlazi lɛ ata a! Mɛ kisugyaɛ kɛ ya a!”
Lɛ kede e, akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia lɛ edo Aya ɖase e, xe akɔ ka akpɛ ba awla ɛ. Lɛ ba pɔ́ bɛŋwɛ ní ka onu i.
Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛbali ní banɔ glegle ba ligbã nɛ kuzɛɛzɛ lɛ ya a. Mɛ ika lɛ gi bɛkɔ ɛnya Aya yɛ kutrɔtrɔ onu lɛ ya a.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛ si, mátraŋwɛ wain yɛ ebi yoyo la liwewe tɔɔ kɔna ni liwe lɛ klɔ gi maaŋwɛ wain vuvu yɛ ní Aya Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ kede e, gi bɛza ɔdzi tole e, bedo etrɛ ní Olif ye Lito le aʋa a.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ pɔ́ mlɛtrase eyurɔ mɛ lɛ ese linu si Aya liboe le liipani iplɛ si ‘Aya aaye ɔgagbanɔ yɛ, kɔ iʋesi le pɔ́ ise hle e.’
Pɔ̀ xe mayɔ adɔ ní bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, maaku mlɔ ɔtɔ trɛ ní Galilea.”
Petro ebu le onu si, “Xegi banɔ gɔgɔ ba biase ní wɔ su fɛ ɛ, mɛ Petro kɔ ɛ, mátrase yurɔ wɔ liwewe e.”
Yesu asi Petro si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ si, xe ableke ɔkukɔ lɔ aamè kuʋlaa olezatɔ nɔ̀ ɛ, wɔanada tatá si wote me e.”
Pɔ̀ Petro aŋwlɛ isu ya gaglaa sanɔ si, “Xegi lizĩa si mɛ ni wɔ kwiatse kyɛ ɛ, mátranada wɔ liwewe e.”
Badɔkpasi dzedze ba pɔ́ bɛpani liboe lɛklɔ ke e.
Bɛtrɛ ní abɔɔtɔ mɛ gi bizɛxwa si Getsemane e, lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mleze ní ya tɔ mɛ pɔ ɛ, mizɛɛxwa Aya.”
Agbani Petro, Yakobo ni Yohanes apɔni isu ya. Axixa ní yɛ isu ya mɛ, lɛ ese linu si eku ní lipoe gagla mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ asi ba si, “Mɛ ɔna nɔ ɛɛmɔ kuyeʋiyeʋi glegle gi míhatse e. Mleze ní ya tɔ mleze ni aŋu.”
Agi aga atrɛ ní ɔtɔ nɔ taʋɛ ɛ, lɛ aŋwia isu ya asa kesea, lɛ axwa Aya si, xegi liaze yɛ kupɛ́pɛ ɛ tɔ ɔsriɖi kuyeʋiyeʋi yo ɔti ní yɛ aʋa a.
Yesu axwa si, “Abba, Mɔka! Kidɔ kakaa kilí plɔplɔ ɛki wɔ. Ki tɔ kuyeʋiyeʋi yo kaŋwɛpliʋia lia kàdɔ mɛ ɔza. Pɔ̀ aní ní mɛ kupɛpɛɔ onu u, boŋu ní wɔ kupɛpɛɔ onu.”
Lɛ edzi aba yɛ badɔkpasi tiata ba klɔ, pɔ̀ amɔ si bɛdɔ sra a. Lɛ eʋi Petro si, “Simon, sra wɔɛdɔ lò o? Kɔ wɔ́tani aŋu kuze ɔnyɔsasa tole kpoo na a?”
Lɛ agba ba si, “Mleze ni aŋu atɔ mlaxwa Aya tɔ mlakíwɔli ku ní kufekedi me e. Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛdimɛ, pɔ̀ kisugyaɛ kiibotsò o.”
Asɛ dzɛ, lɛ azɛɛxwa Aya ni eboa la klɔ ké e.
Agi edzi aba ní badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ, amɔ si bɛzɛdɔ sra dzɛ. Lɛ bátani isu ya onu kubu lɛ ese linu si sra sɛ sivu ba bimbi ʋe.
Agi edzi aba kutanɛɔ ɛ, eʋi ba si, “Sra mlɛdɔ dzɛ ɛ, xe mlɛyɔ isu mɛ lo o? Lisrɛ! Ɔnyɔsasa nɔ ɛna! Mledi bɛkɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kpɛ awla ɛki banɔ zimizi ba.
Mlayɔ tɔ kusɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛkpɛ mɛ awla ɛ, imɔ yɛ!”

Yesu azɛɛpani xe Yuda a, gi onu badɔkpasi ba mɛ tole e, aba edo o. Linɔkpi itɔ gi livu ihɛ gblamadza ʋa, ni kusekpeo e, lize ni Yuda kude. Banɔ baklɔ beze banɔ gi kusumu yo baka ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛkpɛ si bevu Yesu u.
Ɔniliɛ gi atrakpɛ Yesu awla ɛ, asi linɔkpi le kibitɛ kitɔ aplɛ si, “Ɔnyime liɛ klɔ gi yɛ lidzɔ lɛ matramu i, yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi mlɛpɛ ɛ. Mlevu ye tɔ mlagbani yɛ asɛ nɔ ni sigagla.”
Kiliɛ gi Yuda eku ní klɔ ko e, atrɛ Yesu klɔ lɛ axwa yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ!” Lɛ amu yɛ lidzɔ lɛ ɛ.
Banima bevu Yesu lɛ bɛnya yɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛlɛɛ níklɔ ba mɛ tole etso yɛ ihɛ gblamadza yɛ lɛ aŋwia yɛ ɛ. Nite si ihɛ azɛɛtsí kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye yɛ osumubi ye yɛ kutu yɔ ɛzanɔ ɔ.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kizia liziã si mlamani ihɛ gblamadza ba ni kusekpeo tɔ mlaba evu me ŋwisi ɔnɔ gi ɔ́ʋibitɛ ní ɔsã nɔ aʋa na a?
Liwe kakaa meze ní mlɔ kusi gi mabasɛ bidɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ mlévu me e. Pɔ̀ lilɛ si Aya yɛ liboe le liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.”
Niklɔ badɔkpasi ba petee bese esɛ̀ ní yɛ su i.
Ɔyasɔʋi ɔtɔ, gi enyime kusa tete ko e, eze ní Yesu kude. Bekeni edi si bévu ye,
pɔ̀ ayurɔ kusaa akpɛ ba awla a, lɛ ese asɛ nì liya lɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kede e, bɛtsini Yesu ní kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ. Niklɔ kusumu yo baka ba, ɔma nɔ baka ba ni banɔ tsitsi ba, ani ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛzɛtsa.
Petro ezeni ba kude ní ɔdzage no ke, xe eti eku ní kusumu yo Ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ. Niklɔ azɛɛŋani kifu yɛ ni Lisumugba lɛ bepepe ba.
Kusumu yo baka ba ni Yudanɛ ma betsixwa ʋidi ba bekeni edi si biamɔ kunutsatsa kutɔ ní Yesu su tɔ biaye ye; pɔ̀ bátani kutɔtɔ kumɔ ɔ.
Banɔ glegle bɛsɛ asia na ɛkpɛ ní Yesu awla, pɔ̀ ba eboe la ága kude tule e.
Lɛ banɔ batɔ bɛyɔ ɛlɛɛ, lɛ bɛsɛ asia na ɛkpɛ ní Yesu awla si i,
“Kwinu gi apani si, ‘Maayaʋi lisɔligba ɛlɛ ya gi banima bɛwa ni awla la ɛ; lɛ ní ewe tata kede e, maawa lidzedze gi aní banɔ bɛwa lɛ ɛ.’ ”
Pɔ̀ ba kyɛ ɛ, ba katsalia kásɔ ɔ.
Niklɔ Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye ayɔ ní ba pɔ́ aŋu na mɛ xe eʋi Yesu si i, “Kunububu kutɔtɔ kúma ní wɔ awla ní eboa la gi bɛkɔ ní wɔ su kura na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́pani i, xe aabu liboeboe onu u. Lɛ Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye eʋi ye dzɛ si, “Wɔ wonu Mesiya yɛ gi yɛ onu Aya Dradra yɛ Yebi ye na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛ! Lɛ lipoe le litrába gi mlɔ petee mlamɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi odi ní Ɔka Ʋidi ye yɛ kaŋawla mɛ ɛ, gi atrába ní lifunu ne aplɛ la aʋa ɛ.”
Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye akyì yɛ ewu la lɛ apani si i, “Katsali woli lu koŋ kwipɛ ní liboe lɛ ya mɛ dzɛ ɛ!
Mlenu yɛ libusioboe lɛ gi apani i. Ege kìnu mlɔ kugyodi o?”
Ba pɔ́ bɛzi lɛ si, aŋa lipɔ! Lilɛ si beye ye e!

Lɛ banɔatɔ bekpese sita sɛ kubu ubali Yesu aʋa ɛ. Bɛnya yɛ aŋu na mɛ, lɛ bɛsa yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ besi yɛ si i, “Basɛ blɔ ɔniliɛ gi asa wɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛ!” Lɛ Lisumugba lɛ bepepe ba bɛgbani yɛ ɛsɛnɔ ɛ, lɛ bezeekusi ye e.
Agi Petro eze ní kepea kukaa mɛ ɛ Kusumu yo Ɔka Ʋidi ye yɛ ɔdzɛʋi ɔnɔsumu tole aba a.
Lɛ gi amɔ Petro gi azɛɛŋani kifu yɛ ɛ, edi ye haã lɛ asi yɛ si, “Wɔ kyɛ, woze nì Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ kude e.”
Pɔ̀ Petro anada lɛ si, “Méte liboe lɛ gi wɔɛpani i, lɛ menu lɛ ese fɛ ɛ.” Lɛ edo atrɛ ní kevunu ya ɛ. Niklɔ ko lɛ ɔkukɔ lɔ eme e.
Gi ɔdzɛʋi yɛ amɔ yɛ ní niklɔ ɛ, ekpese kudo si banama gi bɛlɛɛ níklɔ dzɛ si, “Onu bamɛ tole.”
Pɔ̀ Petro anada lɛ dzɛ.
Lidze xe banɔ baklɔ gi balɛɛ ní klɔ bebu le etu Petro dzɛ si, “Wɔtratani lɛ kúnada si wonu bamɛ tole e; lɛ ese linu si wɔ kyɛ ɛ, Galilea ɔnɛ wonu u.”
Niklɔ Petro apani si, “Matàni bidɔ si anukwarɛɛ mɛɛpani! Aya ohe kutu ki mɛ xegi asia mɛɛsɛ ɛ! Méte onyime liɛ su gi mlɛpani i!”
Kyɔŋ klɔ ko e, ɔkukɔ lɔ eme kuʋlaa, lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu liboe lɛ gi Yesu asi yɛ aʋa a si, “Xe ableke ɔkukɔ lɔ aamè kuʋla ɛ, wɔanada tatá si wote me e.” nite si amɔ isu ya egyesi lɛ eku kubemi me e.

Keletitia livlɛ lɛ fififĩ i, kusumu yo baka ba, Yudanɛ ma banɔtsitsi ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba, ani Yudanɛ ma betsixwa Ʋidi ba pɔ́ bɛkpɛ likpɔ kise ise niteme si bɛtrɔ likla ní liboe tile aʋa. Bɛkpɛ Yesu bibɔ ʋɛ, lɛ bɛgbani yɛ ɛsɛnɔ; lɛ bɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ awla ɛki Pilato e.
Pilato eʋi ye si, “Wɔ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye na a?” Yesu ebú le onu si, “Ee, kiliɛ gi wɔɛpani lɛ ɛ, nite lilɛ.”
Kusumu yo baka ba bɛkɔ eboe glegle ní Yesu su u.
Lɛ loso e, Pilato eʋi ye dzɛ si, “Wɔtrabu isu ya onu lò o. Dani wɔenu kiliɛ gi bɛɛtsa wɔ onu i?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́pani liboeboe, nite si litu Pilato kugyɔ ɔ.
Ní Kutseolidɔzawe kakaa aʋa ɛ, lize ligoʋi ki Pilato si ɔyurɔ ɔnɔ tole gi ɔlɛ ligba a, gi banima biaʋi i ɔki ba.
Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Baraba ɛ, eze ní banɔatɔ gi bɛyɔ kedu u, xe beye banɔ ɔ, xe lɛ loso bɛkpɛ ba ligba ɛ, ba kusi.
Linɔkpi le litsa lɛ banima beʋi idɔnɔ Pilato awla si ɔbitɛ kiliɛ gi izɛbitɛ ɛki ba a.
Lɛ eʋi ba si, “Mlɛpɛ si miyurɔ Yudanɛ ma okusi ye ki mlɔ na a?”
Etè mɔmɔmɔ si kusumu yo baka ba bɛkɔ Yesu ikpɛ yɛ awla kɔkpɛ gi bɛkɔ kaŋuzã ní Yesu su loso o.
Pɔ̀ kusumu yo baka ba bɛfuɛ ɛkpɛ linɔkpi le me si, beʋi si, Pilato tɔ ɔyurɔ Baraba boŋu ɔki ba a.
Lɛ Pilato eʋi linɔkpi le dzɛ si, “Kɔ ege mlɛpɛ si mibitɛ ni ɔniliɛ gi mlɛɛxwa si Yudanɛ ma okusi ye e?”
Bɛkpɛ ozi lo si, “Ku ye ní ose lo su!”
Lɛ Pilato eʋi dzɛ si, “Liboe zimizi woli abitɛ ɛ?”
Bɛkpɛ ozi lo gaglaa ɛsanɔ si, “Ku ye ní ose lo su!”
Gi Pilato apɛ si yibitɛ ní linɔkpi le kupɛpɛɔ aʋa loso e, ayurɔ Baraba aki ba a. Aki si bekusi Yesu, lɛ akɔ yɛ akpɛ awla si bazekú ye ní ose lo su i.
Baguta ba bɛgbani Yesu itsinɔ ní Roma banɛ ma ɔʋaŋaɛ yɛ kepea mɛ, lɛ bɛxwa baguta ba lihakpɔ gɔgɔ lɛ ɛkpɛ likpɔ ɛ.
Bɛkɔ liwu kyíkyĩ ikpɛ ɛki yɛ, lɛ beyo bibu ʋe likusikuto ekume ɛki yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bekpese yɛ kukpɔ̀ si: “Yudanɛ ma Okusi Ʋidi ye e, oze ligbã gblamadza!”
Bɛsa yɛ ose lo ní litukpo le; lɛ bebu sita sɛ ɛbali yɛ aʋa a; lɛ bedu aklamasi na kesea a, xe bɛkpɛ etukpo kesea ɛki yɛ ɛ.
Agi bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa pɔ́ ɛ, bebu liwu kyíkyĩ nɛ ní yɛ su, lɛ bɛkɔ yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ liwu le dzini kpɛ ɛki yɛ ɛ. Lɛ bɛgbani yɛ dono etsinɔ si beezeku ye ní ose lo su i.

Agi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛtsani onyime ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Simon i. Simon aga ádɔ ní kumami yɔ mɛ xe azɛatrɛ ní Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ gi baguta ba bɛtsani yɛ ɛ, bemi yɛ aʋa si ɔzɛ Yesu yɛ ose lo kutu. Simon ɔtutɔ lɔ ádɔ ní Kirene; lɛ yɛ bebi ba beze Alɛksanda ni Rufus i.
Bɛgbani Yesu itsinɔ ní ɔkutɔ gi bizɛxwa si Golgota ketokpaa aʋa a. Golgota lɛ ese linu si, “Litukpoxwa ozekɔ.”
Lɛ bɛki yɛ wain gi bɛpisa ni kuwa tiitii kutɔ gi bizɛxwa si mire e, pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́ŋwɛ yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bekú ye ní ose lo su xe bɛta exoeʋi la ɛki yɛ bidɔ kpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ. Nite si bɛlɛ yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
Lipoe lɛ gi bekú Yesu ní ose lo su i, lize livlɛ lɛ inyɔ ɔgɔtole.
Lɛ kunutsatsaa liɔ klɔ gi bɛŋwlimi iku ní yɛ litukpo le onu i, kwipani si: “Yudanɛ ma Okusi Ʋidi ye.”
Bekú beze tiaʋa kyɛ ní ise le su ipɔni Yesu; oze tole eze ní yɛ kaŋaa mɛ, lɛ ɔʋlaɛ eze ní yɛ kabaa mɛ ɛ.
Liki si Aya liboe le liba lɛ mɛ si, “Beye ye ŋwisi eboe zimizi ɔbitɛbitɛ onu kinɛ na a!”
Banama gi bɛzɛɛga ɛza ɛ, besugu ba etukpo la, lɛ bezeebu onugu me ní Yesu su si i, “Ɛhɛ̃ɛ! Aní wɔ wɔ si, wɔtrayaʋi Lisɔligba lɛ, tɔ wɔadzini le kuwa ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ?
Ple ní ose lo su tɔ bu isu ya!”
Niteme ke kusumu yo baka ba ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba fɛ bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa ní ba tsali kusi si, “Ebu banɔ dzedze ba, pɔ̀ ɔ́tani isu ya kubu u!
Xegi yɛ onu Mesiya yɛ ɛ, gi onu Israel Okusi Ʋidi ye e, kɔlɔ ople ní ose lo su ablahate tɔ kwiazi yɛ aʋa ŋa a!”
Lɛ banɔ tiaʋa ba klɔ gi beku ní ise le su ipɔni Yesu kyɛ ɛ, bekpini ye e.
Agi inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa isa ɛ, litumu ne lidɔ ní kesea petee aʋa inyɔsasa tita.
Agi inyɔ tita isa ɛ, Yesu akpe ozi tatata si, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabaxtani!” Gi lɛ ese linu si, “Mɔka, Mɔka, ege lɛ loso wɔyurɔ mɛ ɛ?”
Banɔ batɔ gi beeze ní klɔ ɛ, benu yɛ ozi lo, lɛ bɛpani si, “Mlata kutu, ɛɛxwa Eliya!”

Banɔ baklɔ ba mɛ tole ese, lɛ azɛɛkɔ ɔsapo lo o, lɛ akpɛ lɔ ní kuda nyagba nyagba mɛ ɛ, lɛ ete lo ní ose gblamadza ɔtɔ onu, lɛ akɔ kɔ aki Yesu si ɔŋwɛ ɛ. Lɛ apani si, “Mlaplɛ litɔ kese tɔ kudi xe Eliya aaba pleni ye ní ose lo su i!”
Gi Yesu akpɛ ozi lo gaglaa dzɛ ko lɛ ada onugu lo e.
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, kusaa gi bɛkɔ ɛlɛ Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, kwikyĩ idɔni kaʋaa gakɔ nani kesea!
Baguta ba ɔka ɔtɔ gi eze ní osetsase lo ɔtɔ nɔ ɔ, gi amɔ kiliɛ mɛ gi Yesu akɔ etse e, lɛ apani si, “Sugba sugba ɛ, Onyime liɛ, Aya Yebi ɔnyaa nu u!”
Badzɛatɔ bɛlɛɛ ní ɔdzage no gi bezeedi eboa la gi ɛzɛɛba la mɛ ɛkpɛ ɛ. Maria Magdaladzee, ni Maria gi eze Yakobo nuvɔɛ ni Yose ba onee e, kɔpɔni Salomɛ, ba fɛ beze ní badzɛ ba ba klɔ kusi.
Lipoɛ lɛ klɔ gi Yesu eze ní Galilea ɛ, badzɛ ba klɔ beze ni yɛ kude, xe bɛzɛpɔni yɛ ɛ. Badzɛ dzedze gi bezeni yɛ kude eba Yerusalem kyɛ beze níklɔ.
Lize Lisɔpa kulagɔ, liwe lɛ gi bizɛbla ɛplɛ ɛki Lizemɔniwe le e,

Yosef gi ádɔ Arimatia ɛ, aba eku. Eze banɔtsitsi ba likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ mɛ ɔnɔ gi kubùbù kwize ní yɛ su u. Lɛ yɛ fɛ azeepe Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kubabaa a. Edo igyi le atrɛ ní Pilato aŋu mɛ lɛ eʋi si bakɔ Yesu okpo ye aki yɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ litu Pilato kugyɔ gi enu si Yesu etse kyikya te e. Axwa baguta ba ɔkaɛ, lɛ eʋi ye si Yesu anya etse na a.
Lɛ gi enu baguta ba ɔkaɛ yɛ kunutsatsaa si Yesu anya etse e, Pilato ayurɔ okpo ye aki Yosef.

Yosef edzi aklala evu, lɛ gi eple nì okpo ye ní osetsase lo su i, axla yɛ akpɛ ní aklala yɛ mɛ lɛ akɔ yɛ akpɛ ní ɔdrɔ ɔtɔ gi aki si bebu ní likla nɛ mɛ̀ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ kede e, aki si bemli likla ʋidi itɔ etsi ɔdrɔ lɔ onu.
Maria Magdalene ni Maria Yose yene bɛmɔ ní niklɔ gi bɛplɛ Yesu yɛ okpo ye e.
Agi Lizemɔniwe le liza ɛ, Maria Magdalene, Maria Yakobo yene, ani Salomɛ bedzi bawa flafla ʋa tɔ bɛzɛɛsra ɛki Yesu yɛ okpo ye.
Lipadzruwe le livlɛ lɛ fififĩ gi liwo le liitu i, bɛtrɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ su.
Beʋi bahanuglɔ ba ní kudeo me si, “Nyaŋwɛ atrámli likla nɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ onu iiki blɔ abla ɛ?” (Li ze likla ʋidi). Pɔ̀ gi bedi ikpɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si bemli likla nɛ ɛzanɔ kooko.
Lɛ loso beti eku ní ɔdrɔ lɔ mɛ ɛ; níklɔ bɛmɔ ɔyasɔʋi ɔtɔ gi ɛkpɛ liwu pititi itɔ ɔ xe odi ní kaŋaa mɛ ɛ. Liki si lifu liku ba.
Asi ba si, “Lifu likíku mlo.” “Mete si Yesu gi onu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, gi bɛkú ní osetsase lo su i, yɛ mlɛpɛ́ ɛ. Ɔ́ma niya a bɛyɔni yɛ! Mledi niya gi bɛplɛ yɛ ɛ.
Abla ɛ, mlatrɛ tɔ mlazɛɛsi yɛ badɔkpasi ba, ni Petro si: ‘Eku ɔtɔ aki mlɔ atrɛ ní Galilea; níklɔ mlamɔ yɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi asi mlɔ kinɛ ɛ.’ ”
Lɛ bese do ní ɔdrɔ lɔ mɛ gi bezesugu ni lifu i. Bédo liboeboe asi ɔnɔnɔ, lɛ ese linu si lifune liku ba.
Gi Yesu ayɔ ádɔ ní bekpo ʋa mɛ Lipadzruwe le livlɛ lɛ ɛ, ebu isu ya abasɛ Maria Magdalene ɔniliɛ klɔ mɛ gi akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tigloele le edono e akpɛ ɔtɔ.
Yɛ azɛɛsi yɛ bagaglɔnɛ ba. Bɛzɛɛwa awowoe la xe bezee bemi ye e;
lɛ gi benu u gi apani si i Yesu ɔlɛ ligbã gi yɛ amɔ yɛ ɛ, bázɛ yɛ aʋa aŋa a.
Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu ebu isu ya ní kizeze me dzedze me abasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa gi beze ní kudeo aʋa ɛ.
Bedziba edo liboe le ɛsi badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba, pɔ̀ bázɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a.

Gɔgɔɛ, Yesu ebu isu ya abasɛ yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba gi bɛzɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ. Aka aŋu mɛ aki ba lɛ ese linu si kuziŋa kúze ba awla a; lɛ bɛkɔ ina gagla si bátrazɛ banama gi bɛmɔ yɛ si ɔlɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, aʋa ɛɛŋa a.
Asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ ní kelea petee me tɔ mlapani Liboe Gbã nɛ aki ɔnɔ kakaa elu.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ aŋa a xe bɛkpɛ kuni ɛki yɛ ɛ, biazɛ yɛ ligbã́; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́zɛ ŋa ɛ, biabu ye lipɔ.
Banama gi bɛziŋa ɛ, biaki ba kigagla tɔ biabitɛ enugutseboe la: biakpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kudono ní mɛ linyi ne me; biagu kunugu yo ni binemi vuvu ʋɛ.
Xe bevu bagblaga lo bɛŋwɛ aɖi kakaa ɛ, batrámɔ kutse; biatrɔ awla ní banyanya ba aʋa, gi biahaya.”
Agi Yesu apani aki ba pɔ ɛ, befeke ye tsini lifunu ne lɛ eze ní Aya yɛ kaŋaa mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛpani liboe le ní ɔkɔ kakaa a; lɛ Ɔkaɛ eze nì ba gi atrɔ likla lɛ aʋa aki ba si ba kiboedoe kinu anukwarɛ gani enugutseboe ala gi bɛbitɛ mɛ ɛ.
Tiofili dimɛnɔɛ:
Banɔ glegle bekeni edi ŋwlimi eboa la gi ɛba la mɛ ní blɔ kusi i plɛ.
Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi banama gi beze la katsalia a, xe bɛmɔ la kibabaɛ mɛ ni ba bimbi ʋe e, dɔni la okpese klɔ, gi benu Aya yɛ banɔsumu u, xe bɛpani liboe le kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso Obùbùnɛ ɛ, gi mapami eboe la mɛ tsiitsiitsii i, dɔni la okpese kɔ ɛ, mamɔ si liziã si miŋwlimi la ní la kibabaɛ onu ki wɔ.
Liaki si wɔate anukwarɛ liɛ petee gi ɔlɛ bidɔ bɛklɔ gi bɛbasɛ wɔ mɛ ɛ.

Lipoe lɛ gi Herodes eze okusi xe azɛɛŋa Yudea kesea aʋa ɛ. Aya kusumu yo ɔka ɔtɔ eze gi bɛzɛxwa si Zakaria ɛ. Adɔ ní Abiya kusumu yo baka ba lihakpɔ lɛ mɛ. Yedze linyi lize Elisabet, lɛ yɛ kyɛ eze Aron yɛ osobi i.
Ba tiaʋa beze agbã́ gbã ní Aya aŋu mɛ, lɛ bɛbitɛ Ɔkaɛ isã nɛ petee aʋa lipɔ mobu u.
Pɔ̀ obi ɔtɔtɔ óze ní ba awla a, lɛ ese linu si Elisabet eze okonɔ, lɛ yɛ ni yenye Zakaria betsi i.
Liwetɔ lɛɛ, gi lina yɛ okú no aʋa a, xe Zakaria azɛɛwa esumuxwɛ na ní Yerusalem lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Ní kusumu yo egoʋi la onu i, lidɔ yɛ aʋa si, ɔzɛɛkpɛ lifi ye kifu ní lifi ye ɔsuʋɔ lɔ aʋa. Lɛ loso eti eku ní Aya yɛ lisumugba lɛ mɛ.
Lɛ banima petee bɛlɛɛ ní oŋwe no xe bɛzɛxwa Aya ɛ.
Lɛ Ɔkaɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ alɛ ní lifi ye ɔsuʋɔ lɔ kaŋawla mɛ.
Gi Zakaria amɔ yɛ ɛ, elulu lɛ lifu liku ye e.
Pɔ̀ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Zakaria, kíse lifu! Aya enu wɔ yɛ kuxwaxwa, lɛ wodze Elisabet aapɔ obinyime ɔki wɔ. Wɔaki yɛ linyi si Yohanes.
Liaze isami glegle kiwɔ, lɛ yɛ kupɔpɔɔ kwiakpɛ banɔ glegle kyɛ isami i.
Lɛ ese linu si, aaze ɔnɔ ʋidi ní Ɔkaɛ yɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ. Líma si ɔŋwɛ wain loo kuda gagla a. Dɔni yɛ kupɔpɔɔ mɛ ɛ, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ aayi ye.
Lɛ aadzi ni Israelbanɛ glegle manɔ ní Ɔkaɛ gi onu ba Aya yɛ klɔ ɔ.

Yɛ aaku ɔtɔ ki Ɔkaɛ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ ni kigagla mɛ ŋwisi oboedoplɛɛ Eliya kinɛ. Lɛ aakpɛ baka ni bebi likpɔ, lɛ aakyi banama gi bénu batu ba kyɛ, aadzi ni ba manɔ ní Aya yɛ kude gyɔgyɔɔ aʋa a. Tɔ aabla banɔ plɛ ki Ɔkaɛ.”
Lɛ Zakaria eʋi ɔxwɛdzɛɛ si, “Kitɛ maate si, liboe lɛ gi wɔɛpani i, lilɛ lɛ mɛ ɛ? Lɛ ese linu si mɛ metsi i; lɛ modze kyɛ etsi i!”
Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Mɛ menu Gabriɛl. Mizɛɛlɛɛ ní Aya gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ si migasi wɔ liboe gbã ɛlɛ ya ɛ, yɛ aŋu mɛ.
Liboe lɛ gi mamanɔ ɛ, wɔ́zɛ lɛ aʋa ŋa a. Pɔ̀ litraba lɛ mɛ ní lipoe trɔtrɔ lɛ aʋa. Agi wɔ́zɛ lɛ aʋa ŋa onu i, wɔadzi omúmu zɛkɔna ni liwe lɛ gi mɛ kakaplɛa kiaba ka mɛ ki wɔ ɛ!”
Ni lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima bezeepe Zakaria lɛ béte kidiliɛ gi kɛ loso awɔ lisumugba lɛ mɛ te e.
Gi edo aba ɛ, ɔ́tani kupani i, lɛ loso banima bɛmɔ egyesi si Aya ebu kiditɔ abasi yɛ ní lisumugba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Gi ɔ́tani kupani onu i, awla ko abasi banima.
Agi yɛ kusumu yo axwɛwawa la eblo e, Zakaria edzi atrɛ ní yɛ kepea.
Lɛ kede e, yedze Elisabet akɔ limɛ. Lɛ ekpo isu ya badzidzi tietsu nyɔŋ ɔ.
Lɛ apani si, “Gɔgɔɛ, Ɔkaɛ apɔni mɛ gi ebu mɛ kuyeo azanɔ ní banima aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
Ní Elisabet yɛ limɛ nɛ kukɔkɔ lɛ ɔdzidzi glonɛɛ mɛ ɛ, Aya akpɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ Gabriɛl ní Nazaret ɔma nɔ mɛ ní Galilea kesea mɛ.
Atsini odu lo ní ɔdisami ɔtɔ gi óte onyime e, gi bɛkpɛ kuwlawla ɛki onyime ɔtɔ ɔ, gi bɛzɛxwa si Yosef i. Yosef, onu okusi ye Dawid yɛ osobi. Lɛ ɔdisami nɔ linyi linu Maria a.
Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ atrɛ ní yɛ klɔ lɛ apani yɛ si, “Kusuyɔ ki wɔ. Ɔkaɛ ɔlɛ ni wɔ, lɛ akrira wɔ kpaŋu u.”
Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ yɛ eboe la ɛki si Maria apisa lɛ eʋi isu ya si kunɔpanɔ liɔ ya kɔ ese si kitɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Maria, wukíse lifu u. Aya apɛ lipo me aki wɔ.
Wɔakɔ limɛ, gi wɔapɔ obinyime e, lɛ wɔaki yɛ linyi si Yesu u.
Aaze ɔnɔ ʋidi gi biaxwa yɛ si Aya kigaglaɛ petee Ɔkaɛ Yebi. Ɔkaɛ Aya aaki si yɛ aaze ní Yɛkatsitsie Dawid yɛ likusigbo le aʋa.
Lɛ aaŋa Yakob yɛ kepea aʋa kɔtsinɔ kanɔmɛ, lɛ yɛ kaʋaŋaa katrádu liwewe e!
Lɛ Maria eʋi ɔxwɛdzɛɛ si, “Ɔdisami gi óte onyime menu u. Lɛ eboa la gi wɔpani i, kitɛ aatani la mɛ kuba a?”
Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ aaba wɔ aʋa, gi Aya kigaglaɛ kiawe wo o. Lɛ loso obi dradra liɛ gi wɔtrapɔ̀ ɛ, biaxwa yɛ si Aya Yebi ye.
Plɛ aŋu ní wɔ ɔŋanɛɛ Elisabet aʋa. Besi si ɔ́tratani obi kupɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ ní yɛ kutsitsi uliɔ mɛ ɛ, lipo lilɛ ní yɛ su badzidzi tieglo ba ya.
Libasɛ si kididɔ kíma gi Aya ɔ́tratani kubitɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Maria apani si, “Ɔkaɛ yɛ osumubi menu. Lɛ loso e, kiliɛ gi wɔpani lɛ ɛ, tɔ liba lɛ mɛ ɛki mɛ nite e.” Lɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asɛ ní yɛ su i.
Ni lipoe kpekpemi itɔ kede e, Maria abla lɛ akɔsi atrɛ ní Yudea eto la ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ.
Atrɛ ní Zakaria kepea mɛ lɛ azɛɛpani Elisabet i.
Agi Maria kunɔpanɔɔ kwiza eku Elisabet kutu yɔ mɛ ko, lɛ obi ye ahwa ní yɛ lipo le me. Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eyi Elisabet
lɛ emuni yɛ ole lo si, “Wɔ́ Aya asa krira ní badzɛ ba petee kusi; lɛ obi liɛ gi wɔtrapɔ ɛ, biakrira yɛ!
Ege lɛ loso meku Aya liŋu te si mɛ Ɔkaɛ yene aaba si yipani mɛ ɛ?
Lɛ ese linu si kiliɛ gi wɔ kunɔpaniɔ kwiza eku mɛ kutu yɔ mɛ ko e, obi ye ní mɛ lipo le me, ahwa ni isami.
Lisamiboe linu si wɔzi lɛ aʋa ŋa si Ɔkaɛ eboe la gi asi wɔ ɛ, aaba la mɛ!”
Lɛ Maria apani si,
“Mɛ ɔna nɔ ɛɛkpɔ Ɔkaɛ;
Lɛ isami iku mɛ esobo la ní Aya,
yɛ onu mɛ ɔnɔbu ye;
Lɛ ese linu si aplɛ aŋu ni mɛ yɛ osumubi
gi oyi kididɔ aʋa a.
Dɔni abla ɛ, banima petee biaxwa mɛ si ɔsamì nɛ
Kɔkpɛ eboe ʋidi ala klɔ gi kigaglaɛ petee onetee abitɛ aki mɛ ɛ.
Yɛ linyi ne linu Kudradra!
Banama petee gi bizenu kutu iiki yɛ ɛ
izedi ba asigaga dɔni kipɔpɔ mɛ tsinɔ kipɔpɔ mɛ.
Abitɛ eboe kigagla nì yɛ ɔwla lɔ,
lɛ ehle basufeke ba ni ba batrɔtrɔ ʋa petee e,
Lɛ bekusi ʋidi ba ɛ, ebu ba asa dɔni ba ekusigbo la aʋa, lɛ banama gi bepleni isu ya ɛ, emuni ba.
Banama gi kuʋɔɔ kwiku i,
aki beke ni bidɔ gbã mɛ,
lɛ akpɛ bexonete ba pɔ̀ kude
ni iwla pluplu i.
Eboa la gi atrɔ aplɛ aki blɔ bakatsi ba ɛ
abitɛ la aʋa
lɛ apɔni Israel, yɛ besumubi ba.
Edi Abraham
ni yɛ besoebi ba petee, asigaga kɔtsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ.”
Maria eze ní Elisabet su ŋwisi badzidzi tiata xe edzi atrɛ kepea a.
Gi lipoe le lina ɛki Elisabet si ople kese e, apɔ obinyime.
Lɛ gi yɛ axolika ba ni yɛ benete ba benu yɛ kubipɔ ɛ, bɛmɔ isami pɔni yɛ ní kiliɛ gi Aya apɛ lipo me aki Elisabet loso.
Ni liwe ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ aʋa ɛ, bɛba si bɛtsa ɔyaʋi tɔ bɛki obi ye linyi. Bɛpɛ si bɛkɔ yɛka linyi ne Zakaria ɛki yɛ.
Pɔ̀ yene ɔ́dimɛ lɛ aʋa a; lɛ asi ba si “yɛ linyi ne linu si Yohanes”.
Pɔ̀ bɛsi yɛ si “wɔ ɔŋanɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔkɔ linyii lɛ klɔ.”
Lɛ, bɛbasɛ Zakaria awla a, xe beʋi ye linyi nɛ klɔ ɔ, gi apɛ si biaxwa obi ye e.
Zakaria eʋi si baki yɛ lidɔŋwlimikla lɛ aŋwlimi si, “Yɛ linyi si Yohanes.” Litu ɔnɔ kakaa kugyɔ.
Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, Zakaria yɛ onugu lo ɛdra gi ekpese kunugu yo kugu u, lɛ ekpese Aya kukpɔ̀ ɛ.
Liki si lifu liku axolika ba petee, lɛ liboe le lihle eku ní Yudea eto la ima nɛ petee me.
Nite si ɔnɔ kakaa gi enu liboe le e, egyo le edi. Lɛ beʋi si, “Obi liɛ, ege atrádzi i?” Lɛ mɛ lidra si, Aya yɛ ɔwla ɔlɛ ní yɛ aʋa.
Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eyí Zakaria gi onu Yohanes yɛka ɛ, niteme si apani aplɛ si,
“Mlaki tɔ kukpɔ̀ Ɔkaɛ, gi onu Israel Aya ɛ! Aba apɔni yɛ banima,
lɛ ebu ba ní bibɔ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ.
Aki blɔ Ɔnɔbu gagla dɔni Dawid gi eze yɛ osumubi yɛ lipo le me e.
Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi edo aplɛ gani yɛ beboedoplɛ dradra ba aʋa lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ lɛ ya kinɛ ɛ
si yɛ aabu blo dɔni blɔ ahwafianɛ ma ba iwla mɛ,
ni dɔni banama petee gi bevu blo ekpɛ lipo me ba kigaglaɛ ese e.
Asi yɛ adi blɔ bakatsi ba asigaga,
lɛ yɛ aplɛ aŋu ní yɛ kunyanya dradra ni ba aʋa a.
Kunyanya dradraa liɔ klɔ kunu kitamu gi aka aki blɔ ɔkatsitsi ye Abraham
si yɛ aabu blo ní blɔ ahwafianɛ ma ba iwla mɛ tɔ kwiamɔ kudeonu gi kwiasumu ye lifumose e,
niteme si blɔ isu ya nì blɔ ina nɛ mɛ iadra lɛ iagyɔ ní yɛ aŋu mɛ blɔ ewe la petee e.
“Lɛ loso mobi ye,
biaxwa wɔ si kigaglaɛ petee onetee yɛ oboedoplɛ.
Wɔatu ɔtɔ ki Ɔkaɛ tɔ wɔalulɔ kudeo plɛ ki yɛ,
lɛ wɔ́ wɔtrabasɛ Aya yɛ banima si,
Aya aabu ba kɔ akɔ ba eboe zimizi na akyɛ ba ɛ.
Blɔ Aya onu ɔnɔ gi izeedi asigaga a lɛ yɛ ɔna ɛyɔ ɔ.
Lɛ aaki ligbã nɛ liwo le liatu ki blɔ dɔni lifunu ne,
gi líakle bali banama gi bákpasi litumu ni
kutseo lifu kusese le me aʋa;
gi kuklekleo liɔ klɔ kwiagbani blɔ kukpɛ ní kusuyɔ lideke le me e.”
Lɛ obi ye etsi gi eze gagla ní kisugya ni Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ. Yɛ ozeklɔ eze ɔyayakɔ kɔkpɛ ni liwe lɛ gi ebu isu ya abasɛ Israelbanɛ ma ɛ.
Liba lɛ mɛ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ si Roma Ɔʋaŋaɛ Kaisaro Augusto akpɛ ɔsã si bakla banama petee gi beze ní Roma Kaʋaŋaa ese e, tɔ baŋwlimi aplɛ ɛ.
Lɛ ya lize banɔ kuklakla tɔpu ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi Kirenio eze Roma banɛ ma ɔʋaŋaɛ ní Siria a.
Lɛ loso e, ɔnɔ kakaa atrɛ ní yɛ kepea si tɔ bakla yɛ.

Liki si Yosef asɛ Nazaret ɔma nɔ mɛ ní Galilea kesea mɛ atrɛ ní Betlehem ɔma nɔ mɛ gi ɔlɛ Yudea kesea mɛ ɛ. Niklɔ onu Okusi ye Dawid yɛ ɔpɔklɔ. Lɛ ese linu si Yosef ádɔ Okusi ye Dawid yɛ okú no me.
Yɛ ni Maria gi onu ɔdzɛɛ ɛ gi bɛkpɛ kuwlawla ɛki yɛ ɛ, ba bɛtrɛ ní enyi na ɔŋwlimi klɔ. Pɔ̀ lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖi i, lipo lize ní Maria su.
Lɛ gi beze ní Betlehem i, yɛ lipoe le lina si ople kese.
Nite si apɔ Yebi tɔpu yɛ gi eze obinyime e. Lɛ axla basa ní yɛ su, xe akɔ yɛ aplɛ ní baga ʋa kadɔŋazi ya mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si bámɔ ozekɔ ní bababa ba ɔya klɔ ɔ.
Beʋesigbanɔ ba bezeepe ba iʋesi le ní ɔyayakɔ ní kusio klɔ elesi la.
Ɔkaɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ ebu isu ya abasi ba, lɛ Aya yɛ kudradraa kwikle ebali ní ba aʋa a gi lifu liku ba a.
Pɔ̀ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi ba si i, “Mlekíse lifu! Mamani mlɔ liboe gbã, lɛ liboe lɛ klɔ linu lisamiboe ki banima petee e.
Lɛ ese linu si omono liwe le e, bɛpɔ Ɔnɔbu ye ki mlɔ ní Dawid ɔma nɔ mɛ. Yɛ onu Kristo Ɔkaɛ.
Nite si kidiliɛ gi mlakɔ mɔ yɛ gyesi i, kɛ kinu si, mlaamɔ obi ɔtɔ gi bɛxla basa ní yɛ su u, xe bɛkɔ yɛ ɛplɛ ní baga ʋa kadɔŋazia me e.”
Lɛ lisɛ́ɛ nɛ ɛ, lifunu ne baxwɛdzɛ ba likpiʋiidi itɔ liple eku iklani ɔxwɛdzɛ tɔpu yɛ; bɛzɛkpɛ idzi nɛ lɛ bɛzɛkpɔ̀ Aya si:
“Kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ kunu Aya yɛ kunɛ ní lifunu ne hwii!
tɔ kusuyɔ kuba Kesea aʋa
ki banama gi beku yɛ liŋu i.”
Gi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bedziimu lifunu ne ní ba su i, beʋesigbanɔ ba bɛpani ɛsi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kutrɛ ní Betlehem tɔ kuzeedi liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ, gi lɛ Ɔkaɛ ebu abasɛ blɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ loso bɛkɔsi itrɛ lɛ bɛzɛmɔ Maria ni Yosef ani obi ye gi ɔfini ní baga ʋa kadɔŋazia mɛ ɛ.
Gi beʋesigbanɔ ba bɛmɔ obi ye e, behle liboe lɛ gi Aya ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi ba ní ɔnuvɔɛ su i.
Liki si banama petee gi benu liboe le e, ba inugu itse ní beʋesigbanɔ ba eboe la su.
Pɔ̀ Maria aplɛ aŋu ní eboe la petee aʋa, lɛ egyo la edi fɔ̃ɔ ni yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ beʋesigbanɔ ba bɛsɛ ɛ. Bɛzɛkpɛ idzi nɛ zɛɛkpɔ Aya lɛ ese linu si eboa la gi bɛmɔ ɔ xe benu i, eze kiliɛ gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi ba ɛ.
Liwe ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ gi lipoe le lina si batsà ɔyaʋi aki obi ye e, bɛki yɛ linyi si Yesu. Linyi lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ edo aplɛ akpɛ ɔtɔ si bakɔ aki yɛ ɛ, xe ableke bɛkɔ yɛ limɛ nɛ ɛ.
Gi lipoe le lina si Yosef ni Maria bazeplo isu ya ní Mose Ɔsã nɔ onu i. Bɛtsini ɔnuvɔɛ ní Yerusalem, tɔ bɛkɔ yɛ basɛ Ɔkaɛ.
Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Ɔkaɛ Ɔsã nɔ mɛ si, “Obinyime tɔpu kakaa ɛ, biakɔ yɛ ɔki Ɔkaɛ.”
Bɛdzɛ fɛ si tɔ biaki Aya bisumudɔ, gi binu abronuma tiaʋa loo akpakpo nuvɔ taʋa, ní Ɔkaɛ Ɔsã nɔ onu u.

Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si Simeon i, eze ní Yerusalem. Eze ɔnɔ gbã lɛ azɛɛbitɛ ní Aya yɛ isã nɛ aʋa a. Azeepe lipoe lɛ gi Aya aabu Israel i. Lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eze ní yɛ aʋa a.
Lɛ lɔ̀ ɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki yɛ si ɔ́tratse e, kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ gi aamɔ Ɔkaɛ yɛ Kristo ye e, gi aka aplɛ ɛ.
Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ́ ɛgbani Simeon tsini Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi bapɔnɛ ba fɛ bɛkɔ obi ye Yesu i manɔ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ní ligoʋi le oxo klɔ ní Ɔsã nɔ onu.
Simeon azɛ obi ye evu lɛ edo Aya ɖase e si:
“Abla ɛ, Ɔkaɛ Aya, liboe lɛ gi wɔka aplɛ ɛ,
wɔbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa.
Lɛ loso e, ki tɔ wɔ osumubi ye,
ɔsɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si mɛ ɔtutɔ mamɔ wɔ kubúbú yo ni mɛ bimbi ʋe.
Gi lɛ wɔbla aplɛ ní banima petee aŋu mɛ ɛ.
Kuklekle gi kiabu wɔ kupɛ́pɛ ɔ
ɔbasɛ banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kwiamani kuklekleo ki wɔ banima Israel.”
Obika yɛ ni obinee ba inugu itse ní eboa la gi Simeon apani ní ɔnuvɔɛ su i.

Lɛ gi Simeon akrira ba ɛ, asi Maria, Yesu yene si, “Obi liɛ, Aya ɔtutɔ akya yɛ si gani yɛ aʋa ɛ, banɔ glegle ní Israel biagleʋe. Pɔ̀ gani yɛ ke aʋa ɛ, banɔ glegle biamɔ kubúbú ní Israel. Yɛ aaze lixaŋu kikpɛdɔ dɔni Aya klɔ, gi kɛsu banɔ glegle biayɔ kedu u.
Lɛ banima begyodi kpòkpò ʋa biaŋwi. Pɔ̀ wɔ tutɔ ɛ, kuyeʋiyeʋi kwiaze ŋwisi ihɛ piɔpiɔ, gi aatiku wɔ ɔna nɔ mɛ kinɛ ɛ.”
Lipoɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ oboedoplɛ tsitsi ɔtɔ eze ní Yerusalem. Yɛ linyi si Hana eze Fanuɛl gi ádɔ ní Asa yɛ okú no me e, Yebi. Agɔ tegloele ko eze ní kenyime pe xe yenye etse e.
Eze ahosi gi azɛ agɔ avi ɔgɔtaʋa ni tene e. Kesumupea mɛ ko azeeze lɛ eze ní onugu nyanya ni aklamasi aʋa elesi ni kemize gi azeesumu Aya ɛ.
Yɛ fɛ eze ní kesumupea mɛ ní ɔnyɔsasa lɔ klɔ aʋa. Lɛ gi eti apɔni ba ɛ, edo Aya ɖase. Lɛ banama petee gi bɛzeepe Aya si aazi ki Yerusalem i, Hana apani liboe ní obi ye su asi ba.
Gi Yosef ni Maria bexo egoʋi la pɔ́ ni Ɔkaɛ Ɔsã nɔ onu i; bedzitrɛ ní Nazaret, ba kepea ní Galilea kesea mɛ.
Ɔnuvɔɛ etsi gi kigagla kize ní yɛ su u. Kuboeteo fɛ kwize ní yɛ awla, lɛ Aya yɛ lipomepɛpɛ nɛ lize ní yɛ aʋa a.
Ligɔ kakaa Yesu yɛ bapɔnɛ ba bɛzɛɛdzɛ Yerusalem Kutselidɔzawe le ɔŋakɔ.
Gi Yesu azɛ agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa ɛ, bɛtrɛ ní liwe le ɔŋakɔ dzɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛzɛbitɛ lɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ gi bɛŋa liwe le pɔ́ ɛ, yɛ bapɔnɛ ba beku kudeo me dzitrɛ ní Kepea. Pɔ̀ obi ye Yesu xunyɔ awɔ Yerusalem ní yɛ bapɔnɛ ba kumotemote me.
Begyodi si ba obi ye eze ní ɔnɔha lɔ kusi xe bɛzɛɛtrɛ ɛ. Bɛga kudeo liwe zizi, xe ableke bekpese ba obi ye kupɛ́ ní ba benete ba ni ba baʋianɛ ba kusi i.
Agi bámɔ yɛ ɛ, bedzitrɛ ní Yerusalem gi bɛɛzɛpɛ yɛ ɛ.
Liwe tanɛ we le e, bɛtsani yɛ ní Lisumugba lɛ mɛ. Eple eze ní Yudanɛ ma badɔbasɛ ba kusi gi azɛɛta ba kutu u, xe azeeʋi ba beʋiʋi ʋa ɛ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi enu yɛ eboe la ɛ, yɛ onugu etse ní yɛ kuboesenu yo nì eboe la onu kubúbú mɔmɔmɔ su.
Lipoe lɛ gi yɛ bapɔnɛ ba bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, litu ba kugyɔ. Lɛ yene eʋi ye si, “Mobi ye, ege lɛ loso wɔbitɛ nite ɔmanɔ ní blɔ su u? Mɛ ni wɔka kwikyigyi gi kwipɛ wɔ ɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛpɛ́ mɛ ɛ? Kɔ kite mléte si, lilɛ si mize ní mɔka kepea mɛ na a?”
Pɔ̀ bénu liboe lɛ gi apani ese e.
Lɛ Yesu edzi atrɛ ní Nazaret nì ba ɛ. Lɛ Yesu enu kutu aki ba a. Pɔ̀ yene evu eboa la petee akpɛ yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu, etsi ní kisugya ni kuboeteo me, gi yɛ liboe liku Aya ni banima aŋu u.

Ni ligɔ liɔfɔ ni otsu ye me gi Tiberio edzì Roma ɔʋaŋaɛ ɛ, xe Pɔntio Pilato kyɛ eze ɔʋaŋa ní Yudea kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ mɛ ke Herodes azɛɛŋa Galilea kesea aʋa a; xe Herodes yenemi ye Filipo kyɛ eze ɔʋaŋa ní Iturea nì Trakonite kuseo aʋa a. Lisania kyɛ eze ɔʋaŋa ní Abilene kesea aʋa,
lɛ Anas ni Kayafa ba kyɛ beze kusumu yo baka ba ɛ. Lipoɛ klɔ mɛ Aya yɛ ole lo ɛba ɛki Yohanes, Zakaria ye bi ye ní ɔyaya klɔ.

Ɛki si Yohanes aklanɔ kuseo liɔ klɔ gi kuli ní Yordan onipe lo su i me. Gi azɛɛpani Aya yɛ liboe le si, mlekyi adɔ ní mlɔ eboe zimizi na mɛ tɔ mlaki tɔ bakpɛ kuni yo aki mlɔ, atɔ Aya ɔkɔ mlɔ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ mlɔ.
Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ni Yesaya oboedoplɛ yɛ keplekpaa mɛ kinɛ si,
“Ɔnutɔ ɛɛkla ní ɔyaya klɔ si,
‘Mlalulɔ kudeo aplɛ akí Ɔkaɛ,
Mlebu kude gyɔgyɔ aplɛ aki yɛ tɔ aaga!
Mlayaʋi eto la tɔ mlakɔ etsi bàpɛ ʋa,
tɔ mlepleni eto la ni ketokpa kakaa tɔ bidzi kadadase.
Bede klɔʋiklɔʋi ʋa petee bàgyɔ̀ tɔ bede aʋa gi bázrɔ ɛ,
ba petee aʋa tɔ bazrɔ.
Tɔ ɔnɔ gbagbe yɛ kupɔpɔɔ pɔ́ kwiamɔ Aya yɛ kubúbú yo.’ ”
Yohanes eʋi anɔkpi ala gi edo etrɛ si ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba a si, “Mlɔ bagblaga kipɔpɔ mɛ bebi ba a, nyaŋwɛ asi mlɔ si mlaatani kuse ní Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio gi kwitraba su u
Mlabitɛ eboa la gi aabasɛ si mlekyi ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ, tɔ mlamɔni isu ya kusɛ si Abraham yɛ lipo me bebi kunu. Mɛɛka lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si Aya aatani besoebi kubu dɔni akla la ya mɛ ki Abraham!
Dike! Aya yɛ kawɛa katini ní ose lo igu ne aʋa kooko gi kɛtratsa ose lo eʋe e. Lɛ ose kakaa lɔ gi óyo ebi gbã ɛ, biatsa lɔ kɔŋwia kpɛ kifu yɛ mɛ.”
Linɔkpi le liʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ ege kwiabitɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔniliɛ gi ewu taʋa alɛ ní yɛ awla ɛ, ɔkɔ tile ɔki ɔniliɛ awla gi litɔtɔ lima ɛ, lɛ ɔniliɛ awla gi kiŋaŋa kilɛ ɛ, ɔlɛ kɛ ɔki banima.”
Babɔgyɔ batɔ kyɛ bɛba si ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ”, “ege lilɛ si kubitɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlakígyɔ kibɔ ní ɔnɔnɔ awla sani kiliɛ gi ɔsã nɔ eʋi i.”
Bagutaatɔ kyɛ beʋi ye si, “Blɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, ege lilɛ si kubitɛ ɛ?” Lɛ asi ba si, “Mlakíkɔ gigagla ɛzi kibɔ ní ɔnɔnɔ awla a; lɛ mlakísɛ asia ɛkpɛ ɔnɔnɔ awla a. Mlɔ liʋɛ nɛ liku mlɔ aŋu.”
Banima bezee di kudeonu lɛ ba petee bezegyo edi si putɔ Yohanes yɛ onu Kristo ye na a?

Pɔ̀ Yohanes asi ba petee si, “Mɛ kɔ ɛ mɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki mlɔ; pɔ̀ ɔnutɔ atrába ní mɛ kede gi ekeme asani mɛ ɛ. Lɛ mégyeno gi maable yɛ afɔkpa ʋa igbé ne e. Yɛ aakpɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ nì kifu ki mlɔ.
Evu yɛ kitɛɛ gi atrákɔ ɛpi amu na ní yɛ ketsripɛa mɛ kɔ ahali agbã̀ na akpɛ ní owle lo me. Pɔ̀ itsɔ lɛ xunyɔ ɛ, aakani lɛ nì kifu moni ye.”
Yohanes, aga bede glegle aʋa gi akɔ apani Liboe Gbã nɛ asi banima a, lɛ eme le akpɛ ba batu ʋa mɛ si bekyi ba agbã́zeze na.
Pɔ̀ Yohanes aka aŋu mɛ aki Herodes gi eze kesea ɔʋadi ye e, ní kiliɛ gi azɛ yenemi ye yedze Herodia agbanɔ ni eboe dovo dzedze ala la petee gi abitɛ ní lɛ ya kede e.
Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, Herodes abitɛ liboe zimizi litɔ sanɔ gi lɛ lize si evu Yohanes akpɛ ligba a.
Agi akpɛ kuni aki banima petee pɔ ɛ, akpɛ kuni aki Yesu fɛ. Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya, ɛ, lifunu ne lidra
lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ eple edɔ yɛ aʋa ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔni lifunu ne si, “Wɔ wonu mɛ obinyimee gi madimɛnɔ ɔ. Wɔ liboe liku mɛ liŋu.”
