Yesu azɛ ŋwisi agɔ avi tata kinɛ xe ekpese yɛ axwɛ na a. Ní banima begyodi ʋa onu i, eze Yosef yɛ obinyime.
Lɛ Yosef fɛ eze Eli yɛ obinyime e.
Lɛ Eli fɛ eze
Matati yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Lewi yɛ obinyime e.
Lɛ Lewi fɛ eze Melki yɛ obinyime e.
Mɛlki eze Yona yɛ obinyime gi yɛ fɛ eze
Yosef yɛ obinyime e;
Yosef fɛ eze Matatia yɛ obinyime,
lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Amos yɛ obinyime e.
Amos eze Nahum yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Nahum fɛ eze Ɛsli yɛ obinyime e,
gi Ɛsli fɛ eze Nagai yɛ obinyime e.
Niteme si Nagai fɛ eze Maati yɛ obinyime;
lɛ Maati fɛ eze Matatia yɛ obinyime e lɛ Matatia fɛ eze Semei yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Semei fɛ eze Yosek yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Yoda yɛ obinyime e.
Yoda fɛ eze Yohanan yɛ obinyime, lɛ Yohanan fɛ eze Reza yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Reza eze Zerubabel yɛ obinyime e. Lɛ Zerubabel eze Seyaltiɛl yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Neri yɛ obinyime e.
Neri fɛ eze Mɛlkai (Melki)
yɛ obinyime, gi yɛ fɛ eze Adi yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Adi fɛ eze Ɛlmadam yɛ obinyime e.
Ɛlmadam fɛ eze Ɛr yɛ obinyime.
Niteme si Ɛr fɛ eze Yosua yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Yosua fɛ eze Eliezɛ yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Eliezɛ fɛ eze Yorim yɛ obinyime e.
Lɛ Yorim fɛ eze Matati yɛ obinyime e,
gi yɛ fɛ eze Lewi yɛ obinyime e.
Lewi fɛ eze Simeon yɛ obinyime;
lɛ Simeon fɛ eze Yoda yɛ obinyime e,
gi yɛ fɛ eze Yosef yɛ obinyime e.
Yosef fɛ eze Yonam yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Yonam fɛ ɛ eze Eliakim yɛ obinyime e.
Eliakim eze Melea yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Melea eze Mena yɛ obinyime e;
lɛ Mena fɛ eze Matata yɛ obinyime e.
Lɛ Matata ɛ, eze Natan yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Natan eze Dawid yɛ obinyime.
Dawid eze Yese yɛ obinyime e,
gi yɛ fɛ eze Obed yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Obed fɛ eze Boaz yɛ obinyime e.
Lɛ Boaz fɛ eze Salmon yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Salmon fɛ eze Nahson yɛ obinyime e.
Nahson eze Aminadab yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Aminadab eze Ram yɛ obinyime e.
Ram eze Arni yɛ obinyime.
Lɛ Arni fɛ eze Hesron yɛ obinyime e;
Hesron fɛ eze Perez yɛ obinyime,
gi Perez fɛ ɛ, eze Yoda yɛ obinyime e.
Nite si Yoda eze Yakob yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Yakob fɛ eze Isak yɛ obinyime e,
gi yɛ fɛ ɛ eze Abraham yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ yɛ fɛ eze Tera yɛ obinyime e.
Tera fɛ ɛ, eze Nahor yɛ obinyime.
Nahor fɛ eze Seruk yɛ obinyime.
Seruk fɛ eze Regu yɛ obinyime;
lɛ Regu fɛ eze Pɛlɛk yɛ obinyime e.
Pɛlɛk fɛ eze Ebɛ yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Ebɛ fɛ eze Sala yɛ obinyime e;
gi Sala fɛ ɛ, eze Kainan yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Kainan eze Afasad yɛ obinyime e,
gi yɛ fɛ eze Sem yɛ obinyime e;
lɛ Sem eze Noa yɛ obinyime e.
Noa eze Lamɛk yɛ obinyime.
Lɛ yɛ Lamɛk fɛ eze Metusela yɛ obinyime e.
Lɛ Metusela eze Enɔk yɛ obinyime e;
Enɔk fɛ eze Yarɛd yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Yarɛd fɛ eze Mahalaleel yɛ obinyime e;
Mahalaleel fɛ eze Kenan yɛ obinyime,
lɛ Kenan fɛ ɛ, eze Enos yɛ obinyime e,
gi Enos eze Set yɛ obinyime e,
lɛ Set fɛ eze Adam yɛ obinyime e;
niteme si Adam kɔ eze Aya Yebi i.
Gi Yesu ádɔ ní Yordan onipe lo su i, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ kigagla ɛ kize ní yɛ aʋa, Lɛ ɛgbani yɛ ɛtsinɔ Ɔyaya klɔ ɛ,
níklɔ Ozimizi ye efeke ye edi ewe avi tene nyɔŋ. Lipoe lɛklɔ petee ɔŋa kididɔ ɔ, lɛ loso gi ewe la ɛza ɛ, kuʋɛ kwiku ye.
Lɛ Ozimizi ye asi yɛ si i, “Xe Aya Yebi wonu i, ki tɔ likla lɛ ya lidzì lìklã.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya liboe le lipani si, ‘Aní kiŋaŋa su ko ɔnɔ gbagbe aaze ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.’ ”
Lɛ Ozimizi ye atsini yɛ ní ɔkɔ gyɔgyɔ ɔtɔ, lɛ ebu kelea mɛ baʋaŋa ʋa petee abasi Yesu ni lipoe kpekpemi itɔ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ asi yɛ si, “maakɔ kigaglaɛ ni exo a la petee ki wɔ, bɛkɔ bɛ petee kpɛ awla ɛki mɛ, lɛ makɔ bɛ ki ɔniliɛ gi mapɛ ɛ.
Xegi wɔasumu me e, bɛ petee biadzi wɔ binɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya liboe le lipani si, ‘Aya gi onu Wɔka ɛ, Yɛ tete ko wɔasumu lɛ Yɛ lixwɛ ko wɔawa a.’ ”
Lɛ Ozimizi ye agbani Yesu atsinɔ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ ɔgyɔgyɔ klɔ. Lɛ asi yɛ si, “Xegi Aya Yebi wonu i, lɛ kɔ yɔ lixu le dɔni ya tɔ zɛdɔ kesea.
Lɛ ese linu si Aya liboe le lipani si,
“ ‘Aya aakpɛ ɔsã aki yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba
gi biadi wɔ aʋa mumɔ ɔ.’
Lipani fɛ si, ‘Biafeke wo ni ba awla la gi
wɔtratù kikliʋi i.’ ”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu lɛ onu dzɛ si, “Aya liboe le ke lipani dzɛ si, ‘Wukífeke wɔ Ɔkaɛ gi yɛ onu wɔ Aya edi i!’ ”
Agi Ozimizi ye efeke Yesu edi gani kude kakaa onu xe ɔ́mɔ yɛ kude e, ayurɔ yɛ fukɔ.
Lɛ Yesu edzì atrɛ ní Galilea, lɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ kigaglaɛ kize ní yɛ aʋa a. Banima benu yɛ onu ní kusio klɔ petee.
Abasɛ bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ, gi banima petee bɛkpɔ̀ yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní Nazaret niklɔ gi bɛgani yɛ ɛ. Lɛ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa ɛ, atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi izɛbitɛ kinɛ ɛ. Ayɔ si yikla Aya yɛ Liboe le.
Lɛ bɛkɔ oboedoplɛ Yesaya yɛ keplekpa ɛki yɛ ɛ. Gi adra ka ɛ, keboekpea lia klɔ gi aklà ɛ kɛpani si:
“Ɔkaɛ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɔtini mɛ aʋa,
lɛ ese linu si akya mɛ
si mikɔ liboe gbã nɛ tsini bepiplinete ba.
Akpɛ mɛ si, mible banama gi balɛ ní kunyánya mɛ ɛ,
tɔ kuŋupoo fɛ kumɔ,
tɔ banama gi bemi kpɛ kese e, fɛ bamɔ obufuɛkɔ.
Atɔ miki kelea petee ketè si, lipoe le lina
gi Aya aabu yɛ banima ɛ.”
Yesu ada keplekpaa lɛ edzini ka aki ɔnɔpɔnɔ ɛ, xe eze kesea ɛ. Banama petee gi beze ní ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, bezeedi ye
lɛ asi ba si, “Liboe lɛ klɔ gi makla a xe mlenu i, liba lɛ mɛ omono.”
Yɛ liboe le liku ba petee aŋu, lɛ yɛ kinemi ye kɛ kubebeo, kwibitɛ ba yaa. Niteme si beʋi isu ya si, “Aní yɛ onu Yosef yebinyime lo o?”
Yesu asi ba si: Maka lɛ aʋa si mlɛtrabu abee liɛ ɛki mɛ si, “Ɔwabitɛɛ, bitɛ kuwa ki isu” mlɛtrapani si mɛ fɛ si, ‘eboa la klɔ gi mlenu si bɛbitɛ ní Kapernaum i, mibitɛ la ní mɛ kepea ní ya fɛ.’
Pɔ̀ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, “Oboedoplɛ tɔtɔ liboe liʋiku aŋu ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ kepea.”

Atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Mlata kutu: anukwarɛ linu si, lipoɛ lɛ klɔ gi dzeni ɔ́dɔ ɔ ní Israel kesea aʋa agɔ tata nì kapɛ ní Eliya lizepoe le e, xe kuʋɛ gagla atɔ kwidɔ ní kesea mɛ ɛ, badzɛ glegle gi ba benye ba betse e, beze ni Israel.
Pɔ̀ Aya ɔ́kpɛ Eliya ní ɔtɔtɔ kɔ ɔ, sani ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi yenye etse ní Zarefat ní Sidon kesea mɛ kɔ ɔ.
Lɛ kunya kyikyi yɔ kwize ní banɔ glegle su ní Israel ní Oboedoplɛɛ Elisa lizepoe le e. Pɔ̀ Aya ɔ́yɔni ɔtɔtɔ sani Naaman, Siria ɔnɛ ɛ.”
Banama petee gi beze ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ɔ, xe benu yɛ eboe la ɛ, isu iyeʋi ba.
Bɛyɔ lɛ behe Yesu idono ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛtsini ketokpaa aʋa ɛ. Ketokpaa lia klɔ aʋa bɛtsa ba ɔma nɔ. Nya bɛpɛ si betutru Yesu ikpɛ ní kupɛɔ mɛ xe e.
Pɔ̀ Yesu aga linɔkpi le kusi i, lɛ asɛ ní ba su i.
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní Kapernaum ɔma ɔtɔ ní Galilea kesea mɛ, lɛ abasɛ banima bidɔ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa ɛ.
Banima inugu itse ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su, lɛ ese linu si kigagla kize ní yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ.
Onyime ɔtɔ eze ní ɔtsaklɔ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi eze ní yɛ aʋa a. Akpɛ ozi tatata si,
“Ei! liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní blɔ su u? Wɔ Yesu, Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, Blɔ ɔkyurɔ kɔ́ wɔba na a? Mete ɔniliɛ gi yɛ wo nu i. Wɔ wo nu Aya yɛ Ɔxwɛdzɛ Dradra yɛ.”
Yesu akpɛ ozi ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no aʋa si, “Gɔ tsriɖi! Do za ní onyimee mɛ!” Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no ɛŋwia onyimee plɛ kesea ní banima aŋu mɛ pɔ̀ ɔ́kpɛ yɛ libi i, lɛ edo ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.
Banima petee inugu itse lɛ bekyi xe beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “E! Eboe woli lu la ya a? Amɔ kudeonu ni kigagla gi ɛɛkɔ ɛpani iiki ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne lɛ iido e.”
Niteme si Yesu yɛ linyi ne liyii klanɔ ní kusio klɔ petee.
Gi Yesu asɛ ní Ɔtsaklɔ ɛ, atrɛ ní Simon kepea mɛ. Kuwe gagla kutɔ kwivu Simon yɛ nadze; nite si bɛki Yesu kutete ní yɛ su.
Adzɛ alɛɛ ní yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ su lɛ akpɛ ɔsã aki kunyaa si kudo ní yɛ mɛ. Kuweo kwido ní yɛ mɛ nite si ayɔ kyɔŋ lɛ edi ba aʋa ɛ.
Gi liwo le liku i, banɔ baklɔ petee gi ba benete ba bɛzɛnyà bànyà ede ede na ɛ, bɛgbani banyanyaa ba petee manɔ ní Yesu klɔ. Yesu atrɔ awla ni ba mɛ ɔkakaa aʋa lɛ ayɔ ni ba ɛ.
Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne gi izɛkpɛ ozi tatata si “wɔ wonu Aya Yebi ye” kyɛ ido ní banɔ glegle me gi Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki lɛ si ikípani yɛ su i. Lɛ ese linu si ite si yɛ onu Kristo ye.
Keletitia livlɛ lɛ ɛ, Yesu edo ní ɔma nɔ mɛ, lɛ atrɛ ni ɔkutɔ gi ebu lidze e. Banima bɛzɛpɛ́ yɛ klanɔ. Lɛ gi bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bekeni edi si betsí kudeo ɛki yɛ kusɛ̀sɛ.
Pɔ̀ asi ba si, “Lilɛ si mipani Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa su Liboe Gbã nɛ klanɔ ní ima dzedze le kyɛ mɛ. Lixwɛ lɛ klɔ loso Aya akpɛ mɛ.”
Lɛ loso Yesu apani Liboe Gbã nɛ aklanɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ petee ní kesea mɛ ɛ.
Liwe etɔ lɛ ɛ, Yesu alɛ ní Genesaret limu ne kutu, lɛ banima bɛsa likpakpa lɛ klani yɛ si tɔ bénu Aya yɛ liboe le.
Amɔ kutapokpa tuʋa ní limu ne kutu yɔ gi bakpábu ba bɛyurɔ xe bezeplo ba dzikle ba ɛ.
Yesu emu eku ní tole me. Katapokpa lia klɔ keze Simon kanɛ. Nite si Yesu asi yɛ si otutru ka tsinɔ kuni yo aʋa taʋɛ. Yesu eple eze ní katapokpaa mɛ lɛ abasɛ banima bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
Gi Yesu abasɛ bidɔ mɛ pɔ́ ɛ, asi Simon si, “mleku katapokpaa atsinɔ ní limu ne odzudzu klɔ tɔ mlata mlɔ dzikle ʋa atɔ mlebu akpa.”
Simon ebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, kwikeni idi elesi zizi na petee pɔ̀ kúbu kididɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ ní wɔ liboe le onu i, maapleni blɔ dzikle ʋa.”
Gi epleni be ɛ, bebu akpa la gbí gi ɛki si ba dzikle ʋa bekpese kukyì i
Lɛ loso bɛbasɛ ba benemi ba awla ní katapokpa ʋla mɛ si ba gapɔni ba. Bɛba ɛpɔni ba lɛ akpa la gi bebu i, eyí kutapokpa tuʋa gi ligɔ sisami tɔ kunyrɔ ɔ.
Gi Simon Petro amɔ ɔ liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ, ekutu Yesu lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ sɛ ní mɛ su lɛ ese linu si eboe zimizi ɔbitɛbitɛ menu!”
Simon ni yɛ ahanuglɔ ba pɔ́ ba inugu itse ní akpa kɔdzɔkɔdzɔ ala gi bebu i su.
Nite ke Simon yɛ ahanuglɔ ba gi bɛzɛxwa si Yakobo ni Yohanes gi benu Zebedeo yɛ biba fɛ ɛ, libitɛ ba yaa.
Lɛ Yesu asi Simon si, “Wukíse lifu u, dɔnɔ abla ɛ, banɔ wɔtrabu!”
Gi betini ba kutapokpaa ɛmanɔ ní oge no e, bɛyurɔ kidɔ kakaa lɛ bekuni Yesu kude e.
Gi Yesu eze ní ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, onyime ɔtɔ gi kunya kyikyĩ kwize ní yɛ su i, amɔ Yesu lɛ adɔ ni yɛ ketu ya a, xe aki yɛ litukpo si i, “Ɔkaɛ, xe wɔpɛ ɛ, wɔatani mɛ kuyɔnɔ.”
Yesu anina yɛ ɔwla lɔ lɛ agbɔni yɛ ɛ. Lɛ apani si i, “Mapɛ! Wɔ isu ya idra!” Kyɔŋ ko e, kunyaa kwiblo ní yɛ su.

Yesu akpɛ ɔsã akí onyimee si, “Wukísi ɔnɔnɔ! Pɔ̀ trɛ ní kusumu yo ɔkaɛ klɔ tɔ zɛɛkɔ wɔ isu ya basɛ yɛ, tɔ ɔtapo wo odi. Lɛ kede e, tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ egyesi si wɔnyayɔ ɛ, zɛki bidɔ kɔkɔ ɛ bɛklɔ gi bɛ ɔsã Mose akpɛ ɛ.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu su eboe la eyi klanɔ ɛsanɔ. Lɛ anɔkpi la ɛba si lɛ enu yɛ eboe la tɔ biamɔ kuyɔyɔ dɔni ba bànya ʋa mɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu azeebu isu ya lidze e, lɛ azɛɛxwa Aya ní ɔyaya kɔ ɔ.

Liwe etɔ lɛ gi Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ. Farisianɛ batɔ ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ beze ní klɔ. Bɛdɔ ní ɔma kakaa mɛ ní Galilea ni Yudea kuseo me ani Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛba. Ɔkaɛ yɛ Kigaglaɛ kize yɛ aʋa gi akɔ azɛɛyɔni banyanya ba ɛ.
Benyime batɔ bɛmani onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e ní ɔtɔsi aʋa. Bekeni idi si bɛɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ ligba lɛ mɛ tɔ bɛkɔ yɛ ɛplɛ ní Yesu ketu ya.

Pɔ̀ ɔnɔha lɔ loso e, bátani kudeo kumɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso befeke ye emu ní ligba lɛ aʋa a. Lɛ bebu liwu le ní ɔvitɔ lɔ ɔ, xe bepleni ɔnyanyaɛ ní yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ aʋa gani lɛ mɛ kpɛ ligba lɛ mɛ, ní banima kusio ní Yesu ketu ya a.
Gi Yesu amɔ ba kuziŋaa ɛ, asi onyimee si, “Ɔʋia, bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ.”
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma bekpese kupani ní batsali kusi si, “Nyaŋwɛ iliɛ ya gi ɛɛpani ebusioboe ala la te e? Aya ko onu ɔniliɛ gi aatani eboe zimizi kukɔ kyɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ete ba begyodi ʋa lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege loso xe begyodi ba ya elu bàkpasi ní mlɔ mɛ ɛ?
Liwoli lisa ɛplɔplɔ si biapani i, ‘Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ’ loo, ‘Yɔ tɔ ga na a’?
Pɔ̀ tɔ mlete si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye amɔ kude ní kesea aʋa si aakɔ̀ eboe zimizi na kukyɛ ɛ.” asi onyime liɛ gi yɛ kapɛ tiele ketse e si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ si, yɔ; feke wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ trɛ kepea mɛ!”
Kyɔŋ ní ba pɔ́ aŋu mɛ ɛ, onyimee ayɔ, efeke yɛ ɔtɔsi ɔlɔ aʋa gi afɛ ɛ, lɛ atrɛ kepea mɛ nì Aya kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ɔ.
Litu ba pɔ́ kugyɔ. Lifu liku ba; lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya xe bɛpani si, “Enugutseboe woli aŋu mɛ kwimɔ nite omono o?”
Eboa la ya kede e, Yesu edo; lɛ azɛɛmɔ ɔbɔgyɔ ɔtɔ ɔ, gi yɛ linyi linu Lewi i, gi eze ní yɛ lixwɛwagba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kuni mɛ kude e.”
Lɛ Lewi ayɔ, ayurɔ kidɔ kakaa lɛ eku ni yɛ kude e.
Lɛ Lewi atrɔ ɔdɔŋakplɔ ʋidi si yikpɛ kubùbù ní Yesu su ní yɛ kepea mɛ ɛ. Babɔgyɔ glegle ni banɔ dzedze batɔ beze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su.

Pɔ̀ líze Farisianɛ batɔ ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ gi bafɛ beze farisianɛ kule e. Lɛ loso beʋi Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛkpɛ awla ní kezi me xe mlɛɛŋwɛ bidɔ ni babɔgyɔ ba ni banama a gi benu banɔ zimizi na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu akí ba si, “Banama gi balɛ mumɔ ɛ, báziã ɔwabitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛɛnya ɛ, ba bɛziã ɔwabitɛ.
Mába si mixwa banɔ gbã, pɔ̀ banɔ zimzi ba maba si mixwa tɔ bekyi ní ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ.”

Banɔ batɔ bɛsi Yesu si, “Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba bizɛnya onugu, lɛ bizɛxwa Aya lipoe kakaa; lɛ nite ke Farisianɛ ma badɔkpasi ba fɛ bizɛbitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ wɔ badɔkpasi ba xunyɔ ɛ kuŋaa ni kuŋwɛŋwɛɔ aʋa ko balɛ́.”
Yesu ebu le onu akí ba si, “Xegi ɔdzɛnyee ɔlɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ su i, kitɛ yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba biaze ni kuʋɛ ɛ? Lítraba lɛ mɛ liwewe e!
Pɔ̀ lipoe le litrába gi biagbani ɔdzɛnyee sɛnɔ ɔ. Kɔ banɔxwaxwa ba bɛnya onugu i.”
Yesu ebu abee aki ba dzɛ si: “Ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋíkyi lisiapɛ dɔni liwu vuvu su kukɔlulɔ liwu koko ɔpami kɔ. Xe liba lɛ mɛ nite e, libasɛ si ezizi liwu vuvu nɛ, lɛ lisiapɛ nɛ ɛ, lítrasɔ nɔ liwu koko le e.
Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋikɔ kuda vuvu kukpɛ ní kagaplekpa keʋe koko me e. Xe aní te e, keʋe kokoa kiata kɔ kuda kwibali kɔ keʋea kezizi.
Boŋu i lilɛ si bakɔ kuda vuvu yɔ akpɛ ní Kagaplekpa keʋe vuvu me.
Nite ké ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋípɛ si yiŋwɛ kuda vuvu yɔ xegi aŋwɛ kukokoo pɔ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si aapani si, ‘Kuda kókoo kwipɛ ɛsani kuvuvũ yɔ!’ ”
Ni sabat ɔtɔ aʋa ɛ, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛɛga idoli kayaa atɔ mɛ ɛza. Lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekpese idoli le kuyasi, bɛ fili lɛ, xe bɛzɛ ta ɛ.
Niteme si Farisianɛ atɔ beʋi si, “Ege loso kidiliɛ liɛ gi blɔ ɔsã nɔ ɛsi si mlatrátani kubitɛ ní sabat yɛ aʋa ɛ, xe mlɔ kɔ mlɛbitɛ kɛ na a?”
Yesu ebu lɛ onu akí ba si, “Mlakla kidiliɛ gi Dawid abitɛ lipoe lɛ gi kuʋɔɔ kwiku yɛ ni yɛ banima lo o,?

Eti eku ní Aya ligba lɛ mɛ, lɛ akɔ lìklã nɛ gi bɛbla ɛplɛ ki Aya ɛ, lɛ atà nɛ, xe aki yɛ banima kyɛ. Gi liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su lɛ ese linu si kusumu yo baka ba ko bɛmɔ kude si biata lìklã ɛ nɛ klɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si “Ɔnɔɛ Yebie e, onu Ɔka ki sabat yɛ.”
Ni sabat dzedze aʋa ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ gi azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ɔ. Onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ ɔŋawla lɔ etse e, eze klɔ.
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ batɔ ni Farisianɛ batɔ beze klɔ gi bɛzɛpɛ kunutsatsa ní Yesu su i. Lɛ loso e bezevu aŋu ní yɛ su mɔmɔmɔ, tɔ bedi si aayɔ ni ɔnɔ ní Sabat yɛ aʋa na.
Pɔ̀ Yesu kɔ ete ba begyodi ʋa lɛ loso asi onyimee si, “Yɔ! Ga ba ɔtɔ nɔ yà.” Nite si onyimee ayɔ ɔlɛɛ.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Miʋi mlo o: ege blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛsi si kubitɛ ní Sabat yɛ aʋa na a? Kubitɛ liboe gbã loo kubitɛ liboe nyani nyani i? Kubu ɔnɔ ligbã loo kudi ye tɔ otse e?”
Edi ba petee aklanɔ lɛ asi onyimee si, “Nina wɔ ɔwla lɔ!” Yɛ ɔwla lɔ eku lɔ kizee lɛ anina lɔ ɛ.
Isu ya iyeʋi Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma nyani nyani nite si begyodi ni ba kusi kidiliɛ gi biatani Yesu kubitɛ ɛ.
Liwetɔ lɛ ɛ Yesu emu atrɛ ketokpa katɔ aʋa si yizɛɛxwa Aya. Eze klɔ elesi la petee.
Gi kelea kɛti i, axwa yɛ badɔkpasi ba akpɛ likpɔ. Lɛ ebu ba mɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa gi aki ba linyi si banɔkpɛkpɛ ba.
Banɔkpɛkpɛ ba beze Simon (Yesu axwa yɛ dzɛ si Petro) ni yenemie Andrea, Yakobo ni Yohanes i, Filipo ani Batolomeo.
Batɔ fɛ beze Mateo ni Toma, Yakobo, Alfeo yebie ni Simon gi adimɛ ni yɛ kesea ɛ.
Bagɔgɔ ba beze Yuda, Yakobo yebie, ani Yuda Iscariot gi yɛ abakpɛ Yesu ní awla ɛ.

Gi Yesu eple adɔ ni lito le aʋa a, ni yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba xe ana ɔdada klɔɛ ɛ, atsani yɛ badɔkpasi glegle atɔ. Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ gi lidɔ ní Yudea kesea petee me e, Yerusalem ɔma nɔ mɛ, Tiro ni Sidɔn gi lɛ kyɛ inu ima ʋidi ni axu la kutu yɔ mɛ ɛ, lize ní iklɔ.
Banɔ baklɔ ba petee bɛba si benu yɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ ni tɔ ɔyɔ ni ba dɔni ba bànya ʋa mɛ. Banɔ baklɔ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne izɛkpɛ kunugu yo fɛ bɛba gi Yesu ayɔni ba a.
Ɔnɔ kakaa ekeni edi si yigbɔni yɛ, lɛ ese linu si kigagla kizɛdɔ ní yɛ mɛ gi kizɛyɔni banyanya ba petee e.
Yesu edi yɛ badɔkpasi ba lɛ apani si,
“Mlamɔ isami mlɔ bepiplinete ba
lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa ɛ mlɔ kanɛ kenu.
Mlamɔ isami mlɔ banama gi kuʋɛ kwiku abla ɛ,
lɛ ese linu si mlɛtrake e.
“Mlamɔ isami mlɔ banama gi mlebemi abla ɛ
lɛ ese linu si mlɛtramwɛ ɛ
Mlamɔ isami xe banima bevu mlo ekpɛ lipo me e,
xe begbe mlo e, xe bekpini mlo o,
xe bedo eboe nyani nyani na ɛyurɔ mlɔ ɔ kɔkpɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye loso.

“Mleyo ni isami xe liba lɛ mɛ nite e, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ liʋɛtsatsa lɛ lilɛ ní lifunu ne e. Likípè mlo o, lɛ ese linu si nite ké ba bakatsitsi ba bɛbitɛ tsinɔ ní Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba su ní kanɔa mɛ ɛ.
“Pɔ̀ babaa kí mlɔ bexonete ba a, lɛ ese linu si mlɛŋa mlɔ ligbã́ nɛ kooko!
Babaa kimlɔ banama gi mlekè abla ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ kuʋɛ kwitraku u! Babaa ki mlɔ banama gi mlɛmwɛ abla ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ mlɛtraze ní asigaga mɛ ɛ, xe mlaabemi i!
“Babaa ki mlɔ xe banima pɔ́ bɛkpɔ̀ mlɔ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si nite ke ba bakatsitsi ba bɛpani ní asia na beboedoplɛ ba su.”
“Pɔ̀ mɛsi mlɔ banama gi mlenu mɛ liboe le si, mlalɔ mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma; tɔ mlapɛ̀ lipo me aki banama gi bevu mlo ekpɛ ɔna mɛ ɛ.
Mlakrira banama gi beexo ifi le ekpɛ mlɔ ɛ, lɛ banama gi beebu kini ɛki mlɔ ɛ, mlaxwa Aya ní ba litukpo.
Xe gi ɔnutɔ ábɔ wɔ osumu ní ɔtuʋa tole e, tɔ kyi ɔʋla lɔ ki yɛ tɔ ɔbɔ, lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ wɔ liwu le aʋa lini nɛ ɛ, tɔ bu lɛ ese liwu le fɛ ki yɛ.
Xe ɔnutɔ eʋi wo kiditɔ ɛ, kɔ kɛ ki yɛ. Lɛ xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ wɔ kidɔ ɛ, wukíti ke e.
Lɛ kidiliɛ gi wɔ̀pɛ si babitɛ aki wɔ ɛ, bitɛ nite ke ki banima.
“Xegi mlɛdimɛ ni banama ko gi bɛdimɛ ni mlɔ ɛ, kitɛ Aya aakrira mlɔ ɛ? Lɛ ese linu si banɔ zimizi ba kura fɛ ɛ bizɛdimɛ ni banama gi bɛdimɛ ni ba ɛ.
Lɛ xegi mlɛbitɛ eboe gbã ɛki banama ko gi bizɛbitɛ eboe gbã ɛki mlɔ ɛ, ege lɛ loso biakpɔ mlɔ ɛ? Lɛ ese linu si nite ke banɔ zimizi ba fɛ bizɛbitɛ ɛ.

Lɛ xegi ɔniliɛ gi aatani kidiliɛ gi wɔdɔ ɔki yɛ dzini kutsa ki wɔ ko wɔɛdɔ bidɔ ɛkɔ ɛ, kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ tɔtɔ kúma lɛ mɛ ɛki wɔ. Banɔ zimizi ba fɛ nite ko bizɛdɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛki ba ahanuglɔ ba, lɛ ese linu si beedi kudeo onu si biadzini be kutsa aki ba.

Owo, Boŋu i, mlalɔ mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma tɔ mlapɛ̀ lipo me aki ba. Mladɔ bidɔ aki ba pɔ̀ mlakídi kudeo onu si biadzini ʋɛ kutsa ki mlɔ. Xe mlɛbitɛ nite e, mlɔ liʋɛ nɛ liakeme lɛ mlaaze Lifunu ne Ɔkaɛ yɛ bebi. Lɛ ese linu si, yɛ izepɛ̀ lipo me ɛki banama gi bidɔ biʋíku ba liŋu u, ni litukpo me gagla benete ba.
Mlazedi banɔ asigaga ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɔ Ɔkaɛ Aya fɛ izedi asigaga la kinɛ ɛ.
“Mlakíxwa litsi ni mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba tɔ Aya fɛ ɔ́kixwa litsi ni mlo o. Mlakíbu mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba lipɔ tɔ Aya fɛ aabu mlo lipɔ ɔ. Mlakɔ eboe akyɛ tɔ Aya fɛ aakɔ̀ kyɛ mlɔ.
Mlaki banɔ bidɔ tɔ Aya fɛ aaki mlɔ. Mlaamɔ bidɔ gi biayi kekpoa biami ʋe kpɛ lɛ biagbigba xe biakɔ kpɛ mlɔ awla. Lɛ ese linu si kália mɛ gi wɔkpɛ ɔki wonemi i, kamɛ ké Aya fɛ aakpɛ ɔki wɔ.”
Yesu ebu abee dzedze aki ba si, “Kaŋupo kátratani kaŋupo dzedze kugbanɔ ɔ. Xe ani nite e, ba tiaʋa pɔ́ biawɔli ku ní lizokpo me e.
Ableke e, ɔdɔkpasibi ɔ́tɔtɔ óʋikeme ɔsani yɛ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ xegi ɔdɔkpasibi ye akpasi bidɔ mɛ pɔ́ ɛ, kɔ edzì ŋwisi yɛ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Ege lɛ loso wɔedi ɔflimi nɔ ní wɔ onemi ye kimbie me e, xe wodze kanyikpea lia gi kalɛ ní wɔ ɔtutɔ wɔ kimbi ye me na a?

Kitɛ wɔasi wɔ onemi ye si, ‘Ki tɔ mibu ɔflimi nɔ ní wɔ kimbi ye me’ gi wɔʋítani kanyikpea lia gi kalɛ ní wɔ kimbi ye me kumɔ na a? Wɔ ɔnɔ aŋumɛboebitɛ, bú kanyikpea ní wɔ kimbi ye me kpɛ ɔtɔ, kɔ wɔmɔ mumɔ kɔ wobu ɔflimi nɔ ní wɔ onemi ye kimbi ye me.
“Kiliɛ gi ose gbã oʋí yo esebi nyani nyani i, nite ké ose nyani nyani kyɛ ɔ́tratani esebi gbã kuyo o.
Ose kakaa ɛ, lɔ esebi la bizɛkɔ te lo. Ɔ́nɔnɔ ɔ́ʋigu mangɔ ní ɔdɔ̃ mɛ ɛ; lɛ ɔ́nɔnɔ fɛ ɔ́ʋigu imumɔɛ ní fife me e.

Lɛ loso e, ɔnɔ gbã ɛ, izebu bidɔ gbã ɛdɔnɔ ní bidɔ gbã ɛ mɛ gi bilɛ ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ. Nite ké ɔnɔ zimizi ye kyɛ izebu eboe zimizi dɔnɔ ní bidɔ zimizi bɛ klɔ gi bilɛ ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ̀ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si eboa la gi eyi ɔna nɔ ɛ, la onugu lo izɛpani.
“Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba dzɛ si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛxwa mɛ si, ‘Ɔka, Ɔka’, xe mláʋibitɛ ní eboa la gi mɛɛsi mlɔ aʋa a!
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛba mɔklɔ ɛ, xe izenu mɛ eboe la a, xe izɛbitɛ ní la aʋa ɛ, maabasɛ mlɔ ɔniliɛ elu gi onu i.

Ɔniliɛ klɔ ɔlɛ ŋwisi onyime liɛ gi azɛɛwa ligba kinɛ ɛ. Ebu ide ne gi iidzu u xe ina liklakpɔ lɛ ní sise se me; lɛ akpɛ ɔklaxɔ gagla ní ide ne me e. Onipe lo eyi gbigba gi ɛyaʋi iku ligba lɛ klɔ ese e; pɔ̀ kididɔ kísa ligba lɛ, lɛ ese linu si bɛwa lɛ mumɔ ɔ.

Pɔ̀, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izenu mɛ eboe la a, xe ɔ́ʋibitɛ ni la aʋa ɛ, ɔlɛ ŋwisi onyime ɔtɔ gi awa yɛ ligba lɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔ́kpɛ ɔklaxɔ ní ligba lɛ ese kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso lipoe lɛ gi kuni yo kwiyaʋi iku ligba lɛ ese e, likpà kyɔŋ gi kibitɛ tɔtɔ kize ní lɛ su u.”
Agi Yesu ebu abee báklɔ aki banima nite e, asɛ atrɛ ní Kapernaum.
Roma banɛ ma baguta ba ɔka ɔtɔ eze gi osumubi gbã ɔtɔ eze yɛ awla. Yɛ ɔkaɛ ɔ́dimɛ ní yɛ su, osumubi ye yɛ isu ya mɛ izizi gi ihatse e.
Agi baguta ba ɔkaɛ enu Yesu unu i, ebu Yudanɛ ma banɔtsitsi batɔ akpɛ ní Yesu klɔ si basɛ yɛ si ɔga ayɔni yɛ osumubi ye ɔki yɛ.
Gi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛki yɛ litukpo glegle si, “Liziã si wɔapɔni baguta ba ɔka liɛ.
Alɔ blɔakɔanɛ ma, lɛ yɛ, awa blɔ ɔtsaklɔ ligba lɛ aki blɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ loso e Yesu atrɛ ni ba.
Kiliɛ gi bíha kepea mɛ okú i, baguta ba ɔkaɛ atsisi yɛ ole si, “Ɔkaɛ, wukíkpɛ isu kunugu u, mégyeno si wɔatiku mɛ kepea mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ mébu isu ya si megyeno gi maaba wɔ kɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso e, wɔ kɔ pani liboe ko mɛ osumubi ye aayɔ.
Mɛ fɛ makpasi ɔnutɔ yɛ kigagla ese, lɛ baguta bákpasi mɛ ese e. Xe masi tole si, ‘Trɛ ɛ!’ aatrɛ. Xe masi ɔʋlaɛ si, ‘Ba a!’ aaba. Lɛ xe maka mɛ osumubi ye si, ‘Bitɛ kidiliɛ ɛ,’ izɛɛbitɛ kɛ.”
Gi Yesu enu yɛ eboe la ɛ, yɛ onugu etse lɛ ekyi edi linɔkpii lɛ gi lize ni yɛ kude e; lɛ asi ba si, “sugba ɛ, mámɔ kuziŋa ʋidi uliɔ elu edi ní Israel fɛ.”
Lɛ gi baxwɛdzɛ ba bedzitrɛ ní baguta ba ɔkaɛ kepea mɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si osumubi ye ayɔ.
Lidze xe Yesu atrɛ ní ɔma ɔtɔ ɔ gi bizɛxwa si Nain mɛ ɛ. Yɛ badɔkpasi ba ni linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lizeni yɛ kude.
Gi ana ɔma nɔ kevunu ya ɛ, atsani ɔnɔha gi ɛtrɛɛvive okpo ye e. Okpo ye eze ɔtrɛtrɛ ɔtɔ yedze yebinyime tole. Lɛ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lize ni ɔtrɛtrɛ yedzee kude dɔni ɔma nɔ mɛ.
Agi Ɔkaɛ amɔ ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze e, yɛ liboe liga yɛ asigaga. Lɛ asi yɛ si, “Wukíbemi i.”
Lɛ Yesu eti apɔni okpo ye yɛ aɖaka yɛ lɛ agbɔni yɛ ɛ. Lɛ banama gi bevu aɖaka yɛ ɛ, bedzialɛ. Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Ɔyasɔʋi, mɛɛsi wɔ si, yɔ!”
Ko lɛ okpo ye ayɔ eze, xe ekpese kunugu yo kugu i. Lɛ Yesu edzini yɛ aki yene e.
Liki si lifu liku ba petee, lɛ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya a, lɛ bɛpani si, “Oboedoplɛ ʋidi ɔtɔ aba blɔ kusi i. Aya aba gi atrázɛ ikí yɛ banima a!”
Nite si Yesu yɛ linyi ne liyi gi litsa Yudea kesea ni besi ba klɔ petee.
Gi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛpani ní Yesu yɛ eboe bitɛbitɛ la su ɛsi Yohanes i, axwa ba mɛ tiaʋa
Lɛ akpɛ ba si bazeeʋi Ɔkaɛ si, “Wɔ wonu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi bɛsi si aaba a, putɔ kudi ɔnɔ dzedze ɔtɔ kudeonu na a?”
Agi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛsi yɛ si, “Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ akpɛ blɔ si kuʋi wo si wɔ wonu ɔniliɛ su gi yɛ edo aplɛ si aaba na, putɔ kudi ɔnɔ dzedze ɔtɔ kudeonu na?”
Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖii, Yesu ayɔni banyanya glegle adɔ ní ba bànya ʋa mɛ, lɛ akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne adɔ nɔ batɔ mɛ ɛ; xe aki kuŋupo glegle bimbi ʋe bidra a.

Lɛ ebu le onu aki Yohanes yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba si i, “Mledzi atrɛ tɔ eboa la gi mlɛmɔ ɔ, xe mlenu i, mlakɔ la abasɛ Yohanes, si kuŋupoo kwimɔ, lɛ gbafa ba bɛyɔ ɛga a. Lɛ banama gi bɛnya kunya kyikyi yɔ ɛ, ba isu ya iidra. Lɛ itoku le fɛ ɛ, iinu, lɛ bekpo ʋa fɛ ɛ, bɛɛyɔ edzì ligbã. Lɛ bɛɛpani Liboe Gbã nɛ ɛsi bepiplinete ba.
Isami iku banama gi bálila ba kuziŋa ni mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, kɔkpɛ kidiliɛ gi mɛɛbitɛ ɛ!”
Agi Yohanes yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba bɛsɛ ɛ, Yesu ekpese kupani ki linɔkpi le ní Yohanes su si, “gi mledo etrɛ ní ɔyaya klɔ ɛ, ege mlɛdi kudeonu si mlamɔ ɔ? Aplɔ̀plɔ̀ na gi liwɔ lɛ lizeefu putɔ ɔ?
Ege mledo etrɛ si mlɛzeedi i? Ɔnɔ gi eze ní awu gbã na mɛ putɔ ɔ? Banama gi bizɛkpɛ awu la nite e, xe bizɛŋa ligbã nɛ ɛ, kukusipe me bizɛmɔ ba.
Mlasi mɛ; ege mledo etrɛ xe mlɛzɛɛmɔ ɔ? Oboedoplɛ? Ee, nite ɖii. Pɔ̀ kidiliɛ gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, kisani oboedoplɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si Yohanes yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ sú Aya yɛ liboe le lipani plɛ si,
“ ‘Aya si, maakpɛ mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ wɔ ɔtɔ nɔ
tɔ aadra kudeo ɔki wɔ.’
Lɛ Yesu edo apɔnɔ si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ si Yohanes ekeme asani ɔnɔ kakaa gi eze edi i. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi onu ɔsisami yɛ ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, ekeme asani Yohanes.”
Banama pɔ́ gi benu liboe lɛ gi Yesu apani i, ni babɔgyɔ ba kyɛ ɛ, bɛzi lɛ si Aya yɛ kudeo kwigyɔ, lɛ loso ba Yohanes akpɛ kuni yo akɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ farisianɛ ma ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba kɔ ɛ, begbe bázɛ Aya kudeo gi ata aplɛ akí ba ligbã nɛ kupɛ̀pɛɔ ɔ. Lɛ loso bádimɛ si Yohanes ɔkpɛ kuni ɔki ba a.
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ yɛ liboe le aʋa si, “Ege maakɔ abla kelea mɛ banima srɔnɔ ɛ? Ege beyi i?
Balɛ ko ŋwisi banuvɔ gi bɛɛwaʋi ní line ne me kinɛ ɛ. Ba ɔha tole ɛɛkpɛ ozi lo exwa ɔha ʋla lɔ si,
“ ‘Kwiʋe isamidzi iiki mlɔ,
pɔ̀ mléyo o;
kwikpɛ ibemidzi iiki mlɔ,
pɔ̀ mlébemi i.’
Agi Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ aba ɛ, anya onugu lɛ ɔ́ŋwɛ kuda fɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ lɛ mlɛpani ní yɛ su si, ‘Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.’
Lɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba ɛ. Yɛ kɔ ɛ, aŋa bidɔ, lɛ aŋwɛ bidɔ fɛ ɛ. Lɛ mlɛsi si, ‘Mledi onyime liɛ! Ɔŋazinete ni ɔdaŋwɛmu onu u. Ɔnɔ gi onu babɔgyɔ ba ni “banɔ zimizi ba ba ɔʋia!” ’
Pɔ̀ banama gi bɛzi Aya yɛ Kuboeteo e, ba bizɛbasɛ si Aya kuboeteo kɔ kunu kuboeteo.”
Liba lɛ mɛ si farisiɔnɛ ɔtɔ axwa Yesu si ɔga aŋa bidɔ ni yɛ. Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní yɛ kepea mɛ lɛ eple ze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su si yiŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
Ni ɔma nɔ klɔ mɛ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi eze ɔwawadze e, enu si Yesu eze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su ní farisiɔnɛ yɛ kepea mɛ, lɛ akɔ kumu flafla alabasta keʋe tiele,

lɛ atrɛ ɛ xe ɔzɛ ɔlɛ ní Yesu kedea ní yɛ kuklikpɔ onu i. Niklɔ ekpese kubeo kubemi balɛ yɛ kuklikpɔɔ aʋa a. xe ɛkɔ yɛ siya sɛ etsoli kubeo ní yɛ kuklikpɔ ɛ. Lɛ amu kɔ ɛ, xe akɔ kumu flaflaa abali kɔ aʋa ɛ.
Gi farisiɔnɛ amɔ nite e, egyo le edi ni yɛ isu ya mɛ si, “Atɛsi oboedoplɛ onyime liɛ ɔnyanu i, nya aatè ɔniliɛ elu gi ɔdzɛliɛ onu u xe ɛɛgbɔni yɛ ɛ; lɛ aatè ligbã nyaninyanii lɛ gi ɔdzɛliɛ ɔlɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu apani aki yɛ si, “Simon, mapɛ si misi wɔ liboetɔ!” Simon adimɛ aki yɛ si, “Yoo, Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, mɛɛta wɔ kutu.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Benyime tiaʋa batɔ bɛdɔ kibɔ liʋɛ ní ɔbɔda ɔtɔ su. Tole adɔ kibɔ pititi alafa tietsu liʋɛ, lɛ ɔʋla yɛ fɛ yɛ liʋɛ nɛ linu kibɔ pititi avitetsu i.
Agi bamɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tani yɛ liʋɛ nɛ kutsa onu i, ɔbɔdaɛ akɔ ba aʋɛ na akyɛ ba a. Baʋɛnete tiaʋa ya ɛ, ba mɛ owoli wogyodi si asa ɔbɔdaɛ kudimɛ nɔ ɔ?”
Simon ebu le onu si? “Megyo edi si ba mɛ iliɛ gi yɛ liʋɛ nɛ lisa keme e, xe bɛkɔ ɛkyɛ yɛ ɛ.” Lɛ Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Nite ɖii lilɛ ɛ!”

Lɛ ekyi aŋu na mɛ akpɛ ɔdzɛɛ, lɛ eʋi Simon si, “Dani wɔɛmɔ ɔdzɛ liɛ ɛ? Agi meti eku wɔ kepea mɛ ɛ, wɔ́ki mɛ kuni si miplo mɛ kuklikpɔ ɔ. Pɔ̀ yɛ kɔ ɛ, eplo mɛ kuklikpɔɔ ni yɛ kubeo, lɛ etsoli ko ni yɛ siya sɛ ɛ.
Lɛ wɔ́kpɛ mɛ wolaa a. Pɔ̀, dɔni lipoe lɛ gi maba kɔna ni abla ɛ, ɔ́mɔni mɛ kuklikpɔɔ kumu u.
Ableke gi maba ɛ, wɔ́sra kumu kí mɛ litukpo le e. Pɔ̀ yɛ xunyɔ ɛ, abali kumu flafla ní mɛ kuklikpɔɔ.
Lɛ loso mɛɛsi wɔ si kulɔlɔ glegle kɔklɔ gi abasɛ ɛ, kwibu ibasɛ si bɛkɔ yɛ eboe zimizi glegle la ɛkyɛ yɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔnɔ kakaa elu gi bɛkɔ sisami ɛkyɛ ɛ, yɛ kudimɛnɔɔ kyɛ kuzeeze sisami.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Bɛkɔ wɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ wɔ!”
Ɔkplɔ nɔ su bezeze gɔgɔ ba beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ liɛ, gi yɛ kɔ ɔ izɛkɔ eboe zimizi na ɛkyɛ ɛ?”
Pɔ̀ lɛ Yesu asi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Wɔ kuziŋaa kwibu wo o. Sɛ̀trɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ ɛ!”
Lipoetɔ kede e, Yesu aklani ima ni kumami yɔ mɛ gi azaapani Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa su Liboe Gbã nɛ aklanɔ ɛ. Badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba beze ni yɛ kude.

Badzɛ batɔ mɛ gi Yesu akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne dono o, xe ayɔni ba ní ba bànya ba mɛ fɛ beze ni ba kude e. Ba mɛ ɔtɔ eze Maria gi bizɛxwa fɛ si Magdalene e, gi yɛ mɛ Yesu akpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tigloele le dono e.

Odzedze eze Yohana gi yenye eze Kuza: lɛ Kuza ɛ eze Herodes yɛ kekusipea mɛ ɔka ɔtɔ ɔ. Odzedze ɔtɔ fɛ eze Susana. Ni ba ya kede e, badzɛ dzedze glegle fɛ beze ni Yesu kude, gi bɛkɔ ba tutɔ iwla mɛ bidɔ ɛkɔ ɛpɔni Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba a.
Banima bɛzɛɛdɔ ima ede ede me eba Yesu klɔ, lɛ lipoe lɛ gi linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lixogo e, Yesu ebu abee aki ba si,
“Liba lɛ mɛ si onyime ɔtɔ atrɛ ní amu oglu kɔ. Gi azɛɛkpɛ amu na ní kayaa mɛ ɛ, atɔ ɛwɔli ɛdɔ ní kudeo me. Banima bɛga ní la aʋa, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kwita la ɛmlɔ ɛ.
Atɔ ɛwɔli ɛdɔ kese kpakpla aʋa. Ɛyɛ, pɔ̀ gi sise se sísrɛ ki la loso e, amɔ kuni, lɛ loso ɛyurɔ ɔ lɛ etse e.
Amubi la atɔ fɛ ewɔli iku bibu ʋe me. Agi ɛyɛ ɛ, xe la ni bibu ʋe bizeetsi kpɛ likpɔ ɛ, bibu ʋe biwà ɛda la aʋa.
Lɛ atɔ fɛ ɛdɔ ní kese gbã aʋa a; niteme si la kɔ etsi, lɛ likáka liyo amubi alafa a.”
Lɛ Yesu agu yɛ abee si, “Xe batu bali ní mlɔ awla ɛ, tɔ mlenu!”
Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba beʋi abee liɛ gi ebu ese e.
Lɛ ebu le onu aki ba si i, “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa su eboe kpokpo la su kuboeteo e, bɛkɔ kɔ ɛki mlɔ. Pɔ̀ ki banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ, mizɛpani ní abee ʋa mɛ,
“ ‘tɔ xegi bedi fɛ ɛ, bátramɔ ɔ;
lɛ xegi bɛta kutu fɛ ɛ, bátranu liboeboe ese e.’
“Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, abee yɛ ese onu si: amubi la enu Aya yɛ liboe le.

Amubi ala la klɔ gi ɛwɔli ɛdɔ ní kudeo me e, la enu banɔ baklɔ gi bizenu liboe le e, pɔ̀ kɔ́ Ozimizi ye aba ekple liboe le ebu ní ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ. Niteme si bátrazɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a xe biamɔ kubúbú u.

Amubi ala la klɔ gi edɔ ní kese kpakpla aʋa ɛ, la enu banɔ baklɔ gi bizeenu liboe le e gi bizɛzɛ lɛ ni isami fɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ liboe le liʋita igu u. Lipoe kpekpemi itɔ ko bizɛzɛ lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa. Pɔ̀ xegi baxixa ʋa bɛba ko e, kɔ bɛɛdzi kede e.

Amubi ala la klɔ gi ɛwɔli eku bibu ʋe me e, alɛ aki banama gi bizenu liboe le e. Pɔ̀ ligbã nɛ mɛ kusuŋwasiɔ, exo la ni ligbã́ŋaŋa nɛ, bikpɛ likpɔ kɔ bimi liboe le kpɛ ba mɛ, gi líʋibu libi tɔ́tɔ liwewe e.

Amubi ala la klɔ gi ɛwɔli ɛdɔ kese gbã aʋa ɛ, la alɛ aki banɔ baklɔ gi xe benu liboe le e, bizevu lɛ ɔzɔ mɛ ni kutununu ɔna gbã a. Nite si bizɛkpɛ ikũ nɛ ní liboe le kɔkpɛ nì lipoe lɛ klɔ gi liabu libi i.
“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋisu kani i, xe izɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ agba yɛ ese e loo kpo ye ní abati ese. Boŋu i, bizɛkɔ yɛ trɔ ní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa tɔ okle ki banama gi beetiku kepea mɛ ɛ.
“Lɛ kidɔ kakaa liɛ gi bekpo e, kiaŋwi. Lɛ kidiliɛ aʋa gi bewe bidɔ ɛ, biamɔ kɛ kɔ bebu ke basɛ ní oŋwe no e.

“Lɛ loso e, mledi mumɔ tɔ mlevu aŋu ní kiliɛ gi mleenu eboe la ese e su. Lɛ ese linu si, ɔniliɛ awla gi bidɔ bilɛ ɛ, biaki yɛ bidɔ pɔnɔ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ awla gi kididɔ kíma ɛ, kidiliɛ gi egyoedi si kilɛ ní yɛ awla kyɛ ɛ, biazɛ kɛ yɛ awla.”
Yesu yene ni yɛ beneminyime ba bɛba si bɛɛmɔ Yesu. Pɔ̀ bátani yɛ kuti pɔnɔ ɔ, linɔkpi le kisrɛsrɛ loso.
Ɔnutɔ asi Yesu si, “Wone nì wɔ beneminyime ba balɛɛ ní oŋwe no gi bɛpɛ si bɛmɔ wɔ ɔ.”
Yesu asi banima petee si, “Mone ni mɛ beneminyime ba ɛ, ba benu banama gi bizenu Aya yɛ Liboe le e, xe bizɛbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa a.”
Liwe etɔ lɛ ɛ, Yesu nì yɛ badɔkpasi ba bemu iku ní katapokpa atɔ mɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ kutsa limu ne tɔ kutrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ aʋa.” Lɛ beku kudeo me e.
Agi beze kuni yo aʋa ɛ, Yesu adɔ sra. Kyɔŋ ko, liwɔ gagla ɛtɔ likpese kufu ní limu ne aʋa gi liki si kuni yo kwiyaʋi iku katapokpaa mɛ ɛ. Nite si ba petee ba agbã́ na, eku kuxixa mɛ.
Lɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛhwani Yesu u, lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ, Ɔkaɛ, kuhanyrɔ ɔ!”
Yesu ayɔ, lɛ aki liwɔ lɛ ni kuni nyra nyra ɔsã ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, liwɔ lɛ limɔni kufu, lɛ kuni yo kwidɔ zii gi niklɔ ɛgɔ kranaa a.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Nifɔ mlɔ kuziŋaa kulɛ ɛ?”
Pɔ̀ liboe le litu ba kugyɔ ɔ, lɛ lifu liku ba a. Lɛ beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ iliɛ? gi Yɛ kɔ izɛki liwɔ lɛ ni kuni yo ɔsã xe bizenu kutu iiki yɛ ɛ!”
Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛga limu ne aʋa lɛ bɛzeedo ni Garaseanɛ ma kesea aʋa ɛ. Garaseanɛ ma kesea kebu aŋu mɛ ɛkpɛ Galilea kanìa ní limu ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ.

Kiliɛ gi Yesu eple ní katapokpaa mɛ ko e, onyime ɔtɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ize e, ádɔ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ aba atsani yɛ ɛ. Onyimee eze liya lipoe gblamadza lɛ óze kepe me fɛ ɛ. Ikpodrɔ lɛ me ize yɛ ozeklɔ.
Gi amɔ Yesu i, akpɛ ozi gaglaa, lɛ adɔ ní Yesu ketu ya ɛ. Lɛ apani ni ozi si, “Wɔ Yesu, Ɔka Ʋidi ye Yebi ye! Liboe woli wɔɛpɛ ní mɛ su u? Maki wɔ litukpo wukihe kutu iiki mɛ ɛ!”

Apani nite lɛ ese linu si, Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no si “do ní yɛ mɛ.” Epoe glegle e, xe ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛdɔ ní yɛ aʋa a, xe bɛkpɛ yɛ bibɔ ʋɛ, ikli ni iwla a, xe beepe ye fɛ ɛ, ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no izɛki si onyimee izɛpa bala ʋa kɔ ɛkpikpini yɛ ɛtsisi ɔyaya klɔ ɛ.
Yesu eʋi ye si, “Kitɛ bizɛxwa wɔ ɔ?”
Onyimee ebu isu ya onu si, Mɛ linyi si “Likpi.” Lɛ ese linu si ifuɛfuɛ zimizi glegle ize ní yɛ mɛ.
Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ikí Yesu litukpo si ɔki kpikpini nɛ zɛɛkpɛ ní lizokpo gluglui lɛ gi odukɔ ɔma ɔki lɛ ɛ mɛ.
Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, iha likpɔkpɛkpɛ ʋidi itɔ lizɛɛŋa bidɔ ní ketokpaa su ní niklɔ. Lɛ loso ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne iiki Yesu litukpo, si ɔki tɔ izetiku ní iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ Yesu aki lɛ kudeo onu i.
Ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido ní onyimee me lɛ izetiku ní iha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Nite si iha lɛ likpi le petee liseeple ketokpaa lɛ izɛdɔ limu ne, iŋwɛ kuni yo xe itse e.
Baxwɛwaa ba gi bezeedi iha lɛ aʋa ɛ, bɛmɔ liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ; nite si bese etrɛ lɛ bezehle liboe le kpɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ni inyrɔɔ nɛ aʋa a.

Lɛ banima bedoetrɛ si bezeedi liboe lɛ liba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Gi bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ, bɛmɔ onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido e, gi odi ní Yesu ikli lɛ onu u; akpɛ awu, lɛ yɛ begyodi ʋa bɛflɔ ɔ, lɛ lifu liku ba a.
Banama gi bɛmɔ liboe le kibabaɛ mɛ ɛ, bɛsi banɔ dzedze ba kiliɛ gi Yesu ayɔni onyime liɛ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ize e.
Lɛ Gerasese banɛ ma petee bɛsi Yesu si, ɔsɛ ní ba kesea mɛ lɛ ese linu si lifu liku ba nyani nyani. Lɛ loso e, Yesu emu eku katapokpaa mɛ lɛ asɛ ɛ.
Onyime liɛ klɔ mɛ gi ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ido e, aki Yesu litukpo si, “Ki tɔ mize ni wɔ kude.” Pɔ̀ Yesu akpɛ yɛ kude si,
“Dzi trɛ ní kepea mɛ tɔ zɛɛsi banima kidiliɛ gi Aya abitɛ akí wɔ ɛ.” Niteme si onyimee atrɛ lɛ azɛɛpani aklanɔ ɔma nɔ mɛ kidiliɛ gi Yesu abitɛ aki yɛ ɛ.
Gi Yesu edzì atrɛ ní limù ne oge lɔ kɔlɔ ɛ, banima bɛkpɛ yɛ wolaa, lɛ ese linu si banima petee bezeepe ye.
Lɛ onyime ɔtɔ gi bizɛɛxwa si Yairo aba a, eze ɔka ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ. Adɔ ní Yesu yɛ ketu ya, lɛ aki yɛ litukpo si ɔba yɛ Yairo kepea mɛ ɛ
lɛ ese linu si yɛ obidzɛ tolee gi aŋa agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa ihatse e.
Agi Yesu eze kudeo me e, linɔkpi le lizɛpɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ ní kupɛɔ petee.
Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi ika izedo ní yɛ su agɔ liɔfɔ ni taʋa nyɔŋ ɛ, eze ní linɔkpi le kusi. Pɔ̀ ɔdzɛ liɛ ɛ, ezizi yɛ kibɔɛ petee ní bawabitɛ ba su, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani yɛ kuyɔnɔ ɔ.
Etutru isu ya akpɛ linɔkpi le kusi gani Yesu kedea, lɛ agbɔni yɛ liwu le kutu yɔ ɛ. Lɛ onu klɔ ko e, yɛ ika lɛ kudodoo kwitsa!
Lɛ Yesu eʋi si, “Nyaŋwɛ agbɔni mɛ ɛ?”
Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́dimɛ si yɛ ɛ. Niklɔ Petro asi yɛ si, “Ɔka, banima petee bɛpɔ wɔ ɛkpɛ”,
Pɔ̀ Yesu apani si, “Ɔnutɔ agbɔni mɛ lɛ ese linu si mete si kigagla kido ní mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ.”
Ɔdzɛɛ amɔ si kibitɛ kima tɔ ɔ; nite si ekpese kusugu, lɛ adɔ Yesu ní ketu ya ɛ. Lɛ ní banima petee aŋu na mɛ ɛ, asi yɛ kidiliɛ gi kɛ loso yɛ agbɔni yɛ nì kiliɛ gi kunyaa kwiyurɔ yɛ kyɔŋ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obidzɛɛ, wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔni wɔ. Ga trɛ ní kusuyɔ mɛ!”
Gi Yesu azaapani i, ɔnɔ kpɛkpɛ ádɔ ní Yairo kepea mɛ aba si Yairo ɔtsaklɔ ɔkaɛ si, “Wɔ obidzɛɛ etse,” lɛ loso e, “wukúkpɛ Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ kunugu tɔ ɔ.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu enu liboe le, lɛ asi Yairo si, “Wukíse lifu u; wɔ kɔ zi lɛ aʋa ŋa ko. Wobi ye aayɔ!”
Gi Yesu eku Yairo kepea mɛ ɛ, ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ kude onu si oti oku sani Petro, Yohanes ni Yakobo kɔpɔni obika yɛ ni obinee e.
Ɔnɔ kakaa eze ni asigaga mɛ lɛ bezeebemi ɔnuvɔɛ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakíbemi i! Ɔnuvɔɛ ótse e; sra ko ɛɛdɔ!”
Ba petee bɛmwɛ yɛ, lɛ ese linu si bete si ɔdzɛʋi yɛ etse.
Pɔ̀ Yesu evu ɔdzɛʋi yɛ kawlakpɔa lɛ asi yɛ si, “Mɛ obi ye, yɔ!”
Yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ edzì iku yɛ mɛ, nite si ayɔ ɔlɛɛ kyɔŋ. Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, bapɛ́ kiditɔ aki ɔdzɛʋi yɛ tɔ ɔŋa a.
Obidzɛʋi yɛ yɛka ni yene ba inugu itse. Pɔ̀ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã aki ba si bakífeke onugu ní liboe le aʋa si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ.
Yesu axwa yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba akpɛ likpɔ. Lɛ aki ba kigagla ni kudeonu si tɔ biakɔ kpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne petee kudono atɔ biayɔ ni banyanya ba.
Lɛ akpɛ ba si bapani Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa liboe le tɔ baki tɔ banyanya ba bayɔ.
Asi ba si, “Mlakíkɔ kididɔ evu aki mlɔ kudegaga a: mlakívu osevugavuga, kepimi loo kiŋaŋa, kibɔ loo liwu ʋla a.
Xegi bɛzi mlɔ ní kepe atɔ mɛ ɛ, mleze ni iklɔ kɔkpɛni mlɔ lisɛpoe le ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ.
Pɔ̀ niklɔ gi bázɛ mlɔ ɛ; mlasɛ ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ. Pɔ̀ xe mlasɛ ɛ, mlekple ovugbo lo ní mlɔ ikli lɛ aplɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ ŋwisi kiseʋidudu ní ba su kinɛ ɛ.”
Badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ lɛ bɛzɛɛklani kumami yɔ petee me e, gi bɛzɛpani Liboe Gbã nɛ, xe bɛyɔni banyanya ba ní ɔkɔ kakaa ɛ.
Gi Herodes gi azɛɛŋa Galilea kesea aʋa a, enu eboa la petee gi Yesu azaabitɛ ɛ, apisa. Lɛ ese linu si banɔ batɔ bɛpani si, Yohanes Kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ edzì ligbã.
Banɔatɔ kyɛ si Eliya aba edo; lɛ banɔ dzedze kyɛ si kana mɛ beboedoplɛ ba mɛ tole edzì ligbã a.
Pɔ̀ lɛ Herodes apani si yɛ aki bɛtsa Yohanes yɛ litukpo le ní yɛ onu u, lɛ eʋi isu ya si, “Kɔ onyime woli iliɛ gi yɛ su meenu eboa la ya ɛ?” Lɛ loso azeekeni edi si yimɔ Yesu u.
Gi Yesu yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bedzi idɔni kudeo me e, bɛba ɛki yɛ kunutsatsa ní eboa la petee gi bɛzɛɛbitɛ su u. Lɛ agbani ba evu lɛ bedoetrɛ ní ɔma ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Bɛtsaida mɛ ɛ.
Agi linɔkpi le linu niklɔ gi bɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛgbani yɛ ɛkpɛ. Azɛ ba lɛ apani aki ba ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa su u, lɛ banama gi bɛziã kupɔnɔ ní ba bànya ʋa mɛ ɛ, ayɔni ba a.
Agi liwo le lizeeku i, badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba bɛba ɛsi yɛ si, “Ki tɔ banima basɛ tɔ beti iku kumami yɔ ni inyrɔ nɛ me tɔ bazɛpɛ kiŋaŋa ni iyakɔ; lɛ ese linu si niya ebu lidze.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ tutɔ mlaki ba kiditɔ tɔ baŋa a.”
Bebu lɛ onu ɛki yɛ si, “Aklã tetsu ni akpa taʋa ko alɛ blɔ awla a. Wɔpɛ si kuzeedzi kiŋaŋaɛ aki linɔkpi ʋidi ilɛ ya lo o?”
Banama gi beze ni klɔ ɛ, biana benyime akpe tietsu.
Pɔ̀ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banima beze kesea ni ahakpɔ mɛ, banɔ ŋwisi avitetsu avitetsu.”
Gi badɔkpasi ba bɛki si banima beze kesea ɛ,
Yesu akɔ àklã tetsu la ni akpa taʋa la evu. Edi lifunu ne hãa, lɛ edo Aya ɖase ní la aʋa a, xe ayaʋi la ɛ. Lɛ akɔ la aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakɔ alɛ aki banima ɛ.
Ba petee bɛŋa, beke, lɛ biŋaŋa gɔgɔ ʋɛ ɛ, biyi kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa.
Liwetɔ lɛ gi Yesu tole azɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ní yɛ su. Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Nyaŋwɛ anɔkpi la izɛpani si menu u?”

Badɔkpasi ba bebu lɛ onu si, “Banɔ batɔ bizedo si wɔ́ wonu Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛɛ, banɔ batɔ kyɛ si wɔ́ wonu Eliya, lɛ bedzedze ba ba kugyodi yo kunu si Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ koko ba ɛ, bamɛ tole wonu gi edzì ligbã a.”
Lɛ eʋi ba si, “Mlɔ tutɔ xwɛ, nyaŋwɛ mlɛ si sì yɛ menu u?”
Petro ebu le onu si, “Wɔ́ wonu Aya yɛ Kristo ye.”
Lɛ Yesu akpɛ ɔsã gagla aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba si bakífeke onugu ní eboa la aʋa asi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ.

Apani asi ba kyɛ si, “Lilɛ si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye, ɔmɔ ɔziã glegle; banɔtsitsi ba, kusumu yo baka ba, ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba biakyi kede kpɛ yɛ. Lɛ biaye ye e; pɔ̀ ní ewe tata kede e, ayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ gi aadzi ligbã a.”
Lɛ asi ba petee si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aapɛ si yize ni mɛ kude e, liaziã si odze isu liboe, tɔ otu yɛ osetsase lo liwe kakaa tɔ oze ni mɛ kude.
Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ kakaa gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ligbã nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aakɔ̀ yɛ ligbã nɛ kukɔkyɛ ní mɛ litukpo e, aabu yɛ ligbã nɛ.
Libi woli lilɛ ki ɔnutɔ xe aamɔ kelea mɛ bidɔ mɛ petee e pɔ̀ xe aalila yɛ esobo la a?
Xegi ɔnutɔ aase kuye ní mɛ nì mɛ bidɔbasɛbasɛ ʋɛ su i, kɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye fɛ aase kuye ní yɛ su xegi aba ní yɛ tutɔ yɛ kusudraa, nì Yeka ni yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra ba petee ba kusudraa mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ mɛɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si, banama gi bali niya ɛ, ba mɛ batɔ bátratse sani si bɛmɔ Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa xe e.”
Ŋwisi ewe ɔgɔtaʋa kede gi apani eboa la klɔ ɛ, Yesu agbani Petro, Yohanes ni Yakobo, lɛ bɛtrɛ ní ketokpa katɔ aʋa si tɔ bɛzɛxwa Aya a.
Lipoe lɛ gi Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, yɛ aŋu na mɛ kiŋwiŋwi yɛ mɛ kikyi, yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bixwa pititi lɛ bize ŋle e.
Banɔ tiaʋa, Mose ni Eliya,
bɛŋwi ní lifunu ne kusudraa mɛ; gi bɛzɛpani ni Yesu ní kiliɛ mɛ gi litraze xe aatse ní Yerusalem ní Aya kutrɔtrɔ onu su u.
Petro ni yɛ ahanuglɔ ba bɛzɛ ní sra mɛ, pɔ̀ gi ba aŋu mɛ ɛdra ɛ, bɛmɔ Yesu yɛ kusudraa ni banɔ tiaʋa ba gi balɛɛ ni Yesu i.

Gi benyime ba bɛzɛsɛ̀ ní Yesu su i, Petro asi Yesu si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, lipɛ koŋ si kulɛ ní ya! Ki tɔ kuwa akatsa tata; wɔ linɛ tile, Mose linɛ tile ni Eliya linɛ tile.” (Liboe lɛ gi azɛɛpani i, yɛ ɔtutɔ óte le e.)
Gi azaapani i, liplɛ ɛtɔ liŋwi lɛ liba ewe ba a; lɛ gi beti iku liplɛ lɛ mɛ ɛ, lifu liku badɔkpasi ba.
Ole ɔtɔ eyi dɔnɔ ní liplɛ lɛ mɛ si, “Mɛ Obi ye iliɛ ya, yɛ makya! Mlata yɛ kutu!”
Gi ole lo ɛpani tsa ɛ, bɛmɔ si Yesu tètè ko agɔ. Badɔkpasi ba béfeke onugu ní eboa la aŋu mɛ gi bɛmɔ su i si ɔnɔnɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ.
Keletitia mɛ gi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beple edɔni ketokpaa aʋa ɛ, linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ liba ɛtsani yɛ.
Lɛ onyime ɔtɔ ní linɔkpi le me akpɛ ozi si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ! Maki wɔ litukpo, di mɛ obinyimee, lɛ ese linu si yɛ ko onu mɛ obi tolee!
Ɔfuɛfuɛ ɔtɔ izɛdɔ yɛ aʋa gi izɛki si izɛkpɛ ozi lo, kɔ ekpese kuhe e. Nite si ɔfɔ lɔ izedo yɛ onu. Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ izɛdugu ye gi sigagla mɛ izɛyurɔ awla ní yɛ su u.
Maki wɔ badɔkpasi ba litukpo ní lɛ su, pɔ̀ bátani lɔ kukpikpinɔ dono o.”

Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kitɛ xe kumɔziŋa ni kesetata kalɛ mlɔ mɛ nite e?” “Kɔna ni lipoe woli maaze mlɔ su du u? Lɛ kɔna ni lipoe wolite maplɛ litɔ kese kimlɔ du u? Lɛ asi onyimee si, Gbani wɔ obi ye mani ya a!”
Agi ɔyasɔʋi lɔ etrába ɛ, ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no ɛsa yɛ kesea gi ekpese kuhe e. Pɔ̀ Yesu akpɛ ozi ní ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ aʋa, lɛ ayɔni ɔyasɔʋi lɔ, lɛ akɔ lɔ aki yɛka ɛ.
Liki si ɔnɔ kakaa onugu etse ní Aya kigagla ʋidi ye su.
Yesu yɛ kiboebitɛ kitu banima kugyɔ lɛ asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si,
“Mlakídze liboe lɛ gi matrasi mlɔ ɛ. Bɛtrákpɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ní awla ɛki banima.”
Pɔ̀ yɛ badɔkpasi ba bénu liboe le ese e. Bɛ kɔ lɛ ekpo ba tɔ bakítani lɛ ese kunu. Lɛ badɔkpasi ba kyɛ ɛ, bese lifu ne ní kiliɛ gi biaʋi ye liboe le ese e.
Kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ kwiku badɔkpasi ba kusi ní ɔniliɛ gi yɛ asa keme ní ba kusi su u.
Agi Yesu ete ba begyodi ba onu i, agbani ɔnuvɔ ɔtɔ amanɔ lɛ aki si ɔlɛ ni yɛ su i;

lɛ asi ba si, “Ɔniliɛ gi aazi kanuvɔʋia lia ní mɛ linyi ne me e, mɛ ɔniɛ azɛ ɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi azɛ mɛ ɛ, azɛ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi yɛ onu ɔsisami yɛ petee ní mlɔ kusi i, yɛ asa keme e.”
Lɛ Yohanes apani si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, kwimɔ onyime ɔtɔ gi azɛkpikpinì ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono ní wɔ linyi ne me e, nite si kwisi yɛ si odzini kumɔni lɛ ese linu si aní blɔ mɛ tole onu u.”
Yesu asi yɛ nì badɔkpasi gɔgɔ ba si, “Mlekítsi kudeo aki yɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́yɔ kedu ní mlɔ su i, ɔtini mlɔ aʋa.”
Agi Yesu yɛ lifunu ne kutrɛtrɛɔ lipoe le litipɔnɔ ɛ, atrɔ lɛ si yɛ atrɛ ní Yerusalem.
Niteme si atsisi baxwɛdzɛ ba ní yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ ní Samaria kamami katɔ mɛ si babla kidɔkakaa aplɛ aki yɛ.
Pɔ̀ banima ni iklɔ bázɛ yɛ ɛ; lɛ ese linu si lɛ mɛ lidra ɛki ba si Yesu atrága ba klɔ ɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem.
Agi yɛ badɔkpasi ba Yakobo ni Yohanes bɛmɔ lɛ gyesi i, beʋi si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, wɔpɛ si kuxwa kifu idɔni lifunu ne tɔ kibakani banɔ ba ya na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ekyi xe aka aŋu mɛ aki ba ɛ
Nite si Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bekyi itrɛ ní kamami dzedze me.
Agi bɛzɛtrɛ ní kudeo me e, onyime ɔtɔ asi Yesu si, “Ɔkɔ kakaa gi wɔatrɛ ɛ, maze ni wɔ kude.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wayu ʋa bɛmɔ beke ʋa, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ kyɛ kwimɔ evu na. Pɔ̀ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, ɔ́mɔ ɔkɔkɔ gi aafɛ ɛ, xe aayɔ isu mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu asi ɔnɔ dzedze si, “Zenì mɛ kude!”
Pɔ̀ onyimee asi yɛ si, “Ɔka kitɔ mizeevive mɔka xe e.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ki tɔ bekpo ba bevive ba tutɔ ba bekpo ba. Wɔ kɔ trɛ tɔ zepani ni Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa su u.”
Lɛ ɔnɔ dzedze kyɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ, maaku ni wɔ kude; pɔ̀ ki tɔ mizɛɛklá mɛ benete ba xe e.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɛwa lixwɛ xe ɔ́ʋiwa lɛ ni yɛ ɔna nɔ petee, ógyeno gi aasumu ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!”
Eboa la klɔ kede e, Ɔkaɛ ebu, badɔkpasi avi tegloele ni tiaʋa dzedze, lɛ atsisi ba tiaʋa tiaʋa kpɛ ɔtɔ ní ɔma kakaa ni ikɔɛ lɛ klɔ gi apɛ si yitrɛ ɛ mɛ.
Lɛ asi ba si, “Amu na lipapoe le lina pɔ̀ la bapapa ba básrɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso mleʋi tɔ ɔnyrɔɔ nɔ onetee ɔtsisi baxwɛwa ba ní yɛ kayaa mɛ tɔ bapa la.
Mlatrɛ! Mɛɛkpɛ mlɔ ŋwisi kuʋesibi kinɛ ní kuŋwafudroʋi yo kusi i.
Xe mlɛɛtrɛ ɛ, mlakívu kepimi loo ɔdɔʋi gudo loo afɔkpa lide ʋla, Mlakílɛɛ apani ɔnɔnɔ ní kudeo aʋa a.
“Xe mleti iku kepe katɔ mɛ ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, mlapani si, “Kusuyɔ kuze ní kepea lia aʋa a!”
Xegi kusuyɔ onete ɔlɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, mlɔ kusuyɔɔ kwiaze ní yɛ aʋa. Xe aní te pɔ̀ ɛ, mlɔ kusuyɔɔ kwiadzi kuba mlɔ klɔ.
Mlatí ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ. Mlaŋa bidɔ tɔ mlaŋwɛ kidɔ kakaa gi bɛki mlɔ ɛ; lɛ ese linu si ɔxwɛwa yɛ yɛ bizɛɛtsa liʋɛ ɛkɔ ɔ. Mlakítsrɛ kupeo o.
Xegi mleti iku ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ, xe bɛkpɛ mlɔ wolaa ɛ, mlaŋa kidiliɛ gi bɛki mlɔ ɛ.
“Mlayɔ ni banyanya ba ní ɔmaa lɔ klɔ mɛ, tɔ mlasi banima ní klɔ si, ‘Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ketipɔni mlɔ.’
Pɔ niklɔ gi mlɛtrɛ ɛ, xe bázɛ mlɔ ɛ, mledo ní lɔ ablɔ ʋa aʋa tɔ mlapani si,
‘Mlɔ ɔma nɔ mɛ ovugbo ɔlɔ klɔ gi evu blɔ kuklikpɔ kyɛ ɛ, kwisugu lo ɛplɛ ki mlɔ ŋwisi kiseʋi dúdu ní mlɔ su kinɛ ɛ, Pɔ̀ mlaplɛ aŋu si, Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa, ketipɔni mlɔ ɔ.’
Matrɔ likla lɛ aʋa aki mlɔ si, Aya aadi Sodom asigaga sani ɔma lɔ klɔ ní Litsixwawe le aʋa.

“Litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ Korazinanɛ ma; litraze gagla ɛki mlɔ Bɛtsaidanɛ ma kyɛ ní Litsixwawe le aʋa. Atɛsi enugutseboe ala gi bɛbitɛ ní mlɔ kusi i, xe Tiro ni Sidon ima nɛ mɛ bɛbitɛ la ɛ, nya niklɔ banɛ ma benyime akpanya, xe bɛdzà kusuʋɔtɔ tɔ libasɛ si bekyi ba ina nɛ mɛ ní ba eboe zimizi na su u.
Ni Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Aya aadi Tiro ni Sidon asigaga sani mlɔ.
Lɛ wɔ Kapernaum ɔma nɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, kitɛ wɔpɛ si wumuni isu ya lifune e? Lizokpo gluglui lɛ gi odukɔ ɔma kilɛ ɛ, lɛ mɛ bɛtráŋwia wɔ ɛkpɛ ɛ.
“Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Ɔniliɛ gi azɛ mlɔ liboe le e, mɛ liboe le azɛ; nite ke ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́zɛ mlɔ ɛ, mɛ ɔ́zɛ ɛ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́zɛ mɛ ɛ, Ɔkaɛ gi akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ ɔ́zɛ ɛ.”

Badɔkpasi avi tegloele ni tiaʋa ba bedzi dɔni kudeo me ni isami glegle. Lɛ bɛki kunutsatsa si, “Ɔkaɛ, agi kwidzɛ ɛ, xegi kwikpɛ isã ɛki ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne kura fɛ ní wɔ linyi ne me e, izenu kutu iiki blɔ.”
Yesu asi ba si, “Mamɔ Satana gi awɔli adɔ nɔ lifunu ne ŋwisi dzeni kifububu kinɛ ɛ.
Mlata kutu! Maki mlɔ kigagla si tɔ mlaatani kuga ní bagblaga ʋa ni kutapiadzɔɔ aʋa, lɛ mlaaŋa Ozimizi ye kigaglaɛ petee aʋa gi kididɔ kítrasa mlɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ isami ikíku mlo tete si ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne inu kutu iiki mlɔ ɔ; boŋu i, isami iku mlo si bɛŋwlimi mlɔ enyi na ní lifunu ne.”

Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ, Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ɛki si isami iyi Yesu me. Lɛ apani si, “Mɔka, wɔ wonu lifunu ne ni kesea Ɔkaɛ! Medo wɔ ɖase si wɔkɔ eboa la okpo beboete ba ni beplekpate ba, pɔ̀ woble la ɔbasɛ krutu ba. Ee, Ɔka, nite wɔ pɛ si lize.
“Mɔka akɔ bidɔ mɛ petee akpɛ mɛ awla. Ɔnɔnɔ óte ɔniliɛ gi Obi ye onu u sani Ɔkaɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ óte ɔniliɛ gi Ɔkaɛ onu u sani Obi ye ni banama gi beku Obi ye liŋu si yibu Ɔkaɛ basɛ ɛ.
“Lɛ Yesu ekyi edi yɛ badɔkpasi ba xe asi ba tètè dzaa si, “Kunya kulɛ mlɔ su koŋ gi mlɛmɔ eboa la aŋu mɛ ɛ.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, eboa la gi mlɛɛmɔ ɛ, beboedoplɛ glegle ni bekusi ba bɛpɛ la aŋu mɛ si bɛɛmɔ pɔ̀ líba lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ bɛpɛ si beenu eboa la gi mleenu i, pɔ̀ bénu u.”
Liba lɛ mɛ si ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ ɔtɔ aba Yesu klɔ gi apɛ si yipunu yɛ evu u. Lɛ eʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ,” “ege maabitɛ xe maamɔ ligbã́ moblo le e?”
Yesu eʋi ye si, “Kitɛ bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Mose ɔsã nɔ mɛ ɛ? Kitɛ wonu le ese e?”
Lɛ onyimee ebu le onu si, “Dimɛni Ɔkaɛ gi yɛ onu wɔ Aya ɛ, nì wɔ ɔna nɔ petee, nì wɔ esobo la petee, nì wɔ kigaglaɛ petee ani wɔ kugyodi yo petee. Lɛ dimɛni wɔ ɔhanuglɔɛ ŋwisi wɔ isu ya kinɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wobu le onu mumɔ, Trɛ tɔ zɛbitɛ kiliɛ gi wɔpani i, tɔ wɔaze ligbã́.”
Pɔ̀ ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ apɛ si yɛ linɛ ligyɔ ɔ; lɛ loso eʋi Yesu dzɛ si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu mɛ ɔhanuglɔɛ ɛ?”

Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Liba lɛ mɛ liwetɔ lɛ si, onyime ɔtɔ ádɔ Yerusalem gi azeeple atrɛ ní Yerixo e. Beze batɔ bɛdɔ yɛ aʋa, bɛzi yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee ní yɛ awla, bekusi ye lɛ bebu ye liya lɛ ɛ. Niteme si bɛyurɔ yɛ ɛplɛ gi etse okpokpo lo e.
Liba lɛ mɛ si kusɔli yɔ ɔka ɔtɔ azɛɛga kudeo liɔ klɔ ke, pɔ̀ gi amɔ onyimee gi bekusi i, aga kedepɛ ʋla aza a.
Nite ke Lewiɔnɛ ɔtɔ kyɛ gi aba na níklɔ ɔ xe edi onyime e, yɛ kyɛ aga kedepɛ ʋlaa aza yɛ aʋa.
Pɔ̀ Samaria ɔnɛ ɔtɔ gi yɛ kyɛ azɛɛga kudeo liɔ klɔ ɛ, aklani onyime onu. Gi amɔ yɛ ɛ, yɛ ɔna ekyi vu onyimee.
Eti apɔni yɛ su, lɛ abali wain ni kumu akpɛ ní yɛ ebi la mɛ ɛ, lɛ anya na ɛ. Lɛ efeke ye atrɔ ní yɛ tedzi ye aʋa a, xe akɔ yɛ atsinɔ ní bedega ba ɔyakɔ ɔtɔ ɔ, xe edi yɛ aʋa ɛ.
Keletitia mɛ ɛ, ebu bibɔ pititi tuʋa akɔ aki kepea ɔʋadi ye. Lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Di yɛ aʋa, tɔ kidɔ kakaa elu gi wɔazizi pɔnɔ ní yɛ litukpo e, maatsa kɛ ɔki wɔ xe medzi aba ɛ.’
“Lɛ Yesu agu yɛ liboe le ni kuʋiʋi si, “Ni wɔ kugyodi yo onu i, ni banɔ tiata ba ya mɛ ɛ, owoli onu ɔhanuglɔ ɔki odega liɛ gi awɔli eku ní beze ba iwla mɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ ɔsã nɔ ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ ebu le onu si, “ɔniliɛ gi edi yɛ asigaga ɛ.” Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wɔ kyɛ trɛ, tɔ zɛbitɛ nite ke e.”
Gi Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ní ba kudeo aʋa ɛ, beku kamamiatɔ mɛ gi ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si Marta eze e. Yɛ si azɛ Yesu akpɛ ní yɛ kepea mɛ.
Yɛ onemidzɛ ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛxwa si Maria ɛ, eze ní Yesu yɛ ikli lɛ onu gi azeenu yɛ kudɔbasɛ yɔ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ kaʋadi ya axwɛ na emi ní Marta tole aʋa a. Nite si Marta aba Yesu klɔ, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔka wɔ́kɔ lɛ me si monemi ye ayurɔ axwɛ na petee atrɔ ni mɛ tole aʋa a? Si yɛ tɔ ɔbapɔni mɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Marta, Marta wɔepè lɛ wɔxixa ní eboe glegle su u.
Pɔ̀ kidɔ tile ko kizia. Maria kɔ akya kidɔ gbã ɛ gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trazi kɛ ní yɛ awla a.”
Liwetɔ lɛ ɛ, Yesu azɛɛxwa Aya ní ɔkutɔ, gi abitɛ pɔ́ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tole asi yɛ si, “Ɔka basɛ blɔ kiliɛ gi kwiaxwa Aya ɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yohanes abasi yɛ baxwɛkpasi ba kinɛ ɛ.”
Yesu asi ba si, xegi mlɛɛxwa Aya ɛ, mlapani si,
“ ‘Ɔka, Kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ki wɔ linyi ne;
Ki tɔ wɔ Kaʋaŋaa keple kú ní blɔ kusi,
Ki blɔ liwe kakaa lɛ kiŋaŋaɛ.
Kɔ blɔ eboe zimizi na kyɛ blɔ ɔ,
ŋwisi kiliɛ gi blɔ kyɛ ɛ, kuzɛɛkɔ ɛkyɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛta blɔ ese kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ wukígbani blɔ ɛkpɛ kufekedi me e.’”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Xe liba lɛ mɛ si mlɔ mɛ tole atrɛ ní yɛ ɔʋia nɛ ɔtɔ kɔ elesi tetsu, lɛ asi yɛ si: ‘Ɔʋia dɔ àklã tatá ki mɛ.
Mɛ ɔʋia nɛ ɔtɔ gi aga kude e, abaya mɛ, pɔ̀ kididɔ kíma ní mɛ awla gi makɔ odu yɛ ketu ya.’
“Lɛ xegi liba lɛ mɛ si wɔ ɔʋiaɛ aabu le onu dɔni yɛ ligba lɛ mɛ si, ‘Wukíkpɛ mɛ kunugu u! Madà mɛ kevunu ya kooko, lɛ mɛ nì mɛ bebi ba kwiku ligba a. Mátratani kuyɔ xe maadi wɔ ɔza a.’
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xegi ɔ́yɔ ɔ ní kiliɛ mɛ gi wonu yɛ ɔʋia nɛ onu kyɛ ɛ, aayɔ ní wɔ su gi aaki wɔ ɔ kidiliɛ gi kizia wɔ ɔ, kɔkpɛ wɔ kunugu uliɔ gi wɔɛkpɛ yɛ loso o.”
“Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si i, mleʋi bidɔ tɔ baki mlɔ; mlapɛ bidɔ tɔ mlamɔ; mla sa opupo lo tɔ badra lɔ aki mlɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si, ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeʋi bidɔ ɛ, bizɛki yɛ; lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛpɛ bidɔ ɛ, izɛmɔ; lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izɛsa opupo lo e, bizɛdra lɔ ɛki yɛ.
“Nyaŋwɛ ɔlɛ ní ya gi onu obika xe Yebi ye aaʋi ye likpa a xe aakɔ̀ ɔgblaga ɔki yɛ ɛ?
Loo xe eʋi ye likukɔdze e, xe aakɔ̀ katapiadze

Mlɔ ŋwisi baka kinɛ gi mlɛnyani kyɛ ɛ, mlete kiliɛ gi mlaaki mlɔ bebi ba bidɔ gbã ʋɛ ɛ. Lɛ kitɛ gbɛgbɛ liaze xe mlɔ Ɔka yɛ ní lifunu ne e, ɔ́trayurɔ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ɛki banama gi biaʋi ye na a!”
Yesu azɛ kpikpini ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi gi ɔʋípani dono ní onyime ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ. Gi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi no edo pɔ́ ɛ, onyimee apani, gi litu linɔkpi le kugyɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ banɔ batɔ ní ba mɛ bɛpani si, “Belzebul gi yɛ onu ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne ɔkaɛ ɛ, yɛ aki Yesu kigaglaɛ xe ɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ ne edono o.”
Banɔ batɔ kyɛ bɛpɛ si bɛɛpunu Yesu. Lɛ loso e, beʋi idɔnɔ ní yɛ awla si, ɔbitɛ linugutseboe litɔ gi liabasɛ si Aya anya kpɛ yɛ ɛ.

Pɔ̀ gi Yesu etè ba begyodi ʋa onu i, asi ba si, “Kaʋaŋaa kakaa gi ka mɛ benete ba bɛyɔ kedu ní ba ahanuglɔ ba su i, kiayaʋi, lɛ kepe kakaa gi ka mɛ benete ba bɛyɔ kedu ní ba ahanuglɔ ba su i, kiayaʋi.
Lɛ loso e, xe Satana kaʋaŋaa kɛlɛ ní paso ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe bɛɛgɔni i, kitɛ liaze xe kiali i? Mlɛɛpani si Belzebul yɛ aki mɛ kigaglaɛ xe mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono o.

Xegi Belzebul aʋa mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono e, kɔ nyaŋwɛ yɛ kigagla mɛ mlɔ kude bezenozeno ba bizɛkpikpini lɛ edono e? Mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ kude bezenozeno ba ɛ, ba beebu mlɔ lipɔ si mlɔ linɛ lígyɔ ɔ!
Pɔ̀ xe Aya yɛ kigaglaɛ aʋa mɛɛkpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne edono e, libasɛ si Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛba mlɔ kusi kooko o.
“Xegi onyimewa eepe yɛ kepea ni yɛ bigutadɔ mɛ ɛ, yɛ kepea kizeze ní kusuyɔ mɛ.
Pɔ̀ xegi ɔniliɛ gi asani yɛ onu adɔ ní yɛ aʋa a, xe aŋa yɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔniliɛ klɔ aahali yɛ bigutadɔ mɛ gi bɛ aʋa ɛɛwa igyi le e, kɔ alɛ yɛ exo la ni yɛ baʋianɛ ba ɛ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɔ́ma mɛ aʋa ɛ, ayɔ kedu ní mɛ su. Ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́kpɛ bidɔ likpɔ ɔpɔni mɛ ɛ, kihle eehle ʋe.
“Xegi ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi edo ní ɔnɔ mɛ ɛ, izɛpɛ ozekɔ ɛklanɔ ní ɔyaya kɔ. Xegi ɔ́mɔ ɔkɔ gbã ɔtɔtɔ kɔ ɛ, izɛsi isu ya si, ‘Maadzi trɛ ní mɛ kepe kokoa mɛ.’
Xe edzi atrɛ ɛ, aamɔ si bɛgba kepea mɛ ɛlulɔ,
kɔ ɛzɛɛgbani ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tigloele dzedze gi inyani sani lɔ ɔtutɔ lɔ ɛmanɔ kɔ iiba kɔ iizɛ ní kepea mɛ, gɔgɔɛ ɔnɔɛ yɛ kizezee me kudegbaa kianyani sani kiliɛ gi eze tsã ɛ.”
Gi Yesu agù yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ ní ɔnɔha lɔ kusi apani si, “Aya aakrira one liɛ gi apɔ wɔ xe aki wɔ limwa nɛ ɛ.”
Pɔ̀ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Aya aakrira banama gi beenu Aya Liboe le xe bɛɛbitɛ ní lɛ aʋa a boŋu!”
Agi anɔkpi la ɛkpɛ likpɔ ní Yesu i, atrɛ ní yɛ kunugu yo aʋa si, “Kelea lia mɛ bebi ba ɛ, bɛnyani koŋu! Bɛɛpɛ linugutseboe si bɛɛmɔ ɔ; pɔ̀ bátramɔ litɔtɔ ɛ sani Yona yɛ linugutseboe le e.
Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Yona oboedoplɛɛ eze liŋwitsɛ aki Ninive banɛ ma ɛ, nite ke Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kyɛ aaze liŋwitsɛ aki abla kelea mɛ benete ba.

Ní Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Sheba Okusidzɛɛ, aayɔ alɛɛ gi aabu kiwlaʋi kukpɛ mlɔ abla bebi ba aŋu mɛ. Lɛ ese linu si aga adɔ ní yɛ kepea ke, gi aba ata Okusi ye Salomo yɛ kuboeteo kutu u. Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, ɔnutɔ gi ekeme asani Salomo ɔlɛ ní ya a.

Ní Litsixwawe le aʋa ɛ, Ninive banɛ ma kyɛ biayɔ ɔlɛɛ, gi bíabu mlɔ omono bebi ba lípɔ ɔ. Lɛ ese linu si bekyi ɔna mɛ gi benu Yona yɛ liboe le e. Lɛ mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ ní ya gi ekeme asani Yona ɛ.
“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔʋísu kani xe izɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ agba yɛ ese loo izekpo ye; boŋu i, izɛkɔ yɛ ɛtrɔ ní kani yɛ ose lo aʋa tɔ okle ɔki banama gi beetiku ní kepea mɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ bimbi ʋe binu kani ɔki mlɔ inɔse le. Xegi mlɔ bimbi ʋe bipɛ ɛ, kɔ mlɔ inɔse le ina ɛ. Pɔ xegi mlɔ bimbi ʋe bípɛ ɛ, kɔ mlɔ inɔse le iwɔ ní litumu ne me e.
Lɛ loso mledi le aʋa si kuklekleo kukídzi litumu ní mlɔ mɛ ɛ.
Xegi kuklekleo kwiyi mlɔ mɛ gi mlɔ inɔse le kapɛa tɔtɔ káma litumu me e, mlɔ inɔse le petee iaze ŋwisi kiliɛ gi kaniɛ izeekle bali ní mlɔ aʋa kinɛ ɛ.”
Gi Yesu agù yɛ kupaniɔ ɛ, Farisiɔnɛ ɔtɔ ekpe ye si ɔga aŋa bidɔ ni yɛ ní yɛ kepea mɛ. Lɛ loso Yesu atrɛ, eple eze lɛ ekpese bidɔ mɛ kuŋa ni yɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ litu Farisiɔnɛ kugyɔ si Yesu óplo awla xe ekpese bidɔ mɛ kuŋa a.
Lɛ Yesu asi kepea ɔkaɛ si, “Mlɔ Farisianɛ ma mlɛzeplo mlɔ kupliʋi yo ni kudɔŋazi yo kɔ kedea; pɔ̀ mlɔ mɛ eyi ni kuŋazi ni litukpo me gagla a.
Baga! Aní Aya gi abitɛ kedea ɛ, yɛ ke abitɛ kimɛ mɛ kyɛ na a?
Pɔ̀ kidiliɛ gi kikpasi ní mlɔ kupliʋi yo ni kuzi yo me e, mlakɔ kɛ aki bepiplinete ba tɔ kidɔ kakaa su kidra ɛki mlɔ ní mlɔ egoʋi la onu.

“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ Farisianɛ ma, lɛ ese linu si mlɛzɛki Aya oni bitɔ́dɔ, ni siwa flafla, kapɛ liɔfɔa, pɔ̀ mlapɛ si mlɛxwa etsi gyɔgyɔ, lɛ mlálɔ Aya kyɛ ɛ. Mlegyeni la ya kubitɛ pɔ̀ mlatrayurɔ atɔpu na kyɛ ɛ.
“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ Farisianɛ ma, mlɛzɛɛpɛ izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ; lɛ mlɛzɛɛpɛ si bapani mlɔ ni kubùbù ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa.
“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ! Mla lɛ ko ŋwisi idrɔ gi bákpɛ lɛ gyesi i, xe banima bize ga lɛ aʋa ɛza ní motemote me kinɛ ɛ.”
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba mɛ tole asi yɛ si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, xegi wɔɛɛpani eboa la ɛ, wɔekpini blɔ kyɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ kyɛ, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba! Mlɛtrɔ adɔtu zegbezegbe ní banima aʋa gi bátratani kutu i; pɔ̀ mlaʋíkpɛ awla si mlɛpɔni ba tɔ betu la a.
“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ! Mlɛlulɔ Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba ya gi mlɔ bakatsitsi ba beye e, ba idrɔ lɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ kibitɛɛ kibasɛ si mlɛtrɔ ní mlɔ bakatsitsi ba kiboebitɛɛ aʋa a; lɛ ese linu si beye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba lɛ mlɔ pɔ̀ mlɛba ɛʋɔ ba idrɔ lɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e Aya ní yɛ kuboeteo me e, edo aplɛ si, ‘Maatsisi ba beboedoplɛ ba ni baxwɛdzɛ ba; biaye ba mɛ batɔ, kɔ bɛyɔ kedu ní bedzedze ba su i.’
Nite si Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba klɔ petee gi beye e, dɔnɔ ní kelea likpese le gakɔna ni abla ɛ, mlɔ abla bebi ba ɛ, biaʋi ba kuwle dɔni mlɔ awla.

Kuwleo ki banama gi beye e dɔnɔ ní Abel aʋa gakɔna ni Zakaria gi yɛ beye ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ ni lisumugba lɛ kusi yo e. Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, biahe kutu ki mlɔ abla kelea bebi ba ní kunɔyeo liɔ klɔ petee litukpo!
“Litráze gagla ɛki mlɔ ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba! Mletso safi ye ebu ní kuboeteo ligba lɛ opupo lo onu. Mlɔ tutɔ mléʋiti ku lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ mletsi kudeo onu ɛki banama gi bɛɛpɛ si beetiku i.”
Agi Yesu asɛ níklɔ ɛ, Farisianɛ ma nì Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛyɔ kedu ní yɛ su lɛ beʋi ye beʋiʋi ní eboe glegle su ní kusuyeʋi me
lɛ ese linu si bɛpɛ si ɔpani liboe trama ɛtɔ tɔ bɛɛpunu ye evu.

Liba lɛ mɛ si banɔ akpe akpe ba bɛkpɛ likpɔ, gi beze ga ní ba ahanuglɔ ba aʋa kyɛ ɛ. Yesu agba yɛ badɔkpasi ba ní ɔtɔpu kɔ si, “Mlakpɛ lixaŋu ní Farisianɛ ma kunyasi yɔ gi kunu banɔ aŋu mɛ kiboebitɛ su u.
Kidɔ kpokpo kakaa kiaŋwi, lɛ liboe kpokpo kakaa liado oŋwe e.
Niteme si liboe kakaa gi mlapani ní litumu ne me e, bianu le ní liwo le kuklekle onu. Lɛ idali kakaa gi mlaado ní lifɛgba lɛ mɛ ɛ, biakla lɛ ní ivitɔ lɛ ɛ.
“Mɛ baʋia ba, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banama gi ɔnɔse lo ko biata ni kuye e, pɔ̀ xe bátratani kididɔ kubitɛ sanɔ ɛ, mlakíse ba.
Maasi mlɔ ɔniliɛ gi lilɛ si mlese e. Mlese Aya gi xegi eye ɔnɔ pɔ́ ɛ, kigagla kilɛ yɛ awla gi aatani yɛ kukpɛ ní kifumoni ye me e. Mlazi mɛ aʋa aŋa yɛ lilɛ si mlese e!
Aní pɛsɛwa tiaʋa ko bizɛda ayikpakpa tietsu i? Pɔ̀ Aya óʋidze ayikpakpa klɔ ʋa mɛ ni tole e!
Mlɔ pɔ̀ ɛ, mlɔ litukpo le siya sɛ kura kyɛ ɛ, bɛkla sɛ petee. Lɛ loso lifu likíku mlo o. Mlɛŋa kedzi isanɔ ayikpakpa glegle.
“Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banama gi bɛpani ní banima aŋu mɛ si mɛ benu mɛ banɛ ɛ, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kyɛ aapani ní Aya baxwɛdzɛ ba aŋu mɛ si, yɛ banɛ benu.
Nite ke banama gi bianada me ní banima aŋu mɛ ɛ, mɛ kyɛ maanada si mete ba ní Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba aŋu mɛ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aapani liboe zimizi yurɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, biakɔkyɛ yɛ. Pɔ̀ banama gi biapani liboe zimizi yurɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ ɛ, bátrakɔ kɔ ɛkyɛ ba a.
“Xegi bɛtsini mlɔ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ, loo kesea baʋaŋa ba aloo kesea ʋa bedidi ba aŋu mɛ, si baxwa litsi ni mlɔ ɛ, mlakípè ní kiliɛ gi mlaŋwlɛ isu, nì liboe lɛ gi mlaapani su u.
Lɛ ese linu si Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ aabasɛ mlɔ ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ eboa la gi mlapani i.”
Onyime ɔtɔ ní ɔnɔha lɔ kusi asi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, si mɛ onemi ye tɔ ɔlɛ kaŋasea gi blɔ ɔkaɛ ayurɔ aplɛ aki blɔɛ nì mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ebu le onu aki yɛ si, “Onyime, nyaŋwɛ edu me otsixwa loo ɔdɔlɛ ní mlɔ tiaʋa kusi i?”
Lɛ atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa aki ba petee si, “Mleze ni aŋu tɔ mledi mumɔ ní kuŋazi kakaa elu su; lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ ligbã limá ní yɛ exo kumɔmɔ mɛ ɛ, xegi ɔwla mɛ ɔlɛ yɛ kura kyɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu abee aki ba si, “Oxonete ɔtɔ eze gi kese keze ní yɛ awla a. Bidɔ mɛ bipɛ ní kesea aʋa mɔmɔmɔ.
Egyo le edi si, ‘Ɔdɔblakɔ ʋidi ɔma ní mɛ awla a gi maabla mɛ ɔnyrɔɔ nɔ mɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ.’
“Lɛ asi isu ya si, ‘Maayaʋi mɛ idɔblakɔ koko le tɔ maawa ivuvũ gi ikeme sanɔ ɛ. Niklɔ maayasi mɛ idoli le ni kayaa mɛ bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ kukpɛ ɛ.
Kɔ masi isu ya si, “Wɔmɔ ligbã. Bidɔ bilɛ ní wɔ awla ki agɔ glegle gi ɛɛtraba ɛ. Ze mɔni, ŋa, ŋwɛ tɔ mɔ̀ isami.” ’
“Pɔ̀ Aya asi yɛ si, “Wɔ Kanukpaʋi! Kele kátrati nì wɔ ɔ! Kɔ bidɔ mɛ gi wɔbla aplɛ ki wɔ isu ya ɛ, nyaŋwɛ binɛ bitradzì i?”
Lɛ Yesu agù yɛ liboe le si, “Nite litráze ɛki banama gi bexogo kelea mɛ exo la ɛki isu ya a, pɔ̀ xe benu bepiplinete ní Aya aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si mlakíkpɛ isu kunugu ní mlɔ ligbã́ nɛ su, kidiliɛ gi mlaaŋa loo ní mlɔ isu ya kidiliɛ gi mlaakpɛ su u.
Ligbã nɛ liziã boo esani kiŋaŋaɛ; lɛ ɔnɔse lo kyɛ ɛzia ɛsani kusa a.
Mledi akpavia ʋa: Baʋíwa ɔnyrɔɔ ɔ, lɛ baʋíyasi kididɔ ɔ, kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, owle ɔma ní ba awla a. Pɔ̀ Aya yɛ izɛ gani ba a. Lɛ mlɔ pɔ̀ mlɛŋa kedzi i sani kudzɔʋi yɔ ɔ.
Xegi mlekyi gyi ní mlɔ ligbã mɛ su kyɛ ɛ, mlɔ mɛ woli aatani ɔnyɔsasa tole kukɔpɔni yɛ ligbã nɛ na a?
Lɛ xe mlaʋítani liboe sisami la ya elu kulɔ ɛ, ege loso mlɛɛkpɛ isu kunugu ní bidɔ gɔgɔ ʋɛ su u?

“Mlevu aŋu ní otukpomeyaʋi lɔ kitsitsi ye su. Ɔʋíwa lixwɛxwɛ, lɛ ɔʋiyó kusa ki isu u. Pɔ̀ mɛsi mlɔ si Okusi ye Salomo ní yɛ kukusi yo ni yɛ kusudraa petee me kyɛ, yɛ bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bitipɔni lɔ kufufu yo ní kupedi me e.
Xegi nite Aya izɛkpɛ kupedi ni siwa sɛ su gi silɛ omono, kivo pɔ̀ siyrɔ, kɔ sitse kɔ bɛkani sɛ ni kifu i. Kitɛ xe ɔ́trakɔ lɛ mɛ ɛki mlɔ ɛsani siwa sɛ ɛ? Kitɛ xe mlɔ kuziŋaa kulɛ sisami te e?
Lɛ loso mlakíkpɛ isu kunugu ní kiŋaŋa ni kiŋwɛŋwɛ su u.
Lɛ ese linu si babubitɛ ba ɛ, bidɔ bɛ ya petee elu su bizeekyigyi. Pɔ̀ mlɔ Ɔkaɛ etè si biziã mlɔ.
Boŋu i, mleti yɛ kaʋaŋaa tɔ yɛ pɔ̀ ɛ aakɔ̀ bidɔ bɛ ya ʋa ɔki mlɔ ɔ.
“Mlɔ ɔhá sisami nɔ, lifu likíku mlo o. Lɛ ese linu si liku mlɔ Ɔkaɛ aŋu si ɔkɔ Kaʋaŋaa ɔki mlɔ ɔ.

Mlada mlɔ isu ya bidɔ mɛ tɔ mlakɔ kibɔɛ aki bepiplinete ba. Xe mlɛbitɛ nite e, bibɔ ikotoku gi itrapu i, iaze mlɔ awla ní lifunu ne. Lɛ niklɔ ʋa ɛ, mlɔ exo la atráŋini i, lɛ ese linu si oze ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́ma ni iklɔ ɔ, lɛ asu na kyɛ atrázizi bidɔ ɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si niklɔ gi wɔ exo la alɛ ɛ, niklɔ wɔ ɔna nɔ izeze.
“Mleze kublabla mɛ ki liboe kakaa elu gi liaba lɛ mɛ ɛ, mlanya agbagya la tɔ mledi le aʋa si mlɔ ibia lɛ iisɔ lipoe kakaa,
tɔ mleze ŋwisi besumubi ba klɔ gi beepe ba ɔkaɛ kubaba dɔnɔ ní ɔdzɛgbanɔ klɔ kinɛ ɛ. Tɔ xegi aba asa opupo lo e tɔ biadra lɔ ɔki yɛ kyɔŋ.
Biakrira besumubi ba klɔ gi biaze nì aŋu xe ba Ɔkaɛ aadzi i. Mɛɛsi mlɔ si kepea ɔkaɛ aasama yɛ kusaa kɔ aki si yɛ besumubi ba beze kese kɔ yɛ ɔtutɔ esumu ba ɛ.
Biakrira besumubi ba klɔ gi bɛbla ɛki ba Ɔkaɛ yɛ kubabaa, elesi tetsu loo olezatɔ ɔ.
Mlete le si, xegi kepea ɔkaɛ etè lipoe lɛ gi oze ye aaba ɛ, ɔ́traki yɛ kudeo onu si ɔyaʋi opupo lo ní yɛ onu tɔ oti oku ní yɛ aʋa.
Nite ke mlɔ kyɛ ɛ, mlabla aplɛ; lɛ ese linu si Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e, aaba ní ɔnyɔsasaa lɔ klɔ aʋa gi mlaʋídi yɛ kudeo onu u.”
Petro eʋi si, “Blɔ Ɔkaɛ, abee liɛ gi wobu i, blɔ wobu ye ɔkɔ putɔ wobu ye ɔki ɔnɔ kakaa na a?”
Ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Osumubi woli onu ɔgbã ɛ nì oboete e?” Yɛ onu iliɛ gi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ kepea akpɛ awla akɔ ɔ, gi yɛ aaki besumubi dzedze ba ba kiŋaŋaɛ ní lipoe gbã nɛ aʋa a.
Biakrira osumubi liɛ klɔ, xegi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ aaba klani yɛ onu gi ɛɛwa nite me axwɛ na ɛ.
Sugba ɛ, kepea ɔkaɛ aakɔ̀ yɛ exo la petee akɔ kpɛ osumubi liɛ klɔ awla si odi be aʋa.
Pɔ̀ xegi osumubi liɛ klɔ aasi isu ya si, liadze xe mɛ kepea ɔkaɛ adzi i, xe aakpese besumubi benyime ni badzɛ ba kukusi i, xe ɛɛŋa xe ɛɛŋwɛ emu i;
Lɛ xe kepea ɔkaɛ aadzi ní lipoɛ lɛ klɔ mɛ gi osumubi ye ógyo odi, ni liwe lɛ aʋa gi ɔ́plɛ aŋu i, Yɛ, kepea ɔkaɛ aafli ye kukpe kukpe aakɔ̀ yɛ ɔkpɛ batu gagla benete ba kusi i.
Lɛ loso e, osumubi liɛ klɔ gi ete yɛkaɛ yɛ kupɛpɛɔ, pɔ̀ xe ɔ́blaa ɔki kɔ aʋa kubitɛ ɛ, biafiaʋi yɛ biseʋi glegle ŋwisi kutuhehe kinɛ.

Pɔ̀ osumubi liɛ klɔ gi óte yɛkaɛ kupɛpɛɔ xe ata kese e, biahe kutu ki yɛ taʋɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi bɛki bidɔ glegle e, biaʋi bidɔ glegle dɔni yɛ iwla mɛ. Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi bɛki bidɔ ɛsanɔ ɛ, biaʋi bidɔ glegle sanɔ dɔni yɛ awla.
Maba si míkpɛ kifu kesea aʋa, gi nya mapɛ si kikpese kusɔ kooko xe e.
Pɔ̀ lilɛ si miga baxixa ba mɛ, ŋwisi kuni kpɛkpɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ maxixa isu ya mɛ kɔkpɛ ni lipoe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Kigyo mlegyo edi si mɛ kubaba ɛ, kwiamani kusuyɔ ní kelea mɛ lo o? Owo, kútramani kusuyɔ pɔ̀ kulɛlɛ ɛ.
Dɔnɔ abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, ní banɔ tietsu ní kepe me e, ba mɛ tiata biayɔ kedu ní tiaʋa su u, lɛ tiaʋa kyɛ biayɔ kedu ní tiata su u.

Baka ba biayɔ kedu ní ba bebinyime ba su u, lɛ bebinyime ba biayɔ kedu ni ba baka ba su u. Bene biayɔ kedu ni ba bebidzɛ ba su, lɛ bebidzɛ ba kyɛ biayɔ kedu ní ba bene ba su u. Banadze ba biayɔ kedu ní ba beblidze ba su, lɛ beblidze ba kyɛ biayɔ kedu ní ba banadze ba su u.
Yesu asi banima si, “Xegi mlɛmɔ aplɛ la gi ɛdɔ ní keweku ya ɛ, kɔ mlɔsi si dzeni ye atrádɔ ɔ; lɛ izɛdɔ kyɛ ɛ.
Lɛ xegi liwɔ lɛ lifu idɔnɔ ni kalea ɔza lɔ ɛ; kɔ mlɛsi si kana mɛ kɛtraze kpikpi, gi lizɛba lɛ mɛ te kyɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ boe bitɛ ba! Xegi mlɛtani kesea ni liwɔ lɛ mɛ kizezee kudi i, gi mlɔ kiboedoe kizɛba kɛ mɛ ɛ, ege lɛ loso xe mlatrátani abla eboe la ese kunu u?”
“Ege lɛ loso mlatrátrɛ mlɔ isu ya mɛ edi xe mlate kidiliɛ gi mlabitɛ ɛ?

Xegi ɔnutɔ akɔ liboe ní wɔ su u, xe atsini wɔ ní otsixwakɔ ɛ, kenidi tɔ mlalulɔ liboe le ní mlɔ kusi xe ableke mlaaku otsixwaklɔ ɔ. Xe aníte e, aatsini wɔ ní otsixwa yɛ aŋu mɛ ɛ, kɔ yɛ kyɛ akɔ wɔ akpɛ ní ɔsã nɔ aʋa odidi ye awla ɛ, kɔ bɛkpɛ wɔ ligba lɛ ɛ.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, níklɔ wɔaze ga kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi wɔtsa liʋɛ kakaa a, gi bɛnya ɛki wɔ ɛ.”
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banɔ batɔ beze ní iklɔ gi bɛsi Yesu kiliɛ gi Pilato eye Galileanɛ atɔ ɔ, xe apisa ba ika lɛ ni bidɔ mɛ ɛ gi bɛzɛpɔʋi ɛki Aya a.
Yesu ebu le onu si “Kigyo mlegyo edi si Galileanɛ baklɔ gi beye te e, ba bɛsa eboe zimizi na kubitɛ sani Galileanɛ gɔgɔ ba na a?
Aníte lilɛ ɛ! Lɛ loso mɛɛsi mlɔ si, xegi mlékyi ní mlɔ eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ, mlɔ pɔ́ mlaatse e!
Aloo banɔ liɔfɔ ni ɔgɔtiaʋa klɔ gi Siloam lifune ligba lɛ likpa ebu u, xe betse e, kɔ ba benu banɔ zimizi ba sani banama petee gi bali Yerusalem na a?
Kura! Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si xegi mlékyi ní mlɔ eboe zimizi na mɛ ɛ, mlɔ pɔ́ mlaatse e.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu abee liɛ aki ba si: Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi akpɛ mangɔ ni yɛ wain ɔnyrɔ mɛ ɛ, Adzɛ si yigu esebi ní mangɔ yɛ mɛ, pɔ ɔ́mɔ litɔtɔ ɔ.
Lɛ loso asi yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa odidi ye si, “Agɔ tata nyɔŋ la ya gi mɛɛba ni ya pɔ́ mámɔ, lisebitɔtɔ ní ose lo me e. Lɛ loso e tsa lɔ tuʋe e! Líma si ozezizi kesea ki mɛ ɛ.”
Pɔ ɔnyrɔ nɔ ɔʋadi ye asi yɛ si, “ ‘Ɔka,’ ‘yurɔ lɔ ligɔ tile dzɛ ɛ. Maatu lɔ su tɔ maakpɛ biŋaŋa lɔ su.
Xegi eyo galigɔ ɛ, liapɛ; pɔ xe aníte e, wɔatani kuki si biatsa lɔ fãa.’ ”
Ní Sabat liwe etɔ aʋa ɛ, Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ ní Yudanɛ ma Ɔtsaklɔ.
Ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ eze niklɔ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔtɔ evu ye agɔ liɔfɔ ni ɔgɔtaʋa nyɔŋ ɛ. Ɔdzɛɛ axa eku gi ɔ́zɛtani kugyɔ ɔ xe alɛɛ kedu ya kura a.
Gi Yesu amɔ yɛ ɛ, axwa yɛ atsisi lɛ asi yɛ si, “Ɔdzɛ, wɔ kunyaa, kwiyurɔ wɔ!”
Lɛ atrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa a, ko lɛ ayɔ xe agyɔ ɔlɛ ɛ, niteme si ɔdzɛɛ akpɔ Aya!

Pɔ̀ Yudanɛ ma Ɔtsaklɔ ɔʋadi ye, amɔ kusuyeʋi si Yesu ayɔ ni ɔnyanya ní Sabat liwe le aʋa a. Lɛ loso apani asi banima si, “Ewe teglo alɛ gi kiawa axwɛ ɛ, lɛ loso lilɛ si mlaba ní ewe teglo ala klɔ mɛ tɔ bayɔni mlɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ aní ní Sabat liwe le aʋa a.”
Lɛ Ɔkaɛ azɛ lɛ yɛ onu si, “Mlɔ banɔ aŋu mɛ boebitɛ ba,! Mlɔ mɛ ɔkakaa izebu yɛ tedzi ye loo ligume nyime ne edono ní kuka mɛ gi izɛgbani bɛ zɛki bɛ kuni ní Sabat liwe le aʋa a.
Abla Abraham ye obidzɛ liɛ gi Ozimizi ye evu anya agɔ liɔfɔ ni ɔgɔtaʋa nyɔŋ la ya ɛ; Kɔ bakíble ye adɔ ni yɛ kunyaa mɛ ní Sabat liwe le aʋa na a?”
Kuye kwiku yɛ ahwafianɛ ma petee pɔ̀ banima kɔ ɛ, isami iku ba ní enugutseboe ala petee gi Yesu azaabitɛ su u.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi si, “Kitɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ɛ? Lɛ ege maakɔ ka kusrɔnɔ ɔ?”
Kaʋaŋaa kalɛ ŋwisi lisebi sisami gi onyime ɔtɔ akpɛ ní yɛ kayaa mɛ kinɛ ɛ. Lisebi le litsi gi lidzi ose ʋidi ɔtɔ gi kudzɔʋi yɔ kwiwa evu na ɛkpɛ ní lɔ ayaa la mɛ ɛ.
Yesu eʋi dzɛ si, ege maakɔ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa srɔnɔ ɛ?
Kalɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ akɔ kunyasi sisami kutɔ akɔ apisa kunɔ kpaŋukpaŋu utɔ gi kwiki si amɔwɔ yɛ petee eho kinɛ ɛ.
Yesu aga aklanɔ ní ima ni kumami yɔ mɛ azaabasɛ bidɔ gi azaatrɛ ní Yerusalem i.
Ɔnutɔ eʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ, kɔ banɔ kiklakla mɛ sisami itɔ ko kiamɔ kububu na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si,
Mlekeni edi tɔ mleti iku gani kevunu pɔpɔa mɛ; lɛ ese linu si meetrɔ likla lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si; banɔ glegle bɛtráŋwlɛ si beti eku pɔ̀ batrátanɔ ɔ.
Xegi kepea ɔkaɛ ayɔ xe ada opupo lo e, xe mlalɛ ni oŋwe no o, xe mlɛsa opupo lo o si, “Ɔkaɛ, Kwiki wɔ litukpo o, dra opupo lo ki blɔ ɛ!”
Pɔ̀ aasi mlɔ si, “Méte mlo loo niklɔ gi mlɛdɔ ɔ!”
Niklɔ mlɔ kyɛ mlaabù isu ya onu si, “Blɔ ni wɔ kwiŋa lɛ kwiŋwɛ kyɛ ɛ, lɛ wɔbasɛ bidɔ ní blɔ ima nɛ ablɔ ʋa aʋa a!”
Pɔ̀ aasi mlɔ dzɛ si, “Méte mlo loo niklɔ gi mlɛdɔ ɔ! Mlasɛ ní mɛ su, mlɔ litukpo me gagla benete ba.
Mlaabemi gi mlata ene na a, xegi mlɛmɔ Abraham, Isak, Yakob ani beboedoplɛ ba petee ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ xe bɛŋwia mlɔ xunyɔ ɛkpɛ ni oŋwe no e.
Banɔ biadɔ ní kewetu ya, keweku ya, kaʋa ni kale gi biaŋa lɛ biaŋwɛ bidɔ ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.
Nite me si banama gi ba benu banɔ gɔgɔ ba abla ɛ, ba biaze banɔ tɔpu ba, lɛ banama gi benu banɔ tɔpu abla ɛ, ba biaaze banɔ gɔgɔ ba.”
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖii, Farisianɛ batɔ bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ bɛsi ye si, “Sɛ ní niya tɔ trɛ ní ɔkɔ dzedze lɛ ese linu si Herodes ɛɛpɛ si yiye wo.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlazɛsi wayu liɛ klɔ si, ‘Matrakpikpini ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne e dono, lɛ maayɔni banyanya ba kyɛ omono ni kivo o. Liwetanɛ we le e, maagù mɛ axwɛ na.’
Pɔ linu si mize kudeo me omono, kivo ni kivodé. Líma si beye oboedoplɛ ní ɔkɔkɔ sani Yerusalem.

“Wɔ Yerusalem, Woye Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba, lɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi Aya atsisi i, wɔsa ba akla na. Tasɛ mapɛ si mikpɛ wɔ bebi ba likpɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ɔkukɔnee izewe yɛ bebi ba kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ wɔ́ki mɛ kudeo onu u!
Lɛ loso e, wɔ lisumugba lɛ lilɛ kiwɔ pluplu. Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, mlatrámɔ mɛ tɔɔ kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi mlaakpɛ osayee lo si, ‘Aya ɔkrira ɔniliɛ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ linyi ne me e!’ ”
Liba lɛ mɛ ní Sabat liwe etɔ aʋa si Yesu atrɛ ní Farisianɛ ma ɔnɔ ʋidi ɔtɔ yɛ kepea mɛ bidɔ ɔŋa kɔ; lɛ banima bezevu aŋu ní Yesu su mɔmɔmɔ ɔ.
Gi si yidi i, onyime ɔtɔ gi yɛ ikli ni iwla iye e, aba edo ní yɛ aŋu mɛ.
Yesu eʋi Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni Farisianɛ ma si, “Blɔ Ɔsã nɔ ɛki kude si bayɔni ɔnyanya ní Sabat liwe le aʋa loo kitɛ ɛ?”
Pɔ̀ banima bapani i. Lɛ Yesu ebu onyimee kuka a, ayɔni yɛ, lɛ akpɛ yɛ kude e.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Xegi mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ Yebi i, loo yɛ ligume liwɔli iku ní vudo ye me ní Sabat yɛ aʋa a, mlaatrábu ba kyɔŋ ní Sabat yɛ ɔtutɔ aʋa na?”
Pɔ̀ bátani liboe lɛ ya onu kubu kí yɛ ɛ.
Gi Yesu akpɛ lɛ lixaŋu kiliɛ gi banɔkpekpe ba bɛzɛpɛ izekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɛ ki isu ya ɛ, Yesu ebu abee liɛ aki ba petee si,
Xegi ɔnutɔ axwa wɔ amanɔ ní ɔdzɛ ɔgbanɔkplɔ su i, wukíze ní ozekɔ gyɔgyɔ lɔ ɔ; lɛ ese linu si wóte xe bekpe ɔnɔ gbɔgbɔ sani wɔ amanɔ ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su u.
Xegi liba lɛ mɛ nite e, kɔ kepea ɔkaɛ aabasɛ wɔ si, yɔ ní wɔ ozeklɔ ki onyime liɛ ya. Liaki si wɔayɔ ni kuyeo me kɔ wɔzedi ni ozekɔ lɔ gi óku aŋu i.

Boŋu i, xegi bɛxwa wɔ ɛtsini ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i, wukize ni ɔgyɔgyɔ kɔ ɔ, tɔ xe kepea ɔkaɛ aba ɛ, aasi wɔ si, “Ɔʋia, yɔ tɔ zeeze ní ɔkɔ gbã ɔtɔ kɔ sanɔ.” Liaki si kubùbù kwiaze ní wɔ su ní banɔxwaxwa ba petee aŋu mɛ sanɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔ kakaa gi emuni isu ya ɛ, biaple ni ye, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi epleni isu ya ɛ, biamuni ye.

Lɛ Yesu asi kepea ɔkaɛ si, xegi wɔ si wutrɔ ɔkplɔ ɛ, kíxwa wɔ baʋia nɛ, wɔ benemi, wɔ baŋanɛ loo banama gi ɔwla mɛ ɔlɛ ba a; lɛ ese linu si ba kyɛ ɛ, biadzini wɔ kuxwa gani lɛ mɛ ɛ, kɔ bɛtsa wɔ kuxwaxwaa liʋɛ nɛ ɛki wɔ ɛ.
Lɛ loso xegi wɔtrɔ ɔkplɔ ɛ, xwa bepiplinete ba, banama gi ba kapɛ tiele ketse e, bafa ba ani kuŋupoo,
kɔ Aya akrira wɔ ɛ; lɛ ese linu si ba batrátani wɔ liʋɛ nɛ kutsa ki wɔ ɔ. Aya aatsa liʋɛ nɛ ɔki wɔ ní liwee lɛ aʋa gi eboe gbã na babitɛbitɛ ba biayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ.
Lipoe lɛ gi banama gi beze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su ni Yesu ba mɛ tole enu liboe le e, asi yɛ si, “Banama gi biaŋa bidɔ ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ ʋidi lo su ni lifunu ne kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, isami koŋ bɛtra mɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Onyime ɔtɔ atrɔ ɔkplɔ ʋidi ɔtɔ, lɛ axwa banɔ gbí si bagaŋa bidɔ ni yɛ ɛ.
Agi bidɔ mɛ liŋapoe le lina ɛ, akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye si ɔzɛsi banɔxwaxwa ba si, ‘Mlaga ba, kidɔ kakaa kiflɔ.’
“Pɔ̀ ba petee bekpese ba baxixa ʋa kubu basɛ tole tole e. Ɔnɔ tɔpu yɛ asi ɔnɔsumu ye si, ‘Medzi kese katɔ gi lilɛ si mizɛɛtapo kamɛ odi i, lɛ loso e, zi mɛ kuxixaa ki mɛ.’
Ɔnɔ dzedze kyɛ si, ‘Medzi egume nyime liɔfɔ tɔ míkɔ ɛsɔ mɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ, nite si kudeo me malɛ te gi matrɛsɔ ni la edi i, lɛ loso mátratani ku ba a.’
“Ɔnɔ dzedze kyɛ si, ‘magbani ɔdzɛ vuvu lɛ loso mátratani kuba a.’

“Ɔnɔsumu ye azɛɛki yɛ ɔkaɛ kunutsatsaa. Ɔkaɛ amɔ kusuyeʋi gagla lɛ asi yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye si, ‘Kɔsi tɔ trɛ ní ɔma nɔ ablɔ ʋa aʋa ni igbade ne me, tɔ zɛɛxwa bepiplinete ba, bafa ba, kuŋupoo ni banama gi kapɛ tiele ketse ki ba ɛ manɔ.’
“Gi liŋwe ne si lɛdɔ ɛ, ɔnɔsumu ye edzi aba lɛ asi yɛ kepea ɔkaɛ ɛ si, ‘Lixwɛ nɛ gi wɔkpɛ mɛ ɛ, mawa lɛ. Pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, izekɔ lɛ iʋíblo o.’
Nite si ɔkaɛ asi ɔnɔsumu ye si, ‘Do trɛ ní inyrɔ nɛ bede ʋidi ʋa aʋa ni ikli lɛ bede ʋa me tɔ xwa ɔnɔ kakaa gi wɔamɔ manɔ ɔ, tɔ mɛ kepea keyi.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banama petee gi bɛxwa ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, ba mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́trakpɛ mɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ aʋa kididɔ ní onugu me e.’ ”
Liwe etɔ lɛ gi Yesu ni linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ beze ní kudeo aʋa ɛ, ekyi lɛ asi ba si,
“Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aba mɛ klɔ ɛ, ɔ́tratani mɛ ɔdɔkpasi kudzi xegi ɔ́lɔ mɛ sani ɔka loo one e, odze loo bebi, beneminyime loo benemidzɛ, loo yɛ tutɔ yɛ isu ya kyɛ.
Banama gi bátratani ba tutɔ ba isetsase le kutu u, xe biakuni mɛ kude e, bátratani mɛ badɔkpasi kuze e.
“Xegi mlɔ mɛ tole ɔtɔ atrɔ si yiwa lifunu ligba a, liziã si oze kese ní ɔtɔpu kɔ, tɔ obu akɔnta atɔ odi si tiasɛ ligba lɛ liazɛ ɛ, lɛ kibɔ kisrɛ ní yɛ awla gi aatani ligba lɛ kuwa gù na a.
Xegi óbu ɔkliɔ lɔ klɔ ɛ, ɔ́tratani ligba lɛ kuwa gù u, xe akpɛ ɔxɔ lɔ pɔ ɛ. Nite si banama petee gi biamɔ yɛ kibitɛ ɛ, biamwɛ yɛ.
Kɔ bɛpani si, ‘Onyime liɛ ekpese ligba lɛ kuwa pɔ̀ ɔ́tani lɛ kugù u.’
“Xegi okusi ɔtɔ akɔ baguta akpe liɔfɔ si yitrɛta kigũ ni okusi dzedze gi baguta akpe avi taʋa balɛ yɛ awla ɛ, aaze kese gi aadi si kɔ yɛ atani kigũ kuta ní okusi liɛ klɔ na a?
Xegi ete si yɛ ɔ́tratanɔ ɛ, kɔ akpɛ banɔ ní okusi liɛ klɔ kɔ lipoe lɛ gi ba kusi kwidze e, tɔ beʋi kusuyɔ.
Lɛ Yesu agu yɛ liboe le si, Nite ke mɛɛsi mlɔ si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani mɛ ɔdɔkpasi kuze e sanɔ si ayurɔ kidɔ kakaa gi kilɛ yɛ awla ɛ.”
“Kùmwɛ kuzeze ɔgyi, pɔ̀ xegi ɔgyi nɔ eblo ní kɔ mɛ ɛ, bátratani ɔgyi kukpɛ ní kɔ mɛ tɔ ɔ.
Kúpɛ ɛki kididɔ tɔ ɔ, kiŋwia ko biaŋwia kɔ oʋe. Xegi kutu kuli mlɔ ɛ, tɔ mlenu.”
Liwetɔ lɛ gi babɔgyɔ glegle atɔ ni banɔ zimizi ba beti ipɔni Yesu si beenu yɛ eboe la ɛ,
Farisianɛ ma ni ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛzɛɛta ànyà na si, “Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, ɛɛzi banɔ zimizi ba lɛ izɛɛŋa bidɔ ni ba kyɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu abee liɛ akí ba si;

Xe iʋesi alafa tole ilɛ mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔ awla a, xe tole ɛlila ní lɛ kusi i, ɔ́trayurɔ iʋesi avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole le ní lɛ bidɔ mɛ ɔŋa klɔ ɔ, xe iipɛ oʋesi ɔlɔ gi ɛlila a kɔkpɛni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi aamɔ lɔ na a?
Lɛ xe amɔ lɔ ɛ, aafeke lo trɔ ní yɛ aŋwladɔ na aʋa nì isami
xe akɔ lɔ amani kepea mɛ ɛ. Kɔ axwa yɛ baʋia nɛ ba ni yɛ axolika ba kpɛ likpɔ kɔ asi ba si, “Mlamɔ isami ni mɛ; mamɔ mɛ oʋesi ɔlɔ gi ɛlila na a.”
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si niteme ke biamɔ isami glegle ní lifunu ne ní ɔnɔ zimizi tole gi ekyi yɛ ɔna mɛ su u, sani banɔ avi ɔgɔtole ni ɔgɔtole ba ya gi benu banɔ gbã xe bázia kukyikyi i.
Loo ɔdzɛ gi bibɔ pititi liɔfɔ bilɛ ní yɛ awla a, xe tile kilila kɛ su i, ɔ́trasu kani i, xe aagba yɛ kepea mɛ tɔ yipɛ kibɔɛ tsiitsiitsii kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi aamɔ kɛ ɛ?
Lɛ xe amɔ kɛ ɛ, aaxwa yɛ baʋia nɛ ba ni yɛ axolika ba kpɛ likpɔ xe aasi ba si, ‘Mlamɔ isami ni mɛ; Mamɔ mɛ kibɔɛ liɛ gi kilila ɛ.’
Nite me ké mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba biamɔ isami glegle kɔkpɛ ɔnɔ zimizi tole gi ekyi yɛ ɔna mɛ loso o.
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi bebinyime tiaʋa beze ní yɛ awla a.
Obinuvɔɛ asi yɛ ka si, ‘Ɔka, kɔ mɛ ɔŋa klɔ kí mɛ.’ Lɛ alɛ yɛ bidɔ mɛ aki ba tiaʋa ɛ.
“Ewe klakla atɔ kede e, ɔnuvɔɛ ada yɛ bidɔ mɛ lɛ akɔ kibɔɛ xe ekú kude me e. Atrɛ ní kese dzedze katɔ aʋa gi niklɔ azeezizi yɛ kibɔɛ gani ligbãŋaŋa mɛ ɛ.
Gi ezizi yɛ bidɔ mɛ petee e, kuʋɛ gagla kutɔ kwidɔ ní kesea lia klɔ aʋa, nite si eku ɔzia mɛ gi kididɔ kigɔ yɛ awla tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ loso e, akɔ isu ya apɔni kesea klɔ aʋa ɔnɔ gi aki yɛ axwɛ ní yɛ ɔnyrɔ mɛ si ozeedi yɛ iha lɛ aʋa a.
Nya azɛapɛ si yiŋa iha lɛ kiŋaŋaɛ, pɔ́ ɔnɔnɔ ɔki yɛ kitɔtɔ si ɔŋa a.
“Gɔgɔɛ enyime lɛ asi isu ya si, ‘Mɔka yɛ baxwɛwa ba pɔ́ ɛ, ba kiŋaŋaɛ kisrɛ sani ba kuŋaŋa, lɛ mɛ pɔ̀ kuʋɛ kuha mɛ kuye ni ya a!
Maayɔ, maatrɛ ní mɔka klɔ lɛ maasi yɛ si, Mɔka matá Aya ni wɔ ese.
Mégyeno si wɔaxwa mɛ si wobi tɔ ɔ, bitɛ mɛ ŋwisi wɔ baxwɛwa ba mɛ tole kinɛ ɛ.’
Lɛ loso e ayɔ ekú kudeo me gi ɛɛtrɛ ní yɛka klɔɛ ɛ. “Pɔ̀ gi eze ní ɔdzage no e, yɛka amɔ yɛ atsisi; yɛ ɔna nɔ ekyi evu ye, lɛ ese e xe azɛɛkpɛ awla ni yɛ ole lo o, xe amu yɛ adzɔ la ɛ.
Lɛ obi ye apani si, ‘Mɔka matá Aya ni wɔ ese. Mégyeno si wɔaxwa mɛ si wobi tɔ ɔ.’
“Pɔ̀ yɛ ka axwa yɛ banɔsumu ba lɛ asi ba si, ‘Mlakɔ si, tɔ mlaakɔ liwu gblamadza gbã nɛ petee amanɔ tɔ mlakɔ lɛ akpɛ aki yɛ. Mlakpɛ asukpɛɛ ní yɛ kíwlaʋi yɛ tɔ mlakpɛ afɔkpa ʋa yɛ kuklikpɔ ɔ.
Atɔ mlazevu ligume obi liɛ gi amɔ isu ya mɛ ɛ, mleye ye tɔ kumɔ isami.
Lɛ ese linu si lize ŋwisi mobinyime liɛ etse e, pɔ̀ abla ɛ, ɔlɛ ligbã́; alila, pɔ̀ abla ɛ, bɛmɔ yɛ. Lɛ bekpese isami nɛ kumɔ ɛ.
“Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, yebinyime tsitsi ye eze ní ɔnyrɔ mɛ. Gi atrédzi i xe eti apɔni kepea mɛ ɛ, enu idzi ni evu kuyoyo.
Lɛ axwa banɔsumu ba mɛ tole lɛ eʋi ye si, ‘liboe woli liitrɛ lɛ aʋa a?’
Ebu le onu akí yɛ si, ‘Wonemi ye yɛ edzi aba kepea, lɛ wɔka eye ligume obi liɛ gi eku kumu u, lɛ ese linu si amɔ Yebi ye gi alila a xe edzi aba ni isu mɛ pɛ̀pɛ̀ mɛ.’
“Pɔ̀ obinyime tsitsi ye eyeʋi isu ya gbɛgbɛ si ɔdimɛ si yitiku kepea mɛ ɛ; lɛ yɛka aba a xe aki yɛ litukpo si oti oku kepea mɛ ɛ.

Pɔ̀ ebu le onu akí yɛka si, ‘Dí, mɔka agɔ ala ya petee gi mawa axwɛ na aki wɔ ŋwisi ɔnɔdzidzi kinɛ ɛ, xe máta wɔ isã nɛ ese edi i. Ege wɔki mɛ ɛ? Ɔmu tete fɛ ɛ wɔ́ki mɛ edi tɔ mɛ ni mɛ baʋia nɛ ba kwiakɔ mɔ isami i!
Pɔ̀ wobi liɛ ya ɛ, azeezizi wɔ bidɔ mɛ pɔ́ nì bawawadze ba pɔ̀, gi edzi aba kepea ɛ, woye ligume obi gi liku kumu aki yɛ ɛ.’
Yɛka ebu le onu si, ‘Mobi ye, wɔlɛ ní mɛ sú lipoe kakaa, lɛ kidɔ kakaa gi kinu mɛ kinɛ ɛ, wɔ kínɛ kinu.
Pɔ̀ lilɛ si kuŋa liwe tɔ kumɔ isami, lɛ ese linu si lize si wonemi ye etse, pɔ̀ abla ɛ ɔlɛ ligbã́; lize si alila, pɔ abla ɛ bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ.’ ”
Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Oxonete ɔtɔ eze gi ɔdɔaʋadi eze yɛ awla a. Pɔ̀ bɛsi yɛ si yɛ ɔdɔaʋadi ye e azeezizi yɛ kibɔɛ.
Lɛ loso axwa yɛ lɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Liboe woli lɛ ya gi meenu ní wɔsu u? Bu akɔnta kí mɛ ní kiliɛ gi wɔɛkɔ ɛga ní mɛ bidɔ mɛ su u, lɛ ese linu si wɔtratani mɛ bidɔ aʋa kudi tɔ ɔ.’
“Ɔdɔaʋadi ye asi isu ya si, ‘Mɛ ɔkaɛ atrá kpikpini mɛ ní mɛ lixwɛ nɛ mɛ. Ege maabitɛ abla ɛ? Kigagla kíma ní mɛ mɛ̀ gi maakɔ wa axwɛ gagla a, lɛ kuye kwiaku me si miʋi bidɔ ɔ.
Mete kidiliɛ gi maabitɛ ɛ! Tɔ xe bɛyurɔ mɛ ní axwɛ na mɛ fɛ ɛ, Maamɔ baʋianɛ gi biazɛ mɛ kpɛ ní ba kupeo me e.
“Lɛ loso axwa yɛkaɛ yɛ baʋɛnete ba pɔ́ ɔ. Lɛ eʋi ɔtɔpu yɛ si, ‘Tiasɛ liʋɛ wɔdɔ ni mɛ ɔkaɛ su u?’
“Ebu le onu si, ‘Olif ye kumu ŋaŋa gago alafa tole.’
“Lɛ ɔdɔaʋadi ye asi yɛ si, ‘Zi wɔ liʋɛ nɛ keplekpaa, ze kesea tɔ ŋwlimi avi tetsu.’
“Lɛ eʋi ɔnɔ ʋla yɛ si, ‘Wɔ pɔ tiasɛ liʋɛ wɔdɔ ɔ?
“Ebu le onu si ‘Kimimi ikotoku akpe tole.’ Lɛ ɔdɔaʋadi ye asi yɛ si, ‘Zi wɔ́ liʋɛ nɛ keplekpea tɔ ŋwlimi alafa ɔgɔtiaʋa.’

“Ɔkaɛ akpɔ ɔdɔaʋadi nyani nyani liɛ si, ebu ɔdaye ɔkli lɔ ya; lɛ ese linu si kelea lia ya mɛ banima bete liboe ní kiliɛ gi biaga ní ɔɖaye lo me ni ba hanuglɔ ba, sani banama gi benu kuklekle me banɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Lɛ loso e, mɛɛsi mlɔ si: mlakɔ kelea mɛ exo la evu baʋia ba tɔ, xe eblo e, tɔ biazɛ mlɔ kpɛ ni kupe moblo me.
“Ɔnɔ kakaa gi biaka yɛ aʋa ní eboe sisami na mɛ ɛ, biaka yɛ aʋa ní eboe ʋidi la kyɛ mɛ; lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi óɖi anukwarɛ ní eboe sisami na mɛ ɛ, ɔ́traɖi anukwarɛ ní eʋidi la kyɛ mɛ ɛ.
Xegi mlátani anukwarɛ kudo nì kelea mɛ exo la ɛ, nyaŋwɛ aaká ní mlɔ aʋa nì lifunu ne exo la a?
Lɛ xe mlátani ɔnɔ dzedze bidɔ aʋa kudi i, nyaŋwɛ aaki mlɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu mlɔ tutɔ mlɔ kiniɛ ɛ?
“Ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tratani baka tiaʋa kusumu u; aatrɔ tole ahwafi kɔ adimɛ ni ɔʋla ɛ, loo aanu kutu ki tole kɔ akpɛ ɔʋla ɛ kakpaa ɛ. Wɔtratani Aya nì exo la kusumu kpɛ likpɔ ɔ.”
Agi Farisianɛ ma benu eboa la petee e, bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa lɛ ese linu si bɛdimɛ ni kibɔ ɛ.
Yesu asi ba si, “Mlɔ mlenu banɔ baklɔ ba gi mlɛbitɛ isu ya tɔ mlaaŋwui banɔ gbã ní banɔ aŋu mɛ, pɔ̀ Aya ete mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ. Lɛ kidiliɛ gi kizɛ kedzi ní banɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, kíyi kididɔ ní Aya aŋu mɛ.

“Mose Ɔsã nɔ ni beboedoplɛ ba ba bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi bɛ biizɛwa axwɛ na gakɔ nani Yohanes kuni yo ɔkpɛkpɛ yɛ lipoe le; dɔni lipoe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, bɛɛpani ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ka Liboe Gbã nɛ su, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa eekeni idi si yitiku ni kigagla a.
Pɔ̀ linu kidɔ plɔplɔ ɛki lifunu ne ni kesea tɔ bilila sani si ba yurɔ Ɔsã nɔ kapɛmi sisami gɔgɔa.
“Onyime kakaa gi aayurɔ yedze e, xe aagbani ɔdzɛ dzedze e, awa kihasi; lɛ onyime liɛ klɔ gi aagbani ɔdzɛ liɛ gi bɛyurɔ ɛ, yɛ fɛ awa kihasi.
“Onyime oxonete ɔtɔ eze gi yɛ bidɔ kpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ, biŋa kedzi glegle lɛ azɛɛŋa ligbã liwe kakaa a.
