Ɔzíanete ɔtɔ fɛ eze gi bɛzɛxwa si Lazaro e, ebi la ɛtsa ɔnɔ zizi yɛ, lɛ bɛzɛɛmani yɛ ní oxonetee yɛ kevunu ya.
Azeegyo edi si yɛ amɔ kiŋaŋa sisami liɛ gi kizɛɛwɔli dɔnɔ ní oxonetee yɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ aʋa a. Kudroʋi yo kɔ kwizeemini yɛ ebi la mɛ.
“Ɔzianetee etse lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba befeke ye tɔ ozeze ní Abraham su u. Oxonetee kyɛ etse lɛ bevive ye e.
lɛ ní kifumoni ye me e, gi eze ní kuyeʋiyeʋi glegle me e, efeke yɛ aŋu na lɛ amɔ Abraham ní ɔdzage no gi Lazaro odi ní yɛ su i.
Lɛ akpɛ ozi axwa yɛ si, ‘Ɔka Abraham! Di me asigaga, tɔ kpɛ Lazaro tɔ ɔkpɛ yɛ kiwlaʋi yɛ ní kuni me tɔ ɔkɔ yɔ mɛ kinemie, lɛ ese linu si malɛ ní kuyeʋiyeʋi me ní kifui liɛ mɛ.’

“Pɔ̀ Abraham apani si, ‘mɛ obi ye plɛ aŋu si, ní wɔ ligbã́ nɛ mɛ ɛ wɔzi wɔ bidɔ gbã mɛ, ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ gi Lazaro kɔ azɛ bidɔ nyani nyani ʋɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, ɛɛmɔ isami nɛ ní ya, lɛ wɔ́ wɔli ní kuyeʋiyeʋi yo me e.
Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, kupɛ ʋidi kufini ní blɔ ni mlɔ kusi, gi kwikisi banama gi bɛpɛ si bɛtsa ɛdɔni ní ya ɛba mlɔ klɔ ɛ, batrátanɔ, nite me ke ɔ́nɔnɔ ɔ́tradɔ ní mlɔ klɔ ɛba ní ya gi kulɛ ɛ.’
“Lɛ oxonete apani si, ‘Kɔlɔ ɛ, maki wɔ litukpo ɔka Abraham, kpɛ Lazaro ní mɔka kepea mɛ,
níklɔ gi mɛ beneminyime tietsu balɛ ɛ. Tɔ ɔzɛku le kpɛ ní ba mɛ tɔ bakíba kuyeʋiyeʋi uliɔ ya mɛ ɛ.
“Lɛ Abraham apani si, ‘Mose ɔsã nɔ ni beboedoplɛ ba bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi bɛ bilɛ, wɔ benemi ba benu liboe lɛ klɔ gi bi basɛ ɛ.’
“Oxonetee ebu le onu si, ‘Owo Ɔka Abraham,’ ‘Pɔ̀ xe ɔnutɔ aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe atrɛ ní baklɔ ɛ, biakyi ní ba eboe zimizi na mɛ.’
Pɔ̀ Abraham apani si, ‘Xe batrá nu Mose ni beboedoplɛ ba eboe la ɛ, batrázɛ lɛ xe ɔnutɔ ayɔ adɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ fɛ.’ ”
Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Kidiliɛ gi kiaki si banɔ biabitɛ eboe zimizi i, kitraba ba pɔ̀ litraze gagla a ɛki mlɔ mɛ iliɛ gi yɛ aʋa kiaga a xe kiaba ɛ!
Liapɛ ɔki yɛ xe bɛka lihɔkla ʋidi ní yɛ ole lo o xe bɛkɔ yɛ ŋwia ɛkpɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ, sani si tɔ ɔki banuvɔ ba ya mɛ tole ɔbitɛ liboe zimizi.
Lɛ loso mlevu aŋu ní mlɔ kiboebitɛɛ su u!
“Xegi wɔ onemi nɛ ata wɔ ese e, tɛni yɛ; xegi ekyi yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, tɔ kɔkyɛ yɛ.
Xe ata wɔ ese tegloele ní liwe tile me e, xe edzi aba wɔ klɔ tegloele si i, ‘Mekyi ɔna mɛ,’ lilɛ si kɔkyɛ yɛ.”
Lɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba bɛsi ɔkaɛ si, “Kítɔ blɔ kuziŋaa kuze gagla sanɔ.”
Lɛ ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Xe mlɔ kuziŋa kulɛ ŋwisi lisebi sisami nɛ fɛ ɛ, mlaatani kupani si ose ɔlɔ si, ‘Kpaʋi isu ya ni wɔ igu ne tɔ zɛkpɛ isu ya ní axu la mɛ!’ lɛ aanu kutu kí mlɔ ɔ.
“Xegi mlɔ mɛ tole yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye ádɔ ɔnyrɔ mɛ loo iʋesi le aʋa odi klɔ edzì i, aasi yɛ si ɔkɔsi tɔ ɔŋa yɛ bidɔ mɛ na a?
Aníte! boŋu i, kisi asi yɛ si, ‘kyí awla ní mɛ kiŋaŋaɛ su, tɔ ka kusa ole tɔ pe me gi mɛɛŋa bidɔ mɛ ɛ xe mɛɛŋwɛ kuda ɛ; lɛ klɔ kede e, tɔ wuiŋa wɔ bidɔ mɛ.’
Ɔnɔsumu ye ɔ́ziã ɖase ɛki isã nɛ aʋa gi abitɛ ɛ, loo aziã a?
Niteme ke mlɔ fɛ xe mlɛbitɛ kidɔ kakaa gi bɛsi mlɔ si mlabitɛ ɛ, mlapani si, ‘Banɔsumu ko kunu; blɔ axwɛ ko kwiwa.’ ”
Agi Yesu azaatrɛ ní Yerusalem i, aga Samaria ni Galilea kumɔ aʋa.
Gi atrátiku ní kamami katɔ mɛ ɛ, benyime liɔfɔ gi bɛɛnyà kunya kyikyi yɔ bɛtsani yɛ ɛ. Bɛlɛɛ ní ɔdzage no
lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi gagla si, “Yesu! Ɔkaɛ! Dí blɔ asigaga a!”
Yesu amɔ ba lɛ asi ba si, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlaki kusumu yo baka ba batapo mlo edi.” Gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ si ba isu ya idra.
Agi ba mɛ tole amɔ si yɛ isu ya idra ɛ, edzi aba, lɛ azɛɛkpɔ̀ Aya ni ole gagla a.
Adɔ yɛ aklamasi na aʋa ní Yesu ketù ya lɛ edo yɛ ɖase e. Onyimee eze Samaria ɔnɛ.
Yesu eʋi si, “Aní benyime liɔfɔ su ɛdra na a?, Nífɔ ɔgɔtole gɔgɔ ba balɛ ɛ?
Ege lɛ loso ɔbaba tole liɛ ko edzi aba do Aya ɖase e?”
Lɛ Yesu apani asi yɛ si, “Yɔ tɔ ga trɛ; wɔ kuziŋa kwiyɔni wɔ.”
Farisianɛ batɔ beʋi Yesu lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kiaba ɛ, Ebu le onu aki ba si, “Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, kátraba ŋwisi bidɔ gi biamɔ kinɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trapani si, ‘Dí, imɔ ka ní ya a! loo imɔ ka ni ní kɔlɔ ɔ!’ lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, kakpasi ní mlɔ mɛ.”
Lɛ asi badɔkpasi ba si, “Lipoe le litraba gi mlaapɛ si mlɛɛmɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye yɛ ewe a la klɔ la mɛ tile, pɔ mlatrá mɔ lɛ ɛ.
Banɔ batɔ biaze gi biasi mlɔ si i, ‘Dí, imɔ yɛ ní kɔlɔ!’ loo, ‘Dí imɔ yɛ niya!’ Pɔ̀ mlakíze ni ba kude e.’
Ŋwisi kiliɛ gi dzeni ye izɛtsi kifu yɛ ɛ, xe kizeekle dɔni ayɛɛ kapɛ tiele tsini kapɛ ʋla ɛ, nite ke Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaze ní yɛ liwe le aʋa.
Pɔ̀ ní ɔtɔpu kɔ ɛ, lilɛ si ɔmɔ ɔziã glegle tɔ banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla bekyi kede akpɛ yɛ ɛ.
Kiliɛ gi lize ni Noa lipoe le e, nite ke liaze ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ewe la mɛ ɛ.
Banima bɛzɛŋa lɛ bɛzɛŋwɛ ɛ, benyime ba ni badzɛ ba bɛzɛgbani ba ahanuglɔ ba kɔzɛna ni liwe lɛ gi Noa eti eku ní onitsahu lo me xe kuni yo kwiyi i, xe kwiba ɛgbani ba petee sɛnɔ ɛ.
“Liaze ŋwisi Lot lipoe le. Banima bɛzɛŋa lɛ bɛzɛŋwɛ ɛ, bezee dzi lɛ bɛzɛda bidɔ ɔ, bɛzɛkpɛ bidɔ lɛ bɛzɛɛwa agba a.
Liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi Lot edo ní Sodom i, lɛ kifu yɛ ni kifu yɛ akla na ɛdɔ dɔni lifunu ne e, xe eye ba petee e.
Nite ke litraze xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaŋwi i.

“Ní liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔtini ní yɛ ligba lɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔki ple eku ní kepea mɛ si yitrɛkɔ yɛ bidɔ mɛ ɛ; nite ke ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ni ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa ɛ, okídzi trɛ kepea mɛ si yizɛkɔ kididɔ ɔ.
Mlaplɛ aŋu ní Lot yedze aʋa!
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aapɛ si yibu yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, aalila lɛ; lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aalila yɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, aabu le.
Ní elesi ala klɔ mɛ, mɛɛsi mlɔ si, banɔ tiaʋa biafɛ ní ɔtɔsi tole aʋa; pɔ̀ biasɛ ni tole e, lɛ biayurɔ ɔʋla ɛ.
Badzɛ tiaʋa biaze kuhɔɔ aʋa gi biazɛhɔ adeʋi, biasɛ ni tole pɔ̀ biayurɔ ɔʋla ɛ.
Benyime tiaʋa biazɛwa axwɛ na ní ɔnyrɔ mɛ, biasɛ ni tole, lɛ biayurɔ ɔʋla ɛ.”
Badɔkpasi ba beʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ, nifɔ ɔ?” Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Níklɔ gi kidɔ tsetse kifini i, níklɔ opéte ʋa bizɛkpɛ likpɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu abee aki yɛ badɔkpasi ba tɔ yikɔ ɛbasɛ ba si liziã si bazɛxwa Aya lipoe kakaa tɔ ba ina nɛ ikí gbɔ̀ ɔ.
Apani si “Otsixwa ɔtɔ eze ní ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ gi óse Aya a, lɛ ɔ́kɔ lɛ mɛ ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ.
Ɔtrɛtrɛ ɔtɔ yedze fɛ eze ní ɔma lɔ klɔ mɛ gi azɛɛba yɛ klɔ nì kugyodi si tɔ ɔtsa litsi ɔki yɛ ɛ, Apani si, ‘Tsa litsi kí mɛ ní mɛ nì ɔnɔ gi apɛ si yitafa mɛ kusi i!’
“Pɔ̀ kɔki lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ ɛ, otsixwa yɛ ɔ́wa lixwɛxwɛ ní lɛ su. Gɔgɔɛ asi isu ya si, ‘Lilɛ lɛ mɛ si meʋíse Aya loo kɔ lɛ mɛ ɛki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ,
pɔ̀ kɔkpɛ kunugu yo gi ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze liɛ ɛɛkpɛ mɛ loso ɛ, maadi lɛ aʋa si matsa litsi gyɔgyɔ aki yɛ ɛ. Xe aníte e, yɛ mɔklɔ kubaba lipoe kakaa ɛ, kwikpɛ mɛ kupepe.’ ”
Lɛ Ɔkaɛ atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Mlenu liboe lɛ gi otsixwa nyani nyani liɛ klɔ apani i.
Kɔ Aya ɔ́tratsa litsi kí yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ banima gi beebemi ikí yɛ elesi nì kemize kí kupɔnɔ na a? Ɔ́trakɔsi xe aapɔni ba na a?
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, aakɔsi aatsa litsi kiba. Pɔ̀ xe Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aaba kesea aʋa ɛ, aamɔ kuziŋa na?”
Yesu ebu abee akí banama gi bɛka ní isu ya aʋa si bɛɛpɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ xe bɛɛplɛ banɔgɔgɔ ba kesea ɛ.
“Liba lɛ mɛ si benyime tiaʋa bemu itrɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ Aya ɔxwa kɔ: tole eze Farisiɔnɛ, lɛ ɔʋlaɛ eze ɔbɔgyɔ ɔ.

“Farisiɔnɛ ebu isu ya lidze lɛ ɔlɛ kedu ya xe axwa Aya si, ‘Medo wɔ́ Aya ɖase e, si kuŋazi kúma mɛ mɛ̀ ɛ, katafa kama mɛ mɛ̀, lɛ ménu ɔhasinɛ ɛ, ŋwisi banɔ gɔgɔ ba kinɛ ɛ. Medo wɔ ɖase si máma ŋwisi ɔbɔgyɔ liɛ kɔlɔ kinɛ ɛ.
Mizɛɛnya onugu taʋa ní ogle no me, lɛ mizɛɛki wɔ mɛ bidɔ mɔmɔ ʋɛ kapɛ liɔfɔa a.’
“Pɔ̀ ɔbɔgyɔɛ alɛɛ ní ɔdzage no lɛ ómu ni yɛ aŋu mɛ lifunu ne kyɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ azɛɛsa awla yɛ kakɔa mɛ lɛ apani si, ‘Aya, di me asigaga, mɛ ɔnɔ zimizi ye e!’

“Lɛ Yesu atrɛ lɛ aʋa si Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, aní Farisiɔnɛ pɔ̀ ɔbɔgyɔɛ yɛ liboe ligyɔ ní Aya kɔ ɔ, xe bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ. Lɛ loso ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeemu ni isu ya ɛ, biapleni ye, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa gi izeepleni isu ya ɛ biamuni ye.”
Banɔ batɔ bɛmani ba bebi ba ní Yesu klɔ tɔ ɔtrɔ awla ní ba aʋa, tɔ ɔkrira ba. Agi badɔkpasi ba bɛmɔ nite e, bɛtɛni ba,
pɔ̀ Yesu axwa banuvɔ ba amani yɛ isu ya lɛ apani si, “Mlaki tɔ banuvɔ ba baba mɔklɔ lɛ mlakítsi kudeonu aki ba a, lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ɛ, ba elu kanɛ kenu.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si! Ɔnɔ kakaa gi ɔ́zɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ŋwisi ɔnuvɔ kinɛ ɛ, ɔ́tratiku ka mɛ liwewe e.”
Yuda ɔnɛ ɔka ɔtɔ eʋi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ gbã ɛ, ege maabitɛ xe maamɔ ligbã́ moblo le e?”
Yesu eʋi ye si, “Ege lɛ loso wɔɛxwa mɛ si ɔgbã a? Ɔ́nɔnɔ ónu ɔgbã, Aya ko.
Wote isã nɛ: ‘Wukísɛ ádzɛ ni enyimeboe e; wukíye ɔnɔ ɔ; wukízuru u; wukisɛ asia ɛkpɛ ɔnɔ awla a; kpɛ kubùbù ní wɔka ni wone su.’ ”
Onyimee ebu le onu si, “Dɔni mɛ kunuvɔ mɛ ké mɛɛbitɛ ni isã nɛ pɔ́ aʋa a.”
Agi Yesu enu liboe lɛ ɛ, asi yɛ si, “Kigɔ́ kidɔ tile dzɛ gi lilɛ si bitɛ ɛ. Da wɔ bidɔ mɛ petee tɔ kɔ kibɔe kí bazianete ba, tɔ wɔamɔ exo ní lifunu ne; lɛ kede e, bá tɔ gaze ni mɛ kude e.”
Pɔ̀ gi onyimee enu liboe le e, Líku ye isami i, lɛ ese linu si oxonete ʋidi onu.
Yesu edi ye lɛ apani si, “Liaaze gagla xe bexonete ba biati uku ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ!
Sugba ɛ, liaze plɔplɔ ɛki kposɔɛ si ɔga trɔ̀ni yɛ liwu le me odo sani si oxonetee oti oku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ.”
Banama gi benu liboe le e, beʋi ye si, “Kɔ, nyaŋwɛ aamɔ kubúbú i?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kidiliɛ gi ɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kubitɛ ɛ, kilɛ plɔplɔ ɛki Aya yɛ kubitɛ.”
Lɛ Petro apani si, “Dí! Kwiyurɔ kidɔ kakaa xe kwikuni wɔ kude e.”
Yesu asi ba si, “Sugba mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi ayurɔ yɛ kepe loo yedze loo beneminyime loo bapɔnɛ loo bebi kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa loso e,
aamɔ bidɔ glegle sanɔ ni abla kelea mɛ kɔpɔni ligbã moblo le ní kelea lia gi kiaba mɛ ɛ.”
Yesu ebú badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba kuka lɛ asi ba si, “Mlata kutu! Kwitrɛ ni Yerusalem niklɔ kidɔ kakaa gi beboedoplɛ ba bɛŋwlimi ni Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye su i, kiaba kɛ mɛ.
Biakpɛ yɛ awla ki banama gi bénu Yudanɛ ɛ, gi biakpɛ yɛ kakpaa, biakpini ye, lɛ biabu sita bali yɛ aʋa a.
Biafiaʋi yɛ litam lɛ biaye ye e, pɔ̀ ewe tata kede e, aadzi ligbã́.”
Pɔ̀ badɔkpasi ba bénu la ya litɔtɔ ese e; eboe la ese kununu yo kwikpo ba, lɛ béte kidiliɛ su gi Yesu azɛɛpani i.
Gi Yesu eti apɔni Yerixo e, kaŋupo atɔ keze ní kudeo su, gi keze eʋi bidɔ ɔ.
Gi enu linɔkpi le onu gi lizɛza ɛ, eʋi si, “Liboe woli liiba a?”
Bɛsi yɛ si, “Yesu Nazaret Ɔnɛɛ yɛ ɛɛza.”
Lɛ akpɛ ozi si, “Yesu! Dawid Yebi ye! Di me asigaga!”
Banama gi beze ni ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ, bɛtɛni yɛ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si ɔgɔ tsriɖi. Pɔ̀ akpɛ ozi lo gagla asanɔ si, “Dawid Yebi ye! Di me asigaga!”
Lɛ Yesu alɛɛ xe aki si bagbani kaŋupoa mani yɛ ɛ. Gi eti apɔni yɛ ɛ, Yesu eʋi ye si,
“Ege wɔpɛ si mibitɛ kiwɔ ɔ?”
Ebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, mapɛ si mimɔ dzɛ.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kɔlɔ mɔ! Wɔ kuziŋaa kwiyɔ ni wɔ.”
Onyimee bimbi ʋe bidra kyɔŋ lɛ ekuni Yesu kude e, gi azɛɛkpɔ̀ Aya a. Gi linɔkpi le limɔ nite e, ba pɔ́ bɛkpɔ̀ Aya.
Gi Yesu eti eku ní Yerixo o, xe azɛɛza ɛ,
Babɔgyɔ ba ɔka ɔtɔ eze níklɔ gi yɛ linyi lize Zaxeo, eze oxonete.
Azeekeni edi si yimɔ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi Yesu onu i, pɔ̀ eze ɔnɔ kpekpe lɛ ɔ́tani Yesu kumɔ kɔkpɛ linɔkpi le loso o.
Nite si ese ekú ɔtɔ kí linɔkpi le lɛ azeemu ni ose ɔtɔ mɛ si yimɔ Yesu gi atrága niklɔ ɛza ɛ.
Agi Yesu ana niklɔ ɛ, emuni aŋu na lɛ asi Zaxeo si, “Kɔsi tɔ ple, Zaxeo, lɛ ese linu si wɔ kepea mɛ mátraze omono o.”
Zaxeo akɔsi eple ní ose lo me, lɛ azɛ yɛ ni isami i.
Banama pɔ́ gi bɛmɔ lɛ ɛ, bekpese kutɛ si, “Onyime liɛ ya atrɛ edzì ɔbaba ɛki onyime gi onu ɔnɔ zimizi i!”
Pɔ̀ Zaxeo ayɔ ɔlɛɛ, lɛ asi Ɔkaɛ si, “Ta kutu, Ɔkaɛ! maakɔ mɛ bidɔ mɔmɔ ʋɛ mɛ kulɛlɛɔ kapɛ aki bazianete ba, lɛ xe memi ɔnutɔ akpɛ fɛ ɛ, Maadzini kidiliɛ klɔ ede tene kutsa ki yɛ.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kubúbú kwiba kepea lia mɛ omono, lɛ ese linu si onyime liɛ fɛ ɛ, onu Abraham yɛ osobi.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aba si yipɛ tɔ yibu banama gi bɛlila ɛ.”
Gi banima bɛzɛɛta yɛ kutu i, Yesu ebu abee aki ba. Yesu eti apɔni Yerusalem lɛ bezeegyo edi si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kiaba kpekpemi i.
Lɛ asi ba si, “Ɔka ʋidi ɔtɔ eze gi azaatrɛ ní kese katɔ aʋa gi bɛtredu ye kukusi i, xe adzi ba a.
Xe aasɛ ɛ, axwa yɛ banɔsumu liɔfɔ ba lɛ akí ba mɛ ɔkakaa sika kibɔ tile lɛ asi ba si, ‘Mlakɔ kɛ akpɛ axwɛwawa mɛ,’ tɔ mledi kidiliɛ gi mlamɔ trɔ xe masɛ ɛ.”
“Pɔ̀ yɛ akɔanɛ ma bápɛ yɛ liboe, lɛ loso e, bɛkpɛ banɔ ní yɛ kude tɔ basɛ okusi ʋidi ye si, ‘Kúpɛ onyime liɛ si oze blɔ okusi.’
“Pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, bedu ye kukusi yo xe edzì aba. Lɛ aki si bɛxwa yɛ banɔsumu ba ɛmani yɛ klɔ si tɔ yitè kidiliɛ gi bɛmɔ ɛtrɔ ní kibɔɛ liɛ gi yɛ aki ba aʋa ɛ.
“Ɔtɔpu yɛ aba lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, mamɔ sika bibɔ liɔfɔ kɔpɔni kiliɛ klɔ gi wɔ kimɛ ɛ.’
“Asi yɛ si, ‘Wɔbitɛ mumɔ, wonu ɔnɔsumu gbã! Agi wodo anukwarɛ ni eboe sisami na mɛ ɛ, Maakɔ wɔ odu ni imaʋidi liɔfɔ onu.’
“Ɔnɔsumu ʋlaɛ fɛ aba lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, mamɔ sika bibɔ tutsu kɔpɔni kiliɛ klɔ gi wɔ kimɛ ɛ.’
“Lɛ asi iliɛ ya si, ‘Wɔaze ní ima ʋidi titsu onu.’
“Ɔnɔsumu dzedze aba lɛ apani si, ‘Ɔkaɛ, imɔ wɔ sika yɛ kibɔɛ; mabla kɛ ní kavlɔʋi mɛ.
Mazeesé wo, lɛ ese linu si wonu onyime gagla. Wuzɛɛkɔ kidiliɛ gi kínu wɔ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ wuzɛɛkɔ bidɔ gi wɔ́kpɛ ɛ.’
“Yɛ ɔkaɛ asi yɛ si, ‘Wɔ ɔnɔsumu litukpo me gagla onete! Maakɔ wɔtutɔ wɔ eboe la bu wɔ lipɔ! Wote si menu ɔnɔ gagla, mizɛɛkɔ kidiliɛ gi kínu mɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ mizɛɛkɔ bidɔ gi mákpɛ ɛ.
Agi wote nite e, ege lɛ loso wɔ́kɔ mɛ kibɔɛ ɔkpɛ ní kibɔɛ ɔbla klɔ ɔ; atɔ xe medzi i, maazi kɛ ni kitrɔtrɔ ɛ?’
“Lɛ asi banama gi bɛlɛɛ niklɔ si, ‘Mlazi sika yɛ kibɔɛ ní yɛ awla tɔ mlakɔ kɛ aki ɔnɔsumu liɛ gi bibɔ liɔfɔ bɛ bilɛ ní yɛ awla ɛ.’
“Pɔ̀ bɛsi yɛ si, ‘Ɔka, bibɔ liɔfɔ bilɛ ni yɛ awla kooko!’
“Ebu le onu si, ‘Mɛɛsi mlɔ si, ɔnɔ kakaa awla gi kidɔ kilɛ ɛ, biapɔnɔ ɔki yɛ; pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ awla gi kididɔ kima ɛ, kisisami iliɛ gi kilɛ yɛ awla ɛ, biazɛ kɛ.
Pɔ̀ mɛ ahwafianɛ ma gi bápɛ si mize ba okusi i, mlagbani ba amanɔ tɔ mleye ba ní mɛ aŋu mɛ.’ ”
Gi Yesu apani eboa la ya pɔ́ ɛ, eze ní ba ɔtɔ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem i.
Agi beti apɔni Betfage ni Betania níklɔ gi bizɛxwa si Kumu yɔ ise le ketokpaa su i, akpɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ tiaʋa ní yɛ ɔtɔ nɔ, lɛ asi ba si,
“Mlatrɛ ní kamamia ní mlɔ ɔtɔ nɔ mɛ; xe mleti iku i, mlaamɔ tedzi obi gi bɛkpɛ ogbe no me e, gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trɔ ní yɛ aʋa ódi i. Mleble ye amani niya.
Xe ɔnutɔ aaʋi mlo si ege lɛ loso mleeble ye na ɛ, mlasi yɛ si Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã yɛ.”
Bekú kudeo me lɛ bɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa ŋwisi kiliɛ ɖii gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ.
Agi bezeeble tedzi obi ye e, yɛ benete ba beʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mleeble ye e?”
Bebú le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ yɛ aziã yɛ.”
Lɛ bɛgbani tedzi obi ye mani Yesu i, lɛ bɛkɔ ba ewu la ɛtrɔ ní ɔgaɛ aʋa lɛ bɛpɔni Yesu xe emu atrɔ ɛ.
Agi azɛɛkpɛ yɛ atsinɔ ɛ, banima bene bá ewu la ɛplɛ ní kudeo me.

Agi eti apɔni Yerusalem i, ni niklɔ gi kudeo kwikyi ple ní Olif ye ise le ketokpaa su i, yɛ badɔkpasi ba likpi le likpese Aya ɖase kudo ni kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ni ozi gagla ní eboe ʋidi glegle ala la gi bɛmɔ su i si,
“Aya ɔkrira okusi ye klɔ gi atrába ní Ɔkaɛ linyi ne me e! Kusuyɔ ní lifunu ne ni kusudra kí Aya!”
Lɛ Farisianɛ batɔ ní ɔha lɔ̀ kusi i, bɛpani kí Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kpɛ ɔsã kí wɔ badɔkpasi ba tɔ bagɔ tsriɖi!”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ si xegi bɛgɔ tsriɖi i, akla na ɔtutɔ aakpɛ ozi lo.”
Agi eti apɔnɔ xe amɔ ɔma ʋidi no e, ebemi ní lɔ litukpo.
Lɛ apani si, “Atɛsi mlete omono kidiliɛ gi kízia ɛki mlɔ kusuyɔ ɛ! Pɔ̀ abla ɛ bekpo ke ní mlɔ su.
Lipoe le litraba gi mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma biaklani mlɔ lɛ biatsí mlɔ bede ʋa, lɛ biapɔ́ mlɔ ɔkpɛ ní kapɛ kakaa.
Biayaʋi wɔ petee lɛ biaye banama gi balɛ ɔma nɔ mɛ ɛ, batráyurɔ likla ɛtɔtɔ ní lɛ ozeklɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si mlamɔ lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya aba si yibu mlo o!”
Lɛ Yesu eti eku Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ekpese badɔda ba kukpikpinɔ dono e,
asi ba si, “Bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Liboe le me si, Aya apani si ‘Mɛ Ligba lɛ ɛ, biaxwa lɛ si Aya lixwa Gba.’ Pɔ̀ mlekyi le ɛbitɛ beze ba òkpò kɔ́ ɔ!”
Liwe kakaa Yesu abasɛ bidɔ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ. Kusumu yo baka ba, ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba, ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛpɛ si beeye ye,
pɔ̀ bámɔ kudeonu xe biaye ye, lɛ ese linu si banima pɔ́ bezeenu yɛ eboe la a, lɛ bápɛ si liboeboe lidɔ ba ɛza a.
Liwetɔ lɛ gi Yesu azabasɛ banima bidɔ mɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, xe azaasɔli Liboe Gbã nɛ ɛ, Kusumu yo baka ba, Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni banɔtsitsi ba bɛba,
lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Si blɔ, kude woli wɔmɔ xe wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya a? Lɛ nyaŋwɛ aki wɔ kude o?”
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Abla ɛ mlaki tɔ miʋi mlo liboe. Mlasi mɛ,
Nyaŋwɛ aki Yohanes kigaglaɛ xe azaakpɛ kuni yo aki banima a? Aya kɔ́ lidɔ loo dɔni banima kɔ́ na a?”
Lɛ bekpese eboe la kuvu udi ní ba tsali kusi si, “Liboe woli kwiapani i? Xe kwipani si, ‘Dɔni Aya kɔ ɛ,’ aaʋi blo si, ‘Kɔlɔ, ege lɛ loso, mlaazi Yohanes aʋa aŋa ɛ?’
Pɔ xe kwipani si, ‘Dɔni banima klɔ ɛ,’ linɔkpi lɛ ya pɔ́ liasa blɔ akla, lɛ ese linu si bɛzi lɛ si Yohanes eze oboedoplɛ.”
Lɛ loso e bebu le onu si, “Kúte niklɔ gi kidɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kɔlɔ mɛ fɛ, mátrasi mlɔ kude kɔkɔ kuliɔ gi mɛɛkɔ ɛbitɛ eboa la ya a.”
Lɛ Yesu ebu abee liɛ aki banima si: “Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi awa wain ɔnyrɔ, lɛ akɔ lɔ aki ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba si biatsa ɔgyɔ ɔki yɛ lɛ asɛ ní kepea lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ ɛ.
Agi wain yɛ ligu nɛ lina ɛ, akpɛ yɛ ɔnɔsumu tole atsisi yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba tɔ ɔzɛ yɛ ɔŋa klɔ ɔmani yɛ. Pɔ̀ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bekusi ɔnɔsumu ye e, lɛ bedzini ye tsisi iwla pluplu i.
Lɛ atsisi ɔnɔsumu dzedze e; pɔ̀ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bekusi yɛ fɛ ɛ, bɛkpɛ yɛ kuyé, lɛ bedzini ye tsisi iwla pluplu i.
Nite si atsisi ɔnɔsumu tánɛ; ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛkpɛ yɛ libi fɛ, lɛ bɛkpikpini yɛ.
“Lɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee eʋi isu ya si, ‘Kitɛ mabitɛ ɛ? Maatsisi mɛ ɔtutɔ mobinyimee gi malɔ ɛ; nyafɛ biakpɛ kubùbù yo ní yɛ su!’
“Pɔ̀ gi ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba bɛmɔ yɛ ɛ, bɛpani nì bahanuglɔ ba si, ‘Mledi, onetee Yebi ye iliɛ ya. Mlaki tɔ kuye ye, atɔ yɛ kaŋasea kedzi blɔ kanɛ!’
Lɛ loso e behe ye ebú ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ beye ye e.
Lɛ Yesu eʋi si, “kitɛ wain ɔnyrɔ nɔ onetee aabitɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi ba ya ɛ?
Aaba, kɔ eye benyime ba klɔ, kɔ akɔ wain yɛ ɔnyrɔ nɔ akpɛ ní ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bedidi dzedze awla ɛ.” Agi banima benu le e, bɛ pani si, “Likíba lɛ mɛ!”
Yesu edi ba lɛ eʋi si, “Kɔlɔ ege, liboe lɛ ya gi bɛŋwlimi libasɛ ɛ?
“ ‘Likla ɛlɛ klɔ gi bagbatrɔ ba bɛyurɔ si lima liboeboe me e,
lɛ lidzi ogó no aʋa likla nɛ ɛ.’
“Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aadɔ likla ɛlɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, avini kukpe kukpe; lɛ xe likla ɛlɛ klɔ liadɔ ní ɔnutɔ aʋa ɛ, liahɔ yɛ pliplipli.”
Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ni kusumu yo baka ba bɛpɛ́ kudeonu si bévu Yesu ní niklɔ kyɔŋ, lɛ ese linu si betè si basu ebu abee; pɔ̀ bezese banima a.

Lɛ loso e bɛpɛ kudeonu lɛ bɛtsa ní kikpokpo me. Bɛtsa kibɔ ɛki benyime batɔ, tɔ babitɛ ŋwisi banɔ gbã benu u, pɔ̀ tɔ bapunu Yesu gani beʋiʋi me e, tɔ biakɔ yɛ ɔki Roma banɛ ma kesea ɔʋadi ye yɛ kigagla ɛ.

Banɔpunu ba ya ba ɛ, beʋi Yesu si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, kwite si wɔ eboe la gi wuzɛɛpani i, ni kidiliɛ gi wuzɛɛbasɛ banima ɛ, bina. Kwite si woʋidi ɔnɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ wuzɛɛbasɛ anukwarɛɛ ní Aya yɛ kupɛ́pɛɔ ki ɔnɔ onu u.
Si blɔ, liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su si kugyɔ kibɔ ɔki Roma banɛ ma Ɔka ʋidi ye, loo kukígyɔ na a?”
Pɔ̀ Yesu amɔ ba ìmɔ nɛ bede ʋa, lɛ asi ba si,
“Mlabasɛ mɛ kibɔ pititi itɔ. Nyaŋwɛ aŋu mɛ ni linyí lítiní kɛ aʋa a?”
Bebu le onu si, “Roma banɛ ma ɔka ʋidi ye.”
Lɛ loso Yesu asi ba si, “Xe nite e, kɔlɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Roma banɛ ma ɔka ʋidi ye kinɛ ɛ, mlatsa kɛ aki yɛ, tɔ kidiliɛ gi kinu Aya kinɛ ɛ, mlakɔ kɛ aki Aya a.”
Ní banima aŋu na mɛ klɔ ɛ, bátani yɛ kuvu ní liboeboe me, Ni kiliɛ gi ebu le onu i, lidzi onugutsetse ki ba lɛ loso bɛgɔ tsriɖi i.
Lɛ Zadukianɛ batɔ, gi bázɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa si banima biayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, bɛba Yesu klɔ lɛ bɛpani si,

“Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Mose aŋwlimi kí blɔ ní ɔsã nɔ mɛ si, ‘Xe onyime etse e, xe ye yedze agɔ ɔ pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ bebi i, lilɛ si onyime liɛ klɔ yeneminyime ɔgbani ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze tɔ bapɔ bebi gi biakɔ si benu yenemi ye okpo ye yɛ bebi i.’
Liba lɛ mɛ si beneminyime tiegloele beze; otsitsi ye agbani ɔdzɛ lɛ etse e, pɔ̀ ɔ́pɔ obi i.
Lɛ ɔʋlaɛ agbani ɔdzɛɛ ɛ,
lɛ ɔtanɛɛ fɛ ɛ. Nite ke lize ki ba tiegloele ba pɔ́ xe betse e, gi bápɔ bebi i.
Gɔgɔɛ, ɔdzɛɛ kyɛ etse.
Abla ɛ, ní liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa gi bekpo ʋa biayɔ ɛ, nyaŋwɛ yedze ɔdzɛɛ aaze e, gi ba tiegloele ba pɔ́ bɛgbani yɛ edi i?”
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Benyime ni badzɛ ní kelea lia mɛ ɛ, bizɛgbani ba ahanuglɔ ba,
pɔ̀ benyime ni badzɛ ba ya gi bɛna si biayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, xe biaze ligbã́ nɛ ní kelea lia klɔ gi kiaba mɛ ɛ, batrágbani baglɔ ɔ.
Biaze ŋwisi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba lɛ batrátani kutse tɔ ɔ. Benu Aya yɛ Yebi, lɛ ese linu si bɛyɔni ba dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ.
Lɛ Mose ebu le abasi mɔmɔmɔ si biayɔ nì bekpo ʋa. Ní bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi ʋɛ klɔ mɛ gi apani ní ose lo gi ɛɛsɔ su i, apani ní Ɔkaɛ su si; onu ‘Abraham yɛ Aya, Isak yɛ Aya ani Yakob yɛ Aya.’
Yɛ ónu bekpo ʋa Aya boŋu i, bagbagbe ba ba Aya onu, lɛ yɛ ba pɔ́ balɛ ligbã nɛ akɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛpani si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, Wobu le onu mɔmɔ!”
Lɛ ɔna óze ba lipo si biaʋi ye liboeboe tɔ ɔ.
Yesu eʋi ba si, “Kitɛ mɛ biapani si ɔnɔbu ye aaze Dawid yɛ osobi i?
Gi Dawid ɔtutɔ apani ní Psalomo ʋa keplekpa mɛ si:
“ ‘Aya asi Mɛ Ɔkaɛ si,
“ze ní mɛ kaŋaa mɛ
kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi maakɔ wɔ ahwafianɛ ma kpɛ ní wɔ kukliseo.’ ”
Dawid axwa yɛ si ‘Ɔkaɛ’; lɛ Kitɛ liaze si Ɔnɔbu ye aatani Dawid yɛ osobi kuze e?”
Agi banima pɔ́ bɛzɛta yɛ kutu i, Yesu asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si,

“Mleze nì aŋu ní Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba su; gi bizɛpɛ si biazɛga za ní ba ewu gblamadza la mɛ ɛ, xe bɛzɛpɛ si bazɛpani ba nì kubùbù ní ablɔ ʋa aʋa a; gi bizɛkya ibùbùzekɔ ɛki isu ya a, gi bɛgɔ ɛplɛ ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ ɔ, ani ikɔ gbã nɛ ní iŋaŋakplɔ nɛ su i.
Lɛ bizɛɛpɛ kudeonu ní batrɛtrɛ ba bedze ba su ŋwisi kipɔnɔ si bɛpɔni ba na a, pɔ̀ kɔ bezuru ba kupeo o, lɛ kede e, bizɛbasɛ isu ya nì Aya kuxwaxwa gblamadza! Ba kutuheheo kwianyani koŋ!”
Yesu edi aklanɔ lɛ amɔ bexonete ba gi bɛzɛgyɔ ba bidɔ mɛ kpɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ kepimia mɛ ɛ,
lɛ amɔ ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze opiplinete ɔtɔ gi akɔ yɛ ɔla kyikyi yɛ kibɔ sisami itɔ akpɛ ní kepimia mɛ ɛ.
Apani si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛ,” si “ɔtrɛtrɛ yedze ɔzianete liɛ ya ɛ, agyɔ kibɔ asani banɔ gɔgɔ ba pɔ́.
Lɛ ese linu si, banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ, bɛgyɔ ba bibɔ ʋɛ dɔni kidiliɛ mɛ gi biabu kɔ ní ba exo la onu u; pɔ̀ yɛ ɔtrɛtrɛɛ yedzee kɔ akɔ yɛ kidɔ kakaa akɔ gi kɛ aʋa aaze ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.”
Badɔkpasi batɔ bɛzɛpani ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ su, kiliɛ gi lipedi i, ni lɛ akla gbã na ani bidɔkɔkɔɛ ʋɛ gi bɛɛki Aya ɛ. Pɔ̀ Yesu apani si,
“Bidɔ bɛ ya petee gi mlɛmɔ ɛ, lipoe le litrába gi likla ɛtɔtɔ lítraze ní lɛ ozekɔ ɔ, la petee aatsra.”
Beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, lipoe woli liaba lɛ mɛ ɛ? Lɛ liboe woli liaba gi liabasɛ si lipoe le lina si liba lɛ mɛ ɛ?”
Ebu le onu si, “Mleze ni aŋu; tɔ bakímeni mlo o. Banɔ glegle biaba mɛ linyi ne me, lɛ biapani si, ‘Mɛ menu ye!’ lɛ ‘Lipoe le lina!’ Pɔ̀ mlakikuni ba kude e.
Mlakíse lifu xe mlenu bigu ʋɛ ni keduyɔyɔ onu u; la ya pɔ́ ɛtraba kpɛ ɔtɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ líbasɛ si kelea lidu le lina kyɔŋ ɔ.”
Atrɛ ní lɛ aʋa si, “Kese kiayɔ kedu ní kese su; lɛ kaʋaŋaa kiayɔ kedu ní kaʋaŋaa su.
Kese kiahwa nyani nyani lɛ kuʋɛ ni bànya biadɔ ní ikɔ glegle; lɛ eboe mamɔ edi ni eboe kulifu aaba dɔni lifunu ne e.

“Pɔ̀ xe able eboa la ya pɔ́ aaba la mɛ ɛ, biayɔ kedu ní mlɔ su u; biavu mlo kɔ tɔ baxwa etsi ni mlo ní Yudanɛ ma itsaklɔ lɛ biakpɛ mlɔ ní agba; biatsini mlɔ ní bekusi ba ni baʋaŋa ba aŋu mɛ kɔkpɛ mɛ loso.
Lɛ ya liaze kudeonu mɔmɔ kí mlɔ tɔ mlaapani Liboe Gbã nɛ.
Mlakíkpɛ isu ya kunugu kpɛ ɔtɔ ní kiliɛ gi mlaabú isu ya onu u,
lɛ ese linu si maakí mlɔ eboa la, ni kuboeteo gi mlɔ ahwafianɛ ma ba mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́tratani la onu kulɛɛ loo la kunada a.
Mlɔ bapɔnɛ ba ni beneminyime ba, mlɔ baŋanɛ ba, ni mlɔ baʋianɛ ba kyɛ; biakpɛ mlɔ awla lɛ biaye mlɔ mɛ batɔ ɔ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa atrɔ mlɔ ahwafi kɔkpɛ mɛ loso.
Pɔ̀ mlɔ litukpo le kuya tule kyɛ kútralila a.
Mledu ɔkli kese gagla tɔ mlamɔ kubúbú.
“Xe mlɛmɔ gi baguta ba bɛklani Yerusalem i, tɔ mlete si lɔ́ lìzizipoe le lina.
Atɔ banama gi balɛ ní Yudea ɛ, bese atrɛ ní eto la mɛ; lɛ banama gi balɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, bedo; lɛ banama gi balɛ ní iʋa nɛ nì kumami nɛ mɛ ɛ, bakítiku ní ɔma ʋidi no me e.
Lɛ ese linu si la klɔ ɛtráze kutuhehe ewe gi aaki eboa la gi bɛŋwlimi plɛ ɛ, aaba la mɛ.
Lianyani ní ewe ala klɔ mɛ kí bamɛdzɛ ba ni bebine ba! Baxixa glegle biaba kesea lia aʋa, lɛ Aya yɛ kutuheheo kwiaba banɔ ba ya aʋa a.
Banɔ batɔ biatse ní ihɛ piɔpiɔ ʋa onu, lɛ batɔ fɛ ɛ, biavu ba tsinɔ ní kuse dzedzeo petee aʋa. Lɛ babubitɛ ba biayaʋi Yerusalem kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi bɛki ba ɛ.
“Eboe mamɔ edi la aaba liwo le, ɔdzidziɛ ani badzidziebi ʋa aʋa. Ní kesea aʋa ɛ, kuseo kwiaxixa, banima biase, axu la anyra na kuwawaa, lɛ ɔna aado ní banima lipo o.
Banima biatse òkpokpo kɔkpɛ lifu ne gi béte kidiliɛ ɛ gi kitrába kesea aʋa a, lɛ ese linu si kudɔkpaa ní lifune e kwiahwa ní kɔ izeklɔ.
Lɛ biamɔ ‘Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye’ gi atrába ní liplɛ lɛ aʋa a ni kigagla ní kuklekle ʋidi me.
Xe la ya ekpese e, mlayɔlɛɛ tɔ ɔna okú ní mlɔ lipo, lɛ ese linu si mlɔ kubúbú yo kwiti pɔnɔ.”
Lɛ Yesu ebú abee aki ba si, “Mlegyo ogbose lo ni ise gɔgɔ lɛ edi i.
Xe mlɛmɔ lɛ awlakpa vuvu na ɛ, mlete si kedzenilea keti pɔnɔ.
Niteme ke, xe mlɛmɔ eboa la gi ɛɛba la mɛ ɛ, mlete si Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa ketipɔnɔ.
“Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, eboa la pɔ́ atrába la mɛ ɛ, xe ableke banama gi balɛ ligbã́ nɛ abla ɛ, biatse.
Lifunu ne ni kesea biaza, pɔ̀ mɛ eboe la atráza kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ.
“Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ! Mlakíki kuŋwɛŋwɛ kpaŋukpaŋu, kumumu ni begyodi ní kelea mɛ su tɔ bizɛ mlɔ lipoe le xe aníte e, liwe lɛ klɔ lialili mlo
ŋwisi kupè kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ ese linu si liaba ɔnɔ kakaa aʋa ní kelea mɛ ɔkɔ kakaa.
Mleze ní aŋu plɛplɛ mɛ tɔ, mlaxwa Aya lipoe kakaa si ɔki mlɔ kigaglaɛ, tɔ mlaga eboa la pɔ́ gi ɛtrába mɛ, tɔ mlalɛɛ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aŋu mɛ ɛ.”
Ni ewe a la klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu azabasɛ bidɔ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ, pɔ̀ xe ɔlagɔ lɔ ɛna ɛ, azɛɛza ketokpaa lia gi bizɛxwa si olif ye ise le ketokpa aʋa.
Lɛ livlɛ kakaa ɛ, banima pɔ́ bɛzɛtrɛ ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ tɔ benu yɛ eboe la a.
Aklamɔnyasi na liwe ŋaŋa nɛ gi lɛ bizɛxwa si Kutseolidɔzawe le litipɔnɔ ɔ.
Kusumu yo baka ba ni Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba, bezese banima lɛ loso e, bɛzɛ pɛ́ kudeonu gi biaye Yesu ní kikpokpo me e.
Lɛ Satana eti eku u ní Yuda gi bizɛxwa si Iskariot i, gi onu badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole me e.
Lɛ loso Yuda edo atrɛ lɛ ezeegu kunugu yo ni kusumu yo baka ba ni lisumugba lɛ bepepe ba ba baka ba kiliɛ gi aabu Yesu kukɔ ɔki ba ɛ.
Isami iku ba, lɛ bɛdimɛ si biatsa kibɔ ɔki yɛ ɛ.
Yuda adimɛ ní lɛ aʋa lɛ ekpese kude gbã kutɔ onu kupɛ gi kɔ aʋa aaga xe aabu Yesu kukɔ ɔki ba xegi banima báma ní yɛ su i.
Aklamɔnyasi na Liwe le lina gi lilɛ si beye kutse lidɔzawe le keʋesibi ya ɛ.
Lɛ loso Yesu akpɛ Petro ni Yohanes ni eboa la si, “Mlazɛbla ní Kutselidɔzawe le kiŋaŋa ɛ su aki blɔ.”
Beʋi ye si, “Nifɔ wɔpɛ si kubla bɛ aplɛ ɛ?”
Ebu le onu si, “Xe mleti iku ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, onyime ɔtɔ gi etu kenifukpo ɛ, aatsani mlɔ. Mlekuni yɛ kude atrɛ ní kepea lia klɔ mɛ gi aatiku i,
tɔ mlasi kepea ɔkaɛ si, ‘Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ si, Nífɔ bababa ba kugbakeo liɔ mɛ gi mɛ ni mɛ badɔkpasi ba kwiaze xe kwiaŋa Kutselidɔzawe le bidɔ mɛ ɛ?’
Aabasɛ mlɔ lifunu kugbake ʋidi utɔ mɛ gi bɛlulɔ ɛ. Mlabla kidɔ kakaa aplɛ ní niklɔ.”
Agi bɛsɛ ɛ, bɛzɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa ŋwisi kiliɛ ɖii gi Yesu asi ba kinɛ ɛ, lɛ bɛbla ɛki kutseolidɔzawe le kiŋaŋaɛ ɛ.
Agi lipoe le lina ɛ, Yesu eze ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su ni yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba.
Asi ba si, “Linu mɛ kupɛ́pɛ si miŋa Kutselidɔzawe le kiŋaŋaɛ liɛ ni mlɔ xe ableke maamɔ kini ye e!
Lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, Mátraŋa ʋɛ elu tɔɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi lɛ ese kununu yo kwiaba ní Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ.”
Gi Yesu akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia ɛ, edo Aya ɖase, lɛ apani si i, “Mlazɛ tɔ mlɔmɛ ɔkakaa ɔkpɛ onu.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ si dɔni abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, mátraŋwɛ wain liɛ ya tɔɔ kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa kɛba a.”
Lɛ akɔ lìklã nɛ, xe edo Aya ɖase e, lɛ ayaʋi lɛ mɛ ɛ, xe akɔ aki ba ɛ, lɛ apani si i, “Lɛ ya linu mɛ kisugyaɛ gi bɛki ní mlɔ litukpo o. Mlabitɛ nite tɔ mlazakɔ aplɛ aŋu ní mɛ aʋa.”
Niteme ke akɔ kaŋwɛpliʋia kí ba ni kiŋaŋaɛ kede, lɛ apani si, “Kaŋwɛpliʋia lia ya kenu Aya yɛ kunyánya vuvu yɔ gi anya nì mɛ ìka lɛ ɛ, gi bɛbali ní mlɔ litukpo o.
Pɔ̀ mledi i, ɔniliɛ gi aakpɛ mɛ awla ɛ, odi ní ɔkplɔ nɔ su nì mɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atrátse ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Aya atrɔ lɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ babaa ki ɔniliɛ gi aabu ye kukɔ ɛ.”
Lɛ bekpese ba ahanuglɔ ba kuʋi si ba mɛ owoli atrábitɛ liboe lɛ klɔ na a.
Kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ kwiku ní ba kusi dzɛ ní ba mɛ iliɛ gi biamɔ si yɛ onu oʋidi ye su u.
Yesu asi ba si, “babubitɛ ba ba bekusi ba ɛ, bɛmɔ kigagla ní ba akɔanɛ ma aʋa, lɛ banama gi bɛmɔ kigaglaɛ ní ba aʋa ɛ, bizɛpɛ si bɛbasɛ si ba bizedi ba aʋa.
Pɔ̀ mlɔ kɔ ɛ, líma si lize nite ní mlɔ kusi i. Boŋu i, ɔnɔ ʋidi ye ní mlɔ kusi i, oze ŋwisi ɔsisami yɛ kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔniliɛ gi ɔlɛ ní mlɔ onu i, oze ŋwisi ɔnɔsumu ye kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ nyaŋwɛ asa keme e,? Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su lo o, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi eesumu na a? Aní yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i? Pɔ̀ malɛ ní mlɔ kusi ŋwisi ɔnɔsumu kinɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ mlenu banama gi mlɛlɛɛ ní mɛ su u, ní mɛ kupepeo me e.
Lɛ makɔ kukusi ŋaŋa aki mlɔ ɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Mɔka akɔ akí mɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Mlaaŋa tɔ mlaŋwɛ bidɔ ní mɛ ɔkplɔ nɔ su ní mɛ kaʋaŋaa mɛ ni tɔ mlaaze ní ekusigbo aʋa, tɔ mlaaŋa Israel akpɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa la aʋa.
“Lɛ Yesu apani si, Simon, Simon, ta kutu! Satana eʋi kude si yipí mlɔ ŋwisi amu kinɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ maxwa Aya ní wɔ litukpo Simon, tɔ wukíwɔli ní wɔ kuziŋa mɛ ɛ. Lɛ xe wodzi ba mɔklɔ ɛ, tɔ kpɛ wɔ benemi ba kigagla.”
Pɔ̀ Petro ebu le onu si, “Ɔkaɛ, mabla si mitrɛ ligba ni wɔ tɔ mitse ni wɔ fɛ.”
Yesu apani si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ, Petro si, xe able ɔkukɔ loglo lo aamè omono e, wɔanada tatá si wote me e.”
Lɛ Yesu eʋi ba si, “Lipoe lɛ gi makpɛ mlɔ xe mlévu kibɔ okotoku, ogudo, loo afɔkpa ɛ, kiditɔ kiziã mlɔ na a?” bebu le onu si “Kididɔ kíziã blɔ.”
Asi ba si, “Pɔ̀ abla ɛ, xe kibɔ kotoku ɔlɛ ní wɔ awla ɛ, kɔ yɛ ni ogudo lo; lɛ xe ihɛ gblamadza ɔ́ma ni wɔ awla ɛ, da wɔ liwu le aʋa lini nɛ tɔ zekɔ dzi ɔtɔ.

Lɛ ese linu si bɛŋwlimi plɛ ní kuŋwlimi dradra mɛ si, ‘Lɛ bebù ye kpɛ ní banɔ zimizi ba kusi i’, lɛ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, lilɛ si liba lɛ mɛ kí mɛ ɛ. Ee, kidiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi ní mɛ su i, kihà kɛ mɛ kuba.”
Badɔkpasi ba bɛpani si, “Ɔkaɛ Di, imɔ ihɛ gblamadza tiaʋa ni niya.” Ebu le onu si “bɛsrɛ,”
Yesu edo atrɛ ní Kumu yɔ ise le ketokpaa aʋa ŋwisi kiliɛ gi izɛbitɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze ni yɛ kude e.
Agi beku niklɔ ɛ, asi ba si, “Mlaxwa Aya tɔ mlakíwɔli iku ní kufekedi me e.”
Lɛ ebu lidze ní basu taʋɛ ɛ, lɛ adɔ yɛ aklámasi na aʋa a, xe axwa Aya si i:
“Ɔka, xe linu wɔ kupɛpɛ ɛ, tɔ ti kaŋwɛpliʋia lia ní mɛ aʋa, aní mɛ kupɛpɛ onu xunyɔ, pɔ̀ wɔ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa biabitɛ ɛ.”
Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dɔni lifunu ne ebu isu ya abasɛ yɛ lɛ akpɛ yɛ kigagla ɛ.
Lɛ ní kuyeʋiyeʋi me e, axwa Aya ni kimbi kyíkyĩ sanɔ, lɛ yɛ ohihe lo ɛzɛwɔli ní yɛ su ɛdɔ kesea ŋwisi ìka akpɔ kinɛ ɛ.
Agi ayɔ adɔ ní Aya ɔxwaklɔ aba yɛ badɔkpasi ba klɔ ɛ, amɔ si beku sra mɛ, kɔkpɛ kupepe ni ɔna nyipu loso.
Lɛ eʋi ba si, “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛdɔ sra sɛ ɛ? Mlayɔ tɔ mlaxwa Aya atɔ mlakíwɔli iku ní kufekedi me e.”
Agi azeegu kunugu yo e, linɔkpi itɔ gi Yuda badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole eze ɔtɔ akɔ ɛ, lìba. Eti apɔni Yesu tɔ yimu yɛ lidzɔ lɛ,
pɔ̀ Yesu eʋi ye si, “Yuda, kibú woebú Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye ekɔ ni adzɔ kumumu na a?”
Agi banama gi beze ní Yesu su bɛmɔ liboe lɛ gi litraba ɛ, beʋi ye si, “Ɔkaɛ kuwa blɔ ihɛ gblamadza ʋa su axwɛ na a?”
Lɛ ba mɛ tole aŋwia yɛ ihɛɛ, lɛ atí kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ ɔnɔdzidzi ye yɛ kaŋaa mɛ kutukpaa zanɔ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu apani si, “Lisrɛ!” lɛ agbɔni onyimee yɛ kutu yɔ xe ayɔni yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Yesu asi kusumu yo baka ba, lisɔligba lɛ bepepe ba ni bakatsi ba, gi bɛba yɛ ovu klɔ si, “Kiba mleba ni Ihɛ gblamadza ba ni kusekpeo si mlevu me ŋwisi oboebitɛ kinɛ na a?
Meze ní mlɔ kusi liwe kakaa ní Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ pɔ̀ mlévu me e. Pɔ̀ mlɔ lipoe le lina a, gi litumu ne me ɔʋaŋaɛ ɛɛŋa aʋa a.”
Agi bevu ye e, bɛgbani yɛ sɛnɔ ɛtsinɔ ní kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea mɛ. Petro ezenì ba kude ní ɔdzage no.
Bɛkpɛ kifu ní kusumu yo ɔka ʋidi ye yɛ kepea kusi yo gi bɛzɛŋani i, lɛ Petro kyɛ eze ní ba kusi i.
Ɔnɔsumu ɔdisami ɔtɔ ɛmɔ yɛ gi odi i. Eti apɔnɔ lɛ edi ye mɔmɔmɔ lɛ apani si i, “Onyime liɛ ya fɛ eze ni Yesu kude.”
Pɔ̀ anada lɛ si i, “Ɔdzɛ, Méte ye kura a.”
Lídze xe ɔnɔ dzedze fɛ amɔ yɛ ɛ, lɛ apani si i, “Wɔ fɛ wonu ba mɛ tole.” Petro ebú le onu si, “Onyime, Ani mɛ!”
Ŋwisi ɔnyɔsasa tole kede e, ɔnɔ dzedze fɛ edu ɔkli kese si, “Lilɛ lɛ mɛ si ɔniliɛ ya fɛ eze ní yɛ su, lɛ ese linu si Galilea ɔnɛ onu u.”
Petro ebu le onu si, “Onyime, Méte liboe lɛ klɔ su gi wɔɛpani i!” Kiliɛ gi eegu kunugu yo ko e, lɛ ɔkukɔ loglo lo eme e.
Lɛ Yesu ekyi xe edi Petro e. Lɛ Petro aplɛ aŋu ní liboe lɛ gi Ɔkaɛ apani asi yɛ si, “Xe ableke ɔkukɔ loglo lo aamè omono e, wɔanada mɛ tatá.”
Lɛ edo atrɛ oŋwe no o, xe azeebemi tiitiitii i.
Benyime baklɔ gi bezeepe Yesu i, bekpese yɛ kakpaa kukpɛ lɛ bekusi ye kyɛ ɛ.
Bɛnya yɛ aŋu na mɛ lɛ beʋi ye si, “Si blɔ! Nyaŋwɛ asa wɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ bɛtrɛ ní aʋa ekpini Yesu isanɔ ɔ.
Agi kelea kɛti i, kusumu yo baka ba ni banɔtsitsi ba ani Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba bɛtsa, lɛ bɛgbani Yesu i manɔ ní ba aŋu mɛ ɛ.
Bɛpani si, “Xe wɔ wonu Kristo ye e, tɔ si blɔ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Xe masi mlɔ ɛ, mlatrázi mɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a,
lɛ xe meʋi mlo liboetɔ ɛ, mlatrábu le onu u.
Pɔ̀ dɔni abla kɔ tsinɔ ɛ, Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye atráze ní Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete yɛ kaŋaa mɛ.”
Lɛ ba pɔ́ beʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ kido woedo si Aya Yebi wonu na a?”
Lɛ ebu le onu aki ba si, mlɔ mlɛpani si, “yɛ menu.”
Lɛ bɛpani si i, “Ege lɛ loso kwipɛ banɔ gi biaŋa katsalia dzɛ ɛ? Blɔ ɔtutɔ kwinu le dɔni yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ onugu lo me.”
Lɛ ɔnɔha lɔ pɔ́ ɛyɔ ɔ, xe ɛgbani Yesu itsini Pilato klɔ ɛ.

Niklɔ bekpese eboe la kukɔ ní yɛ su si, “Kwivu onyime liɛ ya gi ɛɛfuɛ ɛkpɛ blɔ akɔanɛ ma mɛ si bayɔ kedu u, xe ɛɛsi ba si bakítsa ɔgyɔ lɔ akí Roma banɛ ma okusi ʋidi ye e, lɛ apani si yɛ yenu Kristo ye gi onu okusi i.”
Lɛ Pilato eʋi ye si, “Wɔ́ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Nite wɔ ɛpani.”
Lɛ Pilato asi Kusumu yo baka ba ni linɔkpi le si, “Mámɔ kesetata tɔtɔ gi maakɔ obu onyime liɛ ya lipɔ ɔ.”
Pɔ̀ bɛzɛtù le ekpɛ gagla sanɔ si, “Gani yɛ bidɔ basɛbasɛ ʋɛ mɛ ɛ, ɛɛkpɛ ɔpisáse ní banima mɛ ní Yudea kesea petee me. Ekpese le adɔ ni Galilea lɛ eku ní ya abla ɛ.”
Agi Pilato enu liboe lɛ ya ɛ, eʋi si, Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, Galilea ɔnɛ onu na a.
Agi enu si Yesu ádɔ ní kesea lia aʋa gi Herodes ɛɛŋa ɛ, akɔ yɛ atsisi Herodes gi eze ní Yerusalem ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ.
Liku Herodes isami gi amɔ Yesu i, lɛ ese linu si enu yɛ onu lɛ azaapɛ si yimɔ yɛ lipoe gblamadzaɛtɔ lɛ ya a. Azeedi kudeonu si yimɔ Yesu gi ɛɛbitɛ enugutseboatɔ ɛ.
Lɛ loso ɛ, Herodes eʋi Yesu eboe glegle, pɔ̀ Yesu óbu litɔtɔ onu u.
Kusumu yo baka ba nì Ɔsã nɔ badɔbasɛ ba ɛ, bedoeba ɔtɔ nɔ, lɛ bɛkɔ eboe ní yɛ su gagla a.
Herodes nì yɛ baguta ba kyɛ bɛkpɛ Yesu kakpaa, lɛ kede e, bɛkɔ liwu gbã etɔ kpɛ kí yɛ, lɛ bedzini ye tsisi Pilato e.
Dɔni liwe lɛ klɔ aʋa ɛ, Herodes ni Pilato bedzi baʋia; kpɛ ɔtɔ ɛ, ofu eze ní ba kusi.
Pilato axwa kusumu yo baka ba, ni baʋaŋa ba ani banima akpɛ likpɔ.
lɛ asi ba si, “Mlɛgbani onyime liɛ ya ɛmani mɛ si yɛ ɛɛfuɛ ɛkpɛ banima mɛ tɔ bayɔ kedu u. Abla ɛ, agi mapani nì yɛ ní mlɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ, mámɔ yɛ kesetataa tɔ́tɔ ní eboa la gi mlɛkɔ ní yɛ su mɛ ɛ.
Nite ke Herodes fɛ ɔ́mɔ kesetataa tɔ́tɔ ɔ, lɛ loso edzini ye atsisi blɔ. Onyime liɛ ya ɛ, ɔ́bitɛ kididɔ ɔ, gi biakɔtsà kutsépia kí yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ loso e, maaki tɔ bafiaʋi yɛ litam tɔ maayurɔ yɛ.”
Lize si Pilato ɔyurɔ ɔnɔ tole gi bɛkpɛ ligba aki ba ní Kutseolidɔzawe kakaa aʋa a.
Lɛ ba petee bɛkpɛ ozi si, “Ye ye! tɔ yurɔ Baraba kí blɔ ɔ!”
Bɛkpɛ Baraba ligba kɔkpɛ keduyɔyɔ katɔ ni kunɔye kutɔ gi biba ɔma ʋidi no me loso o.
Nya Pilato apɛ si yiyurɔ awla ní Yesu su, lɛ loso alìɔʋi linɔkpi le onu dzɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ bɛtrɛ lɛ aʋa ni ozi lo si i, “Kú ye ní ose lo su! Kú ye ní ose lo su!”
Pilato eʋi ba kutánɛ si, “Kese woli ata a? Mámɔ kidiliɛ gi abitɛ ɛ, gi kizia yɛ kutse e! Maaki tɔ bafiaʋi yɛ litam tɔ maayurɔ yɛ.”
Pɔ̀ bɛtrɛ ní ozi lo kukpɛkpɛɔ aʋa nì ile gagla si bekú Yesu ní ose lo su u. Gɔgɔɛ ba ozi lo ɛki si adimɛ ní lɛ aʋa a.
Lɛ Pilato atsa litsi le aki Yesu ŋwisi kiliɛ gi beʋi kinɛ ɛ.
Ayurɔ onyime liɛ klɔ gi bɛzɛpɛ́ ɛ, ɔniliɛ klɔ gi bɛkpɛ ligba kɔkpɛ keduyɔyɔ ni kunɔye e, lɛ akɔ Yesu akpɛ ní ba awla tɔ babitɛ yɛ kiliɛ gi bɛpɛ ɛ.

Lɛ baguta ba bɛgbani Yesu sɛnɔ ɛ, lɛ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ, bɛtsani Simon, Kirene ɔnɛɛ gi ádɔ ní kamamiatɔ mɛ ɛ, xe atrába ní ɔma ʋidi no me e. Bemi ye aʋa, lɛ bɛkɔ osetsase lo ɛtrɔ yɛ si otu tɔ oze ni Yesu kude e.
Linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ lize nì yɛ kude; badzɛ batɔ gi bɛzɛtaní i, xe beze bemi kí yɛ kyɛ ɛ, beze ní ba kusi.
Yesu ekyi edi ba lɛ asi ba si, “Yerusalem badzɛ ba a! Mlakíbemi aki mɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ mlebemi akí isu ya ni mlɔ bebi ba a.
Mɛɛtrɔ likla ní lɛ aʋa ɛki mlɔ si ewe la ɛtraba gi banima biapani si, ‘Lipɛ kí badzɛa ba awla gi banuvɔ báma ɛ, gi bápɔ bebi i, xe bakí bebi limwa ɛ!’
Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, banima biasi eto la si, ‘mlakpa adɔ ní blɔ aʋa!’ ani kutokpaa si, ‘mlewe blo!’
Lɛ xegi bɛbitɛ la ya elu ɛyurɔ mɛ gi ma lɛ ŋwisi ose wɔwɔ kinɛ ɛ, kitɛ liaze ki mlɔ gi mlalɛ ŋwisi ose kpakpa kinɛ ɛ?”
Bɛgbani benyime tiaʋa dzedze gi beze banɔ zimizi fɛ evu u, gi bɛtreye pɔni Yesu i.
Agi bɛzɛna niklɔ gi bizɛxwa si “Litukpoxwa lɛ ɛ,” bekú Yesu ní ose lo su. Lɛ bekú banɔ zimizi tiaʋa ba kyɛ, tole ní yɛ kaŋaa mɛ ni ɔʋlaɛ ní yɛ kabaa mɛ.
Yesu apani si, “Ɔka! kɔkyɛ ba lɛ ese linu si, béte kidiliɛ gi bɛɛbitɛ ɛ.” Bɛlɛ yɛ ewu la kpɛ ba kusi gani exoeʋi la kutata mɛ.
Banima bɛlɛɛ gi bezeedi i, pɔ̀ Yudanɛ ma baka ba kɔ ɛ, bezeebu onugu me tsini yɛ su si, “Ebú banima; kitɔ obu isu ya xe yɛ onu Kristo ye e gi Aya akya ɛ!”
Baguta ba fɛ bɛkpɛ yɛ kakpaa; beti apɔnɔ yɛ lɛ bɛki yɛ kuda nyagba nyagba a,
lɛ bɛpani si, “Bú isu ya xe wɔ wonu Yudanɛ ma okusi ye e!”
Ní yɛ etukpo la onu i, bɛŋwlimi eboa la ya si, “Yɛ onu Yudanɛ ma Okusi ye.”
Banɔ zimizi ba mɛ tole gi bekú ose lo su ipɔni yɛ ɛ ekpini ye si, “Aní wɔ wonu Kristo ye e? Bú isu ya tɔ bú blɔ fɛ!”
Ɔnɔ ʋlaɛ, kɔ, atɛni ɔtɔpu yɛ si, “Woʋíse Aya lo o? Wɔzi kutuheheo kiliɛ gi yɛ fɛ azɛ ɛ.
Blɔ kɔ kwimɔ blɔ liʋɛ tsatsa lɛ, lɛ ese linu si kwimɔ kutuhehe uliɔ gi kwisrɔni kidiliɛ ɛ, gi kwibitɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ yɛ kɔ ɛ, ɔ́ta kesea tɔtɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ asi Yesu si, “Plɛ aŋu ní mɛ aʋa Yesu, xe wɔba ŋwisi Okusi kinɛ ɛ!”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ si, omono e, wɔaze ní Paradiso ye me nì mɛ.”
Liaze ŋwisi kemize inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa kinɛ ɛ, lɛ litumu ne lizɛ kesea aʋa petee kɔzɛna ni inyɔ tita a:
lɛ ese linu si liwo le limɔni kuyi i, lɛ Yerusalem Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ kusaa gi kusunu i, kwilɛ ní kupɛ tuʋa ɛ.
Yesu akpɛ ozi lo ni ole gagla si, “Ɔka! wɔ iwla lɛ mɛ makɔ mɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ akpɛ!” Agi apani nite ko e, lɛ ada onugu i.
Baguta ba ɔkaɛ amɔ kidiliɛ gi kiba kɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ akpɔ̀ Aya si, “Sugba ɛ, ɔniliɛ ya onu ɔnɔ gbã!”
Agi banama gi bɛlɛɛ ní niklɔ ɔ, xe bezeedi bidɔ mɛ ɛ, bɛmɔ liboe lɛ klɔ gi liba lɛ mɛ ɛ, ba pɔ́ bɛtàni lɛ bedzitrɛ ní ba kupeo me ní asigaga mɛ ɛ.
Banama petee gi bete Yesu mɔmɔmɔ ɛ, kɔpɔni badzɛa ba ya gi bekuni yɛ kude dɔni Galilea ɛ, bɛlɛɛ ní ɔdzage no gi bezeedi bidɔ mɛ ɛ.
Onyime ɔtɔ eze gi bɛzɛxwa si Yosef i, ádɔ ní Arimatia gi onu Yuda ɔma ɔtɔ mɛ ɛ. Eze ɔnɔ gbã gi kubùbù kwize ní yɛ su u. Eze ní Yudanɛ ma betsixwa ba kusi xunyɔ,
pɔ̀ ɔ́trɔ ní ba begyodi ʋa ni ba kiboebitɛ aʋa a, lɛ azeepe Aya yɛ kaʋaŋaa kubaba a.
Yɛ atrɛ ní Pilato klɔ, lɛ eʋi si bakɔ Yesu okpo ye aki yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ azeepleni okpo ye ní ose lo su u, xe axla yɛ akpɛ ní kusa pititi kutɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ akɔ yɛ akpɛ ní ɔdrɔ vuvu u, gi bebu ikpɛ ní liklakpɔ ɛtɔ mɛ ɛ, gi ɔnɔnɔ ɔfɛ ní lɔ mɛ odi me e.
Lize Lisɔpa, liblawe le gi Sabat yɛ ihakpese e.
Badzɛa ba gi bezeni Yesu kude dɔni Galilea ɛ, bekuni Yosef kude lɛ bɛzɛmɔ ɔdrɔ lɔ ni kiliɛ gi bɛplɛ Yesu ní lɔ mɛ ɛ.
Gi bedzitrɛ ní kepea mɛ ɛ, xe bɛzɛbla ní kumu nì bidɔ flafla bɛ su ki okpo ye e, beze emɔni ní sabat yɛ aʋa ní ɔsã nɔ onu u.
Lipadzruwe le olezatɔ nɔ ɛ, badzɛ ba bɛtrɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ sú, bevu bawá flafla ʋa gi bɛbitɛ ɛ.
Bɛmɔ si bemli likla nɛ za nɔ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ onu,
Pɔ̀ gi beti eku i, bámɔ Ɔkaɛ Yesu yɛ okpo ye.
Agi bɛlɛɛ ɛ, xe bezee bù lɛ su i, bɛmɔ benyime tiaʋa gi balɛ ní ba su ní ewu klekle me e.
Lifu liku badzɛ ba lɛ gi bɛbubɔ ɔ, xe bɛ kpɛ aŋu na mɛ kesea ɛ, benyime ba beʋi ba si “Ege lɛ loso mlɛɛpɛ ɔnɔ gbagbe ní bekpo ʋa kusi i?
Ɔ́ma ní ya; ayɔ. Mlaplɛ aŋu sì asi mlɔ ní Galilea si;
‘Biakɔ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kí banɔ zimizi ba, tɔ beku ní ose lo su, lɛ ní ewe tata kede e aayɔ dzi ligbã.’ ”
Lɛ badzɛ ba bɛplɛ aŋu ní yɛ eboe la aʋa ɛ.
Agi bedzi dɔni ɔdrɔ lɔ su i, bɛzɛɛsi badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba ni banɔ gɔgɔ ba pɔ́ eboa la petee gi bɛmɔ ɛ.
Badzɛ ba klɔ beze Maria Magdaladzee nì Yohana nì Maria gi onu Yakobo yene e ani badzɛ gɔgɔa ba gi bɛpɔni ba ɛ, ba bɛsi banɔxwaxwa ba eboe la petee.
Pɔ̀ banɔxwaxwa ba bɛkɔ lɛ si eboa la gi badzɛ ba bɛpani i, enu anukpadzeboe lɛ loso bázɛ ba aʋa aŋa a.
Pɔ̀ Petro ayɔ lɛ ese atrɛ ní ɔdrɔ lɔ su i: abùbɔ edi pɔ̀ basa ʋa gi bɛxla yɛ ɛkpɛ tètè ko amɔ ɔ. Lɛ edzi atrɛ ní kepea mɛ gi azeegyo o liboe lɛ gi liba lɛ mɛ edi i.
Ní liwe lɛ klɔ ke aʋa ɛ, banɔ tiaʋa gi beze ni Yesu kude e, bɛzɛɛtrɛ ní Emaus kamamia tɔ mɛ, ŋwisi itiplɛkɔ tigloele dɔni Yerusalem.
Bɛzɛka sika ní eboa la gi ɛba la mɛ su u.
Agi bezevu eboe la edi nì ba ahanuglɔ ba ɛ, Yesu ɔtutɔ lɔ eti apɔni ba lɛ azɛɛga ni ba ɛ,
bɛmɔ yɛ pɔ̀, bamɔ yɛ egyesi i.
Yesu eʋi ba si, “Liboe woli su mlɛpani gi mlɛtrɛ ɛ?” bɛlɛɛ zĩi ní asigaga mɛ ɛ.
Bamɛ tole gi bizɛxwa si Kleopa ɛ, eʋi ye si “Wɔ tètè ko wonu ɔbabaɛ ni Yerusalem gi óte eboa la gi ɛba lamɛ ewe ala ya mɛ lo o?”
“Eʋi ba si eboe woli i?”

Bebú le onu si, “eboa la gi ɛba Yesu u, gi ádɔ Nazaret aʋa ɛ.” “Onyime liɛ ya eze Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ, lɛ Aya ni banima pɔ́ bɛkɔ yɛ si onu ɔnɔ gagla ni liboe kakaa gi edo o, ni kidɔ kakaa gi abitɛ mɛ ɛ.
Blɔ kusumu yo baka ba ni baʋaŋa ba bɛkɔ yɛ ɛkɔ tɔ batsà kutsépia aki yɛ tɔ bekú ye ní ose lo su.
Blɔ kugyodi yo kwize si yɛ atrábu Israel. Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ, omono liwe tanɛ gi eboa la ɛba lamɛ ɛ.
Kɔ sanɔ ɛ, badzɛ batɔ ní blɔ kusi bɛmani liboetɔ gi litu blɔ kugyɔ ɔ, bɛpiɔ ɛtrɛ ní Yesu ɔdrɔ lɔ su,
pɔ̀ bámɔ yɛ okpo ye e. Bedziba ɛsi blɔ si bɛtsani bidɔ; Bɛmɔ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi bɛsi ba si ɔlɛ ligbã́ a.
Blɔ iha lɛ itɔ idzɛ ɔdrɔ lɔ su lɛ izɛmɔ kiliɛ ɖii gi badzɛ ba bɛpani i, pɔ̀ bámɔ yɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Kitɛ xe mlɛdɔ kuga nite e, lɛ kitɛ xe mlɔ begyodi ʋa bɛyɔ ní beboedoplɛ ba eboe la aʋa kuziŋaa su u?
Kɔ líziã si Kristo ye ɔmɔ ɔziã nɔ tɔ lɛ kede e, aatiku ní yɛ Kusudraa mɛ na a?”
Lɛ Yesu ebú eboa la gi bɛŋwlimi ní yɛ su ese aki ba dɔnɔ ní liboe le petee me e. Ekpese adɔ nɔ ní Mose kuplekpaa ni beboedoplɛ ba petee bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi ʋɛ mɛ ɛ.
Agi beti apɔni kamamia lia mɛ gi bɛtrɛ ɛ, Yesu abitɛ ŋwisi kitsa ɛtsa eza a.
pɔ̀ bɛtrɔ awla ní yɛ aʋa si “Ze ní blɔ su; kelea keeblo lɛ litumu ne liidɔ ɔ.” Lɛ loso e, eti eku ni ba lɛ eze ni ba su i.
Gi beze ní ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i, akɔ liklã̀ nɛ lɛ akrira lɛ ɛ, lɛ kede e, ayaʋi lɛ lɛ akɔ lɛ aki ba ɛ.
Lɛ ba aŋu na ɛdra ɛ, xe bɛmɔ yɛ egyesi i, ko lɛ alila ní ba aŋu na mɛ ɛ.
Beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si “dani lize ŋwisi kifu kizɛsɔ ní blɔ mɛ ɛ, gi azeegu kunugu yo aki blɔ ní kudeo aʋa a, xe azeebu kudɔŋwlimi yɔ ese akí blɔ ɛ?”
Bɛyɔ kyɔŋ lɛ bedzitrɛ Yerusalem i, niklɔ bɛmɔ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tole ba gi bɛkpɛ likpɔ ni banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ.
gi bɛpani si, “Ɔkaɛ anya yɔ! Ebú isu abasi Simon!”
Lɛ banɔ tiaʋa ya kyɛ ɛ, bɛdra lɛ su si ba kidiliɛ gi kiba kɛ mɛ ní kudeo aʋa ɛ, nì kiliɛ gi bɛmɔ Ɔkaɛ gyesi gi ayaʋi liklã̀ nɛ aki ba ɛ.
Agi banɔ tiaʋa ba ya bɛzɛɛsi ba eboa la ya ɛ, Ɔkaɛ ɔtutɔ alɛɛ ní ba kusi lɛ asi ba si, “Kusuyɔ kimlɔ.”
Besugu, lɛ lifu liku ba lɛ begyodi si bɛɛmɔ okpo.
Pɔ̀ asi ba si, “Ege nì lifu mlese e? Ege lɛ loso mlaʋízi liboe lɛ ya aʋa ɛɛŋa a?
Mledi mɛ kuwla mɛ ni mɛ kuklikpɔ, tɔ mlete si mɛ ɔtutɔ. Mlagbɔni mɛ edi, lɛ ese linu si kigyɛ ni axwa aʋíze okpo su ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mlɛmɔ si bilɛ mɛ su u.”
Gi apani ní te e, abasɛ ba yɛ kuwla mɛ ni yɛ kuklikpɔ ɔ.
Kɔkpɛ gi liboe le litu ba kugyɔ ɔ, xe liku ba isami lɛ loso e, bázɛ lɛ aʋa aŋa dzɛ si yɛ, lɛ eʋi ba si, “kiŋaŋa ɛtɔ kilɛ ní mlɔ awla gi biaŋa na a?”
Bɛki yɛ likpaa gi bɛpɔʋi i,
lɛ azɛ lɛ xe ata nɛ ní ba aŋu mɛ ɛ.

Lɛ asi ba si, “Eboa la ya ɖii masi mlɔ gi meze ní mlɔ kusi i: kidɔ kakaa gi bɛŋwlimi ní mɛ su u ní Mose Isã nɛ mɛ nì, beboedoplɛ ba bidɔ ŋwlimiŋwlimi ʋɛ, anì Psalomo ba kuplekpaa mɛ ɛ, lilɛ si kiba kɛ mɛ.”
Niklɔ adra ba begyodi ba mɛ tɔ benu kuŋwlimi yɔ ese.
lɛ asi ba si, “Eboa la ya bɛŋwlimi plɛ si: Kristo ye aamɔ kini, lɛ aayɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní ewe tata kede e,
lɛ ní yɛ linyi ne me e, ɔna mɛ kukyikyi ni kesetata kukɔkyɛ biasɔ̀li bɛ kí kese kakaa, bia kpese dɔni Yerusalem.
Mlɔ mlenu katsalia aki eboa la ya.
Lɛ mɛ ɔtutɔ maatsísi mlɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ dradra lɔ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi mɔka aka aplɛ kinɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ lilɛ si mleze ní ɔma ʋidi lo me kɔzɛna ni lipoe lɛ gi kigaglaɛ kiadɔ ní lifunu ne xe kiaba mlɔ aʋa ɛ.”
Gi agbani ba edono ní ɔma ʋidi lo me atsini Betania ɛ, emuni yɛ iwla lɛ lɛ akrira ba ɛ.
Gi azɛɛkrira ba ɛ, asɛ ní ba su lɛ befeke ye tsini lifunu ne e.
Besumu ye, lɛ bedzitrɛ ní Yerusalem ni isami glegle e.
Nite si beze Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ lipoe glegle gi bezee do Aya ɖase e.
Ní okpese kɔ ɛ, Liboe le lize; Liboe le lize nì Aya, lɛ Liboe le linu Aya a.
Dɔni kelea okpese kɔ ɛ, eze nì Aya.
Aya abitɛ kidɔ kakaa gani yɛ aʋa; kididɔ kíma gi bɛbitɛ ɛ, xe óze lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Ligbã́ nɛ lize yɛ mɛ, lɛ ligbã́ nɛ, lɛ lize kuklekleo ki banima a.
Kuklekleo kwikle ku ní litumu ne me, lɛ litumu ne lítani kɔ aʋa ku ŋa a.
Aya akpɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gi bizɛxwa si Yohanes,
aba ŋwisi katsalia ɔŋaŋa kinɛ tɔ ɔdra kuklekleo su, tɔ gani yɛ aʋa ɛ, ɔnɔ kakaa aanu liboe le tɔ aazi ŋa.
Aní yɛ ɔtutɔ eze kuklekleo o; kiba aba si yidra kuklekleo su u.
Kuklekleo ɔtutɔ lɔ gi kuzekle kí banima petee e, kwitra ba kelea mɛ.
Aba kelea mɛ, pɔ gi Aya abitɛ kelea gani yɛ aʋa fɛ ɛ, kelea kámɔ yɛ egyesi i.
Aba yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ akɔanɛ ma klɔ, pɔ̀ yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ akɔanɛ ma bázɛ yɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ banɔaklɔ petee gi bɛzi yɛ ɛ, xe bɛzi yɛ linyi ne aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ; ba ko akpɛ kigaglaɛ si bedzi Aya yɛ bebi.
Bédzi Aya yɛ bebi gani kipɔpɔ mɛ ɛ, loo onyime ni ɔdzɛ ba kutrɔtrɔ mɛ, loo gani obika yɛ kupɛpɛ mɛ; Aya ɔtutɔ onu ba Ɔka.
Liboe le lidzi ɔnɔ gi eyi nì lipomepɛpɛ ni anukwarɛ ɛ, lɛ eze ní blɔ kusi i. Kwimɔ yɛ kuklekleo, kuklekleo liɔ klɔ gi azɛ ŋwisi Yɛka yɛ obinyime tolee kinɛ ɛ,
Gi Yohanes amɔ yɛ ɛ, apani ní yɛ su nì ozi si, “Yɛ onu Ɔniliɛ su gi mapani si, ‘Yɛ aaba mɛ kede e, pɔ̀ emu asani mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔlɛ xe bɛpɔ mɛ ɛ.’”
Lipomepɛpɛ lɛ kusrɛsrɛɔ ní yɛ mɛ loso e, akrira blɔ petee, lɛ aki blɔ kukrira trɔ kukrira aʋa a.
Aya akí Ɔsã nɔ gani Mose aʋa, pɔ̀ lipomepɛpɛ ni anukwarɛ kɔ ɛ, Yesu Kristo aʋa biga edo.
Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́mɔ Aya ʋídi i, Yebinyime tolee, gi ɔʋífili ní Yɛka su i, yɛ ebu Ɔka yɛ abasi blɔ.
Lɛ ya linu Yohanes yɛ liboe me dradra lɛ, gi Yudanɛ ma baka ba ní Yerusalem bɛkpɛ kusumu yo bakaatɔ ni Lewianɛ batɔ ní Yohanes klɔ tɔ beʋi ye si, Nyaŋwɛ onu u?
Yohanes ógbe liboe le onu kubúbú, pɔ̀ apani wee lɛ adra lɛ mɛ si, “Aní mɛ menu Kristo ye e.”
Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ nyaŋwɛ wònu, wɔ wonu Eliya na a?” Yohanes ebu le onu si, “Owo aní yɛ menu u,” lɛ beʋi si, “Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ wònu na a?” Ebu le onu si, “Owo.”
Gɔgɔɛ beʋi ye si, “Kɔlɔ si blɔ ɔniliɛ gi wonu i, lilɛ si kuzɛ kunububu tsini banɔaklɔ gi bɛkpɛ blɔ ɛ. Liboe woli wɔɛpani ní isu ya su na a?”
Yohanes ebu le onu nì Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ Yesaya liboe le si, “Mɛ menu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ole lo eeyì ní ɔyaya klɔ si, ‘Mlebu kude gyɔgyɔ akí Ɔkaɛ tɔ ɔga!’ ”
Farisianɛ bɛ kpɛ banima,
lɛ beʋi Yohanes si, “Xe ani wɔ́ wonu Kristo ye e, loo Eliya, loo Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ ɛ, kɔ ege loso wuzɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki banima a?”
Yohanes ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki banima, pɔ̀ ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ ní mlɔ kusi gi mléte e.
Yɛ atrába ní mɛ kede, pɔ̀ mégyeno gi maable yɛ afɔkpa ʋa igbé ne e.”
Eboa la ya petee ɛba la mɛ ní Betania ní Yordan onipe lo oge lɔ kɔlɔ, niklɔ gi Yohanes azaakpɛ kuni yo aki banima ɛ.
Keletitia ɛ, Yohanes amɔ Yesu gi atrába yɛ ɔza lɔ ɛ, lɛ apani si, “Mledi imɔ Aya yɛ Keʋesibi ya gi akɔ̀ akɔ si kiakɔ kelea mɛ eboe zimizi na sɛnɔ ɛ.
Yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ su gi mapani si, ‘Onyime ɔtɔ atrába ní mɛ kede e, gi ekeme asani mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔlɛ xe ableke bɛpɔ mɛ ɛ.’
Mɛ ɔtutɔ méte ɔniliɛ klɔ gi onu u, pɔ̀ kidiliɛ loso gi maba si míkpɛ kuni iiki banima ɛ, kɛ kinu si tɔ mikɔ ebu ye basɛ Israel banɛ ma.”
Lɛ Yohanes adra Yesu su si, “Mamɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ gi eeple ŋwisi abronuma kinɛ ɛ, dɔni lifunu ne lɛ eze yɛ aʋa ɛ.

Nya mátrate yɛ, pɔ̀ Aya a, gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ si mikpɛ kuni yo aki banima ɛ, apani asi mɛ si, ‘Wɔtramɔ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ gi eeple dɔ onyime ɔtɔ aʋa ɛ; yɛ onu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi aakɔ̀ Ɔfuɛfuɛ Dradra lɔ kpɛ kuni kí banima a.’
Lɛ Yohanes apani si, Mamɔ lɛ, lɛ mɛɛdra lɛ mɛ ɛsi mlɔ si yɛ onu Aya Yebinyime e.”
Agi kelea kɛti i, Yohanes alɛ ní klɔ dzɛ nì yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa,
Gi amɔ Yesu gi azɛɛza ɛ, apani si, “Mledi, Aya yɛ Keʋesibi ya!”
Lɛ gi Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi tiaʋa ba benu yɛ liboe le e, bekuni Yesu kude e.
Gi Yesu ekyi xe amɔ si bali ni yɛ kude e, eʋi ba si, “Ege mlɛpɛ ɛ?” Bebu le onu si, “Rabi” Lɛ ese linu si Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ “Nifɔ onu wɔ oze klɔ ɔ?”
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlaga di,” bize ŋwisi kemize inyɔ tine me kinɛ ɛ, Lɛ yɛ ni ba bɛtrɛ xe bɛzɛ mɔ niklɔ gi Yesu eze e, lɛ beze ní yɛ su kele gɔgɔa petee e.
Ba mɛ tole gi enu Yohanes yɛ liboe le e, xe eze ni Yesu kude e, yɛ eze Andrea Simon Petro yeneminyime.
Lɛ onu klɔ ʋa ɛ, apɛ́ yeneminyime Simon amɔ, lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kwimɔ Mesiya yɛ.” Le ese linu si, “Kristo ye.”
Lɛ Andrea agbani Simon amani Yesu i. Yesu edi ye lɛ apani si, “Wɔ linyí linu si Simon, Yohanes Yebi, pɔ̀ biaxwa wɔ si Kefas.” Gi lɛ ese linu si Petro gi lɛ ese ní si Hela sɛ mɛ linu “liklakpɔ ɔ.”
Agi kelea kɛti i, Yesu atrɔ si yɛ atrɛ ní Galilea. Amɔ Filipo lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kuni mɛ kude!”
Filipo adɔ́ Betsaida, ɔma lɔ klɔ mɛ gi Andrea ni Petro bɛdɔ ɛ.
Filipo amɔ Natanael lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kwimɔ ɔniliɛ klɔ su gi Mose aŋwlimi akpɛ ní Ɔsã nɔ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ, xe Aya yɛ beboedoplɛ ba fɛ bɛŋwlimi plɛ ɛ. Yɛ onu Yesu Nazaret ɔnɛɛ, Yosef yebinyime.”
Lɛ Natanael eʋi si, “Kidɔ gbã ɛtɔ kíatani kudɔ ní Nazaret na a?” Lɛ Filipo ebu le onu si, “Ga ba tɔ ga di,”
Agi Yesu amɔ Natanael gi atrába yɛ klɔ ɛ, apani yɛ su si, “Israel obi ɔtutɔ iliɛ ya; asia áma yɛ mɛ ɛ!”
Lɛ Natanael eʋi Yesu si, “Kitɛ mɛ wote me e?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mamɔ wɔ gi woze ní ogbose lo ese e, xe ableke Filipo axwa wɔ ɔ.”
Natanael ebu le onu si, “Rabi, wɔ́ wonu Aya Yebi ye! Wɔ́ wonu Israel Okusi ye!”
Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Wɔziŋa gi masi wɔ si mamɔ wɔ ní ogbose lo ese e? Wɔtramɔ eboe gi ekeme sani lɛ ya a!”
Lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Sugba mɛɛsi mlɔ si, mlɛtramɔ lifunu ne si lidra lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ ba gi beemu u, xe beeple dɔ ní Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye aʋa a.”
Liwetanɛ we le e, kudzɛgbanɔ kwize ní Kana ɔma nɔ mɛ ní Galilea. Yesu yene eze níklɔ,
lɛ bɛxwa Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba fɛ tsinɔ ní ɔdzɛɛ ɔgbanɔ klɔ ɔ.
Agi kudaa kwiblo e, Yesu yene asi yɛ si, “Kudaa kwiblo.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “One ege lɛ loso wɔɛkpɛ mɛ ní lɛ mɛ ɛ?” “Mɛ lipoe le liʋína sukɔ ɔ.”
Yesu yene asi besumubi ba si, “Liboe kakaa gi aasi mlɔ ɛ, mlabitɛ ní lɛ aʋa.”
Bedu akla izɔ tiglo níklɔ kí kuni gi kɔsu axwɛ Yudanɛ ma bizɛwa ní ba kusuploo ligoʋi le me e, lɛ kuni galɔn avi taʋa tsini avi tata kuzeku ní ɔzɔ kakaa mɛ.
Lɛ Yesu asi besumubi ba si, “Mlakpɛ kuni ní izɔ lɛ mɛ.” Lɛ bɛkpɛ kuni yo ní izɔ lɛ mɛ xe iyi i.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Abla ɛ, mlesi kutɔ atsini bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ ɔʋadi ye.” Besi ko ɛtsini yɛ,
lɛ gi bidɔŋaŋa ʋɛ ɔʋadi ye akpɛ kuni uliɔ gi kwikyi dzi wain yɛ onu edi i. Yɛ óte niklɔ gi wain yɛ ádɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ besumubia ba gi ba besi kuni yo kɔ bete e. Lɛ ebu ɔdzɛnyee kuka,
lɛ asi yɛ si, “Kuda gbã ɔnɔ kakaa izɛ tu kɔ ní ɔdzɛ ɔgbanɔ kɔ ɔ, kɔ xegi banɔxwaxwa ba bɛŋwɛ ɛ xe kwiimu ba ɛ, kɔ ableke bɛmani kuliɔ gi kúpɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ wɔkɔ kuda gbã ɔbla gakɔna ni abla a!”
Yesu abitɛ linugutseboe tɔpu i lɛ ya ní Kana ní Galilea; niklɔ ebu yɛ kigaglaɛ abasɛ, xe yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa a.
Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu ni yene, yɛ beneminyime ba, ani yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛsɛ trɛ ní Kapernaum. Beze niklɔ ewe klakla atɔ.
Agi Yudanɛ ma Kutseolidɔzawe ŋaŋa nɛ lihana ɛ, Yesu atrɛ ní Yerusalem.
Ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, amɔ banima gi bɛzɛda egume, iʋesi ni abronuma ʋa ani banɔatɔ gi bɛzɛtsrɛ kibɔ ɛ, gi bedi ní ba ikplɔ nɛ su i.
Lɛ loso Yesu aaʋì igbé lɛ akɔ lɛ akpikpini baga ʋa petee dono ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, iʋesi ni egume; ehle babɔtsrɛ ba bibɔ ʋɛ lɛ ekyi ba ikplɔ nɛ ewe e;
lɛ akpɛ ɔsã akí banama gi bɛɛda abronuma ʋa si, “Mlebu bidɔ bɛ ya dono ni ya! Mlakíkɔ Mɔka kepea mɛ akpɛ kedzí me e!”
Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛplɛ aŋu si bɛŋwlimi kpɛ kuŋwlimi dradraa mɛ si, “Aya, isu kukɔkyɛ kí wɔ kepea ɛ, kwiisɔ ní mɛ mɛ̀ ŋwisi kifu kinɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yudanɛ ma bebu le onu ni kuʋiʋi si, “Linugutseboe woli wɔabitɛ gi liabasɛ blɔ si wɔmɔ kigagla si wɔabitɛ eboa la ya na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlayaʋi Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ ya, maadzini le kuwa ní ewe tata mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Yudanɛ ma beʋi Yesu si, “Wɔtradzini Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ ya ɛwa ní ewe tata mɛ na a? Agɔ avitene ni teglo bɛkɔ ɛwa Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ ya!”
Pɔ̀ Lisɔligba ɛ lɛ su gi Yesu azɛɛpani i, lɛ lize yɛ ɔnɔ se lo.
Lɛ gi Aya ayɔni yɛ adɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛ, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛplɛ aŋu si Yesu apani liboe lɛ ya aplɛ lɛ bɛzi kuŋwlimi dradra ni liboe lɛ klɔ gi Yesu apani aplɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ.
Agi Yesu eze ní Yerusalem ní Kutseolidɔzawe ŋaŋa nɛ mɛ ɛ, banɔ glegle bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa lɛ ese linu si bɛmɔ enugutseboe ala gi abitɛ ɛ.
Pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́yurɔ isu ɔki ba a, lɛ ese linu si ete ɔnɔ gbagbe kakaa.
Lɛ líziã si ɔnɔnɔ ɔpani ní basu ɔki yɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si yɛ ɔtutɔ ete kidiliɛ gi kilɛ ní ba ina nɛ mɛ ɛ.
Ɔka ɔtɔ eze gi yɛ linyí linu Nikodemo o, ádɔ Farisianɛ ma lihakpɔ lɛ mɛ lɛ eze Yudanɛ ɔka tole.
Ní elesi atɔ mɛ ɛ, Nikodemo atrɛ ní Yesu klɔ lɛ asi yɛ sì, “Rabi, kwite si wonu ɔdɔbasɛ gi ádɔ ní Aya kɔ ɛ. Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ma enugutseboe ala gi wɔɛbitɛ ɛ, kubitɛ mɛ xe Aya ɔ́ma ni yɛ kude e.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ: ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ kuze sani si bedzini ye kupɔ ɔ.”
Lɛ Nikodemo eʋi Yesu si, “Kitɛ mɛ biadzini ɔnɔtsitsi kupɔ na a? Ɔ́tratani kudzi iku yene lipo le me kuʋla a, xe biadzini ye kupɔ ɔ!”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ, Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani kutiku Aya yɛ Kaʋaŋaa mɛ ɛ, xe bápɔ yɛ gani kuni ni Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ.
Bapɔnɛ ba bizɛpɔ ɔnɔ ní kisugya mɛ, pɔ̀ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ izɛpɔ ɔnɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ.
Likítu wo kugyɔ gi masi wɔ si lilɛ si bedzini wɔ apɔ ɔ.
Liwɔ lɛ lizeefu itrɛ niklɔ gi lipɛ ɛ; wɔanu le onu pɔ̀ wɔtrate lɛ ɔdɔ kɔ loo lɛ ɔtrɛ kɔ ɔ. Nite ke lilɛ kí ɔnɔ kakaa gi bɛpɔ ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Nikodemo eʋi Yesu si, “Kitɛ liaba lɛ mɛ nite e?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Wònu ɔdɔbasɛ ʋidi ní Israel lɛ wónu la ya ese a?”
Mɛɛsi wɔ anukwarɛɛ; kuzɛɛpani ní kidiliɛ gi kwite su u, lɛ kuzɛɛpani ní kidiliɛ gi kwimɔ su u, pɔ̀ mlɔ mɛ ɔ́tɔtɔ ɔ́pɛ si yizi blɔ liboe me dradra lɛ ɛ.
Mlázi mɛ aʋa ŋa a, gi mɛɛsi mlɔ kelea lia mɛ eboe la a; kitɛ mlaazi mɛ aʋa ŋa a, xe masi mlɔ eboe la gi ɛɛtrɛ la aʋa ní lifunu ne e?
Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ ómu ɔ́trɛ ní lifunu ne oʋídi i, sani Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye gi yɛ ádɔ lifunu ne aba ɛ.
Lɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi Mose emuni ɔlaɛ ɔgblaga yɛ, gi bɛxla ní ose lo aʋa ní ɔyaya klɔ kinɛ ɛ, nite ké lilɛ si bemuni Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye,
tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa gi aazi yɛ aʋa ŋa ɛ, aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le.
Lɛ ese linu si Aya alɔ ɔnɔ gbagbe ní kesea aʋa gbɛgbɛ nite si akɔ yebinyime tolee akɔ si ɔnɔ kakaa gi aazi yɛ aʋa ŋa ɛ, ɔ́tratse e, pɔ̀ aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le e.
Lɛ Aya ɔ́tsisi yebinyime ní kelea mɛ banima kɔ si obu ba lipɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ tɔ yibu ba gani yɛ aʋa a.
Banɔaklɔ gi bɛzi Obi ye aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ, Aya ɔ́traxwa litsi ni ba a, xe aabu ba lipɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ banama gi bázɛ ŋa ɛ, Aya ebu ba lipɔ koko lɛ ese linu si bázɛ Aya yebinyime tolee linyi ne aʋa ɛɛŋa a.
Lɛ Aya yɛ litsixwaxwa lɛ lɛ ya: kuklekleo kwiba kelea mɛ dɔni lifunu ne, pɔ̀ banima bɛdimɛ ni litumu ne sani kuklekleo, lɛ ese linu si ba kiboebitɛɛ kinu kuzimizi i.
Banama petee gi bizɛɛbitɛ eboe zimizi na ɛ, baʋídimɛ ni kuklekle lɛ bátraba kuklekleo onu u, lɛ ese linu si bátrapɛ si ba eboe zimizi na edo oŋwe e.
Pɔ̀ banama gi bizɛɛga ní anukwarɛɛ aʋa ɛ, bizɛba kuklekleo onu tɔ kuklekleo kubasɛ si kidiliɛ gi bɛbitɛ ɛ, bɛbitɛ kɛ ní Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ onu.
Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní Yudea kesea mɛ, eze ní basu niklɔ lipoetɔ onu lɛ akpɛ kuni aki banima ɛ.
Yohanes fɛ azɛɛkpɛ kuni aki banima ní Aenon gi ódze ní Salem su u, lɛ ese linu si kuni yo kwisrɛ níklɔ. Lɛ banima bɛzɛɛdzɛ Yohanes klɔ gi azaakpɛ kuni aki ba a.
Lɛ ya liba lɛ mɛ kpɛ ɔtɔ xe ableke bɛkpɛ Yohanes ní ligba a.
Lɛ kuboeŋwlɛ kwiku ní Yohanes yɛ badɔkpasi batɔ ni Yudanɛ ɔtɔ kusi ní kusuplo ligoʋi le su u.

Lɛ loso bɛtrɛ ní Yohanes klɔ lɛ bɛsi yɛ si, “Rabi, dani wɔplɛ aŋu ní onyime liɛ klɔ gi eze ní wɔ su ní Yordan kedea aʋa ɛ, iliɛ klɔ su gi wɔpani i? Ɛɛkpɛ kuni iiki banima abla, lɛ banima pɔ́ bɛɛtrɛ ní yɛ klɔ ɔ!”
Lɛ Yohanes ebu le onu si, “Kididɔ kítratani ɔnɔ awla kuze e, xe aní Aya aki yɛ kɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ ɔtutɔ mlɔ aŋu mɛ mapani si, ‘Aní mɛ menu Kristo ye e, pɔ̀ kikpɛ Aya akpɛ mɛ ɔtɔ aki yɛ ɛ.’
Ɔdzɛɛ onu ɔdzɛgbanɔɛ yɛ ɔnɛ; pɔ̀ ɔdzɛgbanɔɛ yɛʋiɛ gi izeepe ye e, xe izɛɛta yɛ kutu i, isami izeku ye xe enu ɔdzɛgbanɔɛ yɛ ole lo e. Isami nɛ klɔ inu mɛ inɛ, lɛ abla ɛ, iflɔ.
Li lɛ si yɛ omu ɔsani mɛ tɔ mɛ pɔ̀ ɛ, miple.”

Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ lifunu ne e, ekeme asani ɔnɔ kakaa. Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ kesea ɛ, yɛ onu kesea ɔnɛ ɛ, lɛ izeegu kunugu yo ní kesea eboe la su u, pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ádɔ lifunu ne e, asani ɔnɔ kakaa.
Izɛɛpani ní kidiliɛ gi amɔ ɔ, xe enu su u, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ʋizi yɛ liboe le e.
Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ yɛ liboe le e, atrɔ likla lɛ aʋa si Aya onu anukwarɛɛ onete.
Lɛ ɔniliɛ klɔ gi Aya akpɛ ɛ, izɛɛpani Aya eboe la, lɛ ese linu si Aya akɔ yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ zizi nɔ aki yɛ.
Kakaa alɔ Obi ye lɛ akɔ kidɔ kakaa akpɛ ní yɛ awla a.
Ɔniliɛ klɔ gi azɛ Obi ye aʋa aŋa ɛ, aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le; ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔ́tranu kutu iiki Obi ye e, ɔ́tramɔ ligbã́ a; pɔ̀ aaze ní Aya kutuheheo ese e.
Farisianɛ ma benu si Yesu ɛɛmɔ, lɛ ɛɛkpɛ kuni yo ɛki badɔkpasi ba ɛsani Yohanes.
Ni anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ, Yesu ɔtutɔ ɔ́kpɛ kuni ɔ́ki ɔnɔnɔ ɔ; boŋu i, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛɛkpɛ kuni yo.
Gi Yesu enu eboa la klɔ gi bɛzɛpani i, asɛ ní Yudea lɛ edzi atrɛ ní Galilea ɛ.
Lize si ɔga Samaria kesea mɛ ɔza.
Niteme si ana ɔma ɔtɔ gi bizɛxwa si Sixar ní Samaria kesea mɛ ɛ mɛ. Sixar ódze ní kesea klɔ gi Yakob aki yebinyime Yosef su u.
Yakob yɛ vudo ye eze niklɔ, lɛ gi Yesu aga kudeo xe epe e, eze ní vudo ye kutu yɔ. Bize ŋwisi kemize inyɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Samariadze ɔtɔ aba kuni osi kɔ, lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Kimɛ kuni tɔ miŋwɛ ɛ.”
Lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ si bezeedzi kiŋaŋa.
Lɛ ɔdzɛɛ ebu le onu si, “Wonu Yuda ɔnɛ, lɛ menu Samariadze kítɛmɛ woeʋi me kuni ŋwɛŋwɛ ɛ?” Agi Yudanɛ ma ni Samaria banɛ ma báʋiga eku ba ahanuglɔ ba mɛ ɛ.
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Atɛsi wote Aya yɛ bidɔkɔkɔ ʋɛ ni ɔniliɛ gi yɛ eeʋi wo kuni ŋwɛŋwɛ ɛ, wɔaʋi ye lɛ aaki wɔ kuni gi kuzɛɛkɔ ligbã́ a.”
Ɔdzɛɛ apani si, “Ɔka,” “kididɔ kíma wɔ awla gi wɔakɔsi kuni i, lɛ vudo ye edzu u. Nifɔ wɔtradɔni kuni uliɔ gi kuzɛɛkɔ ligbã na a?
“Blɔ ɔkatsitsi ye Yakob gi yɛ aki blɔ vudo liɛ ya ɛ; yɛ ni yɛ bebinyime ba ani ba baga ʋa pɔ́ bɛŋwɛ kuni dɔni vudo liɛ ya mɛ ɛ. Kido wɔedo si wɔsani Yakob na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aaŋwɛ kuni uliɔ ya ɛ, olile aaku ye dzɛ,
pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ gi aaŋwɛ kuni uliɔ gi maaki yɛ ɛ, olile ɔ́traku ye tɔ ɔ. Sugba, kuni uliɔ gi maaki yɛ ɛ, kwiadzi linitɔ ní yɛ mɛ gi liaki yɛ ligbã moblo o.”
Lɛ ɔdzɛɛ apani si, “Ɔka, kimɛ kuni uliɔ klɔ! Atɔ olile okíku me tɔ ɔ, tɔ mikíba kuni osi kɔ ní ya tɔ ɔ.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Trɛ tɔ zɛɛxwa wonye tɔ mlaba ni ya.”
Ebu le onu si, “Médini onyime e.” Lɛ Yesu apani si, “Wɔ linɛ ligyɔ gi wɔpani si wódini onyime e.
Woze ni benyime tietsu, lɛ onyime liɛ gi wɔ ni yɛ mlalɛ abla ɛ, ónu wonye e. Wɔpani mumɔ.”
Lɛ ɔdzɛɛ apani si, “Ɔka mamɔ si Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ wonu.”
“Blɔ bakatsi Samaria banɛ ma bezeesumu ní litoe lɛ ya aʋa, pɔ̀ mlɔ Yudanɛ ma kɔ mlɔ si Yerusalem onu niklɔ gi kwiasumu u.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Ɔdzɛ, zi mɛ liboe le aʋa ŋa, lipoe le litrába gi banima bátrasumu Aya ní litoe lɛ ya aʋa a, loo ní Yerusalem tɔ ɔ.
Mlɔ Samaria banɛ ma ɛ, mléte ɔniliɛ tututu gi yɛ mleesumu u; pɔ̀ blɔ Yudanɛ ma kɔ kwite ɔniliɛ gi kwisumu i, lɛ ese linu si Yudanɛ ma klɔ kubúbú yo kwidɔ ɔ.
Pɔ̀ lipoe le litraba lɛ liba koko o gi banama a gi besumu Aya ní yɛ kudeo onu tututu i, biasumu ye ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ ni anukwarɛɛ mɛ, lɛ ese linu si banɔsumu ba ya elu Ɔkaɛ ɛɛpɛ.
Aya onu Ɔfuɛfuɛ, lɛ gani Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ kigaglaɛ mɛ ko banima biatani yɛ kusumu ní yɛ kupɛ́pɛɔ onu u.”
Lɛ ɔdzɛɛ asi yɛ si, “Mete si Mesiya yɛ gi bizɛxwa si Kristo ye e, atrába, lɛ xe aba ɛ, aabu liboe kakaa mɛ ɔki blɔ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛ gi mɛ ni wɔ kwigu kunugu yo e, mɛ menu ye.”

Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba bedziba, lɛ litu ba kugyɔ gi bɛmɔ si eegu kunugu yo ni ɔdzɛ ɛ. Pɔ̀ bamɛ ɔtɔtɔ óʋi si, “Ege wɔ ɛ pɛ?” loo ʋi ye si “Ege lɛ loso woegu kunugu yo ni ɔdzɛɛ ɛ?”
Lɛ Ɔdzɛɛ ayurɔ yɛ kenifukpoa edu i, xe edzi atrɛ ní ɔma nɔ mɛ lɛ asi banima si,
“Mlagadi ɔnyime ɔtɔ gi asi mɛ kidɔ kakaa ɛ liɛ gi mabitɛ edi i. Yɛ aaze Kristo ye na a?”
Lɛ loso bɛsɛ ɔma nɔ mɛ lɛ bɛba Yesu klɔ ɛ.
Ní lipoe lɛ ya te me e, yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛki yɛ litukpo si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, ŋa kiditɔ!”
Pɔ̀ ebu le onu si, “Kiŋaŋa kiliɛ mɛ awla gi mlete liboeboe kɛ su u.”
Liki si badɔkpasi ba beʋi ba ahanuglɔ ba si, “Putɔ ɔnutɔ amani yɛ kiŋaŋa na a?”
Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛ kiŋaŋaɛ kɛ kinu si mibitɛ ní ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ kupɛ́pɛɔ aʋa; atɔ migù axwɛ ana gi aki mɛ si miwa ɛ.
Dani mlɛzɛpani si, ‘Bigɔ badzidzi tiene kɔ kiŋaŋaɛ kiku kepe e?’ Pɔ̀ mɛɛsi mlɔ si, mlevu aŋu ní inyrɔ nɛ su mɔmɔmɔ, mlaamɔ si bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ bitsì gi biamani kepe e!
Ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛmani kiŋaŋaɛ kepe abla ɛ, bɛɛtsa liʋɛ ki yɛ, lɛ eexogo ɔnyrɔ nɔ aʋa bidɔ mɛ ɛki ligbã́ moblo le e; lɛ loso ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ bidɔ mɛ ni ɔniliɛ gi eexogo bidɔ mɛ ɛ, ba pɔ́ biamɔ isami i.
Liboe lɛ gi bizɛpani i, lilɛ lɛ mɛ si, ‘Ɔnutɔ izɛɛkpɛ, kɔ ɔnɔ dzedze exogo e.’
Makpɛ mlɔ si mlexogo bidɔ ní niklɔ gi mlépe e; banɔ dzedze ba bɛwa axwɛ gagla la, lɛ mlɛmɔ libi ibú ní ba axwɛwawa lɛ mɛ ɛ.”
Samaria banɛ glegle ni ɔma lɔ klɔ mɛ ɛ, bɛzi Yesu aʋa ɛɛŋa lɛ ese linu si ɔdzɛɛ adra isu mɛ si, “Asi mɛ kidɔ kakaa gi mabitɛ edi i.”
Lɛ loso gi Samaria banɛ ma bɛba yɛ klɔ ɛ, bɛki yɛ litukpo si oze ní ba su, lɛ Yesu eze ni ba su ewe taʋa a.
Ɔkpɛ yɛ eboe la loso e, banɔ glegle sanɔ bɛzi ŋa.
Lɛ bɛsi ɔdzɛɛ si, “Aní liboe lɛ gi wɔpani i, lɛ liki si kwizi ŋa tɔ ɔ, blɔ ɔtutɔ kwinu yɛ liboe le, lɛ kwite si ní anukwarɛɛ mɛ ɛ, onyime liɛ onu Ɔnɔbu ye kí kelea a.”
Gi aŋa ewe taʋa ní klɔ ʋa kede e, Yesu asɛ atrɛ ní Galilea.
Lɛ ese linu si yɛ ɔtutɔ apani si, “Kubùbù kuʋíze ní Aya yɛ oboedoplɛ su u, ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ kepea.”
Agi eku Galilea ɛ, Galileanɛ ma bɛkpɛ yɛ wolaa lɛ ese linu si bɛdzɛ Kutseolidɔzawe le ɔŋa kɔ ní Yerusalem lɛ bɛmɔ kidɔ kakaa gi abitɛ ní liwe le me e.
Lɛ Yesu edzi atrɛ ní Kanaa ní Galilea dzɛ ɛ, niklɔ gi ekyi kuni yo xe kwidzi kuda ɛ. Kekusipea me ɔka ɔtɔ eze ní klɔ gi yebinyime azeetse e ní Kapernaum.
Gi enu si Yesu ádɔ Yudea aba Galilea ɛ, atrɛ yɛ klɔ lɛ aki yɛ litukpo si ɔba tɔ ɔga yɔni yebinyime, gi ihatse e.
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Xe mlámɔ enugutseboe ni eboe gi etu mlo kugyɔ ɛ, mlɔ mɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́trazi iŋa liwewe.”
Kekusipea mɛ ɔkaɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔka, bá tɔ kutrɛ xe mɛ obi ye aatse e.”
Yesu asi yɛ si, “Trɛ, wobinyimee aaze ligbã́!”
Onyimee azɛ Yesu liboe le aʋa ŋa lɛ asɛ ɛ.
Gi eze kudeo aʋa ɛ, yɛ besumubi ba bɛtsani yɛ ni liboe gbã ɛ nɛ si, “Wobinyimee ɔlɛ ligbã́!”
Gi eʋi ba lipoe lɛ klɔ gi yebinyime ayɔ ɛ, bebu le onu si, “Kuweo kwiyurɔ yɛ kivoe kemizea ɔnyɔ tole e.”
Lɛ ɔkaɛ aplɛ aŋu si, lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɖii Yesu asi yɛ si, “Wobi ye aaze ligbã.” Lɛ loso e, yɛ ni yɛ kepea pɔ́ bɛzi ŋa.
Lɛ ya lize linugutseboe ʋla gi Yesu abitɛ gi ádɔ Yudea a xe aba Galilea a.
Lɛ ya kede e, Yesu atrɛ Yerusalem kí Yudanɛ ma liwe ŋaŋa ɛtɔ.
Kevunu katɔ kalɛ ní Yerusalem gi bizɛxwa si Iʋesi kevunu u. Kuni limu itɔ gi bizɛxwa si Betesda ní si Hebri se me e, litipɔni kevunu ya lia klɔ, lɛ bɛwa akatsa tetsu i klani limu ne e.
Akatsa la klɔ mɛ banyanya likpi ʋidi itɔ lizɛfɛ, kuŋupo, bafa ba, ni banyanya gi ba kapɛ tiele ketse e, bezeepe kuni yo si kupisa
lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ izepleeba ɛpisa limu ne lipoe me ni lipoe me; kɔ ɔniliɛ gi yɛ etu ɔtɔ ɔ, xe eple eku limu ne me e, izɛɛmɔ kuyɔyɔ dɔni kunya kakaa gi ɛɛnya mɛ ɛ.
Onyime ɔtɔ eze níklɔ gi azɛɛnya agɔ avitata ni ɔgɔtaʋa ɛ.
Gi Yesu amɔ yɛ gi ɔfini klɔ ɛ, xe bɛsi yɛ si onyimee ɔfini níklɔ lipoe gblamadza lɛ ya ɛ; eʋi ye si, “Wɔpɛ si wuyɔ na a?”
Ɔnyanyaɛ ebu le onu si, “Ɔka, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́ma gi aapɔni mɛ xe maapleku ní limu ne me e, xe bɛpisa kuni yo o; lipoe lɛ klɔ gi meekeni idi si miple eku i, kɔ ɔnutɔ atsã mɛ onu i.”
Lɛ Yesu asi yɛ si, “Yɔ, Kɔ wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ ga!”
Onyimee ayɔ kyɔŋ, akɔ yɛ ɔtɔsi lɔ lɛ ekpese kuga ɛ.
“Liwe lɛ gi kibitɛ liɛ ya kiba kɛ mɛ ɛ, lize Lizemɔniwe.
Lɛ Yudanɛ baka ba bɛsi onyimee gi bɛyɔnɔ ɛ si, Omono onu Lizemɔniwe, lɛ liyɔ kedu ní blɔ Ɔsã nɔ su si tu wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ.”
Ebu le onu si, “Ɔniliɛ gi ayɔni mɛ ɛ, yɛ asi mɛ si, ‘Kɔ wɔ ɔtɔsi lɔ tɔ ga.’ ”
Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Nyaŋwɛ onu onyimee gi yɛ asi wɔ si, kɔ lɔ tɔ ga a?”
Pɔ̀ onyimee gi bɛyɔnɔ ɛ, óte ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ayɔni yɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si, Yesu alila eku linɔkpi le gi lize niklɔ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ kede e, Yesu amɔ yɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ lɛ asi yɛ si, “Dike, wɔyɔ abla, lɛ loso dzini wɔ eboe zimizi na kumɔni i, xe aní te e, liboe nyani nyani sanɔ liaba wɔ aʋa.”
Lɛ onyimee asɛ ɛ xe azɛɛsi Yudanɛ baka ba si, Yesu yɛ ayɔni yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bekpese kedu kuyɔ ní Yesu su i, lɛ ese linu si ayɔni ɔnɔ ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa a.
Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Mɔka ɛɛwa axwɛ na lipoe kakaa, lɛ loso mɛfɛ mɛɛwa axwɛ na a.”
Liboe lɛ ya loso e, Yudanɛ baka ba bɛtrɔ lɛ si biaye ye kikakaa elu e; aní si ezizi Lizemɔniwe le ɔsã nɔ tete e, pɔ̀ apani si Aya onu yɛ ɔtutɔ Yɛka a, lɛ ɛɛkɔ isu i srɔni Aya si ba ni yɛ bɛsɔ.
Lɛ Yesu ebu le onu aki ba si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ; Obi ye ɔ́tratani kididɔ kubitɛ ní yɛ isuwla mɛ ɛ; izɛɛbitɛ kidiliɛ gi amɔ si Yɛka ɛɛbitɛ ɛ. Kidiliɛ gi Ɔka abitɛ ɛ, kɛ Obi ye fɛ izɛɛbitɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si Ɔka yɛ adimɛ ni Obi ye lɛ abasi yɛ kidɔ kakaa gi yɛ ɔtutɔ ɛɛbitɛ ɛ. Aabasɛ yɛ eboe gi ekeme sani lɛ ya, lɛ mlɔ pɔ́ mlɔ inugu aatse e.
Kiliɛ gi Ɔka yɛ izɛɛyɔni bekpo ʋa a xe izɛɛki ʋa ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, nite ke Obi ye fɛ izɛɛki banama gi apɛ ɛ ligbã́ nɛ.
Kɔpɔnɔ ɛ Ɔka yɛ ɔ́ʋixwa litsi nì ɔnɔnɔ ɔ. Akɔ kigaglaɛ akí Yebi ye tɔ ɔxwa litsi nì banima.
Atɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔkpɛ kubùbù ní Obi ye su ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bizɛɛkpɛ kubùbù ní Ɔka yɛ su kinɛ ɛ. Ɔniliɛ gi ɔ́ʋikpɛ kubùbù ní Obi ye su i, ɔ́ʋikpɛ kubùbù ní Ɔka yɛ gi yɛ akpɛ Obi ye su u.
“Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ; ɔniliɛ gi enu mɛ eboe la a, xe azɛ ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ mɛ aʋa ŋa ɛ, aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le, lɛ batrábu ye lipɔ; pɔ̀ yɛ kɔɔ edo kutse me aba ligbã́ mɛ ɛ.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ: lipoe le litrába lɛ liba koko gi bekpo ʋa bianu Aya Yebinyime ole lo o, lɛ ba klɔ gi benu lo e, biadzi ligbã́.
Kiliɛ ɖii gi Ɔka yɛ ɔtutɔ onu ligbã́ nɛ linitɔ lɛ ɛ, nite ke abitɛ Yebinyime si oze ligbã́ nɛ linitɔ lɛ.
Lɛ aki Yebinyime kigaglaɛ tɔ ɔxwa litsi lɛ ese linu si yɛ onu Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye.
“Lɛ ya likítu mlo kugyɔ ɔ; lɛ ese linu si lipoe le litraba gi bekpo ʋa petee e, gi bali ni ba idrɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ, bianu yɛ ole lo
lɛ biado o, ba klɔ gi bɛbitɛ eboe Gbã ɛ, biayɔ lɛ biadzi ligbã́ a, lɛ ba klɔ gi bɛbitɛ eboe zimizi i, biayɔ lɛ biabu ba lipɔ ɔ.

“Mátratani kididɔ kubitɛ ní mɛ ɔtutɔ isu wla mɛ; Mizɛɛxwa litsi kiliɛ gi Aya asi mɛ ɛ, lɛ mɛ litsixwaxwa lɛ ligyɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si mátrakeni idi si mibitɛ mɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a, pɔ̀ ní ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ mɛ yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a.
“Xe mapani ní mɛ ɔtutɔ isu ya su i, liboe lɛ gi mapani i, lítraŋa kutu u.
Pɔ̀ ɔnutɔ ɔlɛ gi izɛɛpani ní mɛ su i, lɛ mete si liboe lɛ gi izɛɛpani ní mɛsu i, lilɛ lɛ mɛ.
“Yohanes yɛ onu ɔniliɛ gi yɛ kɔ́ mlɛkpɛ mlɔ baxwɛdzɛ ba a, lɛ apani ní anukwarɛ su u.
Aní si mizɛ ɔnɔ gbagbe yɛ katsalia kuŋaŋa a; boŋu i, mapani liboe lɛ tɔ mlamɔ kubúbú.
Yohanes eze ŋwisi kani kinɛ ɛ, gi asɔ̀ ɔ, xe aki kuklekle e, lɛ lize mlɔ kupɛpɛ ki lipoetɔ si mlanu yɛ eboe la gi eze ŋwisi kuklekle e, gi kwikpɛ mlɔ isami kinɛ ɛ.

“Pɔ́ katsalia kalɛ mɛ awla gi kalɛ zegbezegbe sani eboa la gi Yohanes apani ní mɛ su i. Ka kenu kidiliɛ gi mizɛɛbitɛ ɛ, gi kinu axwɛ ana gi Mɔka aki mɛ si miblono o, la ɛtrɔ likla lɛ aʋa si Kaka yɛ akpɛ mɛ.
Lɛ Kakaa gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ ɔtutɔ aŋa katsalia aki mɛ. Mlaʋínu yɛ ole loo mɔ yɛ ʋídi i.
Lɛ mlákpɛ yɛ liboe le ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si mlázi ɔniliɛ gi yɛ akpɛ ɛ, aʋa ɛɛŋa.
Mlɛkpasi kuŋwlimi dradraa, lɛ ese linu si mlegyo edi si gani kɔ mɛ ɛ, mlaamɔ ligbã́ moblo le. Lɛ kuŋwlimi dradraa kɔ tututu kwipani ní mɛ su u!
Pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, mlápɛ si mlɛba mɔkɔ tɔ mlamɔ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.
“Mápɛ kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ dɔni banima kɔ ɔ,
pɔ̀ mete banɔaklɔ elu gi mlenu i, lɛ mete si mládimɛ ni Aya ní mlɔ ina nɛ mɛ ɛ.
Maba ní Mɔka yɛ kigaglaɛ mɛ, pɔ̀ mlázi mɛ ɛ; pɔ̀ xe ɔnutɔ aba ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ kigaglaɛ mɛ ɛ, mlaazi yɛ.
Kitɛ mlatani mɛ aʋa kuziŋa gi mlɛdimɛ ni kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ dɔni mlɔ ahanuglɔ ba kɔ ɔ? Pɔ̀ mlékeni idi si mlɛzi kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ gi kwidɔ ní ɔniliɛ gi yɛ tete onu Aya kɔ ɔ.
“Mlakígyo edi si, mɛ matratsà mlɔ onu ki Mɔka a. Mose gi yɛ mɛ mlɔ kudeonu didi yo kulɛ ɛ, yɛ ɖii onu ɔniliɛ gi atrátsà mlɔ onu u.
Xe nya mlɛzi Mose aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ; mlazi mɛ aʋa ŋa, lɛ ese linu si yɛ aŋwlimi bidɔ ní mɛ su u.
Pɔ̀ gi mlázi kidiliɛ ɛ gi aŋwlimi aʋa aŋa ɛ, kitɛ mlatani liboe lɛ gi mapani aʋa kuzi ŋa a?”
Lɛ kede e, Yesu atsa Galilea limu ne atrɛ ní oge lɔ kɔlɔ; bizɛɛxwa lɛ kyɛ si Tiberia limu ne.
Lɛ linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ likuni yɛ kude e, lɛ ese linu si bɛmɔ enugutseboe ala gi akɔ ayɔni banyanya ba ɛ.
Yesu emu ketokpa katɔ, lɛ yɛ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba beze kesea ɛ.
Yudanɛ ma Kutseolidɔzawe le liŋa nɛ litiipɔnɔ.
Agi Yesu efeke yɛ aŋu na ɛ, amɔ si linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ litrába yɛ klɔ ɔ, lɛ loso eʋi Filipo si, “Nifɔ kwiamɔ kiŋaŋaɛ ní kisrɛsrɛ mɛ gi kwiadzi kí banɔ ba ya petee e, xe biaŋa a?”
Eʋi liboe lɛ ya tɔ yikɔ efeke Filipo edi: lɛ ese linu si ete kidiliɛ gi atrábitɛ ɛ koko.
Filipo ebu le onu si, “Tɔ ɔnɔ kakaa ɔmɔ sisami ɔkpɛ onugu me e, biazia kibɔ ŋwisi ɔxwɛwa tole yɛ badzidzi ɔgɔtiaʋa liʋɛ kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ fɛ kítrana a.”
Yɛ badɔkpasi ba mɛ ɔtɔ gi yɛ linyi linu si Andrea a, gi onu Simon Petro yeneminyime e, apani si,
“Ɔyasɔʋi ɔtɔ ɔlɛ ní ya gi evu anasi aklã tetsu ni akpa taʋa, pɔ̀ atrána banɔ kisrɛsrɛ liɛ ya onu u.”
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlaki tɔ banima beze kesea.” Siwa sɛ sisrɛ ní niklɔ. Lɛ banima beze kesea ɛ; benyime ba kisrɛsrɛ mɛ kize ŋwisi akpe tietsu kinɛ ɛ.
Yesu akɔ aklã na, lɛ edo Aya ɖase e, xe akɔ la akɔ si balɛ akí banama gi beze ní niklɔ ɛ. Nite ke abitɛ nì akpa la fɛ, lɛ ɔnɔ kakaa amɔ kiliɛ onu gi apɛ ɛ.
Gi ba pɔ́ beke e, asi yɛ badɔkpasi ba si, “Mlakpɛ kupɛ gɔgɔɔ likpɔ, mlakíki tɔ kutɔtɔ kudɔ ofu u.”
Lɛ bɛkpɛ kugɔgɔɔ likpɔ ɛ, niteme si dɔni anasi aklã tetsu la gi banima bɛta mɛ ɛ, kupɛ gɔgɔɔ kwiyi kusɔʋi liɔfɔ ni tuʋa.
Agi banima bɛmɔ enugutseboe la gi Yesu abitɛ ɛ, bekpese kupani si, “Sugba iliɛ ya onu Aya yɛ Oboedoplɛɛ gi atrába kelea mɛ ɛ!”
Yesu ete si bɛɛpɛ si beevu ye du kukusi ni kigagla; lɛ loso e, alila ba kusi lɛ edzi atrɛ ní eto la mɛ dzɛ yɛ tete e.
Gi kulagɔ kwina ɛ, Yesu yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛtrɛ ní limù ne kutu,
lɛ bemu iku ní katapokpa atɔ mɛ ɛ, xe bɛtsa limu ne e, gi bɛɛtrɛ ní Kapernaum i. Kɔna ni lipoe lɛ ya ɛ, kelea keblo pɔ̀ Yesu ɔ́ba oku ba kusi i.
Ní lipoe lɛ klɔ mɛ ɛ, liwɔ gagla ɛtɔ likpese kufu gi kuni yo kwizɛɛpisa a.
Badɔkpasi ba beku katapokpaa ŋwisi itiplɛkɔ titsu loo tiglo kinɛ ɛ, lɛ gi bɛmɔ Yesu u gi ɛɛga kuni yo aʋa a, xe atrába ní katapokpaa su i, belulu.
Lɛ Yesu asi ba si, “Mlakíse lifu u, mɛ mlɛmɔ!”
Lɛ bɛdimɛ xe bɛzi yɛ ɛkpɛ ní katapokpaa mɛ ɛ, kyɔŋ ko ɛ, katapokpaa ke ku niklɔ gi bɛzɛtrɛ ɛ.
Agi kelea kɛti i, linɔkpi lɛ gi liwɔ limu ne kedea ɛ, livu aŋu lɛ limɔ si katapokpa tiele ko keze níklɔ ɔ. Bete si Yesu ɔ́sɛ ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba a, ba tete ko bɛsɛ.
Kutapokpa dzedze gi kwidɔ Tiberia ɛ, kwiba eku oge no gi eti ipɔni niklɔ gi linɔkpi le lita aklã na gi Ɔkaɛ edo ɖase e ní la litukpo pɔ́ ɛ.
Gi linɔkpi le limɔ si Yesu ni yɛ badɔkpasi ba báma niklɔ ɛ, beku kutapokpaa klɔ lɛ bɛtrɛ ní Kapernaum gi bɛzɛɛpɛ yɛ ɛ.
Gi bɛmɔ Yesu ní limu ne kapɛ ʋla ɛ, beʋi ye si, “Ɔdɔbasɛ yɛ, lipoe woli wɔba eku ni ya a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ, mlɛɛpɛ mɛ lɛ ese linu si mlɛtà aklã na lɛ mleke e, aní si mlenu mɛ enugutseboe la ese e.

Mlakíwa axwɛ akí kiŋaŋaɛ klɔ gi kiazizi i; boŋu i, mlawa axwɛ akí kiŋaŋaɛ klɔ gi kiaze kí ligbã moblo le e. Bɛ binu kiŋaŋaɛ klɔ gi Ɔnɔ Yebi ye aaki mlɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si Kaka Aya, akɔ yɛ liklatrɔtrɔ lɛ gyesi ye atrɔ ní yɛ aʋa.”
Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Ege lilɛ si kubitɛ ɛ, xe kwiawa axwɛ ana gi Aya apɛ si kuwa na a?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kidiliɛ gi Aya apɛ si mlabitɛ ɛ, kɛ kinu si mlazi mɛ ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ aʋa aŋa a.”
Lɛ beʋi ye si, “Linugutseboe woli wɔabitɛ si kumɔ tɔ kwiazi wɔ aʋa ŋa na a? Ege wɔtrabitɛ ɛ?
Blɔ bakatsitsi ba bɛŋa kiŋaŋaɛ gi bizɛxwa si mana yɛ ní ɔyaya klɔ ɔ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní Aya yɛ liboe le me e si, ‘Aki ba aklã na dɔni lifunu ne tɔ batà.’ ”
Yesu apani si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ. Aní Mose yɛ aki mlɔ, aklã na gi ɛdɔ lifunu ne e; pɔ̀ Mɔka Aya yɛ izɛki mlɔ aklã na ɔtutɔ lɔ gi ɛdɔ ní lifunu ne e.
Lɛ aklã na gi Aya izɛkɔ ɛ, la enu mɛ ɔniliɛ gi eple adɔ ni lifunu ne e, xe izɛki kelea ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ bɛsi Yesu si, “Ɔka, dɔni abla kɔtsinɔ ɛ, ki blɔ liklã̀ nɛ ya lipoe kakaa.”
Niklɔ Yesu asi ba si, “Malɛ ŋwisi kiŋaŋa gi kizɛki ligbã́ kinɛ ɛ, Ɔniliɛ gi aba mɔklɔ ɛ, kuʋɛ kútraku ye e; ɔniliɛ gi azɛ mɛ aʋa aŋa ɛ, olile ɔ́traku ye e.
Pɔ̀ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi masi mlɔ kinɛ ɛ, mlɛmɔ mɛ pɔ̀ mlázi mɛ aʋa aŋa a.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi Mɔka Aya aki mɛ ɛ, aaba mɔ klɔ. Mátrakpikpini ɔniliɛ gi aaba mɔklɔ liwewe e.
Lɛ ese linu si madɔ lifunu ne aba kesea aʋa, aní si tɔ mibitɛ mɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa a, pɔ̀ tɔ mibitɛ ní Aya gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa.
Lɛ linu ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ kupɛ́pɛ si; mikílila ɔ́tɔtɔ ní banɔaklɔ pɔ́ gi aki mɛ kusi i, pɔ̀ tɔ miyɔni ba pɔ́ dɔni bekpo ʋa me ní liwe gɔgɔ lɛ aʋa a.
Lɛ kidiliɛ gi Mɔka apɛ́ ɛ, kɛ kinu si; banama pɔ́ gi bɛmɔ Obi ye xe bɛzi yɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa ɛ, bamɔ ligbã́ moblo le. Lɛ maayɔni ba pɔ́ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní liwe gɔgɔ lɛ aʋa a.”
Yudanɛ ma bekpese kutɛ̀ gi Yesu apani si, “Mɛ menu liklã̀ nɛ gi lidɔ ní lifunu ne eba a.”
Lɛ bɛpani si, “Aní onyime liɛ onu Yesu u, Yosef yebinyime na a? Kwite yɛka ni yene. Lɛ kitɛmɛ ɛɛpani abla si ‘madɔ ní lifunu ne aba kesea aʋa na a’?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mlamɔni kutɛ̀ ní mlɔ atsali kusi i.”
“Ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani mɔkɔ kuba a, xe aní Mɔka gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ, yɛ etini ye apɔni mɛ; lɛ maayɔni yɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní liwe gɔgɔ lɛ aʋa a.
Aya beboedoplɛ ba bɛŋwlimi si, ‘Aya aabasɛ ɔnɔ kakaa bidɔ.’ Ɔniliɛ gi ata Kakaa Aya kutu u, xe akpasi bidɔ dɔni yɛ kɔ ɛ, izɛɛba mɔklɔ.
Lɛ ya líbasɛ si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́mɔ Kaka Aya oʋídi i; mɛ gi madɔ Aya klɔ aba ɛ, mɛ ko mamɔ Kaka a.
Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ: ɔniliɛ gi azɛ mɛ aʋa aŋa ɛ, ligbã́ moblo le lilɛ yɛ awla.
Mɛ menu liklã̀ nɛ gi lizɛki ligbã́ nɛ ɛ.
Mlɔ bakatsitsi ba bɛŋa mana yɛ ní ɔyaya klɔ pɔ̀ fɛ betse e.
Pɔ̀ liklã̀ ɛnɛ klɔ gi liba kesea aʋa dɔni lifunu ne e, lilɛ nite me si, xe ɔnɔ atà nɛ ɛ, ɔ́tratse e.

Mɛ menu liklã̀ nɛ gi lizɛɛki ligbã́ a, gi lidɔ ní lifunu ne eba a. Xe ɔnutɔ atà likla lɛ ya ɛ, aaze ligbã́ moblo le. Liklã̀ ɛnɛ gi maaki yɛ ɛ, lɛ linu mɛ kisugyaɛ gi maakɔ tɔ kelea mɛ banima biadzi ligbã́ a.”
Lɛ ya limani kusuyeʋi ni kuŋwlɛŋwlɛ ní ba kusi i. Lɛ beʋi si, “Kitɛ onyime liɛ ya aakɔ̀ yɛ kisugyaɛ kí blɔ si kuta na a?”
Yesu asi ba si, “Mɛɛsi mlɔ anukwarɛɛ: xe mláta Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye yɛ kisugyaɛ ɛ, xe mlaŋwɛ yɛ ika lɛ ɛ, ligbã́ litraze ní mlɔ mɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aata mɛ kisugyaɛ ɛ, xe aaŋwɛ mɛ ika lɛ ɛ, aamɔ ligbã́ moblo le, lɛ maayɔni yɛ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ ní liwe gɔgɔ lɛ aʋa a.
Lɛ ese linu si mɛ kisugyaɛ kinu kiŋaŋa ɔtutɔ, lɛ ika lɛ inu biŋwɛŋwɛ ɔtutɔ ɔ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi aata mɛ kisugyaɛ ɛ xe aaŋwɛ mɛ ika lɛ ɛ, ɔlɛ likpɔ ni mɛ, lɛ mɛ fɛ malɛ likpɔ ni yɛ ɛ.
Kiliɛ gi mɔka Aya gi yɛ awla ligbã́ nɛ lilɛ ɛ, akpɛ mɛ xe malɛ ligbã́ nɛ ɔkpɛ yɛ loso e, nite ke ɔniliɛ gi aata mɛ kisugyaɛ ɛ, aaze ligbã́ kɔkpɛ mɛ loso.
Mɛ menu liklã̀ ɛ nɛ gi liba kesea aʋa dɔni lifunu ne e; mlɔ bakatsitsi ba bɛŋa mana yɛ pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ betse. Banɔaklɔ gi biatà likla ɛ nɛ ya ɛ, biaze ligbã́ moblo le.”
Yesu apani eboa la ya gi azaabasɛ bidɔ ɔ ní Yudanɛ ma ɔtsaklɔ ni Kapernaum.
Gi banɔ glegle e, gi bezeni yɛ kude e, benu eboa la gi apani i, bedo si “Kudɔbasɛ uliɔ ya kwisa ɛgagla. Nyaŋwɛ aatani kɔ ese kunu u?”
Yesu ete si yɛ badɔkpasi ba bɛzɛtɛ ní liboe lɛ ya su, lɛ eʋi ba si, “Eboa la ɛkpɛ mlɔ kunugu gi mlɛɛpɛ si mlɛɛki litukpo na a?
Kɔ xegi mlɛmɔ mɛ Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye e gi medzi emu niklɔ gi meze xwɛ ɛ?
Kidiliɛ gi kizɛɛki ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, kɛ kinu Aya yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ; ɔnɔ gbagbe kisugyaɛ kínu liboeboe. Eboa la gi mapani akí mlɔ ɛ, enu Ɔfuɛfuɛ gi izɛki ligbã́ a.
Pɔ̀ mlɔ mɛ banɔatɔ bázɛ aŋa a.” Yesu ete adɔ ni okpese kɔ banama gi batráziŋa a ni ɔniliɛ gi aakpɛ yɛ awla ɛ.
Lɛ atrɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Kɔkpɛ eboa la ya loso e, Masi mlɔ si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tratani mɔkɔ kuba sani si Mɔka aki yɛ kudeo onu.”
Dɔni lipoe lɛ ya aʋa ɛ, banɔ glegle gi bezeni Yesu kude e, bɛdɔ edzini yɛ kude.
Lɛ eʋi yɛ badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiʋa ba si, “Mlɔ fɛ mlɛpɛ si mlasɛ na a?”
Simon Petro ebu le onu akí yɛ si, “Ɔkaɛ, nyaŋwɛ kɔ kwiatrɛ ɛ? Eboa la gi izɛɛki Ligbã́ moblo le e, wɔ kɔ́ alɛ.
Lɛ abla ɛ, kwizi lɛ aʋa ɛɛŋa lɛ kwite si wɔ́ wonu Ɔdradra yɛ gi ádɔ Aya klɔ ɔ.”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Mɛ makya mlɔ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba, putɔ aní mɛ na a? Pɔ̀ mlɔ mɛ tole onu ozimizi ye ɔnɛ.”
Azɛɛpani ní Yuda, gi onu Simon Iskariot yebinyime su u. Lɛ gi Yuda anya eze badɔkpasi liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba mɛ tole kyɛ, yɛ atra kpɛ Yesu awla lɛ kede e.
Ní lɛ ya kede e, Yesu aga aklani Galilea kesea mɛ; ɔ́pɛ si yitrɛ ní Yudea, lɛ ese linu si Yudanɛ baka ba bɛzɛpɛ si beeye ye e.
Gi lipoe le litiipɔnɔ kí Yudanɛ ma Akpandɔ ʋa Liweŋaŋa nɛ ɛ,
Yesu yɛ beneminyime ba bɛsi yɛ si, “Sɛ niya tɔ trɛ ní Yudea, tɔ wɔ́ badɔkpasi ba, bamɔ enugutseboe a la gi wɔɛbitɛ ɛ.
Ɔnɔnɔ óʋikpo kidiliɛ gi ɛɛbitɛ ɛ, xe apɛ́ si bete ye mɔmɔmɔ ɛ. Agi wɔɛbitɛ eboa la ya ɛ, kí tɔ kelea petee kéte wo!”
Bɛpani nite lɛ ese linu si yɛ beneminyime ba ɔtutɔ fɛ bázɛ yɛ aʋa ŋa a.
Lɛ loso Yesu asi ba si, “Lipoe gbã nɛ liʋína ɛki mɛ. Lipoe kakaa linu lipoe gbã ɛki mlɔ kɔ.
Kelea mɛ banima bátratani mlɔ kuvu kpɛ lipo me e, pɔ̀ bevu mɛkɔ ɛkpɛ lipo me e, lɛ ese linu si mɛɛsi ba si ba kiboebitɛɛ kiinyani.
Mlɔ kɔ mlatrɛ ní liwe le ɔŋa klɔ. Máʋitrɛ ní liwe lɛ ya ɔŋakɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si lipoe gbã nɛ liʋína ɛki mɛ ɛ.”
Asi ba nite lɛ awɔ Galilea ɛ.
Agi yɛ beneminyime ba bɛsɛ ɛtrɛ ní liwe le me e, Yesu fɛ atrɛ, pɔ̀ ɔ́basi isu u.
Yudanɛ ma baka ba bɛzɛɛpɛ́ yɛ ní liwe le me, lɛ beʋi si, “Nífɔ onyime liɛ klɔ ɔlɛ ɛ?”
Ní linɔkpi le kusi i, bɛzɛɛpani ní yɛ su ní kikpokpo me, banɔatɔ bɛ pani si, “Onu ɔnɔ gbã,” batɔ fɛ si, “owo eemeni banɔ.”
Pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ óbu le odo ni yɛ su u, lɛ ese linu si bezeese Yudanɛ ma baka ba.
Akpandɔ ʋa Liweŋaŋa nɛ lilɛ lɛ mɛ xe ableke Yesu azeekpese bidɔ mɛ kubasɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Yudanɛ baka ba inugu itse, lɛ beʋi si, “Nifɔ onyime liɛ ya yɛ kuboeteo kwidɔ gi bábasɛ yɛ kididɔ ɔ?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Kidiliɛ gi mɛɛbasɛ ɛ, ani mɛ ɔtutɔ mɛ kinɛ ɛ, pɔ̀ kidɔ ní Aya gi yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ klɔ.
Ɔnɔ kakaa gi apɛ si yibitɛ Aya yɛ kupɛpɛɔ aʋa ɛ, aatè xe kidiliɛ gi mɛɛbasɛ ɛ, kidɔ ní Aya kɔ loo mɛɛpani ní mɛ ɔtutɔ mɛ kigagla mɛ.
Ɔniliɛ gi izɛpani ní yɛ ɔtutɔ yɛ kigagla mɛ ɛ, ɛɛpɛ kukɔkɔ ɛki isu, Pɔ̀ ɔniliɛ ɛ gi ɛɛpɛ kukɔkɔ ɛki ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ yɛ ɛ, onu anukwarɛ onete lɛ asia atɔtɔ áma ní yɛ mɛ ɛ.
Mose aki mlɔ Ɔsã nɔ, putɔ aní te na a? Pɔ̀ mlɔmɛ ɔtɔtɔ ɔʋíbitɛ Ɔsã nɔ aʋa a, Ege lɛ loso mlekeni idi si mleye me e?”
Lɛ linɔkpi le libu le onu si, “Ɔfuɛfuɛ zimizi ɔkpasi ní wɔ mɛ ɛ! Nyaŋwɛ eekeni idi si yiye wo o?”
Yesu ebu le onu si, “Liboe tile ko mabitɛ, lɛ litu mlɔ petee kugyɔ ɛ.
Mose akí mlɔ ɔsã si mlatsà ɔyaʋi aki mlɔ bebinyime ba, aní Mose ekpese le pɔ̀ mlɔ baka ba a. Lɛ mlɛzɛɛtsa ɔyaʋi kí bebinyime ba ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa a.
Xe biatsa ɔyaʋi kí obinyime ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa a, tɔ bakíta Mose Ɔsã nɔ ese e, ege lɛ loso mlɛmɔ kusuyeʋi ni mɛ si mayɔni ɔnyime ní Lizemɔniwe le aʋa na a?”
Mlamɔni etsi kuxwa ní banɔ kiŋwiŋwi mɛ onu u, pɔ̀ mlaxwa etsi ní anukwarɛ mɛ ɛ.
Niklɔ banɔatɔ ní Yerusalem bɛpani si, “Aní onyime liɛ ya baka ba bekeni edi si beeye na a?
Dike! imɔ yɛ gi ɛɛpani ní ɔha lɔ kusi i, xe baʋíkɔ liboeboe tuni ye e! Kɔ kitsa baka ba bɛtsa lɛ si yɛ onu Kristo ye na a?
Pɔ̀ xe Kristo ye aba ɛ, ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́trate niklɔ gi ádɔ ɔ. Lɛ blɔ pɔ̀ kwite niklɔ gi onyime liɛ ya ádɔ ɛ.”

Agi Yesu azɛɛbasɛ bidɔ mɛ ní Lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, apani ni ole gagla si, “Ee Mlɛnya ete niklɔ gi madɔ ɔ? Aní mɛ ɔtutɔ mɛ kigagla onu ma ba ni ya a. Ɔniliɛ gi akpɛ mɛ ɛ, onu anukwarɛ onete. Mléte ye e,
pɔ̀ mete ye, lɛ ese linu si yɛ kɔ madɔ lɛ yɛ akpɛ mɛ ɛ.”
Liboe lɛ ya loso e, bekeni edi si beevu ye, pɔ̀ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́gbɔni yɛ lɛ ese linu si yɛ lipoe le liʋína a.
