Lɛ emi ní ɔnɔ kakaa aʋa, banɔtsitsi ni banuvɔ, bexonete ni bazianete, banɔdzidzi ni banɔ gi balɛ ní ba ɔtutɔ isuwla mɛ, lɛ aki si bakpɛ ɔnɔ kakaa lixaŋu ní yɛ kaŋawla mɛ loo ní yɛ ketu ya,
atɔ ɔnɔnɔ ɔkitani bidɔ kudzi loo tɔ ɔdà bidɔ ɔ, dzaa si ɔnyraga yɛ yɛ lixaŋu nɛ gi linu yɛ linyine e loo yɛ aŋwi na ɛ, alɛ ní ɔniliɛ klɔ ʋa su u.
Lɛ ya liziã kuboete. Xe kuboesenu kulɛ ní ɔnutɔ awla ɛ, ogyo ɔnyraga yɛ yɛ aŋwi na odi i, lɛ ese linu si linu ɔnɔ linyi gi lɛ aŋwi na enu alafa tieglo aviteglo ni teglo.
Lɛ gi meedi i, mamɔ keʋesibi ya gi kalɛɛ ní Zion lito le aʋa ɛ, lɛ banɔ akpe alafa tole ni avitene ni tiene, gi bɛŋwlimi yɛ linyi ne nì Yɛka yɛ linyi ne ní ba kùtu yo e, bɛpɔni yɛ.
Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ gi ɛdɔ ní lifunu ne ŋwisi onipe gi ɛdɔ limu kinɛ ɛ, ni dzeni kugugu gagla ɔtɔ kinɛ ɛ. Ole lo gi menu i, ɔlɛ ŋwisi ɔsangu beʋéʋe gi beeʋe ba isangu ne kinɛ ɛ.

Bɛzɛzà ɔdzi vuvu ɔtɔ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ní bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe kɔpɔni banɔtsitsi ba aŋu mɛ. Lɛ ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani ɔdzi nɔ kukpasi i, sani banɔ akpe alafa tole avitene ni tiene ba gi bebu idɔni kesea aʋa ɛ.

Banɔ ba ya benu banama gi bákpɛ ɔdzɛ ha, lɛ bélulu isu ya ni badzɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si ba isu ya idra a. Banɔ ba ya ɛ, bizeekuni Keʋesibi ya kude tsinɔ ní ɔkɔ kakaa gi izɛtrɛ ɛ. Banɔ ba ya bedzi dɔni banima kusi i, xe bɛkɔ ba ŋwisi bidɔkɔkɔ tɔpu ki Aya ni Keʋesibi ya a.
Lɛ bámɔ asia atɔtɔ ní ba onu u; lɛ ese linu si benu banɔ gi kunutsatsaa kutɔtɔ si bɛbitɛ eboe zimizi i, kúma ní ba su u.

Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze gi eepruru ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ, gi evu liboe gbã moblo le ní awla a, si yipani iiki banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa a, ki kese kakaa, ki limade kakaa, ki siya lide kakaa ni banɔ kakaa.

Lɛ apani ni ole gagla si, “Mlese Aya, lɛ mlakɔ kusudraa aki yɛ; lɛ ese linu si yɛ litsixwaxwa nɛ lipoe le lina, lɛ mlesumu ɔniliɛ klɔ gi yɛ abitɛ lifunu ne e, ni kesea ani axu la kɔpɔni inide ede ede ne.”
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ʋla ɛ, ekuni yɛ kude lɛ apani si, “Egleʋe, Egleʋe, Babilonia ʋidi ye Egleʋe, yɛ gi yɛ aki si kuseo petee kwiŋwɛ yɛ kihasiwawaɛ kɛ kuwleda ɛ.”
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tanɛ, ekuni ba kude lɛ apani ni ole gagla si, “Xe ɔnutɔ esumu ɔnyraga yɛ ni yɛ litugu ne e, xe azɛ yɛ lixaŋu nɛ ní yɛ ketu ya loo ní yɛ kawla mɛ ɛ,

Aya aayeʋi isu ni ye, lɛ yɛ kyɛ aŋwɛ Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio kuda, gi bátsa ní yɛ kusuyeʋio kepliʋia mɛ ɛ. Lɛ biakɔ kifu ni kifu akla kɔwa yɛ nyɔnyɔɛ ní Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ dradra ba ani keʋesibi ya aŋu mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ ba kinie xunyɔ ɛ, kwiado trɛ ní lifunu ne tsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ. Lɛ kuzemɔni kúma elesi ni kemize ki banama gi besumu ɔnyragaɛ ni yɛ litugu ne e, loo ki banama gi bɛzɛ yɛ linyi ne lɛ lixaŋu nɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ ya liziã litɔplɛplɛkese kese ni igyidodo dɔni banɔ dradra ba, gi bizeenu kutu iiki Aya isã nɛ ɛ, xe bevu kuziŋa ni Yesu me ní awla ɛ.

Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ dɔni lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si i, “Ŋwlimi si: Biakrira banɔ ba ya gi betse ní Ɔkaɛ mɛ ɛ, dɔni lɛ ya aʋa kɔtsinɔ ɛ.” “Ee” Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛɛpani si, “biaazemɔni ní ba axwɛwawa la mɛ, lɛ ese linu si ba axwɛwawa la aazeni ba kude.”
Gi meedi i, mamɔ liplɛ pititi itɔ, lɛ ɔnutɔ odi ní lɛ aʋa ŋwisi Ɔnɔɛ Yebi ye kinɛ ɛ, sika yɛ likuto le lilɛ ní yɛ litukpo le, lɛ evu ihɛ gi bizɛkɔ ɛtsa amu ní awla la a.

Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze edo ádɔ ní lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla atsisi ɔniliɛ klɔ gi odi ní liplɛ lɛ aʋa si, “Kɔ wɔ ihɛ tɔ tsa bidɔ mɛ; lɛ ese linu si ɔmuzáza nɔ ɛna, lɛ ese linu si kesea aʋa bidɔ mɛ biizã a.”
Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi odi ní liplɛ lɛ aʋa ɛ, aŋwia yɛ ihɛ atsisi ní kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ atsa kesea aʋa bidɔkpɛkpɛ ʋɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze edo ádɔ ní lisɔligba ɛlɛ, gi lilɛ ní lifunu ne me e, gi yɛ fɛ evu kaláʋi nunu atɔ ní awla a.

Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze ɔtɔ dzɛ, gi yɛ awla kigaglaɛ kilɛ ní kifu yɛ aʋa ɛ, edo ádɔ ní ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ su, lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla atsisi ɔniliɛ klɔ gi evu kaláʋia ní awla la si, “Kɔ̀ wɔ kaláʋia tɔ gu kesea aʋa wain yoyoe yɛ asà la; lɛ ese linu si wain yɛ esebi la ɛzã!”
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ aŋwia yɛ kaláʋia atsisi ní kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ agu kesea aʋa wain yoyoe, lɛ bɛkɔ yɛ ɛkpɛ ní Aya yɛ kusuyeʋio kɔ wain yɛ ɔka kɔ ʋidi lo me e.
Lɛ bɛpita wain yoyoe ni ikli lɛ ní ɔma nɔ ese e, lɛ ika lɛ ido ní wain yɛ ɔka klɔ ɛ, gi idzu ŋwisi ɔnɔ liŋwladɔ̃ kinɛ ɛ, gi bɛ kidzedzee me kina itiplɛkɔ alafa tiaʋa a.

Lɛ mamɔ gyesi ʋidi dzedze ní lifunu ne, gi liki si mɛ onugu etse e. Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele gi bevu baxixa tiegloele gɔgɔ ʋa ní awlaa. Ba ya benu ba gɔgɔ ʋa lɛ ese linu si gani ba mɛ ɛ, kɔ Aya yɛ kusuyeʋi gaglaa kɔ onu kwidu i.

Lɛ mamɔ kiditɔ gi kilɛ ŋwisi axu la a, pɔ̀ alɛ ŋwisi azinzi yɛ kinɛ ɛ, gi yɛ mɛ azã kyikyii ŋwisi kifu kinɛ ɛ. Lɛ mamɔ banɔ batɔ gi balɛ ni axu la kutu yɔ ɛ, ba benu banama gi bɛŋa ɔŋuga yɛ ni yɛ litugu ne ani yɛ linyi ne lɛ aaŋwi na aʋa a. Bevu isangu ne gi Aya aki ba ní awla a.
Lɛ bɛza Mose, Aya yɛ ɔnɔsumu ye yɛ ɔdzi nɔ ani Keʋesibi ya ka ɔdzi nɔ si,
“Ɔka, Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete,
wɔ axwɛwawa la ekeme lɛ enu enugutseboe.
Wɔ bede ʋa benu bede gi bɛgyɔ ɔ, lɛ benu anukwarɛɛ,
Wɔ wonu kelea petee Okusi ye lipoe kakaa.
Ɔkaɛ, nyaŋwɛ ɔlɛ gi ɔ́trase wo o,
xe ɔ́trakpɔ̀ wɔ linyi ne e?
Lɛ ese linu si wɔ tole ko wɔdra.
Ima nɛ petee iaba wɔ aŋu mɛ ɛ,
lɛ iaba sumu wo,
lɛ ese linu si bebu wɔ kiboebitɛ gyɔgyɔ ɛbasɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ ya kede e, medi, lɛ mamɔ si bɛdra lisɔligba lɛ, gi linu kusɔliɔ kɔ likatsa lɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba, gi bevu baxixa tiegloele ʋa ní awla ɛ, bedo edɔ ní lisɔligba lɛ mɛ. Bɛkpɛ ewu pititi gi ɛɛdra a, xe eeŋle e, lɛ bɛkɔ sika asaba ɛklani ba ete na mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe ɔmɛ tole akɔ sika kubɔziʋi tugloele aki Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba ɛ. Kubɔziʋi tugloele uliɔ ya mɛ Aya gi ɔlɛ ligba nɛ kɔtsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ, yɛ kusuyeʋio kukpasi.

Lɛ kunyɔɔ, gi kwidɔ Aya yɛ kuklekleo ni yɛ kigaglaɛ mɛ ɛ, kwiyi lisumugba lɛ mɛ, nite me si ɔnɔnɔ ɔ́tani lisɔligba lɛ mɛ kutiku, zɛkɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi baxixa ʋa gi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba bevu i, ba onu ɛza.
Lɛ menu ole gagla ɔtɔ dɔni lisɔligba lɛ mɛ gi ɛɛsi Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba si i, “Mlatrɛ tɔ mlazeenye Aya yɛ kusuyeʋi yo kubɔziʋi tugloele ko abali ní kesea aʋa.”
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tɔpu yɛ atrɛ ɛ, lɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní kesea aʋa ɛ, lɛ banima bɛdɔ ebì gi ezeyeʋi gagla ɛ, ba banama su gi ɔŋuga yɛ yɛ gyesi ye ɔlɛ ɛ ani banama gi besumu yɛ litugu ne e.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ʋla yɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní axu la aʋa ɛ, lɛ kuni yo kwikyi dzi ika ŋwisi okpo ɔtɔ yɛ ika kinɛ ɛ, lɛ kidɔ gbagbe kakaa gi kilɛ ní axu la mɛ ɛ kitse.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tanɛɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní inipe le ani inide ne aʋa ɛ, lɛ bikyí dzi ika ɛ.
Lɛ menu gi Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ liɛ gi odi ní bèni ʋa onu i ɛɛpani si,
“Wɔ linɛ ligyɔ ní litsi tsatsa ɛlɛ ya mɛ.
Wɔ gi wɔlɛ ɛ, xe woze e, wɔ Ɔnɔ dradra yɛ,
lɛ ese linu si nite wɔtsa litsi le e;
lɛ ese linu si bɛbali wɔ banɔ dradra ba ni wɔ beboedoplɛ ba ba ika lɛ,
lɛ wɔki ba ika lɛ, tɔ baŋwɛ ŋwisi kiliɛ gi ligyeni ba kinɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ dɔni ɔdɔpɔʋisuʋɔ lɔ mɛ gi ɛɛpani si i, “Ee, Ɔkaɛ Aya kigaglaɛ petee ɔkaɛ, wɔ etsixwaxwa la enu anukwarɛɛ ni eboe gyɔgyɔ.”
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ néne ye enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní liwo le aʋa ɛ, lɛ bɛki liwo le kigagla tɔ, likani banima nì kifu u.
Lɛ liwo le lɛ kuhuhu yo kwikani banima ɛ, lɛ bexo ifi ikpɛ Aya yɛ linyi ne, Aya gi yɛ amɔ kigagla ní baxixa ʋa ya aʋa ɛ, pɔ̀ lɛ badimɛ si bekyi ní ba ina nɛ mɛ, xe biakɔ kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀ ki yɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tsunɛɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní ɔŋuga yɛ yɛ likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, lɛ yɛ kaʋaŋaa kɛdɔ litumu ne e. Lɛ banima bɛtà ba binemi ʋe kɔkpɛ ɔzia mɔmɔ nɔ loso o,
lɛ bexo ifi le ekpɛ lifunu ne Aya a, kɔkpɛ ba kuyeʋiyeʋi yo ni ba ebi la loso, pɔ̀ kyɛ ɛ, badimɛ si bekyi ní ba kiboebitɛɛ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ glonɛɛ enye yɛ kabɔziʋia abali ní Eufrate onipe ʋidi lo aʋa ɛ, lɛ lɔ mɛ kuni yo kwiti i, tɔ bialulɔ kudeo aki kewetu ya bekusi ba.
Lɛ mamɔ ifuɛfuɛ zimizi tita, gi ilɛ ŋwisi akpɔkplɔ ʋa kinɛ ɛ, gi ido edɔ ní keni ya mɛ ɔgblaga yɛ yɛ onugu lo me e, ni ɔŋuga yɛ yɛ onugu lo me, ani asia na oboedoplɛɛ yɛ onugu lo me.
Inu ifuɛfuɛ zimizi gi izɛɛbitɛ enugutseboe la a, lɛ izɛɛtrɛ ní kelea mɛ bekusi ba klɔ ní kelea petee me e, tɔ bɛkpɛ ba likpɔ ɛki kigũ yɛ ní Aya kigaglaɛ petee pɔ́ Ɔkaɛ, yɛ liwe ʋidi le aʋa a.
“Dike, matraba ŋwisi oze kinɛ ɛ! Biakrira ɔniliɛ klɔ gi izeeze ni aŋu i, xe izɛɛkɔ yɛ ewu la ɛplɛ isu ya su u, tɔ ɔkiga liya, xe biamɔ yɛ kuye me ɛ.”
Lɛ bɛkpɛ bekusi ba likpɔ ní niklɔ gi bizɛxwa ní si Hebri se me si Armagedon.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gloele enye yɛ kabɔziʋia kpɛ ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ole gagla ɔtɔ eyi dɔni lisɔligba lɛ mɛ ní likusigbo le su si, “Bɛbitɛ lɛ pɔ!”
Lɛ dzeni ye kifutsitsi yɛ, yɛ kulaʋiɔ ni yɛ kugugu yo kwiyi i, lɛ kesea kɛhwa gagla gi kɔ elu kuʋíba eʋídi dɔni lipoe lɛ gi banima bali ní kesea aʋa ɛ, biba bɛ mɛ ɛ, kesea kɛhwa gaglaa koŋ.
Ɔma ʋidi no ɛlɛ ní kupɛ tuta mɛ, lɛ kesea aʋa ima ʋidi ne iiyaʋi. Lɛ Aya aplɛ aŋu ní Babilonia ʋidi ye aʋa ɛ, lɛ akɔ yɛ kepliʋia gi ka mɛ yɛ kusuyeʋio kuda kulɛ ɛ, lɛ akɔ ka aki yɛ si ɔŋwɛ.
Lɛ kunisi yo kese kakaa kɛlila ɛ, lɛ bámɔ litoe tɔtɔ tɔ ɔ.

Lɛ amukla ʋidi, gi la kunyipu yo kwiaze ŋwisi ɔklagbotu tole e, ɛdɔ ɛdɔni lifunu ne xe ɛdɔ ni banima aʋa ɛ. lɛ banima bexo ifi le kpɛ Aya kɔkpɛ amukla na kuxixa loso, lɛ ese linu si la kinie kɛ onu kikeme koŋ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba ya awla gi kubɔziʋi tugloeleo kwize e, ba mɛ tole apani asi mɛ si, “Ba tɔ mibasɛ wɔ kutuhehe kuliɔ gi bɛtráki ɔwawadze ʋidi ye e, gi odi ní bèni glegle ʋa aʋa ɛ.
Kesea aʋa bekusi ba bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ, lɛ yɛ kihasi ye kuda ɛ, kwimu banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa ɛ.”

Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ efeke me ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ atsini ɔyaya klɔ, lɛ mamɔ ɔdzɛ ɔtɔ gi odi ní ɔŋuga kyikyi ɔtɔ, gi bɛŋwlimi ebusionyi na ní yɛ su petee e, xe etukpo tegloele ni asia liɔfɔ alɛ yɛ aʋa ɛ.
Ɔdzɛɛ enyime basa gi bɛzi kedzi, lɛ alulɔ isu ya ni sika ni akla gi ɛɛzi kedzi ani ihwia pititi, lɛ evu sika kadaŋwɛpliʋi, gi keyi ni anyaniboe ni yɛ kihasi ye kɛ eboe kluklu la.
Linyii nɛ gi bɛŋwlimi ni yɛ ketu ya linu si:
LIBOE KPOKPO
BABILONIA ƲIDI YE
BAWAWADZE BA PETEE ONEE
NI ANYANIBOE LA NI KESEA AƲA LA ONEE.
Lɛ mamɔ si ɔdzɛɛ emu kuda gi kunu banɔ dradra ba ba ika lɛ ɛ, banama gi bɛŋa katsalia ɛki Yesu i, ba ika lɛ.
Gi mamɔ yɛ nite e, mawɔ yaa.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ eʋi me si, “Ege lɛ loso wɔwɔ yaa nite e? Ki tɔ mibu liboe kpokpoe lɛ gi lilɛ ní ɔdzɛɛ ni ɔga liɛ gi yɛ aʋa odi i, gi etukpo tegloele ni asia liɔfɔ alɛ yɛ ɛ, ese aki wɔ.

Ɔŋuga yɛ gi wɔmɔ ɛ, eze azanɔ, pɔ̀ ɔ́ma tɔ ɔ, lɛ atrádo edɔ ní lizokpo gluglu le me, lɛ aatrɛ gi iikyrɔ ɛ. Lɛ banama gi balɛ ní kesea aʋa gi báŋwlimi ba enyi na akpɛ ní ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ, dɔni lipoe lɛ gi bɛbitɛ kelea ɛ, ba inugu iatse xe bɛmɔ ɔŋuga yɛ, lɛ ese linu si ɔŋuga yɛ eze edi, pɔ̀ ɔ́ma tɔ ɔ, pɔ aadzi ba dzɛ.
“Lɛ ya liziã kuboesenu nu: Etukpo tegloele la enu kutokpa tugloele, gi kɔ aʋa ɔdzɛɛ odi i. Edzì enu bekusi tiegloele:
Bamɛ tietsu bɛwɔli, tole ɔlɛ, ɔgɔgɔɛ ɔʋíba sukɔ, lɛ xegi aba ɛ, lilɛ si ɔŋa kukusi yo lipoe kpekpemi itɔ
Lɛ ɔŋuga yɛ, gi eze edi i, xe ɔ́ma tɔɔ ɛ, yɛ onu okusi ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ. Onu tiegloele ba ɔmɛ tole lɛ ɛtrɛ ní kukyrɔkyrɔ mɛ ɛ.
“Lɛ asia, liɔfɔa la gi wɔmɔ ɛ enu bekusi liɔfɔ pɔ̀ baʋízɛ ba kukusi yo sukɔ ɔ, pɔ̀ biaki ba kukusi ki ɔnyɔsasa tole ko lɛ biaŋa kukusi yo, kɔpɔni ɔŋuga yɛ.
Litukpo me trɔtrɔ tile lilɛ ní ba awla, lɛ linu si biakɔ ba kigaglaɛ ni ozeklɔ ki ɔŋuga yɛ.

Biata kigũ ni Keʋesibi ya, pɔ̀ Keʋesibi ya kiaŋa ba aʋa a; lɛ ese linu si Yɛ onu Baka ba aʋa Ɔkaɛ ni Bekusi ba aʋa Okusi ye. Lɛ banama gi biapɔni yɛ ɛ, ba benu yɛ banɔxwaxwa ba ni yɛ banɔ kyakya ba kɔpɔni banama gi balɛ ni yɛ kude ni anukwarɛɛ mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ Aya yɛ Ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi mɛ si, “Kuni yo gi wɔmɔ ɔ, gi kɔ aʋa ɔwawadzee odi i, kunu banɔ, linɔkpi ani kelea mɛ kuse ani siya ede ede.
Lɛ ɔŋuga yɛ ni asia liɔfɔa la gi wɔmɔ ɛ, biatrɔ ɔwawadzee ahwafi. Biaki si aakyrɔ lɛ biabu ye liya a, biatà yɛ kisugyaɛ, lɛ biakpɛ yɛ kifu yɛ.
Lɛ ese linu si Aya akpɛ lɛ ba ina nɛ mɛ, si babitɛ ní Aya yɛ batrɔtrɔ ʋa aʋa, gi ba petee biadimɛ tɔ biakɔ ba kaʋaŋaa aki ɔŋuga yɛ, zɛkɔna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi Aya yɛ eboe la aaba la mɛ ɛ.
“Ɔdzɛɛ gi wɔmɔ ɛ, yɛ onu ɔma ʋidi ɔ lɔ klɔ, gi ɛɛŋa kukusi yo ní kesea aʋa bekusi ba aʋa a.”
Lɛ ya kede e, mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ dzedze gi eeple edɔni lifunu ne e, lɛ ozekɔ ʋidi ɔlɛ ní yɛ awla a, lɛ yɛ kusudraa kwiki si kesea petee keekle e.
Akpɛ ozi ni ole gagla si,
“Ayaʋi! Babilonia ʋidi ye ayaʋi!
Lɛ ese linu si edzì ifuɛfuɛ zimizi ne e, lɛ ozekɔ,
ni ɔfuɛfuɛ mɔdramɔdra kakaa lɔ okpo kɔ, ani kadzɔʋi kyrìkyrì nì ke kluklu kakaa ŋwisi opéte kinɛ ka ɔdɔ kɔ.
Lɛ ese linu si kesea petee kɛŋwɛ yɛ kihasi ye kɛ kuwledaa,
lɛ kesea aʋa bekusi ba bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ,
lɛ kesea aʋa bedzigà ba bedzi bexonete gani yɛ bikesinɔdɔ kpaŋukpaŋu ʋɛ mɛ.”
Lɛ menu ole dzedze dɔni lifunu ne gi ɛɛpani si i, “Mledo aza ní yɛ mɛ, mɛ banima, tɔ mlakíkpɛ ɔha ni yɛ kuzimizi yo, atɔ mláʋazɛ yɛ kinii tɔtɔ ɔ.
“Lɛ ese linu si yɛ kuzimizi yo kwimu ina lifunu ne e, lɛ Aya aplɛ aŋu ní yɛ eboe kyrikyri la aʋa.
Mlabitɛ akpɛ ní lɛ onu aki yɛ, ŋwisi kiliɛ gi yɛ fɛ abitɛ lɛ kinɛ ɛ;
mledzini atsa aki yɛ ede taʋa kɔkpɛ kidiliɛ gi abitɛ ɛ.
Kaŋwɛpliʋia lia mɛ gi akpɛ aki mlɔ ɛ, mlaki yɛ kɔ tuʋa tɔ ɔŋwɛ.
Mlebu kinie aki yɛ atɔ mlaki yɛ ɔna tata ŋwisi kubùbù yo ni exo ala gi aki isu ya kinɛ ɛ.
Ní yɛ ɔna nɔ mɛ ɛ, izeefeke isu ya si,
‘Medi ŋwisi okusidzɛ; Ménu ɔdzɛ gi yenye etse e, lɛ mátrabemi monye liwewe e.’
Lɛ loso e, yɛ kini ye kiaba yɛ aʋa ní liwe tile aʋa a: kutse, kube ani kuʋɛ ɛ.
Lɛ biakpɛ yɛ kifu gi kiakani yɛ petee,
lɛ ese linu si Ɔka Aya, ɔniliɛ gi
izɛxwa litsi ni yɛ ɛ, onu ɔnɔ gagla.
“Lɛ xe kesea aʋa bekusi ba a, gi bɛwa kihasi ye ni yɛ ɛ, xe bɛŋa yɛ exo la nì yɛ ɛ, xe bɛmɔ yɛ kunyɔɔ ɔ, gi ɛɛsɔ ɛ, biabemi ye lɛ biawa awowoe la ní yɛ litukpo.
Lɛ bialɛɛ ní ɔdzage no ke gi lifu ne liiku ba kɔkpɛ yɛ ɔzia mɔmɔ nɔ lɔ kinie e, gi ɛɛmɔ loso o, lɛ biabemi si,
“Babaa, babaa kí wɔ, wɔ ɔma ʋidi no
Wɔ Babilonia, wɔ gi wonu ɔma ʋidi ni ɔma gagla!
Lɛ ese linu si wɔ kutuheheo kwiba ní ɔnyɔsasa tole me.
“Lɛ kesea aʋa bedzigà ba biabemi, lɛ biawa awowoe la ní yɛ litukpo, lɛ ese linu si ɔnɔnɔ óʋidzi ba bidɔdada ʋɛ tɔ ɔ.

Bidɔdadaɛ ʋɛ ya binu: Sika ni klosalo, ani akla gi ɛzi kedzi i, ni ihwia ni akla la plɔplɔ yɛ, ni basa gi bɛzi kedzi i, ni seda yɛ ni ise kakaa elu gi ilɛ flafla ɛ, ni kudɔkpa gi bɛbitɛ ni onyi ye line ne e, ni ise gi izɛ kedzi i, ni ɔla kyikyi yɛ ani ɔla kpikpi yɛ kɔpɔni akla dzedze la a;

awlakpaa la gi la mɛ bizebu kumu flafla edɔnɔ ɛ, ni bidɔ flafla ɛʋɛ gi bizɛɛkɔ ɛtɔ bidɔ mɛ ɛ, lifi ye adɔtu la ni kotoklobo ye, ni kuda ni kumu yɔ, ni kunɔ ni amu, ni egume ni iʋesi, ni isɔ ʋa ni kikee ʋa, ani banɔ dzidzi ʋa, kɔpɔni banɔ gbagbe ba.
“Lɛ biapani si ‘wɔ bilésedɔ mɛ, bido ní wɔ awla. Wɔ exo la petee ni wɔ isu ya bilulɔ dɔ mɛ petee bilila gi bitradzì ba liwewe tɔ ɔ.’
Bedzigà ba gi bɛzɛda kudɔkpaa liɔ ya ɛ, xe bɛmɔ ba exo la ɛdɔni yɛ klɔ ɛ, bialɛɛ ní ɔkutɔ ke gi lifu ne liiku ba a, gi bɛmɔ yɛ kinimɔmɔɛ ɛ. Biabemi, lɛ biawa awowoe la,
lɛ biasa awla onu si,
“ ‘Babaa, babaa ki ɔma ʋidi no!
Wɔ gi wɔkpɛ aklala plɔplɔ yɛ ɛ, ni basa kakaa gi bɛzi kedzi i,
xe wɔɛtsi kifu yɛ ni sika ni akla a, gi ɛzi kedzi ani ihwia lɛ ɛ!
Wɔ exo glegle la ezizi ní ɔnyɔsasa tole me!’
“Lɛ initsahu le ɔka kakaa, ni ɔnɔ kakaa gi izekù initsahu le e, ni banama gi bizeku initsahu le e, ni kenia aʋa baxwɛwa ba, ani banama petee gi bizɛga kedzia ní axu la aʋa ɛ, bialɛɛ ní ɔkutɔ ke.
Lɛ xegi bɛmɔ kunyɔ ɛdɔ ni yɛ kukanikani yɔ mɛ ɛ, biakpɛ ozi si, ‘Ɔma ʋidi ɔtɔtɔ ɔ́srɔni ɔma lɔ ya a.’
Lɛ biakpɛ ovugbo lo ní ba siya sɛ mɛ gi bɛwa awowoe la ɛ, lɛ biakpɛ ozi xe biazebemi si i,
“‘Babaa! Babaa kí wɔ, ɔma ʋidi no,
gi lɔ mɛ banama petee awla gi
initsahu le ize ni axu la aʋa ɛ,
bekyi edzì bexonete gani yɛ exo la aʋa!
Lɛ ní ɔnyɔsasa tole me e, bɛkyrɔ yɛ.
Mlamɔ isami ní lɛ litukpo, Mlɔ banama gi mlalɛ ní lifunu ne e!
Isami iku mlo mlɔ baʋaziŋa ba ni mlɔ Aya yɛ banɔkpɛkpɛ ba ni beboedoplɛ ba!
Lɛ ese linu si Aya atsa liʋɛ nɛ aki yɛ
kɔkpɛ kiliɛ gi agani mlɔ loso o.’ ”
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ gagla ɔtɔ efeke liklakpɔ ʋidi itɔ gi likeme ŋwisi lihɔkla kinɛ ɛ, lɛ aŋwia lɛ akpɛ ní axu la mɛ, lɛ apani si:
Anyra ala elu bɛtrákɔ ɛŋwia
Babilonia ɔma ʋidi no ɛkpɛ kesea,
lɛ batrámɔ nɔ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batránu ɔsangu no beʋéʋe ba ni badziza ba, ni ketee bememe ba, ani kukuklui yɔ bememe ba ile le
ní wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batrámɔ lixwɛxwɛ lɛ baxwɛwa ba
ní wɔ mɛ tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batránu lihɔkla nɛ onu
ní wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Kani yɛ kuklekleo kutrákle ní
wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Lɛ batránu kunyimezeno ni kudzɛgbanɔ ole
ní wɔ mɛ liwewe tɔ ɔ.
Wɔ bedzigà ba ba beze kesea aʋa banɔ ʋidi ba.
Gani wɔ kunɔfanɔɔ mɛ ɛ, kelea ima nɛ petee ilila lɛ kudeo.
Lɛ bɛmɔ beboedoplɛ ba ni baʋaziŋa ba kɔpɔni banama
petee gi beye ní kesea aʋa ɛ, ba ika lɛ ni wɔ mɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ ya kede e, menu ole gagla ɔtɔ gi ɔlɛ ŋwisi linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ ní lifunu ne lɛ ole gi liikpɛ ozi lo si,
“Haleluya!
Kubúbú ni kusudra ani kigaglaɛ binu blɔ Aya yɛ binɛ,
lɛ ese linu si yɛ etsixwaxwa la enu anukwarɛ lɛ ɛɛgyɔ ɔ.
Ebu ɔwawadze ʋidi ye lipɔ
gi yɛ ezizi kesea ni yɛ kihasi ye.
Eʋi yɛ banɔsumu ba ba kuwleo adɔ ni yɛ iwla mɛ.”
Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi lo dzɛ si, “Haleluya! Ɔdzɛɛ yɛ kunyɔɔ kwiyɔ emu ní lifunu ne tsinɔ kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ.”
Lɛ bakatsitsi avitaʋa ni tiene ba ani bidɔgbagbe tune ʋe bɛdɔ kesea, lɛ besumu Aya, gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ. Lɛ bɛkpɛ ozi lo si,
“Amen, Haleluya!”
Lɛ ole eyi dɔni likusigbo le su si,
“Mlakpɔ̀ blɔ Aya,
mlɔ yɛ banɔsumu ba petee,
mlɔ banama gi mlezeese ye e,
mlɔ banuvɔ ni betsitsi.”
Lɛ menu ole ɔtɔ ŋwisi linɔkpi ʋidi itɔ ile, ŋwisi inipe glegle kuni kinɛ ɛ, ani ŋwisi dzeni kugugu gagla kinɛ gi bɛkpɛ ozi lo si,
“Haleluya!
Lɛ ese linu si Ɔkaɛ, blɔ Aya kigaglaɛ petee onete ɛɛŋa kukusi yo.
Mlaki tɔ kumɔ isami tɔ kuyo,
tɔ mlaki yɛ kukpɔ̀kpɔ̀!
Lɛ ese linu si keʋesibi ya ka kudzɛgbanɔɔ lipoe le lina,
lɛ yɛ ɔdzɛɛ gi atrágbanɔ ɛ alulɔ yɛ isu ya aki lɛ.
Lɛ bɛki yɛ aklala pititi
gi eeŋle si ɔkpɛ ɛ.” Aklala pititi yɛ onu banɔdradra ba eboe gyɔgyɔ la gi bɛbitɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi mɛ si, “Ŋwlimi si, ‘Biakrira banama gi bɛxwa si ba ba Keʋesibi ya ka kudzɛgbanɔɔ ɔdɔŋakplɔ nɔ su i!’ ” Lɛ apɔnɔ dzɛ si, “Eboa la ya enu Aya yɛ anukwarɛɛ eboe.”

Gi menu nite e, madɔ kesea ní yɛ ikli lɛ onu, tɔ misumu ye. Pɔ̀ asi mɛ si, “Wukíbitɛ lɛ ɛ! wɔ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu menu, wɔ ni wɔ benemi ba gi mlevu Yesu yɛ katsalia mɛ ni awla ɛ. Sù Aya! Lɛ ese linu si anukwarɛ liɛ gi Yesu abasɛ ɛ, bɛ binu kidiliɛ gi Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɔ, gi eeze ní beboedoplɛ ba mɛ, ebu ibasɛ ɛ.”
Lɛ mamɔ lifunu ne gi lidra edu u, lɛ mamɔ isɔ pititi ɔtɔ, gi yɛ ɔkpɛkpɛɛ yɛ bizɛxwa si Anukwarɛɛ onete ni ɔnɔ aʋa gi biaziŋa ɛ. Izɛxwa litsi, lɛ izɛta kigũ ní kude gyɔgyɔ aʋa.
Yɛ bimbi ʋe bilɛ ŋwisi kifu gi kiisɔ gaglaa kinɛ ɛ, lɛ ekume ekusikuto glegle ní yɛ litukpo le. Bɛŋwlimi linyi itɔ ní yɛ su gi ɔnɔnɔ óte sani yɛ ɔtutɔ ko o.
Akpɛ liwu gi bɛkpɛ ní ika lɛ mɛ ɛ, lɛ yɛ linyi ne linu si, Aya yɛ liboe le.
Lɛ lifunu ne baguta ba lihakpɔ lɛ gi bɛkpɛ isɔ pitititi ʋa ɛ, balɛ ni yɛ kude, lɛ bɛkpɛ aklala pititi ewu gi la su ɛɛdra a, xe eeŋle e.

Lɛ dɔni yɛ onugu lo me e, ihɛ inugu tiʋa izeedo gi yɛ izɛɛkɔ ɛɛŋa kuseo aʋa a. “Lɛ aaŋa amade na aʋa ni ɔwla gagla.” Yɛ izɛɛka wain yɛ ní Aya kigaglaɛ petee onetee yɛ kusuyeʋi gaglaa, kɔ wain yɛ ɔkaklɔ.
Lɛ ni yɛ liwu le ni yɛ litagba nɛ su i, bɛŋwlimi linyii nɛ ya; BEKUSI BA AƲA OKUSI NI Baka Ba aʋa Ɔka!
Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ tole ɔtɔ gi ɔlɛɛ ní liwo le me e, lɛ akpɛ ozi ni ole gaglaa atsisi kudzɔʋi yɔ petee gi kuze pruru u, ní liwɔ lɛ mɛ si, “Mlakpɛ isu likpɔ kí Aya yɛ ɔkplɔ ʋidi lo,

atɔ mlaata bekusi ba, ni baguta ba baka ba, banɔ ʋidi ba, isɔ ʋa, ni ba bakpɛkpɛ ba, banima petee, banama gi balɛ ba isuwla mɛ ni banama gi benu banɔ dzidzi i, banɔ bɔtsɔbɔtsɔ ani banɔ gbɔgbɔ ba kigyaɛ.”
Lɛ mamɔ ɔŋuga yɛ ni kesea aʋa bekusi ba ani ba baguta ba gi bɛkpɛ isu likpɔ ɔ, si bɛta kigũ ni ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɔlɛ ní isɔɛ aʋa a ani yɛ baguta ba.

Pɔ̀ bevu ɔŋuga yɛ ni asia na oboedoplɛɛ, gi yɛ azaabitɛ inugutseboe la ní yɛ onu i. Gani eboa la ya elu me e, emeni banama gi bɛzɛ ɔŋuga yɛ lixaŋu kpɛkpɛ lɛ ɛ, xe bɛkpɛ litukpo kese ɛki yɛ litugu ne e. Bɛkɔ ba bagbagbe tiaʋa ba ɛŋwia ɛkpɛ ní lifuha lɛ gi liisɔ ni kifu yɛ akla na mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bɛkɔ ihɛ gblamadza yɛ gi izedo edɔni ɔniliɛ klɔ gi ɛɛkpɛ isɔɛ yɛ onugu lo me e, bɛkɔ yɛ eye banɔ gɔgɔ ba ɛ, lɛ kudzɔʋi yɔ petee kwizɛɛta ba kigyɛ.
Lɛ mamɔ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ ɔtɔ gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne e, gi evu lizokpo gluglu le lɛ safi ye ni bibɔɛ ʋɛ gi bizɛɛkpɛ banima ɛ, biʋidiitɔ ní awla la.
Evu keni ya mɛ ɔgblaga ʋidi ye, ɔgblaga kokoe, gi onu Ozimizi ye loo Satana ɛ, lɛ anya yɛ kɔki agɔ akpe tole e.

Lɛ aŋwia yɛ akpɛ ní lizokpo gluglu le me e, xe ada bidɔ mɛ ní lɛ onu i, lɛ asamu lɛ aʋa ɛ, atɔ okímeni kelea mɛ banima tɔ ɔ, kɔna ni lipoe lɛ klɔ gi agɔ akpe tole la onu ɛɛza ɛ, pɔ̀ lɛ ya kede e, lilɛ si, biable yɛ lipoe kpekpemi itɔ ko o.

Lɛ mamɔ ekusigbo gi banama a, gi bɛki kigagla si baxwa etsi la ɛ, ba bedi ní la aʋa. Lɛ mamɔ banama onu gi bɛti etukpo la kɔkpɛ Yesu yɛ katsalia kuŋaŋaa ani kɔkpɛ Aya yɛ liboe le loso e, ba esobo la. Ba benu banama gi bésu ɔŋuga yɛ loo yɛ etugu na a, lɛ bázɛ yɛ lixaŋu kpɛkpɛ lɛ ní ba kutu yo loo ní ba kuwlakpɔɔ ɔ. Bedzi ligbã́ lɛ bɛŋa kukusi yo ni Kristo agɔ akpe tole.
Banama gi betse e bédzi ligbã́ tɔɔ, kɔna ni lipoe lɛ gi agɔ akpe tole la ɛza ɛ. Lɛ ya linu kuyɔyɔ tɔpu yɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ.

Banɔ gi bɛkrira ni banɔ dradra ba benu banama gi biamɔ ba kapɛa ní kuyɔyɔ tɔpu yɔ dɔni bekpo ʋa mɛ̀ mɛ ɛ. Kutse ʋla kutrámɔ kigagla ní ba aʋa a, boŋu i, biadzi Aya ni Kristo yɛ kusɔliɔ kɔ baka ba, lɛ biaŋa kukusi yo ni yɛ kɔki agɔ akpe tole.
Lɛ xe agɔ akpe tole la onu ɛza ɛ, biabu Satana ní yɛ lizokpo gluglu le me,
lɛ aatrɛ, tɔ yizeemeni kelea petee, dɔni kesea igó tine ne aʋa a, gi inu, Gog ani Magog,
Bɛga klani kesea petee lɛ bɛkpɛ Aya yɛ banima ba likpɔkpɛkpɛ lɛ ni yɛ ɔma ʋidi lo gi alɔ ni kusi yo e. Pɔ̀ kifu yɛ kidɔ ní lifunu ne lɛ kiba ɛkani ba ɛ.
Lɛ bevu Ozimizi ye gi yɛ emeni ba ɛ, ɛŋwia ɛkpɛ ní lifuha ɛlɛ gi liisɔ mɛ ɛ. Niklɔ gi bɛŋwia ɔŋuga yɛ ni asia na oboedoplɛɛ ɛkpɛ ɛ, lɛ biawa ba nyɔnyɔɛ elesi ni kemize tsini kanɔmɛ anɔmɛ ɛ.
Lɛ mamɔ likusigbo pititi ʋidi itɔ ni ɔniliɛ gi odi ní lɛ aʋa ɛ. Lifune ni kesea bise ní yɛ aŋu na mɛ, lɛ bámɔ ʋɛ tɔ ɔ.

Lɛ mamɔ bekpo ʋa, banɔtsitsi ni banuvɔ, gi balɛ ní likusigbo le ɔtɔ nɔ ɛ, lɛ bɛdra kuplekpaa ɛ. Lɛ bɛdra keplekpa dzedze gi ka kenu ligbã nɛ keplekpaa. Lɛ bɛxwa litsi ni bekpo ʋa ní kidiliɛ gi bɛŋwlimi i kpɛ ní kuplekpa liɔ klɔ mɛ ní ba axwɛwawa la su u.
Lɛ axu la ebú banama ma gi bɛwɔ ní la mɛ ɛkɔ, lɛ kutseo ni bekpo ʋa mɛ kyɛ bebu banama gi balɛ ní bɛ mɛ ɛkɔ ɔ, lɛ bɛxwa litsi ni ɔnɔ kakaa ní kidiliɛ gi abitɛ ɛ onu.
Lɛ bɛkɔ kutseo ni bekpo ʋa mɛ ɛŋwia ɛkpɛ ní lifuha lɛ mɛ ɛ. Lifuha ɛlɛ ya linu kutse ʋlaa.
Lɛ xegi báŋwlimi ɔnutɔ yɛ linyi ne akpɛ ní ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ, kɔ bɛŋwia yɛ ɛkpɛ ní lifuha lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ mamɔ lifunu vuvu ni kese vuvu, lɛ ese linu si lifunu tɔpu nɛ ni kese tɔpu ya bɛ onu biza, lɛ axu la amá tɔɔ ɔ.
Lɛ mamɔ ɔma dradra nɔ gi onu Yerusalem vuvu yɛ, gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne ní Aya klɔ ɛ, lɛ bɛlulɔ lɔ ŋwisi ɔdzɛ, gi bɛbitɛ kublabla ɛkɔ ki yenye kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ menu ole gagla ɔtɔ ɛdɔni likusigbo le su si “Abla ɛ, Aya yɛ ozeklɔ ɔlɛ ní banima kusi lɛ yɛ aaze ní basu. Biaze yɛ banɔ, lɛ Aya ɔtutɔ lɔ aaze ní ba su lɛ aaze ba Aya.
Lɛ aatsoli kube kakaa kube ni ba aŋu mɛ. Kutse loo awowoe la kuwawa loo kubemi loo kuyeʋiyeʋi kútraze tɔɔ ɔ, lɛ ese linu si eboe kokoo la ɛɛza.”

Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi odi ní likusigbo le aʋa ɛ, asi mɛ si, “Mɛɛbitɛ kidɔ kakaa si kidzi kivuvu u!” Lɛ apani si, “Ŋwlimi liboe lɛ ya plɛ, lɛ ese linu si eboe ala ya enu anukwarɛ eboe ni eboe gi biazɛ la aʋa ŋa a.”
Lɛ asi mɛ si, “Bɛbitɛ lɛ pɔ́! Mɛ menu Alfa ni Omega, gi lɛ ese linu si okpese klɔ ni ɔgù klɔ. Ɔniliɛ gi olile eeku i, maaki yɛ tɔ aaŋwɛ kuni liʋɛmotsa dɔni ligba nɛ kuni yo kɔ linitɔ lɛ mɛ ɛ.
Ɔniliɛ gi aŋa aʋa ɛ, aazɛ kaŋase alia ya, lɛ maaze yɛ Aya, lɛ yɛ aaze mobi i.

Pɔ̀ befufluse ba ni banama gi báziŋa a ani banama gi bizɛbitɛ anyaniboe la a, bakpɛnɛ ba, banama gi bizɛbitɛ ádzɛboe la ni enyimeboe la a, banama gi bizɛɛbitɛ ehwiboe la a, banama gi bizeesumu babu ʋa a, kɔpɔni basia nɛ ma petee ba ozeklɔ onu lifuha lɛ gi liisɔ ni kifu yɛ akla na a mɛ. Lɛ ya linu kutse ʋlaa a.”

Lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ tiegloele ba, gi ba awla kubɔziʋi tugloeleo o, gi kwiyi ní baxixa tiegloele gɔgɔ ʋa ba mɛ tole aba, lɛ apani nì mɛ si, “Ba, tɔ mibasɛ wɔ ɔdzɛɛ gi bɛkpɛ kuwlawlaa gi onu Keʋesibi ya yedze e.”
Lɛ efeke me ní Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ mɛ atsini lito ʋidi gyɔgyɔ ɛtɔ aʋa ɛ, lɛ ebu ɔma dradra nɔ, Yerusalem, gi eeple dɔni lifunu ne ní Aya klɔ ɛ, abasɛ mɛ.
Eekle ni Aya yɛ kusudraa, lɛ lɔ kuklekleo kulɛ ŋwisi líhuiʋi zi kedziatɔ kinɛ ɛ, ŋwisi yaspis likla, gi lɛ mɛ lidra ŋwisi azinzi kinɛ ɛ.

Ligli gyɔgyɔ ʋidi itɔ liklani lɔ, lɛ kuvunu liɔfɔ ni tuʋa kulɛ ní lɔ su, lɛ Aya yɛ baxwɛdzɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa balɛɛ ní lɔ kuvunu yo o. Bɛŋwlimi Israɛl bebi ʋa ba iku liɔfɔ ni tiʋa lɛ enyina ní lɔ kuvunu yo.
Kuvunu tuta kulɛ ní kewetu ya kapɛa, tuta ni kaʋaa, tuta ní kalaa ni tuta ní keweku ya.
Ɔma ʋidi no lɔ egli la alɛɛ ní ixɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa aʋa, lɛ ni ixɔ liɔfɔ ni tiʋa lɛ aʋa ɛ, bɛŋwlimi Keʋesibi ya ka banɔkpɛkpɛ liɔfɔ ni tiaʋa ba enyi na ɛtrɔ ɔ.
Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛ liɛ gi apani ni mɛ ɛ, evu sika kigyigyeseʋi gi atrákɔ egyigyi ɔma ʋidi no ni lɔ kuvunu yo ni lɔ egli la a.
Ɔma nɔ lɔ kidzedzee me ni lɔ kinenee me bisɔ̀. Egyigyi ɔma nɔ nì kigyigyeseʋi ye lɛ bize itiplɛkɔ akpe tole ni alafa tietsu; lɔ kidzedzee me ni kinenee me ani lɔ kimumu ye me bisɔ.
Lɛ egyigyi ɔma nɔ lɔ ligli le, lɛ amɔ si lɛ kitritri ye me e, kize kuklikpɔ alafa tiaʋa ní ɔnɔ kugyigyi yo onu, gi kɔsu axwɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ɛɛwa ɛ.
Lɛ kidiliɛ gi bɛkɔ ɛtrɔ ligli le e, kinu yaspis likla, lɛ ɔma nɔ onu sika dradra yɛ, gi yɛ mɛ adra ŋwisi azinzi yɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ bɛkɔ akla zikedzi ede ede dzedze la, ɛkɔ ɛlulɔ ɔma nɔ lɔ ɔxɔ lɔ, gi lɔ aʋa egli la alɛ ɛ. Ɔxɔ kpɛkpɛ tɔpu nɔ onu yaspis, ɔʋla lɔ onu safir, ɔtanɛ nɔ onu xalkedon, onene no onu smaragd,
otsunɛ nɔ onu sardonik, oglonɛ nɔ onu kanelia, ogloele lo onu krisolit, ɔgɔtɔʋa yɛ onu beril, ɔgɔtolee onu topas, liɔfɔɛ onu krisopras, liɔfɔ ni tolee onu hiakint, liɔfɔ ni ɔʋlaɛ onu ametis.
Lɛ kuvunu liɔfɔ ni tuʋa kunu ehuʋi pititi liɔfɔ ni taʋa, kevunu kakaa kenu lihuʋi pititi tile, lɛ ɔma nɔ ablɔ ʋa ɛ, benu sika gbã yɛ gi yɛ mɛ adra ŋwisi azinzi mɛ kinɛ ɛ.
Lɛ mámɔ lisɔligba ɛ tɔtɔ ní lɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ese linu si Ɔka Aya, kigaglaɛ petee onetee ni Keʋesibi ya ba benu ba lisɔligba lɛ.
Lɛ ɔma nɔ ɔ́ziã liwo le loo ɔdzidzi yɛ, tɔ aakle ɔbali ní lɔ aʋa, lɛ ese linu si Aya yɛ kusudraa kuzɛɛki lɔ kuklekle o, lɛ Keʋesibi ya kenu lɔ kani yɛ.
Lɛ kesea aʋa banima biaga ní lɔ kuklekleo onu u, lɛ kesea aʋa bekusi ba biakɔ ba exo la ni ba kusudraa mani lɔ mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ batráda lɔ ipupo le liwewe lɛ ese linu si kele kátrablo ní niklɔ ɔ,
Kesea aʋa banima biamani ba exo la ni ba kubùbù yo ní lɔ mɛ.

Lɛ kidɔkakaa gi kɛsu kídra ɛ, kítrati iku ní lɔ mɛ ɛ, lɛ ɔnɔ gi izɛɛbitɛ anyaniboe loo izɛɛsɛ asia kyɛ ɔ́trátiiku isani banama tètè gi ba enyi na akpasi ní Keʋesibi ya ka ligbã́ nɛ keplekpaa mɛ ɛ.
Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ abasi mɛ onipe gi lɔ kuni yo kuzɛɛkɔ ligbã́ nɛ ɛ, gi ɛɛtsi kifu yɛ ŋwisi azinzi kinɛ ɛ, gi ɛɛkpɛ dɔni Aya ni Keʋesibi ya ba likusigbo le su i.

Lɛ ɛɛkpɛ ɛza ni ɔma ʋidi no lɔ ablɔ ʋidi ye yɛ kusio e. Lɛ ní onipe lo ige tiʋa lɛ aʋa ɛ, ligbã́ nɛ ose lo ɔlɛɛ, gi izeeyo lɔ esebi la eyo liɔfɔ ni taʋa ligɔ kakaa, tule ni ɔdzidzi kakaa mɛ ɛ. Lɛ ose lo lɔ awlakpa la ɛ, enu kuwa gi kwiaki amade na petee e aayɔ dɔni ba bànya ʋa mɛ.
Lɛ ifixoxo etɔ́tɔ itráze tɔɔ ɔ, lɛ Aya ni Keʋesibi ya ba likusigbo le liaze ní ɔma ʋidi no me e, lɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba biasumu ye.
Biamɔ yɛ aŋu na mɛ, lɛ yɛ linyi ne liaze ní ba kutu yo.
Kele katráblo tɔɔ, lɛ batrázia kani kuklekle loo liwo le kuklekleo tɔɔ, lɛ ese linu si Ɔkaɛ Aya aaki ba kuklekle o. Lɛ biaŋa kukusi yo dɔni kanɔmɛ tsinɔ kanɔmɛ ɛ.

Lɛ Aya yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ asi mɛ si, “Eboa la ya ɛ, enu eboe aʋa gi biazɛ ŋa a, lɛ enu anukwarɛ eboe. Lɛ Ɔkaɛ Aya, gi yɛ izɛki yɛ beboedoplɛ ba yɛ Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ɛ, yɛ akpɛ yɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ tɔ obu eboa la gi ɛtrába la mɛ kpekpemii basɛ yɛ banɔsumu ba a.”
“Dike, matraba kpekpemi i! Biakrira ɔniliɛ gi evu keplekpaa lia ya mɛ eboedoplɛ la ní awla ɛ.”
Mɛ Yohanes mɛ menu ɔniliɛ gi enu u, xe amɔ eboa la ya a. Lɛ gi menu u, xe mamɔ na ɛ, madɔ ní kesea ní ɔxwɛdzɛɛ ikli lɛ onu tɔ misù ye ɔniliɛ gi yɛ ɛbasɛ mɛ bidɔ bɛ ya ɛ.
Pɔ̀ asi mɛ si, “Wukíbitɛ lɛ ɛ, mɛ kyɛ wɔ ɔhanuglɔ ɔnɔsumu menu, mɛ ni wɔ benemi ba beboedoplɛ ba ani banama gi bevu keplekpaa lia ya mɛ eboe la ní awla ɛ. Sù Aya!.”
Lɛ asi mɛ si, “Wukítsi eboa la gi akpasi ní kuboedoplɛ keplekpaa lia ya onu u, lɛ ese linu si lipoe le lina pɔ́.

Mlaki si ɔniliɛ gi izɛbitɛ eboe zimizi i, ɔtrɛ ní yɛ eboe zimizi na aʋa a. Mlaki si ɔniliɛ gi izɛbitɛ anyaniboe ɔtrɛ ní yɛ anyaniboe la aʋa a. Mlaki si ɔniliɛ gi yɛ bede ʋa bɛɛgyɔ ɛ, oze ní yɛ kude gyɔgyɔɔ aʋa. Mlaki si ɔniliɛ gi adra ɛ, ɔtrɛ ni yɛ kudradraa aʋa a.”
“Dike, matraba kpekpemii, lɛ matsini mɛ liʋɛ nɛ ɛmanɔ, lɛ maatsa liʋɛ ki ɔnɔ kakaa ní kidiliɛ gi abitɛ onu u.
Mɛ menu Alfa ni Omega, Ɔtɔpu yɛ ni Ɔgɔgɔ yɛ, Okpese klɔ ni Ɔgù klɔ.
“Biakrira banama gi beplo ba ewu la, tɔ biamɔ kude tɔ biaŋa ligbã́ nɛ ose lo lɔ biyoyo ʋe, ani tɔ biaga kuvunu yo tɔ biati uku ní ɔma ʋidi no me e.

Banama gi balɛ ní ɔma ʋidi no kede e, ba benu kudroʋio, behwinete ba, banama gi bizɛbitɛ enyimeboe ni ádzɛboe, banama gi bizeye banɔ ɔ, banama gi bizesu babu ʋa a, kɔpɔni banama onu gi asia na izeeze ɔgyi i, xe bizɛɛsɛ asia na a.
“Mɛ Yesu mɛ menu ɔniliɛ gi makpɛ mɛ ɔxwɛdzɛɛ si obu eboa la ya basɛ wɔ, tɔ wɔaŋa katsalia ki isɔliha lɛ ɛ. Mɛ menu Dawid yɛ ogù no ni yɛ osobi ye ani livlɛ lɛ ɔdzidziobi ye gi eekle e.
Ɔfuɛfuɛ nɔ ni ɔdzɛɛ gi bɛgbanɔ ɛ, bɛpani si, “Ba!” Lɛ ɔniliɛ gi eenu i, ɔpani si “Ba!” Ɔniliɛ gi olile eeku i, ɔba, ɔniliɛ gi apɛ́ ɛ, ɔzɛ ligbã́ nɛ kuni yo liʋɛmɔtsa.

Mɛɛgba ɔnɔ kakaa gi eenu kuboedoplɛ uliɔ ɔ, gi kulɛ ní keplekpaa lia mɛ si i: xe ɔnutɔ akɔ kiditɔ apɔni eboa la ya ɛ, Aya aakɔ̀ baxixa ʋa su gi bɛŋwlimi bidɔ mɛ ní keplekpaa lia ya mɛ ɛ, aakɔ̀ pɔnɔ ɔki yɛ.

Lɛ xe ɔnutɔ aabu eboe atɔ ní kuboedoplɛ uliɔ gi kukpasi ní keplekpa lia ya mɛ ɛ, kɔlɔ Aya aabu yɛ ɔŋa klɔ kapɛa dɔni ligbã́ nɛ ose lo ní ɔma dradra lɔ gi bɛŋwlimi kpɛ ní keplekpaa lia ya mɛ ɛ, mɛ.
Ɔniliɛ gi ɛɛŋa katsalia ɛki eboa la ya ɛ, apani si; “Ee, matraba kpekpemi!” Atɔ liba lɛ mɛ. Ɔkaɛ Yesu ba!
Ɔkaɛ Yesu Kristo yɛ lipomepɛpɛ nɛ lize ni Aya yɛ banima. Tɔ liba lɛ mɛ.
